<br>
etāvata āśvāsarahitaṃ śiṣyaṃ jñātvā tasya samāśvāsanaṃ karoti<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;tathaitad vistareṇeha vakṣyāmo bahuyuktibhiḥ /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;abādhitaṃ yathā nūnaṃ svayam evānubhūyate // Mo_3,7.39 //<br>
vayam | "etat" pūrvoktaṃ vastu | "vistareṇa bahuyuktibhiḥ tathā ihā"smin
 śāstre | "vakṣyāmaḥ" | "nūnaṃ" niścaye | "yathā" tvayā "etat abādhitaṃ 
svayam evānubhūyate" ||&nbsp;MoT_3,7.39 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
prakṛtam eva kathayati<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;ādāv eva hi notpannaṃ yat tasyehāstitā kutaḥ  /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;kuto marau jalasarid dvitīyendau kuto grahaḥ // Mo_3,7.40 //<br>
"hi" niścaye | "yat" vastu | "ādāv eva utpannaṃ na" bhavati | 
"tasyehāstitā" sattvam | "kutaḥ" bhavati | atra dṛṣṭāntadvayam kathayati
 "kuta" ityādi ||&nbsp;MoT_3,7.40 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;yathā vandhyāsuto nāsti yathā nāsti marau jalam /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;yathā nāsti nabhovṛkṣas tathā nāsti jagadbhramaḥ // Mo_3,7.41 //<br>
"jagadbhramaḥ" jagadrūpaḥ bhramaḥ | jagad iti yāvat ||&nbsp;MoT_3,7.41 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
tarhi kim idaṃ bhāsate ity | atrāha<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;yad idaṃ dṛśyate rāma tad brahmaiva nirāmayam /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;etat purastād vakṣyāmo yuktito na giraiva vaḥ // Mo_3,7.42 //<br>
asmābhiḥ "yat idaṃ dṛśyate" | "tat nirāmayam" bhāvābhāvākhyāmayarahitam |
 "brahmaiva" bhavati | vayam | "etat purastāt" agre | "yuktitaḥ" 
yuktibhiḥ | "vaḥ" yuṣmākam&nbsp;| "vakṣyāmaḥ" | "na girā eva vakṣyāmaḥ" |
 sārvavibhaktikas tasil ||&nbsp;MoT_3,7.42 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
sargāntaślokena yuktiyuktavākyopekṣāṃ tyājyatvena kathayati<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;yan nāma yuktibhir iha pravadanti tajjñās<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;tatrāvahelanam ayuktam udārabuddheḥ | /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;yo yuktiyuktam avamatya vimūḍhabuddhyā<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;kaṣṭāvaho bhavati taṃ vidur ajñam eva // Mo_3,7.43 //<br>
"nāma" niścaye | "avahelanam" upekṣā | "kaṣṭāvahaḥ" kaṣṭadāyī | 
asambhavaprayatnair ātmana iti śeṣaḥ | iti śivam ||&nbsp;MoT_3,7.43 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
iti śrībhāskarakaṇṭhaviracitāyāṃ śrīmokṣopāyaṭīkāyām utpattiprakaraṇe saptamaḥ sargaḥ || 3,7 ||<br>

śrīrāmaḥ pṛcchati<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;kayaitaj jñāyate yuktyā katham etat prasidhyati /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;nyāye 'nubhūta etasmin na jñeyam avaśiṣyate // Mo_3,8.1 //<br>
"etat" dṛśyāsatyatvam | nanu kimartham atra yuktiṃ pṛcchasīty | atrāha 
"nyāye"ti&nbsp;| yataḥ "etasmin nyāye" | nyāyena "anubhūte" sati | 
"jñeyam nāvaśiṣyate" | yuktiśravaṇena sarvasya jñātatvāt 
||&nbsp;MoT_3,8.1 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
śrīvasiṣṭhaḥ vistarakathanapratijñāṃ sampādayiṣyann uttaraṃ kathayati<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;bahukālam iyaṃ rūḍhā mithyājñānaviṣūcikā /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;jagannāmnī vicārākhyād ṛte mantrān na śāmyati // Mo_3,8.2 //<br>
ā"rūḍhā" buddhau satyatayā sphuritā | jagataś ca mithyājñānarūpatvaṃ 
śuktirajatavaj jñeyam | yuktaś ca "viṣūcikāyāḥ mantreṇa" nāśaḥ 
||&nbsp;MoT_3,8.2 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
vakṣyamāṇopadeśaśravaṇaṃ prati śrīrāmaṃ dṛḍhīkaroti<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;vadāmy ākhyāyikā rāma yā imā bodhasiddhaye /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;tāś cec chṛṇoṣi tat sādho mukta evāsi buddhimān // Mo_3,8.3 //<br>
"ākhyāyikāḥ" upadeśakārīṇi ākhyānāni | "bodhasiddhaye" 
dṛśyātyantābhāvajñānasiddhaye | "muktaḥ" dṛśyenāspṛṣṭaḥ 
||&nbsp;MoT_3,8.3 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
aśravaṇe daṇḍaṃ kathayati<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;no ced udvegaśīlatvād ardhād utthāya gacchasi /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;tat tiryagdharmiṇas te 'dya kiñcin nāpi tu setsyati // Mo_3,8.4 //<br>
tvaṃ "no cet" śṛṇoṣi | atha vā "udvegaśīlatvāt ardhād utthāya gacchasi" |
 "tat" tadā&nbsp;| "tiryagdharmiṇaḥ" paśutulyasya | "te" | "kiñcid api 
na setsyati" ||&nbsp;MoT_3,8.4 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
nanu dṛḍhatayā śravaṇenāpi yadi kiñcin na setsyati tadā kiṃ kāryam ity | atrāha<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;yo yam arthaṃ prārthayate tadarthaṃ yatate tathā /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;so 'vaśyaṃ tad avāpnoti na cec chrānto nivartate // Mo_3,8.5 //<br>
"yaḥ" puruṣaḥ | "yam artham" yat vastu | "prārthayate" prārthanāviṣayaṃ 
karoti | "tathā" tadanukalpena | na tv anyathā | "yatate" | "saḥ avaśyaṃ
 tat āpnoti" | "cet" yadi&nbsp;| "śrāntaḥ na nivartate" 
||&nbsp;MoT_3,8.5 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
nanv aham asmin prārthite vastuni kiṃrūpaṃ yatnaṃ karomīty | atrāha<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;sādhusaṅgamasacchāstraparo bhavasi rāma cet /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;tad dinair eva vā māsaiḥ prāpnoṣi paramaṃ padam // Mo_3,8.6 //<br>
niratiśayapratibhāvattve "dinaiḥ" | anyathā "māsair" | iti vibhāgaḥ ||&nbsp;MoT_3,8.6 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
śrīvasiṣṭhasādhutve niścitaḥ śrīrāmaḥ ātmajñānaprabodhanimittaṃ śāstraṃ pṛcchati<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;ātmajñānaprabodhāya śāstraṃ śāstravidāṃ vara /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;kiṃnāma tatpradhānaṃ syād yasmiñ jñāte na śocyate // Mo_3,8.7 //<br>
"ātmajñānaprabodhāya" ātmajñānāvirbhāvārtham | "na śocyate" dṛśyāsaktirūpaṃ śocanaṃ nānubhūyate ||&nbsp;MoT_3,8.7 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
śrīvasiṣṭha uttaraṃ kathayati<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;ātmajñānapradhānānām idam eva mahāmate /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;śāstrāṇāṃ paramaṃ śāstraṃ mahārāmāyaṇābhidham // Mo_3,8.8 //<br>
"ātmajñānaṃ pradhānaṃ" vācyatayā sārabhūtaṃ yeṣāṃ | te | tādṛśānām | 
"idaṃ rāmāyaṇābhidham" ayam mahārāmāyaṇākhyaḥ itihāsaḥ | nanu 
śrīvālmīkinā svenopanibaddhe śrīmahārāmāyaṇe 
śrīrāmavṛttāntakathanaprasaṅgataḥ śrīrāmaṃ prati śrīvasiṣṭhena kṛtaḥ 
upadeśaḥ nibaddhaḥ yaḥ kenāpi dayālunā asmāc chrīmahārāmāyaṇād uddhṛtaḥ 
tat katham upadeśakālānantarabhāvinaḥ śrīmahārāmāyaṇasya śrīvasiṣṭhena 
"idam" ity anena parāmarśaḥ kṛtaḥ | anena hi śrīmahārāmāyaṇasya 
śrīvasiṣṭhakṛtatvaṃ dyotate iti cet | ārambhe evāsmābhiḥ ayaṃ nirṇayaḥ 
kṛtaḥ | kiṃ punaḥ punaḥ pṛcchasi | yataḥ tatra pratibhāvatāṃ svayam 
asyārthasyāvabodhakatvaṃ uktam | tadrahitānāṃ tv anadhikāraḥ uktaḥ | iti
 pratibhām eva pṛccha | yadi na pratibhā asti tadānadhikāritvān maunam 
eva kāryam ity alaṃ prapañcena ||&nbsp;MoT_3,8.8 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
śrīmahārāmāyaṇam eva praśaṃsati<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;itihāsottamād asmāt paro bodhaḥ pravartate /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;sarveṣām itihāsānām ayaṃ sāra udāhṛtaḥ // Mo_3,8.9 //<br>
"asmāt" rāmāyaṇākhyāt ||&nbsp;MoT_3,8.9 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;śrute 'smin vāṅmaye yasmāj jīvanmuktatvam akṣatam /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;udeti svayam evāta idam evātipāvanam // Mo_3,8.10 //<br>
"vāṅmaye" śāstre ||&nbsp;MoT_3,8.10 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;sthitam evāstam āyāti jagaddṛśyaṃ vicāraṇāt /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;yathā svapne parijñāte svapnārthād eva bhāvanā // Mo_3,8.11 //<br>
"sthitam eva" na tu mudgarādiprahāraiḥ nāśaṃ nītam | atra dṛṣṭāntam āha 
"yathe"ti | "bhāvanā" satyatābhāvanā | "eva"kāraḥ pādapūraṇārthaḥ | ayaṃ
 bhāvaḥ&nbsp;| yathā svapne jāgradavasthāyāṃ asatyatayā parijñāte sati |
 tatrānubhūtaiḥ bhāvābhāvaiḥ harṣāmarṣau na jñāyete | anyathā hi jāgraty
 anubhūtair atītair api bhāvābhāvair iva tatratyaiḥ bhāvābhāvaiḥ 
harṣāmarṣotpādaḥ syāt&nbsp;| tathā mahārāmāyaṇavicāraṇena dṛśye 
asatyatayā jñāte sati dṛśyaviṣayaiḥ bhāvābhāvaiḥ harṣāmarṣau na jñāyete 
iti ||&nbsp;MoT_3,8.11 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
nanv anyāny api śāstrāṇi santy eva | tat katham asyaivāsādhāraṇakāraṇatvaṃ kathayasīty | atrāha<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;yad ihāsti tad anyatra yan nehāsti na tat kvacit /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;idaṃ samastavijñānaśāstrakośaṃ vidur budhāḥ // Mo_3,8.12 //<br>
"yat iha" asmin rāmāyaṇe | "asti" sāmastyena vidyate | "tat anyatra" 
anyaśāstreṣu&nbsp;| "asti" vyastatvena bhavatīty arthaḥ | "yat iha nāsti
 tat kvacit" kutrāpi śāstre | "nāsti"&nbsp;| ataḥ "budhāḥ" 
samastaśāstrasārajñāḥ | "idam" etat śrīmahārāmāyaṇaṃ | 
"samastavijñānaśāstrakośaṃ" sakalādhyātmaśāstrabhāṇḍāgāraṃ | "viduḥ" 
jānanti&nbsp;||&nbsp;MoT_3,8.12 ||<br>

<br>
uktalakṣaṇaśrīmahārāmāyaṇaśravaṇe phalaṃ kathayati<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;ya idaṃ śṛṇuyād nityaṃ tasyodāracamatkṛteḥ /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;bālasyāpi paraṃ bodhaṃ buddhir eti na saṃśayaḥ // Mo_3,8.13 //<br>
"bālasyāpi" mūrkhasyāpīty arthaḥ | paṇḍitasya tu kā katheti bhāvaḥ ||&nbsp;MoT_3,8.13 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
etadvimukhasya kartavyaṃ kathayati<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;yasmai nedaṃ tv abhavyāya rocate duṣkṛtodayāt /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;vicārayatu yatkiñcit sa śāstraṃ jñānavāṅmayam // Mo_3,8.14 //<br>
"abhavyāya" āsurasvabhāvayuktāya | "jñānavāṅmayam" jñānavākyanirbharam&nbsp;||&nbsp;MoT_3,8.14 ||<br>

<br>
nanu muktikāmasya mama kim etacchravaṇenety | atrāha<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;jīvanmuktatvam asmiṃs tu śrute samanubhūyate /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;svayam eva yathā pīte nīrogatvaṃ varauṣadhe // Mo_3,8.15 //<br>
"svayam eva" ayatnam eva ||&nbsp;MoT_3,8.15 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;śrūyamāṇe hi śāstre 'smiñ śrotā vetty etad ātmanā /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;yathāvad idam asmābhir na tūktaṃ varaśāpavat // Mo_3,8.16 //<br>
"etat" maduktaṃ vastu | nanu yady etacchravaṇe pravṛttasya kiñcit 
pratyavāyādi syāt tadā kiṃ kāryam ity | atrāha "idam" iti | 
"varaśāpavat" varaśāpayuktam | mantravad iti śeṣaḥ ||&nbsp;MoT_3,8.16 ||<br>

<br>
sargāntaślokena svātmavicārasya dṛśyātyantābhāvajñāne asādhāraṇakāraṇatvaṃ kathayati<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;śāmyati saṃsṛtiduḥkham idaṃ te<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;svātmavicāramahākathayaiva /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;no dhanadānatapaḥśrutavedais<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;tatkathanojjhitayatnaśatena // Mo_3,8.17 //<br>
"te" tava | "idaṃ" dṛśyasvarūpaṃ | "saṃsṛtiduḥkham" janmākhyaṃ duḥkhaṃ |
 "svātmavicāramahākathayā" | "svātmavicārasya" | yā "mahākathā" 
anyo'nyaṃ mahatī kathā&nbsp;| tay"aiva śāmyati" | 
"dhanadānatapaḥśrutavedaiḥ idaṃ saṃsṛtiduḥkham no śāmyati"&nbsp;| ataḥ 
bhavitavyam iti śeṣaḥ | ataḥ kāraṇāt puruṣeṇa&nbsp;| tasya 
"svātmavicārasya" | yat "kathanam" sādhubhiḥ saha anyo'nyakathanaṃ | 
tadarthaṃ "ujjhitāni" tyaktāni | "yatnaśatāni" kathanavyatiriktāni 
yatnaśatāni | yena | saḥ | tādṛśena bhavitavyam | iti śivam 
||&nbsp;MoT_3,8.17 ||<br>

iti śrībhāskarakaṇṭhaviracitāyāṃ śrīmokṣopāyaṭīkāyām utpattiprakaraṇe 'ṣṭamaḥ sargaḥ || 3,8 ||<br>

oṃ pūrvasargāntaślokārtham eva sphuṭaṃ kathayati<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;taccittās tadgataprāṇā bodhayantaḥ parasparam /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;kathayantaś ca taṃ nityaṃ tuṣyanti ramayanti ye // Mo_3,9.1 //<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;teṣāṃ jñānaikaniṣṭhānām ātmajñānavicāraṇāt /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;sā jīvanmuktatodeti videhonmuktataiva yā // Mo_3,9.2 //<br>
"taccittāḥ" | "tasmin" svātmavicāre | "cittaṃ" yeṣāṃ | te | tādṛśāḥ | 
tathā "tasmin" svātmavicāre | "gatāḥ" niṣṭhāṃ gatāḥ | "prāṇāḥ" 
bāhyendriyāṇi yeṣāṃ | te&nbsp;| tādṛśāḥ | tathā "tam" ātmavicāraṃ | 
"parasparam bodhayantaḥ" | tathā "taṃ" ātmavicāraṃ | "kathayantaś" "ca 
ye" sādhavaḥ | "tuṣyanti" tuṣṭiyuktāḥ bhavanti | tathā "ramayanti" anyān
 tuṣṭiyuktān sampādayanti | ātma"jñānaikaniṣṭhānāṃ" ātmavicāraikaparāṇāṃ
 | "teṣāṃ" puruṣāṇām | "ātmajñānavicāraṇāt sā jīvanmuktatā udeti" 
prādurbhavati | "yā videhamuktataiva" bhavati | niḥśeṣaṃ 
dehābhimānābhāvāt ||&nbsp;MoT_3,9.1-2 ||<br>

<br>
śrīrāmaḥ pṛcchati<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;brahman videhamuktasya jīvanmuktasya lakṣaṇam /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;brūhi yena tathaivāhaṃ yate śāstradṛśā dhiyā // Mo_3,9.3 //<br>
"jīvanmuktasye"ty atra "ca"śabdo 'dhyāhāryaḥ | "yate" yatnaṃ karomi | 
"lakṣaṇam" svarūpapratiṣṭhāpakaḥ dharmaḥ | "dhiyā" buddhyā | 
kathambhūtayā | "śāstram" eva "dṛk" netre | yasyāḥ | sā | tādṛśyā | 
śāstrānusāriṇyety arthaḥ ||&nbsp;MoT_3,9.3 ||<br>

<br>
śrīvasiṣṭha uttaraṃ kathayati<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;yathāsthitam idaṃ yasya vyavahāravato 'pi ca /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;astaṃ gataṃ sthitaṃ vyoma sa jīvanmukta ucyate // Mo_3,9.4 //<br>
"vyavahāravato 'pi" viśvapadārtheṣu vyavahāraṃ kurvato 'pi | "yasya" 
puruṣasya | "yathāsthitam" anena prakāreṇaiva sthitam | na tu kenāpi 
prayatnena nāśitasvarūpaṃ | "idam" puraḥsphuraṇaśīlaṃ jagat | "astaṃ" 
"gataṃ" nāśaṃ gataṃ | ata eva "vyoma" śūnyarūpaṃ bhavati | paṇḍitaiḥ "sa
 jīvanmuktaḥ ucyate" | bhāsamānasya jagataḥ śuktikārajatavat 
asatyatvadarśitvaṃ jīvanmuktalakṣaṇam iti bhāvaḥ ||&nbsp;MoT_3,9.4 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;bodhaikaniṣṭhatāṃ yāto jāgraty eva suṣuptavat /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;ya āste vyavahartaiva sa jīvanmukta ucyate // Mo_3,9.5 //<br>
"bodhe" dṛśyātyantābhāvajñānapūrvake ātmajñāne | "ekaṃ" kevalaṃ | 
"niṣṭhā" ratiḥ yasya | saḥ "bodhaikaniṣṭhaḥ" | tasya bhāvaḥ tat"tā" | 
tām "yātaḥ" gataḥ | "yaḥ" puruṣaḥ | "jāgraty eva" jāgradavasthāyām eva |
 tatrāpi "vyavahartaiva" pravāhāgatavyavahārakāry eva | "suṣuptavat" 
suṣuptyāviṣṭa iva | "āste" | niranusandhāna āste iti yāvat | paṇḍitaiḥ 
"saḥ jīvanmuktaḥ ucyate" | dṛśyate ca stryādiniṣṭhasya puruṣasya jāgrati
 vyavahartur eva sataḥ suṣuptavad avasthitir iti 
nāyastam&nbsp;||&nbsp;MoT_3,9.5 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;nodeti nāstam āyāti sukhe duḥkhe mukhaprabhā /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;yathāprāptasthiter yasya sa jīvanmukta ucyate // Mo_3,9.6 //<br>
"yathāprāptasthiteḥ" pravāhāgataniṣṭhasya | "yasya" | "sukhe duḥkhe" ca 
"mukhaprabhā nodeti nāstam āyāti" harṣāmarṣarāhityāt | paṇḍitaiḥ "saḥ 
jīvanmuktaḥ ucyate"&nbsp;||&nbsp;MoT_3,9.6 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;yo jāgarti suṣuptastho yasya jāgran na vidyate /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;yasya nirvāsano bodhaḥ sa jīvanmukta ucyate // Mo_3,9.7 //<br>
"yaḥ" puruṣaḥ | "jāgarti" bāhyapadārthaviṣayaṃ bodhaṃ bhajati | 
kathambhūtaḥ&nbsp;| "suṣupte" suṣuptau iva tiṣṭhatīti | tādṛśaḥ | 
ekacinmātratāniścayena bāhyaprapañcānusandhānarahitatvāt | tathā "yasya"
 puruṣasya | "jāgrat" laukikā jāgradavasthā | "na vidyate" turyamayatvāt
 | jīvanmukto hi jāgrati sarvaṃ cinmātramayaṃ paśyan turyāvasthāviṣṭa 
eva bhavati | tathā "yasya nirvāsanaḥ" ahaṃmamatārūpavāsanārahitaḥ | 
"bodhaḥ" bāhyadehādipadārthajñānaṃ | bhavati | paṇḍitaiḥ "sa jīvanmukta 
ucyate" ||&nbsp;MoT_3,9.7 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;rāgadveṣabhayādīnām anurūpaṃ carann api /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;yo 'ntar vyomavad atyacchaḥ sa jīvanmukta ucyate // Mo_3,9.8 //<br>
"yaḥ" puruṣaḥ | "rāgadveṣabhayādīnām anurūpaṃ caran api" | rāgādhāre 
putrādau ratiṃ bhajan api | dveṣādhāre śatrau vimukho bhavan api | 
bhayakāraṇāt siṃhādeḥ calan api | "antaḥ" manasi | "vyomavat atyacchaḥ" 
atinirmalaḥ bhavati | putrādiviṣayasya ratyādeḥ pravāhabalena 
niranusandhānakaraṇāt | anusandhāna eva hi manasi malaṃ bhavati | 
paṇḍitaiḥ "saḥ jīvanmuktaḥ ucyate" | "ādi"śabdena dehādiviṣayāṇām 
asmitādīnāṃ grahaṇam ||&nbsp;MoT_3,9.8 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;yasya nāhaṅkṛto bhāvo buddhir yasya na lipyate | /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;kurvato 'kurvato vāpi sa jīvanmukta ucyate // Mo_3,9.9 //<br>
"yasya" puruṣasya | "ahaṅkṛtaḥ bhāvaḥ" ahaṅkāramayī cittavṛttiḥ | 
"nā"sti | sarvatra brahmakartṛtvadarśanāt | tathā "yasya" puruṣasya | 
"buddhiḥ na lipyate" lepayuktā na kriyate | rāgādirūpaiḥ pāpair iti 
śeṣaḥ | paṇḍitaiḥ "saḥ jīvanmukta ucyate"&nbsp;| "yasya" kathambhūtasya |
 "kurvataḥ" śarīrayātrānimittaṃ pravāhāgataṃ vā karma kurvataḥ | tathā 
kenāpi kāraṇena "akurvataḥ" vā | tatra karaṇakāle niranusandhānakaraṇāt 
akaraṇakāle śuddhacinmātraparāmarśaniṣṭhatvāt ahambhāvadhīleparāhityaṃ 
jñeyam&nbsp;||&nbsp;MoT_3,9.9 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;yaś conmeṣanimeṣābhyāṃ vidheḥ pralayasambhavau /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;paśyet trilokyāḥ khasamaḥ sa jīvanmukta ucyate // Mo_3,9.10 //<br>
"khasamaḥ" ākāśasadṛśaḥ | "yaḥ" puruṣaḥ | "trilokyāḥ vidheḥ" 
bhvādibāhyatrilokīvidhānasya jāgradādyāntaratrilokīvidhānasya ca | 
"unmeṣanimeṣābhyāṃ" | arthāt paramātmatayā niścitasya cittattvasya 
"unmeṣeṇa" cetyānaunmukhyākhyena prādurbhāvena | "nimeṣeṇa" 
cetyaunmukhyākhyena svarūpagopanena | "pralayasambhavau" "paśyati" 
saṃhārotpattī | tathā tirobhāvāvirbhāvau paśyati | paṇḍitaiḥ "saḥ 
jīvanmuktaḥ ucyate" | atha vā svaparāmarśaḥ "unmeṣaḥ" | tatrāpi upekṣā 
"nimeṣaḥ" | tathā ca unmeṣeṇa sambhavaḥ | nimeṣeṇa pralayaḥ | iti 
yathāsaṅkhyaṃ vihāyaiva sambandhaḥ kāryaḥ&nbsp;||&nbsp;MoT_3,9.10 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;bhoktaiva yo na bhokteva śuddhabodhaikatāṃ gataḥ /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;buddhaḥ supta ivāste 'ntaḥ sa jīvanmukta ucyate // Mo_3,9.11 //<br>
"śuddhabodhaikatāṃ" śuddhabodhenaikatvaṃ "gataḥ" | "yaḥ" puruṣaḥ | 
"buddhaḥ" bodhayuktaḥ san | "antaḥ suptaḥ iva āste" tiṣṭhati | 
niranusandhānatvāt | "yaḥ" kathambhūta "iva" | "bhoktā eva" 
bhujikriyākartṛtvaṃ bhajann eva | "abhoktā iva" svasmin 
śuddhabodhatājñānena bhoktāham ity abhimānābhāvāt | paṇḍitaiḥ "saḥ 
jīvanmuktaḥ ucyate"&nbsp;||&nbsp;MoT_3,9.11 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;nityaṃ draṣṭaiva cādraṣṭā jīvann eva mṛtopamaḥ /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;vyavahartaiva śailābhaḥ sa jīvanmukta ucyate // Mo_3,9.12 //<br>
yaḥ "draṣṭaiva" dṛśikriyākartṛtvaṃ bhajann eva | na tv andhavat tiṣṭhan |
 "adraṣṭā" bhavati | tathā yaḥ "jīvann eva" jīvanakriyākartṛtvaṃ bhajann
 eva | "mṛtopamaḥ" bhavati | mṛtasadṛśaḥ bhavati | mṛtavat 
bhogādivāñchābhāvāt | tathā yaḥ "vyavahartā eva" vyavahāraṃ kurvan eva |
 "śailābhaḥ" bhavati | tattvataḥ kṣobharāhityāt | paṇḍitaiḥ "saḥ 
jīvanmuktaḥ ucyate" ||&nbsp;MoT_3,9.12 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;yasmān nodvijate loko lokān nodvijate ca yaḥ /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;harṣāmarṣabhayonmuktaḥ sa jīvanmukta ucyate // Mo_3,9.13 //<br>
"lokaḥ" sāmānyalokaḥ | "yasmāt nodvijate" udvegakāraṇābhāvena udvegaṃ na
 yāti&nbsp;| tathā "yaḥ lokāt na udvijate" niṣprayojanatvāt | 
svaprayojanaparaḥ eva hi yebhyaḥ svaprayojanaṃ na paśyati tebhyaḥ 
udvijate | "yaḥ" kathambhūtaḥ | "harṣāmarṣabhayonmuktaḥ" 
harṣāmarṣabhayarahitaḥ | svasmin śuddhabodhaikatājñānāt | paṇḍitaiḥ "saḥ
 jīvanmuktaḥ ucyate" ||&nbsp;MoT_3,9.13 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;śāntasaṃsārakalanaḥ kalāvān api niṣkalaḥ /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;yaḥ sacitto 'pi niścittaḥ sa jīvanmukta ucyate // Mo_3,9.14 //<br>
"śāntā" ātmani cinmātratādarśanena layaṃ gatā | "saṃsārakalanā" yasya | 
saḥ | tādṛśaḥ | "yaḥ" puruṣaḥ | "kalāvān api" jñānākhyakalāyukto 'pi | 
"niṣkalaḥ" kalābhyaḥ niṣkrāntaḥ bhavati | svasya niṣkalacinmātratājñānāt
 | tathā "yaḥ sacittaḥ api" śuddhasattvasvarūpacittayuktaḥ api | 
"niścittaḥ" cittān niṣkrāntaḥ bhavati&nbsp;| malinacittābhāvāt&nbsp;| 
paṇḍitaiḥ "saḥ jīvanmuktaḥ ucyate" ||&nbsp;MoT_3,9.14 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;yaḥ samastārthajāteṣu vyavahāry api śītalaḥ /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;parārtheṣv iva pūrṇātmā sa jīvanmukta ucyate // Mo_3,9.15 //<br>
"pūrṇātmā" nirapekṣaśāntacinmātratvena tṛptātmā | "yaḥ 
samastārthajāteṣu" pravāhāgateṣu sakaleṣu prayojanasamūheṣu | "śītalaḥ" 
kim ayaṃ sidhyati na veti santāparahitaḥ bhavati | keṣv "iva" | 
"parārtheṣv iva" | yathā laukikaḥ "parārtheṣu śītalaḥ" bhavati&nbsp;| 
tathety arthaḥ | paṇḍitaiḥ "sa jīvanmuktaḥ ucyate" ||&nbsp;MoT_3,9.15 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
jīvanmuktim uktvā kramaprāptāṃ videhamuktiṃ kathayati<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;jīvanmuktapadaṃ tyaktvā dehe kālavaśāt kṣate /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;cid yāty adehamuktatvaṃ pavanaḥ spandanām iva // Mo_3,9.16 //<br>
"cit" lakṣaṇayā cidbhāvatāgataḥ jīvanmuktaḥ | "dehe" śarīre | 
"kālavaśāt" niyativaśena&nbsp;| "kṣate" naṣṭe sati | "jīvanmuktapadam" 
jīvanmuktatāṃ | "tyaktvā" | "adehamuktatvaṃ" videhamuktabhāvaṃ | "yāti" |
 ka "iva" kāṃ "tyaktvā" | "pavana iva spandanām"&nbsp;| yathā "pavanaḥ 
spandanām" ceṣṭākaraṇam | tyajati | tathety arthaḥ | "pavanaḥ spandatām 
ive"ti vā pāṭhaḥ ||&nbsp;MoT_3,9.16 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
jīvanmuktavat tasyāpi lakṣaṇāni leśataḥ kathayati<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;videhamukto nodeti nāstam eti na śāmyati /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;na san nāsan na dūrasthaṃ na cāhaṃ na ca vetarat // Mo_3,9.17 //<br>
"videhamuktaḥ" anahambhāvena gṛhītasya dehasyāpy abhāvena videhamuktiṃ 
gataḥ puruṣaḥ | "na udeti" sadoditacinmātrabhāvena avasthānāt | tathā 
"astam na eti" | yathā tathā kalpitasya tadastasya tataḥ evotthānāt | 
anyathāsambhavāt&nbsp;| tathā "na śāmyati" saṃsārabhānābhāvaprasaṅgāt | 
"na sat" bhavati | bāhyāntarakaraṇāgocaratvāt | tathā "asat na" bhavati |
 etādṛkprapañcabhāvena bhānābhāvaprasaṅgāt | na hi śaśaśṛṅgaṃ kenāpi 
rūpeṇa bhātuṃ śaknoti | tathā "dūrasthaṃ na" bhavati | sarveṣām 
ahantāsāratvena sthitatvāt | tathā "ahaṃ na" bhavati | paricchinnaḥ 
pramātā na bhavati | aparimitapramātṛtvena sthitatvāt | tathā "itarat" 
parimitaṃ prameyaṃ | "na" bhavati | aparimitaprameyabhāvena sthitatvāt 
||&nbsp;MoT_3,9.17 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
viśvottīrṇatām uktvā viśvamayatāṃ leśataḥ kathayati<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;sūryo bhūtvā pratapati viṣṇuḥ pāti jagattrayam /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;rudraḥ sarvān saṃharati sarvān sṛjati padmajaḥ // Mo_3,9.18 //<br>
asau śuddhacinmātratāṃ yātaḥ videhamuktaḥ "sūryo bhūtvā" sūryabhāvam 
āsādya | "pratapati" tāpakriyākartṛtvaṃ bhajati | tathā "viṣṇuḥ bhūtvā 
jagattrayaṃ pāti" rakṣati&nbsp;| evaṃ sarvatra yojyam | eṣāṃ sūryādīnāṃ 
ca bāhyāntaratvena dvaividhyaṃ jñeyam&nbsp;| bāhye hi "sūryaḥ" yaḥ 
vyomni dṛśyate | āntaras tu prāṇaḥ&nbsp;| sūryavat śarīrapākakāritvāt | 
tathā "viṣṇuḥ" buddhiḥ | tadvat saṅkalpasthitikāritvāt | tathā "rudraḥ" 
ahaṅkāraḥ | tadvat sarvasaṅkalpānāṃ svasmin layīkaraṇāt&nbsp;| tathā 
"padmajaḥ" manaḥ&nbsp;| tadvat saṅkalpotpādakatvāt | evaṃ yathāsambhavaṃ
 sarvatra yojyam | nanu kathaṃ videhamuktaḥ 
sūryādicarācarapadārthabhāvam āgatya tadgatāḥ sarvāḥ kriyāḥ karotīti cet
 | satyam | tatra carāḥ tāvat sphuṭam eva 
antaryāmiśuddhacittattvādhiṣṭhitāḥ lakṣyante | anyathā maraṇāvasthāṃ 
gateṣv api teṣu prāgvat kriyādhāratvaprasaṅgāt | nanu tatkriyāyāṃ prāṇa 
eva prerakaḥ dṛśyate | niṣprāṇānām acaraśarīrāṇāṃ niṣkriyatvadarśanāt | 
asad etat | na hi prāṇo nāmātra prerakatve samarthaḥ kaścic cetana iva 
lakṣyate | kiṃ tv anyasya kasyāpi svatantrasya cetanasya preraṇayā | 
devadattapreryamāṇakandukavat nirgamapraveśakārīva dṛśyate iti śuddhasya
 cinmātrasyaiva carāntaryāmitvena caragatakriyākartṛtvaṃ jñāyate&nbsp;| 
acareṣv api dṛśyamāṇā avasthitikriyā kriyātvāt caragatakriyāvat tatkṛtā 
eva jñeyā&nbsp;| yataḥ yatra sākṣāc cetanatayā bhāsamānānāṃ carāṇāṃ 
svakriyāyām asāmarthyam asti tatra sākṣāj jaḍatvena bhāsamānānāṃ 
acarāṇāṃ kā kathā kriyākāritve&nbsp;| tena yathā adhiṣṭhātṛbhūtena 
devadattena kvacit sthāpitāḥ stambhādayaḥ tiṣṭhanti tathā svāntargatena 
kenāpi tattvena sthāpitāḥ acarāḥ tiṣṭhantīti jñeyam&nbsp;| tatra 
devadattasya tebhyaḥ bahiḥsthatā pratyakṣam eva dṛśyate iti na tatra 
tasya tadantargatatvaṃ kalpyate | atra tu bahiḥ sthūlasya kasyāpy 
adarśanāt tadantargatatvaṃ kalpyate&nbsp;| bahirgatatvam api tasya na 
virudhyate ity āstām etat | evaṃ ca śuddhacinmātre paryavasitaṃ 
sarvakriyākartṛtvaṃ tanmayatāgate tasminn api siddham eva | samudre 
līnasya jalabindoḥ iva samudraguṇaviśiṣṭatvam | avaśiṣṭaṃ mṛtaśarīram 
api pakṣākṣiptam eva jñeyam | nanu tathāpi videhamuktaḥ
sarvāḥ kriyāḥ karotīty etāvanmātram eva siddham | na tu sarvaṃ bhūtvety 
etat siddham | tatra kā vārteti cet&nbsp;| satyam&nbsp;| tatreyaṃ vārtā |
 carācarāḥ bhāvāḥ kimmayāḥ iti vicāryamāṇe tatsvarūpaṃ hastagrāhābhāvāt 
anirvācyatāyām eva viśrāmyati | anirvācyatā eva ca śuddhacittattvasya 
svarūpam iti śuddhacidrūpatāṃ gatasya videhamuktasya sarvabhāvo yukta 
eveti na ko 'pi virodhaḥ | etac ca śuddhacittattvasvarūpam anubhavatsu 
pratyakṣasiddham eva&nbsp;| tadavidvadarthe tu ayaṃ prayatnaḥ kṛta ity 
alaṃ prapañcena ||&nbsp;MoT_3,9.18 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;khaṃ bhūtvā pavanaskandhān dhatte sarkṣasurāsurān /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;kulācalagaṇo bhūtvā lokapālapurāspadam // Mo_3,9.19 //<br>
"sarkṣasurāsurān" nakṣatradevāsurasahitān | "kulācalagaṇaḥ bhūtvā lokapālapurāspadaṃ" bhavatīti sambandhaḥ ||&nbsp;MoT_3,9.19 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;bhūmir bhūtvā bibhartīmāṃ lokasthitim akhaṇḍitām /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;tṛṇagulmalatā bhūtvā dadāti phalasantatim // Mo_3,9.20 //<br>
spaṣṭam ||&nbsp;MoT_3,9.20 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;bibhraj jalānalākāraṃ jvalati bhavati drutaḥ /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;candro 'mṛtaṃ prasravati mṛtiṃ hālāhalaṃ viṣam // Mo_3,9.21 //<br>
"jalākāraṃ bibhrad drutaḥ" dravaguṇayuktaḥ | "bhavati" | "analākāraṃ 
bibhrat jvalatī"ty yojyam | "candro" bhūtvā "hālāhalaṃ" bhūtveti 
sambandhanīyam ||&nbsp;MoT_3,9.21 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;tejaḥ prakaṭayaty āśās tanoty āndhyaṃ tamo bhavat /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;śūnyaṃ sad vyomatām eti giriḥ san rodhayaty alam // Mo_3,9.22 //<br>
"rodhayati" rodhanaṃ karoti ||&nbsp;MoT_3,9.22 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;karoti jaṅgamaṃ cittve sthāvaraṃ sthāvarākṛtiḥ /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;bhūtvārṇavo valayati bhūstriyaṃ valayo yathā // Mo_3,9.23 //<br>
"cittve" cidbhāve sthitvā | cidbhāvayukto bhūtveti yāvat | "jaṅgamaṃ 
karoti" "sthāvarākṛtiḥ" san "sthāvaraṃ karoti" | "arṇavaḥ bhūtvā 
bhūstriyaṃ" bhūr eva strī | tām "valayati" samantāt paryanteṣu āvṛṇoti |
 ko "yathā" | "valayo yathā" | "yathā valayaḥ striyaṃ" | arthāt 
strībhujaṃ | "valayati" | tathety arthaḥ ||&nbsp;MoT_3,9.23 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;paramārkavapur bhūtvā prakāśe 'ntar visārayan /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;trijagattrasareṇvoghaṃ śāntam evāvatiṣṭhati // Mo_3,9.24 //<br>
"paramārkavapuḥ" citsūryavapuḥ | "bhūtvā" | "prakāśe" prakāśarūpāyāṃ 
svabhittau&nbsp;| "trijagattrasareṇvoghaṃ" trijagadākhyaṃ 
paramāṇusamūhaṃ | "visārayan" vistārayan | "śāntam eva" sākṣibhāvena 
sthitatvāt tatkṛtakṣobharahitam ev"āvatiṣṭhati"&nbsp;| yuktaṃ cārkasya 
prakāśe trasareṇvoghavisāraṇaṃ śāntam avasthānaṃ 
ca&nbsp;||&nbsp;MoT_3,9.24 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
viśeṣakalanām aśakyāṃ jñātvā sāmānyena kathayati<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;yat kiñcid idam ābhāti bhātaṃ vā bhām upaiṣyati /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;kālatrayagataṃ dṛśyaṃ tad asau sarvam eva vā // Mo_3,9.25 //<br>
"vā" pakṣāntare | "yat kiñcit idaṃ" jagat | "bhātam" pūrvaṃ sphuritaṃ | 
tathā "ābhāti" adya sphurati | tathā "bhām" sphuraṇam | "upaiṣyati" agre
 āgamiṣyati | "tat kālatrayagatam sarvaṃ dṛśyam asau" uktaḥ videhamuktaḥ
 | bhavati ||&nbsp;MoT_3,9.25 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
atra śrīrāmaḥ pṛcchati<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;katham evaṃ vada brahman bhūyate viṣamā hi me /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;dṛṣṭir eṣā tu duṣprāpā durākramyeti niścayaḥ // Mo_3,9.26 //<br>
he "brahman" | tvaṃ "vada" kathaya | puruṣeṇa "evam" etādṛgguṇayuktena 
videhamuktena | "katham bhūyate" kathaṃ sampadyate | "hi" yasmāt kāraṇāt
 | "me niścayaḥ" | "iti" evaṃ | bhavati | "iti" kim | "iti viṣamā" 
kaṭhinā | "eṣā" pūrvoktā | "dṛṣṭiḥ" videhamuktirūpā dṛṣṭiḥ | "duṣprāpā 
durākramyā" ca bhavati ||&nbsp;MoT_3,9.26 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
śrīvasiṣṭha uttaraṃ kathayati<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;muktir eṣocyate rāma brahmaitat samudāhṛtam /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;nirvāṇam etat kathitaṃ śṛṇu samprāpyate katham // Mo_3,9.27 //<br>
he "rāma" | paṇḍitaiḥ "eṣā" etat videhamuktatvaṃ | "muktiḥ ucyate" | 
jīvanmuktatvasya sattvarūpacittāśrayatvenāmuktikalpatvāt | paṇḍitaiḥ 
"etat" "brahma samudāhṛtam" kathitam | sarvapadārthabhāvena 
bṛṃhaṇābhāktvāt | paṇḍitaiḥ "etat nirvāṇaṃ kathitam" sarvathā 
parimitāhantāyāḥ layībhāvāt | tvaṃ "śṛṇu etat" puruṣeṇa "kathaṃ 
prāpyate"&nbsp;||&nbsp;MoT_3,9.27 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;yad idaṃ dṛśyate dṛśyam ahaṃtvattādisaṃyutam /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;sato 'py asyāpy anutpattyā buddhyā vaitad avāpyate // Mo_3,9.28 //<br>
asmābhiḥ | "ahaṃtvattādisaṃyutaṃ yad idam dṛśyaṃ" jagat | "dṛśyate" 
anubhūyate&nbsp;| "sataḥ api" evam eva sthitasyāpi | "asya" jagataḥ | 
"anutpattyāḥ buddhyā" anutpannam evedam ity evaṃrūpasya abhāvasya 
jñānenaiva | tajjagadviṣayānutpannatvajñāneneti yāvat | "etat" uktaguṇaṃ
 videhamuktatvam | "avāpyate" prāpyate&nbsp;| "apivā"śabdau evaśabdārthe
 | etena dṛśyātyantābhāvasya videhamuktiṃ prati kāraṇatvam uktam 
||&nbsp;MoT_3,9.28 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
śrīrāmaḥ punaḥ pṛcchati<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;videhamuktās trailokyaṃ sampadyante yadā tadā /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;manye te sargatām eva gatā vedyavidāṃ vara // Mo_3,9.29 //<br>
"videhamuktāḥ yadā" yadi | "trailokyaṃ sampadyante" | he "vedyavidāṃ 
vara" | ahaṃ "manye" | "tadā te sargatām eva gatāḥ" sargabhāvam eva 
gatāḥ bhavanti | sargāntargatapadārthabhāvenaiva sphuraṇāt 
||&nbsp;MoT_3,9.29 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
śrīvasiṣṭha uttaraṃ kathayati<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;vidyate cet tribhuvanaṃ tat tattāṃ samprayāntu te /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;yatra trailokyaśabdārtho na sambhavati kaścana // Mo_3,9.30 //<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;tatra trilokatāṃ yātaṃ brahmety uktyarthadhīḥ kutaḥ |<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;tasmān no sambhavaty anyā jagacchabdārthakalpanā ||&nbsp;MoT_3,9.31 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
"tribhuvanaṃ" sargaḥ |"ced" yadi | "vidyate" satyaṃ bhavati | "tat" tadā
 | "te" videhamuktāḥ | "tattām" tribhuvanatāṃ | "samprayāntu" samyak 
gacchantu | "yatra" yasmin sthāne&nbsp;| "kaścana trailokyaśabdārthaḥ" 
trailokyaśabdayuktaḥ arthaḥ | "trailokyaśabdārthaḥ" trailokyākhyaḥ 
śabdaḥ tadarthaś ceti yāvat | "na sambhavati" | "tatra" tasmin sthāne | 
"ity uktyarthadhīḥ" evaṃrūpoktyarthākārā dhīḥ | evaṃrūpā uktiḥ evaṃrūpaḥ
 arthaś ceti yāvat | "kutaḥ" bhavati | trailokyaśabdārthayor asambhavāt |
 na sambhavatīty arthaḥ | "iti" kim | "iti" "brahma" lakṣaṇayā 
videhamuktaḥ | "trilokatāṃ" sargatāṃ&nbsp;| "yātaṃ" bhavati | 
upasaṃhāraṃ karoti "tasmād" iti | "tasmāt" tato hetoḥ | "anyā" brahmaṇaḥ

bhavati ||&nbsp;MoT_3,9.30-31 ||<br>

<br>
anena prasaṅgena jagadbrahmaṇoḥ aikyam eva punaḥ punaḥ kathayati<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;ananyac chāntam ābhāsamātram ākāśanirmalam /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;brahmaiva jagad ity eva satyaṃ satyāvabodhinaḥ // Mo_3,9.32 //<br>
"jagat" kartṛ | "ananyat" sarvarūpatvena sthitatvāt 
svavyatiriktavasturahitaṃ | "śāntaṃ" svarūpe viśrāntam | 
"ābhāsamātrakam" ābhāsamātrasvarūpam | "ākāśanirmalam" ākāśavat svaccham
 | "brahma eva" bhavati | "ity eva" etad eva | "satyāvabodhinaḥ" 
satyajñānayuktasya | "satyaṃ" bhavati ||&nbsp;MoT_3,9.32 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
atra dṛṣṭāntaṃ kathayati<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;yathā hi hemakaṭake vicāryāpi na dṛśyate /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;kaṭakatvaṃ kvacin nāma ṛte nirmalahāṭakam // Mo_3,9.33 //<br>
"yathā hī"ti dṛṣṭāntatvadyotakam | asmābhiḥ | "hemakaṭake" suvarṇavalaye
 | "vicāryāpi" vicārayitvāpi | "nirmalahāṭakam ṛte kaṭakatvaṃ nāma 
kvacit na dṛśyate" | yathā kaṭakaṃ hemaiva bhavati tathā jagat brahmaiva
 bhavatīti pūrvaślokadṛṣṭāntatayā yojyam uttaraślokadvayaṃ ca 
||&nbsp;MoT_3,9.33 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
dvitīyaṃ dṛṣṭāntaṃ kathayati<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;jalād ṛte payovīcau nāhaṃ paśyāmi kiñcana /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;vīcitvaṃ tvādṛśair dṛṣṭaṃ yat tu nāsty eva tatra hi // Mo_3,9.34 //<br>
"ahaṃ payovīcau" jalataraṅge | "jalād ṛte kiñcana na paśyāmi" payovīcau "nāsti" ||&nbsp;MoT_3,9.34 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
tṛtīyaṃ dṛṣṭāntaṃ kathayati<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;spandatvaṃ pavanād anyan na kadācana kutracit /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;spanda eva sadā vāyur jagat tasmān na vidyate // Mo_3,9.35 //<br>
"kadācana" kutrāpi kāle | "kutracit" kutrāpi deśe | "spandatvam pavanāt 
anyat na" bhavati | yataḥ "vāyuḥ spanda eva" bhavati | phalitaṃ 
kathayati "jagad" iti | yataḥ jagataḥ brahmatve dṛṣṭāntatrayam asti 
"tasmāt jagat na vidyate" | ataś ca videhamuktasya sargatāgamanaṃ kathaṃ
 bhavatīti bhāvaḥ ||&nbsp;MoT_3,9.35 ||<br>

<br>
<br>
punar api pūrvoktam artham eva sadṛṣṭāntaṃ kathayati<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;yathā śūnyatvam ākāśas tāpa eva marau jalam /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;teja eva yathāloko brahmaiva trijagat tathā // Mo_3,9.36 //<br>
spaṣṭam ||&nbsp;MoT_3,9.36 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
śrīrāmaḥ pṛcchati<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;atyantābhāvasampattyā jagaddṛśyasya muktatā /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;yayodeti mune yuktyā tāṃ mamopadiśottamām // Mo_3,9.37 //<br>
he "mune" | "jagaddṛśyasya" jagadrūpasya dṛśyasya | "yayā yuktyā 
atyantābhāvasampattyā" atyantābhāvasampādanena | "muktatā udeti" | tvam 
"mama uttamāṃ" niratiśayām | "tām" yuktiṃ | "upadiśa" | 
jagadviṣayasyātyantābhāvasya muktatāsādhane kathaṃ sāmarthyam astīty 
atra yuktiṃ kathayeti bhāvaḥ ||&nbsp;MoT_3,9.37 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
nanu yuktim eva kiṃ punaḥ punaḥ pṛcchasīty atrottarakathanapūrvaṃ praśnāntaraṃ karoti<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;mithaḥ sampannayor draṣṭṛdṛśyayor ekasaṅkṣaye /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;dvayābhāve sthitiṃ yāte nirvāṇam avaśiṣyate // Mo_3,9.38 //<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;dṛśyasya jagatas tasmād atyantānudbhavo yathā /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;brahma cetthaṃ svabhāvasthaṃ budhyate vada me tathā // Mo_3,9.39 //<br>
uktanītyā "mithaḥ sampannayoḥ" yataḥ tvayaivaitad uktam iti śeṣaḥ | 
yataḥ tvayā eva uktaṃ "mithaḥ sampannayoḥ" uktanītyā mithaḥ siddhayoḥ | 
"draṣṭṛdṛśyayoḥ" madhye&nbsp;| "ekasaṅkṣaye" sati | tataḥ "dvayābhāve 
sthitiṃ yāte" sati | "nirvāṇaṃ" kaivalyam | "avaśiṣyate" | "tasmāt" 
tataḥ kāraṇāt | "dṛśyasya jagataḥ" dṛśyasvarūpasya jagataḥ | 
"atyantānudbhavaḥ" atyantābhāvasvarūpā atyantānutpattiḥ | "yathā" yayā 
yuktyā | "budhyate" jñāyate | "tathā brahma" jagadbhāvena bṛṃhitaṃ 
śuddhacittattvaṃ | "itthaṃ" jagadrūpeṇa | "svabhāvasthaṃ" svarūpasthaṃ |
 "yathā budhyate"&nbsp;| tvaṃ "tathā ca me vada" kathaya 
||&nbsp;MoT_3,9.38-39 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
rasāveśenonmattavat punar api dṛśyātyantābhāvasiddhiyuktiṃ brahmaṇaḥ itthaṃsvabhāvāvasthitiyuktiṃ ca pṛcchati<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;kayaitaj jñāyate yuktyā katham etat prasidhyati | /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;etasmiṃs tu mune siddhe na sādhyam avaśiṣyate // Mo_3,9.40 //<br>
"etat" ayaṃ dṛśyātyantābhāvaḥ idam brahmaṇaḥ itthaṃsvabhāvāvasthānaṃ 
ca&nbsp;| nanu kimartham atra punaḥ punaḥ praśnān karoṣīty | atrāha 
"etasmin" iti | he "mune" | "etasmin siddhe" sati | "sādhyam" sādhanīyaṃ
 | "nāvaśiṣyate" avaśiṣṭaṃ na bhavati | muktimātrasyaivākāṅkṣitatvāt 
tasya cānenaiva siddhatvāt ||&nbsp;MoT_3,9.40 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
śrīvasiṣṭhaḥ uttaraṃ kathayati<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;bahukālam iyaṃ rūḍhā mithyājñānaviṣūcikā | /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;nūnaṃ vicāramantreṇa nirmūlam upaśāmyati // Mo_3,9.41 //<br>
"nūnaṃ" niścaye | "iyaṃ mithyājñānaviṣūcikā" śuddhacinmātre dṛśyam idam 
ity evaṃrūpo jñānaviśeṣaḥ | "rūḍhā" manasi satyatvena bhātā | yuktaṃ ca 
"mantreṇa" viṣūcikāyāḥ upaśamanam | "vicāraś" cātra kiṃrūpam idaṃ dṛśyam
 ity evaṃrūpo jñeyaḥ&nbsp;||&nbsp;MoT_3,9.41 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
nanv asmin samaye mayā kṛta eva leśato vicāraḥ | tat katham idaṃ dṛśyaṃ na śāntam ity | atrāha<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;na śakyate jhagity eva samucchedayituṃ kṣaṇāt /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;samaprayatane hy adrau samārohāvarohaṇe // Mo_3,9.42 //<br>
"samucchedayituṃ" nāśayitum | uttarārdhenaitat samarthayati "same"ti | 
yathā kaścit parvatāgram ārūḍhaḥ tataś cāvataritum icchan "na jhagity 
evā"vatarituṃ śaknoti | tathā cirarūḍhā dṛśyasatyatāpratītiḥ "na 
jhagiti" dūrīkartuṃ "śakyate" iti bahukālaṃ vicāraḥ kartavya iti bhāvaḥ 
||&nbsp;MoT_3,9.42 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
yuktikathanaṃ phalitatvena pratijānīte<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;tasmād abhyāsayogena yuktyā nyāyopapattibhiḥ /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;jagadbhrāntir yathā śāmyet tathedaṃ kathyate śṛṇu // Mo_3,9.43 //<br>
"tasmāt" tato hetoḥ | "abhyāsayogena" vicārābhyāsayuktyā | tathā 
"yuktyā" svabuddhikṛtayā yuktyā | tathā "nyāyopapattibhiḥ" 
nyāyaśāstreṣūktābhiḥ yuktibhiḥ&nbsp;| "jagadbhrāntiḥ" 
dṛśyasvarūpajagadbhramaḥ | "yathā" yena prakāreṇa | "śāmyet" | "tathā" 
tena prakāreṇa | "idam" vakṣyamāṇaṃ vāgjālaṃ | mayā "kathyate" | tvaṃ 
tat "śṛṇu" śravaṇaviṣayaṃ kuru ||&nbsp;MoT_3,9.43 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
nanu tacchravaṇena mama kiṃ setsyatīty | atrāha<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;vadāmy ākhyāyikāṃ rāma yām imāṃ bodhasiddhaye /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;tāṃ cec chṛṇoṣi tat sādho mukta evāsi buddhimān // Mo_3,9.44 //<br>
spaṣṭam ||&nbsp;MoT_3,9.44 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
samanantarakṛtāṃ pratijñāṃ sampādayan prakaraṇārambhe pratijñātaṃ savistarakathanaṃ prastauti<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;athotpattiprakaraṇaṃ mayedaṃ tava kathyate | /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;yaḥ kilotpadyate rāma tena muktena bhūyate // Mo_3,9.45 //<br>
"atha"śabdaḥ ānantaryārthaḥ saṅkṣepakathanānantaratāṃ dyotayati | 
kimartham utpattiprakaraṇam eva prathamaṃ kathyate ity | atrāha "yaḥ 
kile"ti | ataḥ muktikathane pravṛttair asmābhiḥ utpattiprakaraṇakathanam
 eva kāryam | anyathā nirādhārāyāḥ mukteḥ kathanam ayuktaṃ syād iti 
bhāvaḥ ||&nbsp;MoT_3,9.45 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
vistareṇa kathayiṣyamāṇe 'sminn utpattiprakaraṇe tvaṃ kiṃ kathayasīty | atrāha<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;iyam itthaṃ jagadbhrāntir bhāty ajātaiva khātmikā /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;ity utpattiprakaraṇe kathyate 'smin mayādhunā // Mo_3,9.46 //<br>
"iyam" puraḥsphuraṇaśīlā | "jagadbhrāntiḥ" jagadākāraḥ bhramaḥ | 
"itthaṃ" anayā yuktyā | "ajātā eva" anutpannā eva | ataḥ "khātmikā" 
ākāśasvarūpā satī | "bhāti" sphurati | "iti" etat | "mayā adhunā" "asmin
 utpattiprakaraṇe kathyate" ||&nbsp;MoT_3,9.46 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
utpattiprakaraṇam eva kathayiṣyan 
sthūṇānikhanananyāyenotpattimūlakāraṇabhūtaśuddhacinmātraprakaṭanārtham 
ādau tadāvarakaprapañcalayaṃ tāvat kathayati<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;yad idaṃ dṛśyate kiñcij jagat sthāvarajaṅgamam | /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;sarvaṃ sarvaprakārāḍhyaṃ sasurāsurakiṃnaram // Mo_3,9.47 //<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;tan mahāpralaye prāpte rudrādipariṇāmini /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;bhavaty asad adṛśyaṃ ca kvāpi yāti vinaśyati // Mo_3,9.48 //<br>
 "kiñcit" anirvācyasvarūpam | "sarvaprakārāḍhyaṃ" 
samastabhāvābhāvādiprakārayuktaṃ&nbsp;| "mahāpralaye" turyākhye 
avasthāviśeṣe mahākalpāntasamaye ca | "rudrādipariṇāmini" 
rudrādilayayukte | rudro 'tra ahaṅkāraḥ saṃhārādhikārī śrīmahādevo 
jñeyaḥ&nbsp;| "ādi"śabdena buddhyādeḥ sṛṣṭisthityadhikāriṇaḥ viṣṇvādeś 
ca grahaṇam | "adṛśyam" bāhyendriyāgocaram | nanu katham "adṛśyaṃ ca" 
"bhavatī"ty&nbsp;| atrāha "kvāpī"ti&nbsp;| "kvāpi yāti" anirvācye kasmin
 cittattve ekatāṃ yāti | anyatayā sphuratīti yāvat | ata eva "vinaśyati"
 adarśanaṃ gacchati | na hi bhāsamānasya sarvathā vināśo yuktaḥ&nbsp;| 
śuktikārajatasyāpi sarvathā vināśaprasaṅgāt | na hi śuktikārajataṃ 
sarvathā vinaśyati | kiṃ tu śuktibhāvena 
sphurati&nbsp;||&nbsp;MoT_3,9.47-48 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
nanu bhāsamānasyaitasya jagataḥ nāśe kiṃ śiṣyate | bhāsamānasya śuktikārajatasya nāśe hi śuktikā śiṣyate ity | atrāha<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;tataḥ stimitagambhīraṃ na tejo na tamas tatam /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;anākhyam anabhivyaktaṃ sat kiñcid avaśiṣyate // Mo_3,9.49 //<br>
"tataḥ" dṛśyanāśānantaram | "kiñcit" arthāt dṛśyavināśasākṣisvarūpaṃ kim
 api anirvācyaṃ vastu | "śiṣyate" śiṣṭaṃ bhavati | anyathā bhāsamānasya 
iyataḥ jagataḥ kutrāvasthānaṃ syān | na hi bhāsamānasya vināśo 
ghaṭasvarūpanāśavat yuktaḥ | śuktikārajatanāśavad anyarūpatayā 
sphuraṇamātrarūpatvāt&nbsp;| anyarūpatayā sphuraṇaṃ prādhānyaṃ vinā 
nopapadyata iti | "kiñcit" kathambhūtam | "stimitagambhīram"&nbsp;| 
"stimitam" cetyaunmukhyākhyaspandarahitam | "gambhīram" 
svaviṣayāvagāhitrabhāvenāvagāhanakriyāviṣayatvābhāvena ca avagāhitum 
aśakyam | tādṛśaṃ ca tat tādṛśaṃ ceti | punaḥ kathambhūtaṃ | "na tejaḥ" 
śuddhacinmātrarūpatvena jīvādisvarūpalaukikacetanavyatiriktam ity arthaḥ
 | tathā "na tamaḥ" jaḍapadārthavyatiriktam ity arthaḥ&nbsp;| atha vā 
cinmātrarūpatvena cetyasvarūpabāhyatejastamovyatiriktam iti jñeyam | 
punaḥ kathambhūtam | sarvatrānusyūtam | punaḥ kathambhūtam | "anākhyam" 
ākhyākartṛtvenāvasthānāt ākhyāviṣayatvābhāvāc cākhyātum aśakyam ity 
arthaḥ | punaḥ kathambhūtaṃ | "anabhivyaktam" bāhyāntaḥkaraṇāgocaratvena
 aprakaṭasvarūpam | kṛtaś ca pūrvam eṣāṃ viśeṣaṇānāṃ hetuhetumadbhāvena 
śṛṅkhalābandha iti na punar āyastam ||&nbsp;MoT_3,9.49 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
avaśiṣṭatayā proktaṃ vastu punar api vistareṇa viśinaṣṭi<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;na śūnyaṃ nāpi cākāśaṃ na dṛśyaṃ na ca darśanam /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;na ca bhūtapadārthaugho yad anantatayā sthitam // Mo_3,9.50 //<br>
"anantatayā" anantabhāvena | "sthitaṃ yat" vastu | "śūnyaṃ na" bhavati |
 tattve hi jagadadhiṣṭhānatvam ayuktaṃ syāt | na hi śūnyaṃ kasyāpi 
adhiṣṭhānaṃ dṛṣṭam | tatra bhāsamānasya picchikādeḥ 
nāyanaraśmyadhiṣṭhānatvāt | tathā "yat" vastu | "ākāśaṃ na" bhavati | 
proktanyāyena śūnyavyatiriktatvāt | ākāśasya ca śūnyaikamayatvāt | "yat 
dṛśyaṃ na" bhavati | kevaladraṣṭṛsvarūpatvāt | "yat" vastu | "darśanam 
na" bhavati | draṣṭṛdṛśyānapekṣasiddhikatvāt | "yat bhūtapadārthaughaḥ 
na" bhavati&nbsp;| tattve hi jaḍaṃ syāt ||&nbsp;MoT_3,9.50 ||<br>

<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;kim apy avyapadeśātma pūrṇāt pūrṇatarākṛti  /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;na san nāsan na sadasan nābhāvo bhavanaṃ na ca // Mo_3,9.51 //<br>
"pūrṇāt" pūrṇatvenābhimatāt ākāśādeḥ | "pūrṇatarākṛti" pūrṇatarākāram | 
yat vastu | "kim apy avyapadeśātma" kim apy anirvācyasvarūpaṃ bhavati | 
tathā yat "sat na" bhavati | [...] jagadadhiṣṭhānatvāyogāt | tathā yat 
"sadasat na" bhavati&nbsp;| ubhayadoṣaprasaṅgāt | tathā yat "abhāvaḥ na"
 bhavati | tadviruddhābhāvatayāpy avasthānāt ||&nbsp;MoT_3,9.51 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;cinmātraṃ cetyarahitam anantam ajaraṃ śivam /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;anādimadhyaparyantaṃ yad anādhi nirāmayam // Mo_3,9.52 //<br>
"yat" evaṃvidhaṃ bhavati | evaṃvidhaṃ kīdṛg ity apekṣāyām āha 
"cinmātram" ityādi&nbsp;| "cinmātram" kevalaṃ citsvarūpam | ata eva 
"cetyarahitam" cetyārūṣitam | "anantam" svāntasyāpi sākṣitvena 
sthitatvāt | tatra hi "anādimadhyaparyantam" 
ādimadhyaparyantavyavasthākārideśakālabhāsakatvāt 
ādimadhyaparyantarahitam | "anādhi" cittābhāvena tadāśritādhirahitam | 
"nirāmayam" bhāvābhāvādisvarūparogarahitam ||&nbsp;MoT_3,9.52 ||<br>

<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;yasmiñ jagat prasphurati dṛṣṭimauktikahaṃsavat /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;yaś cedaṃ yaś ca naivedaṃ devaḥ sadasadātmakaḥ // Mo_3,9.53 //<br>
"yasmin" vastuni | "jagat prasphurati" adhiṣṭheyatayā vilasati | kathaṃ |
 "dṛṣṭimauktikahaṃsavat" | dṛṣṭau sphuritau mauktikahaṃsau 
"dṛṣṭimauktikahaṃsau" | tāv iva tad"vat" | rogavaśena hi 
dṛṣṭyavayavabhūtāḥ raśmayaḥ mauktikabhāvena haṃsabhāvena cākāśe 
sphuranti | "sadasadātmakaḥ" sadasatsvarūpaḥ | anirvācya iti yāvat | 
"yaḥ devaḥ" | "yaḥ" krīḍāśīlaḥ dyotanaśīlaś "ca" | "idaṃ" idantayā 
viṣayīkṛtaṃ bhāvajātaṃ bhavati | sārabhāvena sthitatvāt | "yaḥ devaḥ 
idaṃ na" bhavati&nbsp;| ahantāsāratvena sthitatvāt ||&nbsp;MoT_3,9.53 ||<br>

<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;akarṇajihvo 'nāsātvaṅnetraḥ sarvatra sarvadā /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;yaḥ śṛṇoty āsvādayati jighran spṛśati paśyati // Mo_3,9.54 //<br>
"akarṇajihvaḥ" śrotrendriyarasanendriyarahitaḥ | tathā "anāsātvaṅnetraḥ"
 ghrāṇendriyatvagindriyanetrendriyarahitaḥ | "yaḥ sarvatra" sarvadeśeṣu |
 "sarvadā" sarvakāleṣu&nbsp;| "śṛṇoti" samastaśabdaśravaṇakriyāṃ karoti |
 "āsvādayati" samastāsvādāsvādanakriyāṃ karoti | "jighran" bhavati | 
samastagandhaśiṅghaṇakriyāṃ kurvan bhavati | "spṛśati" 
samstasparśasparśanakriyāṃ karoti | "paśyati" samastarūpadarśanakriyāṃ 
karoti | samastadeśakālagatasamastaprasādasamastendriyasāratvena 
sthitatvāt 
śravaṇādikriyākartṛtvābhimānagrastasamastadeśakālagatasamastapramātṛbhāvena
 vā sthitatvāt | na cendriyasāratvena sthitasyāsyānyendriyāpekṣā yuktā |
 indriyāṇām indriyāntaranairapekṣyeṇa tatsārasyāpi tadvat tadapekṣāyāḥ 
ayuktavāt | kalpyamānānām api teṣāṃ etatsāratvaṃ vinā 
nakiñcidrūpatvāpatteḥ | etatsāratve tu etasyaiva tadbhāvenāpi 
sthitatvāt&nbsp;| sarvapramātṛbhāvena sthitatve api nendriyāntarāpekṣā |
 tadindriyair evendriyamattvena indriyāntarāṇām anupayogitvāt 
||&nbsp;MoT_3,9.54 ||<br>

<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;sa eva sadasadrūpaṃ yenālokena lakṣyate /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;sargacitram anādyantaṃ kharūpaṃ cāpy arañjanam // Mo_3,9.55 //<br>
"sa eva" cinmātrasvarūpaḥ san draṣṭṛtām āpannaḥ sa eva | na tv anyaḥ 
kaścit | "yenālokena" yatsvarūpeṇa | "sargacitraṃ" jagadrūpaṃ citram | 
citprakāśena "lakṣyate" dṛśyate | cidālokaṃ vinā draṣṭuḥ 
jagaddarśanāsambhavāt | kathambhūtaṃ "sargacitraṃ" | "sadasadrūpaṃ" | 
phalataḥ sadasadbhyām anirvacanīyam&nbsp;| punaḥ kathambhūtam | 
"anādyantam" anādyantacinmātrasāratvenādyantarahitam ity arthaḥ | punaḥ 
kathambhūtaṃ "ca" | "kharūpaṃ ca" | ābhāsamātrarūpatvena svapnavat

"api"śabdaḥ pādapūraṇārthaḥ ||&nbsp;MoT_3,9.55 ||<br>

<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;ardhonmīlitadṛgbhrūbhūmadhyatārakavaj jagat /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;vyomātmaiva sadābhāsaṃ svarūpaṃ yo 'bhipaśyati // Mo_3,9.56 //<br>
"yaḥ svarūpaṃ" cinmātrākhyaṃ svabhāvaṃ | "jagat" naśvaracetyarūpaṃ | 
"paśyati" svagocarīkaroti | kathambhūtam "jagat" | "vyomātmaiva" 
paramārthato jagadrūpatābhāvāt nakiñcidrūpam eva | punaḥ kathambhūtaṃ | 
"sadābhāsaṃ" sad ivābhāsata iti "sadābhāsam" | paramārthato na sad ity 
arthaḥ | kathaṃ "paśyati"&nbsp;| "ardhonmīlitadṛgbhrūbhūmadhyatārakavat"
 | ardham unmīlitā dṛk yena | saḥ "ardhonmīlitadṛk" | "bhruvau" eva 
"bhūḥ" sthānaṃ | tasyā madhyaṃ "bhrūbhūmadhyaṃ" | ardhonmīlitadṛśaḥ 
bhrūbhūmadhye bhāsamānā yā "tārakā" | tad"vat"&nbsp;| ardhonmīlitanetraḥ
 puruṣaḥ svabhrūmadhye svadṛṣṭiraśmim eva tārakākārāṃ yathā paśyati |

<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;yasyānyad asti na vibhoḥ kāraṇaṃ śaśaśṛṅgavat /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;yasyedaṃ ca jagat kāryaṃ taraṅgaugha ivāmbhasaḥ // Mo_3,9.57 //<br>
"yasya vibhoḥ kāraṇaṃ nā"stīty arthaḥ | nanu kathaṃ nāsya kāraṇam asti |
 satyam&nbsp;| tatkāraṇaṃ cidrūpam acidrūpaṃ vā | nāntyaḥ cidrūpaṃ prati
 acidrūpakāraṇatvāyogāt&nbsp;| ādye tu sa eva cidrūpaḥ cidrūpasya svasya

"yasyedam" iti | jagataḥ cinmātrakāryatvaṃ svapnajagadvaj jñeyam 
||&nbsp;MoT_3,9.57 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;jvalataḥ sarvato 'jasraṃ cittasthālīṣu tiṣṭhataḥ /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;yasya cinmātradīpasya bhāsā bhāti jagattrayam // Mo_3,9.58 //<br>
"yasya cinmātradīpasya" | dīpatvaṃ cāsya prakāśakatvena jñeyam | "bhāsā"
 indriyadvāranirgatayā citprabhayā | "jagattrayam" avasthātraye 
bhāsamānaṃ prapañcatrayaṃ&nbsp;| "bhāti" sphurati | kathambhūtasya | 
"sarvataḥ" sarvatra | "jvalataḥ" sarvaṃ prakaṭayituṃ samarthasyety 
arthaḥ | punaḥ kathambhūtasya | "cittasthālīṣu" cittarūpeṣu pātreṣu | 
"tiṣṭhataḥ" sārabhāvena sthitavataḥ | yuktaṃ ca dīpasya pātreṣv 
avasthānam | yady api suṣuptau cittaṃ līyata eva tathāpi 
bījatvenātrāsyāvasthānāt evam uktam | bahir api bhūrbhuvassvarākhyaṃ

<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;yaṃ vinārkādayo 'py ete prakāśās timiropamāḥ /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;sati yasmin pravartante trijaganmṛgatṛṣṇikāḥ // Mo_3,9.59 //<br>
"yaṃ vinā" cakṣurindriyasārabhāvena sthitaṃ yaṃ vinā | "ete" dṛśyamānāḥ |
 "arkādayo 'pi timiropamā" andhakārasadṛśāḥ | bhavanti | cakṣuṣā

yathā sūryasannidhāne "mṛgatṛṣṇikāḥ pravartante" | tathā yatsannidhāne

&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;saspande samudetīva niḥspande 'ntargateva ca /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;iyaṃ yasmiñ jagallakṣmīr alāta iva cakratā // Mo_3,9.60 //<br>
"yasmin saspande" dṛśyaunmukhyākhyaspandayukte sati | "jagallakṣmīḥ 
samudetīva"&nbsp;| "niḥspande" sati | "antargateva" tadantargateva "ca" 
bhavati | paramārthato nodeti nāntargacchatīti "iva"śabdopādānam | 
kasminn "ivālāta iva" | yath"ālāte saspande" bhrāmite sati | "cakratā"

&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;jagannirmāṇavilayavilāso vyāpako mahān /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;spandāspandātmako yasya svabhāvo nirmalo 'kṣayaḥ // Mo_3,9.61 //<br>
"jagannirmāṇavilayavilāsaḥ" jagatsṛṣṭisaṃhāravilāsaḥ | "yasyākṣayaḥ"

mahattvayukta | ata eva "vyāpakaḥ" | "svabhāvaḥ" svarūpam eva | bhavati |
 na tv anyat | kathaṃ | sṛṣṭisaṃhāravilāsaḥ cetyamāno 'cetyamāno vā ity 
etasyāsatkalpatvād alaṃ taccintayādye cidviṣayatayā cidantargatatvāt 
tadrūpa eveti na virodhaḥ | kathambhūtaḥ&nbsp;| "spandāspandātmakaḥ" 
spandāspandasvarūpaḥ | tatra sṛṣṭivilāsaḥ spandamayaḥ&nbsp;| 
aspandamayaḥ saṃhāravilāsaḥ&nbsp;||&nbsp;MoT_3,9.61 ||<br>

<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;spandāspandamayī yasya pavanasyeva sarvagā /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;sattā nāmnaiva bhinneva vyavahārān na vastutaḥ // Mo_3,9.62 //<br>
"yasya spandāspandamayī sattā" | cetyaunmukhyayuktā sattā spandamayī | 
tadrahit"āspandamayī" | "vyavahārān nāmnaiva" vyavahārārthaṃ kṛtena 
nāmnā eva | "bhinnā iva" | kathambhūtā | "sarvagā" viśve taduttīrṇe ca

sattā yayā vṛkṣādayaḥ kampante | 'spandamayī ākāśasvarūpā | nanu kathaṃ 
spandāspandamayyāḥ sattāyā ekatvaṃ | satyaṃ | saspandasya niḥspandasya

||&nbsp;MoT_3,9.62 ||<br>

<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;sarvadaiva prabuddho yaḥ supto yaḥ sarvadaiva ca /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;na prasupto na buddhaś ca yaḥ sarvatraiva sarvadā // Mo_3,9.63 //<br>
"yaḥ sarvadaiva" sarvāsu daśāsv eva | "prabuddhaḥ" sākṣitayāvasthānāt 
prakṛṣṭajñānayukta eva | "yaḥ sarvadā eva suptaś" ca | 
tatparāmarśarahitatvāt suptiṃ gataś ca bhavati | "yaḥ sarvatraiva" 
sarvadeśeṣu eva | "sarvadā" sarvāvasthāviśeṣeṣu&nbsp;| "prasupto na" 
bhavati | nityaṃ bodharūpatvāt | "buddhaś ca na" bhavati | upekṣayā

<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;yadaspandaḥ śivaṃ śāntaṃ yatspandas trijagatsthitiḥ /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;spandāspandavilāsātmā ya eko bharitākṛtiḥ // Mo_3,9.64 //<br>
iti | "yadaspandaḥ" yaccetyaunmukhyarāhityam | "śāntaṃ" kṣobharahitaṃ | 
"śivam" ānandaḥ | bhavati | "yatspandaḥ" yaccetyaunmukhyam | 
"trijagatsthitiḥ" trijagatsattā&nbsp;| bhavati | "yaḥ ekaḥ 
spandāspandavilāsātmā" cetyaunmukhyatāyuktatadrahitasvarūpaḥ&nbsp;| 
bhavati | kathambhūtaḥ | "bharitākṛtiḥ" | "bharitā" sarvamayī | "ākṛtiḥ"
 svarūpaṃ yasya&nbsp;| tādṛśaḥ | ekasya yugapatspandamayatvaṃ 
vaicitryāvaham&nbsp;||&nbsp;MoT_3,9.64 ||<br>

<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;āmoda iva puṣpeṣu na naśyati vināśiṣu /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;pratyakṣastho 'py athāgrāhyaḥ śauklyaṃ śuklapaṭeṣv iva // Mo_3,9.65 //<br>
yaḥ "vināśiṣu" padārtheṣu | "na naśyati" tannāśe 'pi tadupādānatayā 
sūkṣmatvenāvasthānāt | na hi ghaṭe naṣṭe 'pi tadapekṣayā sūkṣmam 
upādānabhūtaṃ mṛtsvarūpaṃ naśyati | ka "ivāmoda iva" | yathā "puṣpe"

arthaḥ | yaḥ "agrāhyaḥ" kenāpi bāhyenāntareṇa vendriyeṇa grahītuṃ śakyo 
na bhavati | kathambhūto "'pi"&nbsp;| "pratyakṣastho 'pi" pratyakṣe 
vartamāno 'pi | na hi kasyacit svātmāpratyakṣaḥ nāham atrāsmīti | kim 
"iva" | "śauklyam iva" | yathā paṭe vartamānaṃ śuklatvaṃ pratyakṣam api

<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;mūkopamo 'pi yo vaktā mantā yo 'py upalopamaḥ /<br>

"yaḥ vaktā" bhavati | sarvavaktṛrūpatayā sthitatvāt | kathambhūto "'pi" |

bhoktuḥ tadrūpatānapāyāt | "yaḥ kartāpi" sarvakartṝṇāṃ 
sāmarthyāpādakatvena kartṛtvam āpanno 'pi | "akiñcana" bhavati&nbsp;| 
kiñcanātra kartā jñeyaḥ | kartāto na bhavatīty arthaḥ | akartṛtvaṃ cāsya

&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;yo 'naṅgo 'pi samastāṅgaḥ sahasrakaralocanaḥ /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;na kiñcit saṃsthitenāpi yena vyāptam idaṃ jagat // Mo_3,9.67 //<br>
"yaḥ anaṅgo 'pi" śuddhacinmātratvenāṅgarahito 'pi | "samastāṅgo" bhavati
 | "yaḥ" kathambhūtaḥ | "sahasrakaralocanaḥ" | "sahasra"padam 
atrānantatāvācakaṃ | tena anantakaralocana ity arthaḥ |

kiṃmayam etat syād iti bhāvaḥ | "yena" kathambhūten"āpi" | "na

||&nbsp;MoT_3,9.67 ||<br>

<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;nirindriyabalasyāpi yasyāśeṣendriyakriyāḥ /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;yasya nirmanaso 'py etā manonirmāṇarītayaḥ // Mo_3,9.68 //<br>
"yasyāśeṣendriyakriyāḥ" bhavanti | kathambhūtasy"āpi" | 
"nirindriyabalasyāpi" | aśeṣendriyakriyatvam asyendriyasārarūpatayā |

<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;yadanālocanād bhānti saṃsāroragabhītayaḥ /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;yasmin dṛṣṭe palāyante sarvathā sarvadetayaḥ // Mo_3,9.69 //<br>
"yadanālocanāt" yadviṣayasamyagjñānābhāvāt | "saṃsāroragabhītayaḥ" 
saṃsārākhyasarpodbhavāni bhayāni | "bhānti" vilasanti | yathā 
rajjusamyagjñānābhāvāt uragabhītayaḥ sphurantīty "uraga"padābhiprāyaḥ | 
paramātmājñānād eva hi tasmin saṃsāraḥ tadbhītayaś ca "bhānti" | 
"yasmin" paramātmani | "dṛṣṭe" svarūpatvenānubhūte sati | "sarvathā" 
sarvaprakāreṇa vartamānā | "ītayaḥ" bādhāḥ | "sarvadā" sarvakāleṣu | 
"palāyante" dūre gacchanti | ītīnāṃ palāyanam ītirūpatāviparyayeṇa 
paramātmarūpatājñānam eva&nbsp;| tāsām api paramārthataḥ tadrūpatvāt 
||&nbsp;MoT_3,9.69 ||<br>

&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;sākṣiṇi sphāra ābhāse dhruve dīpa iva kriyāḥ /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;sati yasmin pravartante citrehāḥ spandapūrvikāḥ // Mo_3,9.70 //<br>
"sākṣiṇi" sarvāsāṃ staimityaspandāvasthānāṃ grāhakatvena sākṣibhūte | 
"sphāre" vyāpake | "ābhāse" sphurattaikasāre | "dhruve" udāsīne | 
"yasmin sati" sannidhimātraṃ bhajati sati | "citrehāḥ" nānāvidhāḥ 
manovyāpārāḥ | kathambhūtāḥ | "spandapūrvikāḥ" śarīraceṣṭāḥ | 
"pravartante" | tatsahitā ity arthaḥ | asati āntare kasmin cittattve 
vikalpānāṃ śarīraceṣṭānāṃ cotthānaṃ yuktaṃ na syād iti bhāvaḥ | kā "iva"
 | "kriyā iva" lokakriyā iva | yathā "dīpe" sannidhimātraṃ bhajati 
lokakriyā svayam eva pravartante | tathety arthaḥ ||&nbsp;MoT_3,9.70 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;yasmād ghaṭapaṭākārapadārthaśatapaṅktayaḥ /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;taraṅgakaṇakallolavīcayo vāridher iva // Mo_3,9.71 //<br>
"yasmād" upādānabhūtāt | yataḥ "ghaṭapaṭākārapadārthaśatapaṅktayaḥ" 
ghaṭapaṭasvarūpāḥ padārthaśatasamūhāḥ | bhavanti | yady api paramāṇvāder
 evopādānatvam anyair uktaṃ tathāpi cetanān prati tasyopādānatvābhāvāt 
kim api cetanācetanasvarūpam upādānaṃ kalpyam iti na vivādaḥ | kā "iva" |
 "taraṅgakaṇakallolavīcaya iva" | yathā tāḥ ambudheḥ bhavanti | tathety 
arthaḥ ||&nbsp;MoT_3,9.71 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;sa evānyatayodeti yaḥ padārthaśatabhramaiḥ /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;kaṭakāṅgadakeyūranūpurair iva kāñcanam // Mo_3,9.72 //<br>
"sa eva" cidākhyo 'pūrvarūpeṇa vartamāna ev"ānyatayā"nyasvarūpeṇ"odeti" 
udayaṃ yāty&nbsp;| anyasvarūpatām iva bhajata ity arthaḥ | kaiḥ kṛtvā | 
"padārthaśatabhramaiḥ" padārthaśatarūpāḥ bhramāḥ | taiḥ | padārthaśatair
 ity arthaḥ | "śata"padaṃ cātrānantatāparam | kim "iva" | "kāñcanam iva"
 | yathā "kāñcanaṃ" | tad eva "kaṭakāṅgadakeyūranūpurair" udeti | 
tathety arthaḥ ||&nbsp;MoT_3,9.72 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;yas tvam ekāvabhāsātmā yo 'ham ete janāś ca ye /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;yaś ca na tvam abuddhātman nāhaṃ naite janāś ca yaḥ // Mo_3,9.73 //<br>
he "abuddhātman" adya tāvat ajñātaparamātmatattva | "ekāvabhāsātmā" 
kevalajñānasvarūpaḥ | "yaḥ tvam" upadeśyabhūtaḥ asti | tvattayā bhātīty 
arthaḥ | "yaḥ aham" upadeśakabhūtaḥ asti | mattayā bhātīty arthaḥ | "yaś
 ca ya ete janāḥ" asti&nbsp;| tattayā bhātīty arthaḥ | sarvatra sāratayā
 sthitatvāt | nanu paricchinna eva tarhy asau nety āha "yaś ce"ti | 
tvattādivikalparahitaśuddhacinmātrarūpeṇa paramārthataḥ sthitatvād ity 
arthaḥ ||&nbsp;MoT_3,9.73 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;anyevāvyatiriktaiva saivāseva ca bhaṅgurā /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;payasīva taraṅgālī yasmin sphurati dṛśyabhūḥ // Mo_3,9.74 //<br>
"bhaṅgurā" naśvarasvabhāvā | "dṛśyabhūḥ" | "dṛśyaṃ" dṛśikriyāviṣayo 
bhāvajātaṃ&nbsp;| tad eva "bhūḥ" nānāracanādhāratvāt bhūmiḥ | "sā 
yasminn" ādhārabhūte&nbsp;| "sphurati" vilasati | citsvarūpasya 
dṛśyādhāratvaṃ svapnadṛṣṭāntena jñeyaṃ | kathambhūt"aivāvyatiriktaiva" 
tato vyatirekam anāpannaiva | "anyevā"nyavat&nbsp;| bhāsamānety arthaḥ |
 avyatiriktasyānyatābhāsanaṃ vaicitryāvahaṃ | vyatirekābhāve 'pi 
jātivyaktyor iva aikyābhāvam āśaṅkya tanmayatāṃ kathayati "saive"ti | 
"saiva" na tu leśenāpy atadrūpatāmatī | "aseva" atadvad bhāsamānā&nbsp;|
 k"eva" | "taraṅgālīva" | taraṅgālyāḥ ca "payasi" tadrūpatāyām apy 
atadrūpatayeva bhāsanaṃ sarvapratītisiddham eva ||&nbsp;MoT_3,9.74 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;yataḥ kālasya kalanā yato dṛśyasya dṛśyatā /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;mānasī kalanā yena yena bhāsāṃ vibhāsanam // Mo_3,9.75 //<br>
"kālasya" vartamānādyupādhyasahitasya vastunaḥ | "yataḥ kalanā" kalpanā 
bhavati&nbsp;| na hy āntaraṃ kalpayitāraṃ vinā kālasya kalpanā yukteti 
bhāvaḥ | "yataḥ dṛśyasya dṛśyatā" bhavati | na hi draṣṭāraṃ vinā 
dṛśyasya dṛśyatvam upapadyate&nbsp;| "yena mānasī kalanā" bhavati | na 
hi sākṣiṇaṃ vinā mano 'pi sidhyati | "yena bhāsāṃ" ghaṭādijñānānāṃ | 
"vibhāsanaṃ" sphuraṇaṃ | bhavati | na hi jñātāraṃ vinā jñānāny 
utpadyante ||&nbsp;MoT_3,9.75 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;kriyāṃ rūpaṃ rasaṃ gandhaṃ sparśaṃ śabdaṃ ca cetanam /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;yad vetsi tad asau devo yena vetsi tad apy asau // Mo_3,9.76 //<br>
"kriyām" ity anena "vetsī"ty asya sthāne karoṣīty etat sambandhanīyam | 
tenāyam arthaḥ&nbsp;| tvaṃ | "kriyāṃ yat" karoṣi | "tat" karaṇam | "api 
asau" pūrvoktaḥ | "devaḥ" krīḍākārī | bhavati | "yena" karmendriyeṇa 
karoṣi | "tat" karmendriyam | "apy asau devaḥ" bhavati | tathā "rūpaṃ 
rasaṃ gandhaṃ sparśaṃ śabdaṃ yad vetsi tad" vedanam | "asau devaḥ" 
bhavati | "yena" dhīndriyapañcakena "vetsi tad apy asau devaḥ" bhavati |
 tathā "cetanam" saṅkalpādikaṃ | "yad vetsi tad asau devaḥ" 
bhavati&nbsp;| "yenā"ntaḥkaraṇena&nbsp;| "vetsi tad apy asau devaḥ" 
bhavati | etena kriyāphalasya tatkaraṇasya ca tanmayatā kathitā | kartus
 tu sā nirvivādasiddhaiva ||&nbsp;MoT_3,9.76 ||<br>

<br>
evaṃ viśeṣaṇadvāreṇa tatsvarūpam uktvā tatpraveśopāyam āha<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;draṣṭṛdarśanadṛśyānāṃ madhye yad darśanaṃ sthitam /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;sādho tadavadhānena svātmānam avabudhyase // Mo_3,9.77 //<br>
he "sādho" paramātmabodhārha | tvaṃ "tadavadhānena" tatrāvadhānadānena |
 "svātmānaṃ" svarūpabhūtaṃ paramātmānam | "avabudhyase" jānāsi | tatra 
kutra | "draṣṭṛdarśanadṛśyānāṃ" trayāṇāṃ | "madhye" | "yad darśanaṃ 
sthitaṃ" bhavati | ayam atra nirṇayaḥ | sarvo vyavahāraḥ tāvat tripuṭyām
 eva sampadyate&nbsp;| tatra "draṣṭā" kartā&nbsp;| "darśanaṃ" kriyā | 
"dṛśyam" ālambanabhūtaṃ karma | yadviṣayā kriyotpadyate | karaṇaṃ tv 
asādhāraṇakāraṇarūpam etebhyo na vyatiricyate | sāmagryā eva karaṇatvāt |
 tatrāhaṃ draṣṭety abhimānagrastād draṣṭuḥ grāhyaikarūpadṛśyaviṣayaṃ 
darśanam utpadyate | 'nyathā tayoḥ draṣṭṛdṛśyatāyogāt | 
draṣṭābhimānagrastatvān na jhagiti śuddhīkartuṃ śakyate | dṛśyaṃ tv 
atyantajaḍatayā tattulyayogakṣemam evātaḥ tau hitvā darśana evāvadhānaṃ 
vihitaṃ | nanu darśanam apy āśrayaviṣayadoṣeṇa dūṣitaṃ | natarāṃ 
śuddhīkartuṃ śakyate | satyaṃ | draṣṭari sthitāyā ahantāyāḥ dṛśyasthāyāḥ
 jaḍatāyāś ca nivāraṇam aśakyam eva | leśata ubhayasparśadūṣitasya 
darśanasya tu aṃśabhāvena sthitadoṣadvayanivāraṇaṃ suśakam eva | 
tatreyaṃ rītiḥ&nbsp;| darśanaṃ madrūpaṃ nāsti | sphuṭaṃ 
madvyatiriktatvāt | madvyatiriktatvaṃ cāsya draṣṭṛtvābhāvāt dṛśyarūpam 
api nāsti | grāhakatvāt | ataḥ tābhyāṃ vyatiriktaṃ kim api grahītum 
aśakyam avyapadeśyaṃ darśanaṃ nāmāstīti siddhā darśanasya 
paramātmarūpatā | tato draṣṭṛdṛśyayoś ca sā siddhataraiva | na hi 
darśanasambandhavilaye draṣṭṛdṛśyayoḥ sthitiḥ sambhavati | 
darśanāśrayatvenaiva draṣṭur draṣṭṛtvāt | tadviṣayatvena ca dṛśyasya 
dṛśyatvāt | athavā "darśanam" atra darśanecchākālīnaṃ jñeyaṃ | tad dhi 
tadā āśrayaviṣayoparāgābhāvena śuddhatayaiva sphurati | paścāt tu 
sthūlatāṃ yāti ||&nbsp;MoT_3,9.77 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
pūrvoktaṃ sargāntaślokena saṅgṛhṇāti<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;ajam ajaram ajāḍyaṃ śāśvataṃ brahma nityaṃ<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;śivam amalam anādyaṃ vandhyavedyair anindyam /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;sakalakalanaśūnyaṃ kāraṇaṃ kāraṇānām<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;anubhavanam avedyaṃ vedanaṃ vittvam antaḥ // Mo_3,9.78 //<br>
"vittvaṃ" vettīti yāvat | "antaḥ" bhavati | sarvasya dṛśyajātasya 
paryavasānarūpaṃ bhavati | mahāpralaye śiṣyate iti yāvat | kathambhūtaṃ |
 "ajam" sarvadaiva vartamānatvāt | "ajaraṃ" śarīravyatiriktatvāt | 
"ajāḍyaṃ" manovyatiriktatvāt&nbsp;| "śāśvataṃ" viśvātmakatve 'pi 
svarūpād acyutatvāt | "brahma" jagadrūpeṇa bṛṃhaṇāt | "nityaṃ" 
kālatrayānapāyitvāt | "śivaṃ" sukhaikarūpatvāt | "amalaṃ" 
bhedamālinyarahitatvāt | "anādyaṃ" kasyāpi tadādyatvenāvartamānatvāt | 
"vandhyavedyaiḥ" vyarthavedyair | "anindyam" akadarthitaṃ | tatsthair 
bhāvābhāvair adūṣitatvāt | "sakalakalanaśūnyaṃ" nirvikalpasvarūpatvāt | 
"kāraṇānāṃ" kāraṇatvenābhimatānāṃ brahmādīnāṃ | "kāraṇaṃ"&nbsp;| teṣām 
apy ākṛtimattvena sakāraṇatvāt | "anubhavanam" anubhavasvarūpaṃ | 
anubhava eva pūrvoktaviśeṣāṇāṃ sambhavāt | anubhavasvarūpatve 'pi 
vedyamālinyam āśaṅkyāh"āvedyam" iti | "avedyaṃ" vedyasparśādūṣitaṃ | 
"vedanam" | acetyacidrūpam iti yāvat&nbsp;| iti śivam ||&nbsp;MoT_3,9.78
 ||<br>

oṃ | atra moham āpanna iva śrīrāmaḥ pṛcchati<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;mahāpralayasampattau yad etad avaśiṣyate /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;bhavatv etad anākāraṃ nāma nāsty atra saṃśayaḥ // Mo_3,10.1 //<br>
"atra saṃśayo nāsti" | "etat" vastu | "anākāram" ākārarahitaṃ | 
"bhavatu" | atra mamāpi viśvāso 'stītīti bhāvaḥ | "etat" kiṃ | 
"mahāpralayasampattau" sarvabhāvakṣaye | "yat etat" sad vastu | 
"avaśiṣyate" avaśiṣṭatayā tiṣṭhati ||&nbsp;MoT_3,10.1 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
bahir anubhūyamānākārarahitaśūnyādivasturūpatānirāsas tu tasya na yujyata iti kathayati<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;na śūnyaṃ katham etat syān na prakāśaḥ kathaṃ bhavet /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;kathaṃ vā na tamorūpaṃ kathaṃ vā naiva khātmakam // Mo_3,10.2 //<br>
tat "śūnyaṃ kathaṃ na bhavet" | tad eva bhavatv ity arthaḥ | evaṃ 
sarvatra yojyam&nbsp;| "prakāśaḥ" mahābhūtaprakāśaḥ | "khātmakam" 
ākāśarūpam ||&nbsp;MoT_3,10.2 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;kathaṃ vā naiva cidrūpaṃ jīvo vā na kathaṃ bhavet /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;kathaṃ na buddhitattvaṃ syāt kathaṃ vā na mano bhavet // Mo_3,10.3 //<br>
cidrūpatvasyāpi tatra paramārthatayā nivāraṇād etad uktam ||&nbsp;MoT_3,10.3 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;kathaṃ vā na na kiñcit syāt kathaṃ vā sarvam ity api /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;anayā ca vacobhaṅgyā mama moha ivoditaḥ // Mo_3,10.4 //<br>
"na kiñcit" kenāpi rūpeṇa sthitaṃ na bhavati | nakiñcittvasyāpi 
nirākaraṇāt | "sarvam ity api kathaṃ vā" na bhavati ||&nbsp;MoT_3,10.4 
||<br>
<br>
<br>
śrīvasiṣṭha uttaram āha<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;viṣamo 'yam ati praśno bhavatā samudāhṛtaḥ /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;bhinadmy enaṃ tv ayatnena naiśaṃ tama ivāṃśumān // Mo_3,10.5 //<br>
"ati"śabdo bhinnakramaḥ | "bhavatā ayaṃ praśnaḥ ativiṣamaḥ" 
durbodhataraḥ | "samudāhṛtaḥ" | "tu" viśeṣe | 'haṃ "enam ayatnena" 
sukhenaiva | "bhinadmi" | manogranthirūpatvāt praśnasya "bhinadmī"ti 
kathanam | ka "ivāṃśumān iva" sūrya iva&nbsp;| aṃśumān yathā "naiśaṃ" 
niśāsambandhi | "tamaḥ" bhinatti | tathety arthaḥ ||&nbsp;MoT_3,10.5 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
praśnam eva bhinatti<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;mahākalpāntasampattau yat tat sad avaśiṣyate /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;tad rāma na yathā śūnyaṃ tad idaṃ śṛṇu kathyate // Mo_3,10.6 //<br>
"mahākalpāntasampattau" turye turyātīte mahāpralayasamayaniṣpattau vā | 
"tat" prasiddhaṃ kenāpi apalapitum aśakyaṃ | he "rāma" | "tat" 
"yac"chabdakathitaṃ "sad" vastu | "yathā" yena prakāreṇa | "śūnyaṃ na" 
bhavati | "tat" tam eva prakāram | "idaṃ" samanantaram eva kathyamānaṃ |
 "śṛṇu" | yato mayā "kathyate" ||&nbsp;MoT_3,10.6 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
tad eva kathayati<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;anutkīrṇā yathā stambhe saṃsthitā sālabhañjikā /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;tathā viśvaṃ sthitaṃ tatra tena śūnyaṃ na tat padam // Mo_3,10.7 //<br>
"anutkīrṇā" takṣakāreṇa nistakṣya na prakaṭīkṛtā | stambhe saṃsthitatvam
 asyā agre prakaṭībhāvāt | viśvasya sadrūpe sthitatvam adyaiva 
bhāsamānatvād | iti tu viśeṣaḥ | "tat padaṃ" paramātmākhyaṃ padam | yadi
 tac "chūnyaṃ" syāt tadā jagat kutra bhūyāt | niradhiṣṭhānasya 
bhramasyāyuktatvād iti bhāvaḥ&nbsp;| bhedenaiva bhātīty "anutkīrṇe"ty 
uktam ||&nbsp;MoT_3,10.7 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
etad evam vistaraṃ kathayati<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;ayam itthaṃ mahābhogo jagadākhyo 'vabhāsate /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;satyo bhavatv asatyo vā yatra tatra kva śūnyatā // Mo_3,10.8 //<br>
"ayam" anubhūyamānaḥ vistāraḥ | "satyo bhavatu" satsvarūpo bhavākhyaḥ | 
"jagad" iti nāmadheyaḥ | "mahābhogaḥ" mahāvistāraḥ | "satyo bhavatu" 
satsvarūpo bhavatv| "asatyo vā"satsvarūpo vā bhavatu | saḥ "yatra" 
ādhārabhūte yasmin vastuni | "avabhāsate" sphurati | "tatra kva śūnyatā"
 | na yukteti bhāvaḥ ||&nbsp;MoT_3,10.8 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;yathā na putrikāśūnyaḥ stambho 'nutkīrṇasālikaḥ /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;tathā tāta jagad brahma tena śūnyaṃ na tat padam // Mo_3,10.9 //<br>
"anutkīrṇasālikaḥ" anutkīrṇaputrikaḥ | dārṣṭāntike yojayati "tathe"ti | 
he "tāta" he pūjya | "tathe"ty anena pūrvavākyasthaṃ "ne"ti "śūnya" iti 
ca padadvayam ākṛṣyate&nbsp;| tenāyam arthaḥ | "tathā brahma" 
"jagacchūnyaṃ na" bhavati | phalitam āha "tene"ti ||&nbsp;MoT_3,10.9 ||<br>

<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;somyāmbhasi yathā vīcir na cāsti na ca nāsti ca /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;tathā jagad brahmaṇīdaṃ śūnyāśūnyapadaṃ gatam  // Mo_3,10.10 //<br>
"somyāmbhasi" kṣobharahite jale | "na cāsti" | tadānīm alabhyatvāt | "na
 ca nāsti"&nbsp;| agre sphuṭībhaviṣyamāṇatvāt | dārṣṭāntikam āha 
"tathe"ti | bhāsamānatvād "aśūnyapadaṃ gataṃ" | paramārthato 
nakiñcidrūpatvāc "chūnyapadaṃ gatam" iti yojyam ||&nbsp;MoT_3,10.10 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
nanu tarhi putrikādisādṛśyena siddhā eva brahmaṇi jagatsthitir ity | atrāha<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;deśakālādiśāntatvāt putrikāracanaṃ drume /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;sambhavaty ajadhātau tu kena nāntar vimuhyate // Mo_3,10.11 //<br>
"drume" lakṣaṇayā stambhe | "putrikāracanaṃ" deśavaśena kālavaśena 
kartrādivaśena ca "sambhavati" | "tu" viśeṣe | "ajadhātau" 
navīnaprādurbhāvarahitacidākhyamūlakāraṇaviṣaye | "'ntaḥ" manasi |

arthaḥ | kuto "muhyate" | "deśakālādiśāntatvāt" | "ādi"śabdena 
kartrādīnāṃ grahaṇam | deśakālakartrādiśānter ity arthaḥ&nbsp;| 
tacchāntiś cātra śuddhacinmātratayaiva jñeyā | mohaś ca 
deśakālādisparśarahite brahmaṇi kathaṃ jagad bhāti ity evaṃrūpo jñeyaḥ 
||&nbsp;MoT_3,10.11 ||<br>

phalitam āha<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;tat stambhaputrikādy etat paramārthajagatsthiteḥ /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;ekadeśena sadṛśam upamānaṃ na sarvataḥ // Mo_3,10.12 //<br>
yataḥ deśakālādisambhavena stambhe putrikāracanaṃ yuktaṃ | tacchāntyā tu
 ciddhātau tu na yuktam | "tat" tato hetoḥ | "etat" samanantaram evoktaṃ
 "stambhaputrikādi"&nbsp;| "ādi"śabdena vīcyambhasor grahaṇam | 
"paramārthe" yā "jagatsthitis"&nbsp;| tasyāḥ "ekadeśena" 
śūnyatānivāraṇamātreṇa | "sadṛśam upamānaṃ" bhavati&nbsp;| "na sarvataḥ"
 na sarveṇa prakāreṇa | na bhavatīty arthaḥ ||&nbsp;MoT_3,10.12 ||<br>

<br>
jagadādhāratvena śūnyatvaṃ nirasya tadrūpatayā nirasyati<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;na kadācid udetīdaṃ parasmān na ca śāmyati /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;idaṃrūpaṃ kevalaṃ sad brahma svātmani saṃsthitam // Mo_3,10.13 //<br>
"parasmāt" paramātmanaḥ | nanu yadi jagan nodeti na ca śāmyati tarhi kim
 idaṃ bhāsata ity | atrāha "idam" iti | "kevalam" advitīyaṃ | "sat" 
satsvarūpaṃ | "brahma" bṛṃhitaṃ vastu | "svātmani" svasvarūpe | 
"saṃsthitaṃ" bhavati | kathambhūtaṃ "idaṃrūpaṃ" | "idaṃ" 
śāntyudayasahitaṃ jagat | "rūpaṃ" svarūpaṃ | yasya | tat&nbsp;| tādṛśaṃ |

jñeyaṃ | bṛṃhāviṣayo hi brahmasvarūpam eva bhavati | tathā ca brahmaṇaḥ

śūnyatvaṃ nivārya prakāśarūpatvaṃ nivārayati<br>

&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;sūryānalendutārādi kutas tatra kilāvyaye // Mo_3,10.15 //<br>

jīvādirūpatānirāsārthaṃ paramātmatattvaṃ viśinaṣṭi<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;paramāṇor api paraṃ tad aṇīyo 'py aṇīyasaḥ /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;śuddhaṃ sūkṣmaṃ paraṃ śāntaṃ tad ākāśodarād api // Mo_3,10.32 //<br>
"tat" brahma | "paramāṇor api param aṇīyaḥ" atisūkṣmaṃ | bhavati | 
kathambhūtād "api" | "aṇīyaso 'pi" dvyaṇukādyapekṣayā sūkṣmatarād api | 
sūkṣmataratvaṃ cāsya bāhyendriyāgrāhyatvena jñeyam | "tat" brahma | 
kathambhūtaṃ | "śuddhaṃ" rāgādirajo'dūṣitaṃ | "sūkṣmaṃ" | "param" 
uttīrṇaṃ | "śāntaṃ" sarvapracāraśūnyaṃ | kasmād "api" | "ākāśodarād api"
 ||&nbsp;MoT_3,10.32 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;dikkālādyanavacchinnarūpatvād ativistṛtam /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;tad anādyantam ābhāsaṃ bhāsanīyavivarjitam // Mo_3,10.33 //<br>
"tat" brahm"ātivistṛtam" ativistīrṇaṃ bhavati | kutaḥ | 
"dikkālādyanavacchinnarūpatvāt"&nbsp;| "ādi"śabdena vastuparigrahaḥ 
trividhaparicchedaśūnyatvād ity arthaḥ | nanu katham asya 
digādiparicchedaśūnyatvaṃ | tathātve 'py ativistṛtatvam iti cet&nbsp;| 
"dik" tāvat cetyamānā na vā | na cet tarhi svayam evāsiddhā katham anyaṃ
 paricchedayet | cetyamānā cet tarhi citaiva sā paricchinnā kathaṃ tāṃ 
paricchedayet | evaṃ "kālā"der api jñeyam | "dig"ādibhiḥ paricchinnam 
eva paricchinnaṃ bhavati | tadabhāve tv ativistṛtam eveti sthitam 
asyātivistṛtatvam | punaḥ kathambhūtam | "anādyantaṃ" yathā tathā 
kalpyamānayor apy ādyantayoḥ sākṣitvād ādyantarahitam | punaḥ 
kathambhūtaṃ | "bhāsanīyavivarjitam" ābhāsajñeyarahitajñānasvarūpam ity 
arthaḥ ||&nbsp;MoT_3,10.33 ||<br>

proktaviśeṣaṇāvaṣṭambhena jīvādirūpatām asya nivārayati<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;cidrūpam eva no yatra labhyate tatra jīvatā /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;kathaṃ syāc cittatākārā vāsanānilarūpiṇī // Mo_3,10.34 //<br>
"yatrai"vaṃvidhaguṇaviśiṣṭe brahmaṇi | "cidrūpam eva" bhāvapradhāno 
nirdeśaḥ cidrūpatvam eva | "no labhyate" pūrvanyāyena nānubhūyate | 
"tatra" tādṛśe brahmaṇi&nbsp;| "jīvatā" jīvabhāvaḥ | "kathaṃ syāt" | 
kathambhūtā | "cittatākārā" cetyaśayanāviṣṭaṃ cittatvaṃ cittaṃ | 
tadrūpiṇīty arthaḥ | punaḥ kathambhūtā | "vāsanānilarūpiṇī" | 
cetyabhāvanā "vāsanā" | saiva calattay"ānilaḥ" | tad"rūpiṇī" | śuddhā 
cidrūpatāpi yatra nāsti cetyaśayanāviṣṭāyā jīvatāyāḥ kā tatra vārteti 
bhāvaḥ ||&nbsp;MoT_3,10.34 ||<br>

<br>
cidrūpatvābhāvenaiva yugapajjīvāditāṃ nirākaroti<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;cidrūpānudayād eva tatra nāsty eva jīvatā /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;na buddhitā na cittattvaṃ nendriyatvaṃ na vāsanāḥ // Mo_3,10.35 //<br>
"cidrūpānudayād eva" citsvarūpānudbhūter eva | na tv anyena hetunā | 
tadrūpānudayas tu pūrvaṃ kathitaḥ | sūkṣmarūpeṇa sthitā cetyabhāvanā 
vāsanā&nbsp;| nanu cidrūpānudayena katham atra jīvāditā nāsti | satyaṃ |
 ciducchūnatāyā eva jīvādibhāvena tadrūpatvānudaye yuktam eva 
jīvatādyabhāvatvam iti na virodhaḥ ||&nbsp;MoT_3,10.35 ||<br>

<br>
phalitam āha<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;evaṃ sthitaṃ layārambhapūrṇam apy ajaraṃ padam /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;asmaddṛṣṭyā sthitaṃ śāntaṃ śūnyam ākāśato 'dhikam // Mo_3,10.36 //<br>
"layārambhapūrṇaṃ sthitam api ajaraṃ" jarākhyaśarīradharmarahitaṃ | 
"padaṃ" paramātmalakṣaṇaṃ sthānam | "asmaddṛṣṭyākāśataḥ" 
ākāśāpekṣay"ādhikaṃ śāntaṃ" | tathā "śūnyaṃ" nakiñcidrūpaṃ | "sthitaṃ"

paramātmasvarūpaṃ durbodhaṃ jñātvā punar api śrīrāmaḥ pṛcchati<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;paramārthasya kiṃ rūpaṃ tasyānantacidākṛteḥ /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;punar etat samācakṣva nipuṇaṃ bodhavṛddhaye // Mo_3,10.37 //<br>

śrīvasiṣṭha uttaram āha<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;mahāpralayasampattau sarvakāraṇakāraṇam /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;śiṣyate yat paraṃ brahma tad idaṃ varṇyate śṛṇu // Mo_3,10.38 //<br>
"mahāpralayasampattau" turye turyātīte mahākalpāntasamaye vā | 
"kāraṇakāraṇaṃ" mūlakāraṇaṃ | "yat paraṃ brahma" jagadbhāvena bṛṃhāṃ 
gataṃ paramātmalakṣaṇaṃ vastu | "śiṣyate" mahāpralayasākṣibhāvena śiṣṭaṃ
 bhavati | mayā "tad idaṃ varṇyate"&nbsp;| 'taḥ tvaṃ "śṛṇu"

paramātmasvarūpam eva varṇayati<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;nāśayitvā svam ātmānaṃ manaso vṛttisaṅkṣaye /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;yad rūpaṃ yad anākhyeyaṃ tad rūpaṃ tasya vastunaḥ // Mo_3,10.39 //<br>
"tasya vastunaḥ" paraṃ brahmāparaparyāyasya paramātmalakṣaṇasya vastunaḥ
 | "tat rūpaṃ" bhavati | "tat" kiṃ | "yat tad rūpaṃ" | śiṣyata iti śeṣaḥ
 | "śiṣyate" svanāśasākṣibhāvena śiṣṭaṃ bhavati | kasya | "manasaḥ" | 
kiṃ kṛtvā | "svam ātmānaṃ nāśayitvā" śuddhacinmātre layaṃ nītvā | kasmin
 sati | "vṛttisaṅkṣaye" vṛttināśe sati ity arthaḥ | "tad rūpaṃ" kiṃ | 
"yat anākhyeyaṃ" bhavati | atiśuddhatvena ākhyāyogyaṃ na bhavatīty 
arthaḥ | ayaṃ bhāvaḥ | manasaiva manaḥ chittveti nyāyena kiñcinmātraṃ 
samyakjñānena saṃsārakalanābhyo niṣkrāntaṃ śuddhaṃ manaḥ bhāvanābalena 
śuddhāśuddhavṛttikṣayeṇa hetunā śuddhāśuddhaṃ svaṃ rūpaṃ nāśayati | 
tataḥ tan manaḥ śuddhatare kutrāpy anākhyeye layībhūtam anākhyeyaṃ 
bhavati | etadrūpatā ca suṣuptau sarvair anubhūyate | kiṃ tu 
mūḍhatāmiśrā | tac ca mano yadā tādṛk syāt tadāsya paramātmatābhāvaḥ 
bhavatīti | tatraiva yoginā sāvadhānena bhāvyam 
iti&nbsp;||&nbsp;MoT_3,10.39 ||<br>

&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;nāsti dṛśyaṃ jagad draṣṭā dṛśyābhāvād vilīnavat /<br>

"tasya vastunaḥ" paramātmalakṣaṇasya vastunaḥ | "tad rūpaṃ" bhavati |

tatsphuraṇaṃ ca draṣṭṛdṛśyaleparahitatvena nakiñcidrūpatvād anākhyeyaṃ

&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;citer jīvasvabhāvo yo yadi cetyonmukho vapuḥ /<br>

"tat" prasiddhaṃ | "tac" cinmātraṃ | "kāraṇakāraṇaṃ" mūlakāraṇabhūtaṃ

&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;aṅguṣṭhasyātha vāṅgulyā vātādyasparśane sati /<br>

&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;asvapnāyā anantāyā ajaḍāyā ghanasthiteḥ /<br>

&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;yad vyomno hṛdayaṃ yad vā śilāyāḥ pavanasya ca /<br>

&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;acetyasyāmanaskasya jīvato yā kriyāvataḥ /<br>

&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;citprakāśasya yan madhyaṃ prakāśasya ghanasya ca /<br>

paṇḍitāḥ | "brahmaṇaḥ" nānāpadārthabhāvena bṛṃhitasya paramātmanaḥ |

yā ca padārthaprakāśanasamaye 'ntyāvasthā sā padārthasparśadūṣitā |

 bāhyatamasaś ca dhāraṇāyāḥ kaiścid uktatvāt ||&nbsp;MoT_3,10.47 ||<br>

&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;yato jagad udetīva nityānuditarūpy api /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;vibhinnavad ivābhinnaṃ tad rūpaṃ pāramātmikam // Mo_3,10.48 //<br>
"tat pāramātmikam" paramātmasambandhi | "rūpaṃ" bhavati | kiṃ "tat" | 
"yataḥ" yasmāt&nbsp;| "jagad udetīva" udayaṃ yātīva | bhāsamānatvāt | 
kathambhūtam "api" | "nityānuditarūpy api" nityam anuditaṃ | 
paramārthataḥ cinmātrarūpatayā jagadrūpeṇāprādurbhūtaṃ "rūpam" asyāstīti
 | tādṛśam "api" | punaḥ kathambhūtam&nbsp;| "abhinnaṃ" tanmayaṃ | punaḥ
 kathambhūtaṃ | sthitam iti śeṣaḥ | "sthitaṃ" vartamānaṃ | kathaṃ | 
"vibhinnavat" vibhinnam iva | paramārthataḥ bhinnatvanirāsāya 
"vat"iśabdopādānam | ayaṃ bhāvaḥ | yataḥ sūkṣmatarād vastuna idaṃ jagat 
payasa iva vīcikadambakaṃ niryāti&nbsp;| tad eva paramātmano rūpam iti |
 tatra yoginā sāvadhānena bhāvyam iti ||&nbsp;MoT_3,10.48 ||<br>

&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;vyavahāraparasyāpi yat pāṣāṇavad āsanam /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;avyomna eva vyomatvaṃ tad rūpaṃ pāramātmikam // Mo_3,10.49 //<br>
"tat pāramātmikam" paramātmasambandhi | "rūpaṃ" bhavati | kiṃ "tat" | 
"yat vyavahāraparasyāpi" vyavahāraṃ kurvāṇasyāpi | "pāṣāṇavat āsanaṃ" 
sthitiḥ | bhavati&nbsp;| tad "āsanaṃ" kiṃ | "avyomna eva" 
jaḍatvādivyomadharmarahitatvenākāśasvarūpavyatiriktasya eva | 
"vyomatvaṃ" vyomabhāvaḥ | ayaṃ bhāvaḥ | vyavahāraṃ kurvann api puruṣaḥ 
tatratyasiddhyasiddhyanusandhānarahitaḥ paramātmarūpa eva 
bhavatīti&nbsp;| tatra yoginā sāvadhānena bhāvyam iti 
||&nbsp;MoT_3,10.49 ||<br>

&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;vedyavedanavettṛtvarūpatrayam idaṃ punaḥ /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;yatrodety astam āyāti tat tat paramam uttamam  // Mo_3,10.50 //<br>
"tat tat" prasiddhaṃ | "paramam" utkṛṣṭaṃ | "uttamam" niratiśayam 
paramātmalakṣaṇaṃ vastu | bhavati | "tat" kiṃ | "yatra" yasmin | "idam" 
anubhūyamānaṃ | "vedyaṃ" vidikriyāviṣayo | "vedanaṃ" vidikriyā | "vettā"
 vidikriyākartā | teṣāṃ bhāvaḥ "vedyavedanavettṛtvam" | tadākhyaṃ 
"rūpatrayaṃ" "vedyavedanavettṛtvarūpatrayaṃ udeti astaṃ yāti" | ayaṃ 
bhāvaḥ | vedyāditripuṭī cetyamānatvena kutracic cinmātrākhye vastuni 
udeti layībhavati ca | tad eva paramātmano rūpam iti&nbsp;| yoginā tatra
 sāvadhānena bhāvyam iti ||&nbsp;MoT_3,10.50 ||<br>

&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;vedyavedanavettṛtvaṃ yatredaṃ pratibimbati /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;abuddhyādau mahādarśe tad rūpaṃ paramaṃ smṛtam // Mo_3,10.51 //<br>
paṇḍitaiḥ | "tat paramaṃ" utkṛṣṭaṃ | "rūpaṃ" paramātmalakṣaṇaṃ svarūpaṃ |
 "smṛtam" | "tat" kiṃ | "yatra mahādarśe vedyavedanavettṛtvaṃ" 
vedyāditripuṭī | "pratibimbati" pratibimbatayā sphurati | kathambhūte | 
"'buddhyādau" buddhyādirahite&nbsp;| yuktaṃ cādarśasya 
buddhyādirahitatvam | ādarśasya jāḍyena buddhyādirahitatvam asya 
uttīrṇatveneti viśeṣaḥ | ayaṃ bhāvaḥ | vedyāditripuṭī kṣaṇa eva 
sphuramāṇā kṣaṇa eva ca layabhāginī svasphūrtyāśrayasya kim api mālinyam
 anādadhatī pratibimbatayaiva bhāti | yataḥ pratibimbam api kṣaṇa eva 
sphurati kṣaṇa eva ca layībhavati svāśrayasya makurādeḥ mālinyaṃ na 
dadhāti&nbsp;| tava vedyāditripuṭīpratibimbāśrayaṃ tripuṭīvyatiriktaṃ 
kim api vastu svīkāryam | anyathā tripuṭīpratibimbāyogāt&nbsp;| tac ca 
tādṛśaṃ svīkriyamāṇam anākhyam eva bhavati | tad eva ca paramātmatattvam
 iti | tatra yoginā sāvadhānena bhāvyam iti ||&nbsp;MoT_3,10.51 ||<br>

<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;manaṣṣaṣṭhendriyātītaṃ yad rūpaṃ syān mahāciteḥ /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;jaṅgame sthāvare vāpi tat sargānte 'vaśiṣyate // Mo_3,10.52 //<br>
"tat" vastu | "sargānte" mahāpralaye | "'vaśiṣyate" | "tat" kiṃ | "yat 
mahāciteḥ" cinmātrasya&nbsp;| "rūpaṃ syāt" | kathambhūtaṃ | 
"manaṣṣaṣṭhendriyātītaṃ" | mana eva ṣaṣṭhaṃ yeṣāṃ | tāni "manaḥṣaṣṭhāni"
 | tāni ca tānīndriyāṇi "manaḥṣaṣṭhendriyāṇi"&nbsp;| tāny atītaṃ 
"manaḥṣaṣṭhendriyātītaṃ" | tadagocaram ity arthaḥ | kutra | "jaṅgame 
sthāvare vāpi" | ayaṃ bhāvaḥ | "jaṅgame" cittatvaṃ tāvan nirvivādam

tṛṇādyudgamena naiva nirṇītam&nbsp;| na | na hi niścetanāt kasyāpy

&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;sthāvarāṇāṃ hi yad rūpaṃ tac ced bodhamayaṃ bhavet /<br>

"hi"śabdopādānaṃ pādapūraṇārthaṃ | "tat pareṇa" paramātmanā | "samaṃ"

bodhanasvarūpaṃ&nbsp;| "cet" syāt | "tat" kiṃ | "sthāvarāṇāṃ yad rūpaṃ" 
bhavati | ayaṃ bhāvaḥ | sthāvarāṇāṃ rūpaṃ avaśyaṃ kṣobharahitam eva kiṃ 
tu jāḍyadūṣitam | ataḥ jāḍyaṃ vihāya jñeyāsparśenaiva svaṃ jñānatattvaṃ

sargāntaślokena pūrvoktam upasaṃharati<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;brahmārkaśakraharaviṣṇusadāśivādi-<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;śāntau śivaṃ paramam etad ihaikam āste /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;śiṣṭaṃ pradiṣṭam avinaṣṭam akaṣṭam<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;iṣṭaṃ miśraṃ na miśram aṇunāśritam āśritena // Mo_3,10.54 //<br>
"etat" svātmatvena sthitaṃ | "śivaṃ" parānandasvarūpaṃ | "paramam" 
utkṛṣtaṃ&nbsp;| vastu&nbsp;| "āste" svasvarūpe tathaiva tiṣṭhati | na tu
 naśyati | kasyāṃ satyāṃ | "brahmārkaśakraharaviṣṇusadāśivādiśāntau" 
satyāṃ | "ādi"śabdena surāditṛṇāntānāṃ grahaṇam | "brahmādīnāṃ" 
tattadbhuvanādhipatīnāṃ | "śānti"rūpe mahākalpāntasamaye sati&nbsp;| 
"haraḥ" saṃhārakārī | "sadāśivaḥ" sarvasya svamayatāpādanenānandakārī | 
atha vā "brahmādīnāṃ" saṅkalpotpattyādikāriṇāṃ manaḥprabhṛtīnāṃ | 
"śāntau" turyākhye satīty arthaḥ | kathambhūtaṃ | "śiṣṭaṃ pradiṣṭaṃ"

"miśraṃ" nānābhāvābhāvasvarūpaṃ | punaḥ kathambhūtaṃ | "na miśraṃ" 
śuddhacinmātrarūpaṃ&nbsp;| punaḥ kathambhūtam | "aṇunā"
