oṃ śrīrāmaḥ pṛcchati<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;idaṃrūpam idaṃ dṛśyaṃ jagan nāmāsti bhāsuram /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;mahāpralayasampattau bho brahman kva nu gacchati // Mo_3,11.1 //<br>
"idaṃ" puraḥ sphurat | "dṛśyaṃ" dṛśikriyāviṣayo | "jagan nāma" 
jagadākhyaṃ vastu&nbsp;| "asti" paramārthata evāsti | anyathā 
bhāsamānatvāyogāt | kathambhūtam "idaṃrūpam"&nbsp;| "idam" 
anubhūyamānabhāvābhāvamayaṃ | "rūpaṃ" svarūpaṃ yasya | tat 
"idaṃrūpam"&nbsp;| tataḥ kim ity | atrāha "mahāpralaye"ti | "bho 
brahman" | idam eva jagat "mahāpralayasampattau kva nu gacchati" | kaṃ 
deśaṃ yātīty arthaḥ ||&nbsp;MoT_3,11.1 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
śrīvasiṣṭho 'py etatsadṛśaṃ kiñcit pṛcchati<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;kuta āyāti kīdṛg vā vandhyāputraḥ kva gacchati /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;kva yāti kuta āyāti vada vā vyomakānanam // Mo_3,11.2 //<br>
"kutaḥ āyāti" | utpattisamaye ity arthaḥ | "kīdṛg vā" kiṃsvarūpo vā | 
"yāti" | "kva gacchati" | nāśasamaya ity arthaḥ | etatsadṛśaḥ tava 
praśna iti bhāvaḥ ||&nbsp;MoT_3,11.2 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
śrīrāmo 'trottaraṃ dadhāti<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;vandhyāputro vyomavanaṃ naivāsti na bhaviṣyati /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;kīdṛśī dṛśyatā tasya kīdṛśī tasya nāstitā // Mo_3,11.3 //<br>
vartamānabhaviṣyanniṣedhena bhūtaniṣedho 'py ākṣiptaḥ | tataḥ kim ity | 
atrāha "kīdṛśī"ti | "dṛśyatā" darśanayogyatā | lakṣaṇayāstiteti yāvat 
||&nbsp;MoT_3,11.3 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
śrīvasiṣṭhaḥ śrīrāmoktam uttaraṃ dṛṣṭāntīkṛtyottaram āha<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; vandhyāputravyomavane yathā na staḥ kadācana /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;jagadādy akhilaṃ dṛśyaṃ tathā nāsti kadācana // Mo_3,11.4 //<br>
"jagadādī"ty "ādi"śabdena pralayaḥ gṛhyate | "kadācana" kadāpīty arthaḥ ||&nbsp;MoT_3,11.4 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
phalitam āha<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;na cotpannaṃ na ca dhvaṃsi yat kilādau na vidyate /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;utpattiḥ kīdṛśī tasya nāśaśabdasya kā kathā // Mo_3,11.5 //<br>
"kile"ti niścaye | "yat" vastu | "ādau" pūrvaṃ | "na cotpannaṃ" bhavati |
 "na ca dhvaṃsi" bhavati | nāśabhāg api na bhavati | tathā "na vidyate" 
sthitiviṣayatāṃ ca na yāti | "tasya kīdṛśī" kiṃrūpā | "utpattir" bhavati
 | utpattyabhāve ca "nāśaśabdasya kā kathā" | etad vaktum api na yuktam 
iti bhāvaḥ ||&nbsp;MoT_3,11.5 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
śrīrāmaḥ punaḥ pṛcchati<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;vandhyāputranabhovṛkṣakalpanā tāvad asti hi /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;sā yathā nāśajanmāḍhyā tathaivedaṃ na kiṃ bhavet // Mo_3,11.6 //<br>
"tāvac"chabdo vipratipattyabhāvadyotakaḥ | "hi" niścaye | 
vandhyāputrādikalpanābhāve vandhyāputretyādikathaiva na yuktā syād iti 
bhāvaḥ | tataḥ kim ity&nbsp;| atrāha "sā" iti | "sā" 
vandhyāputrādikalpanā | asatyatve 'pi "nāśajanmāḍhyā" nāśajanmayuktā | 
"yathā" bhavati | "tathedaṃ" dṛśyam | asatyatve 'pi nāśajanmāḍhyaṃ "kiṃ 
na bhavet" | bhavatv ity arthaḥ | tathā ca "kva nu gacchatī"ti praśno 
yukta eveti bhāvaḥ ||&nbsp;MoT_3,11.6 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
anyatra striyi dṛṣṭasya putrasyāropeṇa yuktaiva vandhyāputrakalpanātra 
tu dṛśyasya kva yatrāpi sattaiva nāstīti na tatkalpanā yuktety uttaraṃ 
śrīvasiṣṭho bhaṅgyāntareṇāha<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;phullasyātulabhuḥ samyag ālakaiḥ kuru kolanam /<br>

"hi" niścaye | "jagatsattā tathaiva" tena prakāreṇaiva | "niranvayā" kam

niranvayatvam eva dṛṣṭāntāntaraiḥ pratipādayati<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;yathā sauvarṇakaṭake dṛśyamānam api sphuṭam /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;kaṭakatvaṃ tu nāsty eva jagattvaṃ tu tathā pare // Mo_3,11.8 //<br>

&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;ākāśe ca yathā nāsti śūnyatvaṃ vyatirekavat /<br>

"ca"śabdaḥ samuccaye | "vyatirekavat" vyatirekayuktam | ākāśaśūnyatvayoḥ

&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;kajjalān na yathā kārṣṇyaṃ śvaityaṃ ca na yathā himāt /<br>

guṇiguṇanidarśanenaikyam uktvā jagato bhramasiddhatayā aikyaṃ kathayati<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;marunadyāṃ yathā toyaṃ dvitīyendau yathendutā /<br>

punar apy etad eva dṛṣṭāntāntareṇa dṛḍhayati<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;saṃvidvilocanāloko bhāty ayaṃ saṃvidambare /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;jagadākhye 'male vyomni dṛṣṭimuktāvalī yathā // Mo_3,11.13 //<br>
"ayaṃ" ātmatvena pratyakṣe sthitaḥ | "saṃvidvilocanālokaḥ" | "saṃvid"

 raśmiḥ | "bhāti" padārthabhāvena sphurati | kutra | "jagadākhye" 
jagannāmni | "saṃvidambare" cidākāśe | kā "yathā" | "dṛṣṭimuktāvalī

sphurantaḥ muktāvalīrūpeṇa dṛśyante | tathā cita utthitāḥ cidālokākhyāḥ 
raśmayaḥ jagadākhye cidambare sphurantaḥ nānāpadārtharūpeṇa dṛśyante iti
 ||&nbsp;MoT_3,11.13 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;cidākāśe cidākāśaś cittvād yaḥ kacati svayam /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;tad eva tena rūpaṃ svaṃ jagad ity avabudhyate // Mo_3,11.14 //<br>
"cidākāśaḥ" "cidākāśe" cidākāśākhyāyāṃ svabhittau | "cittvāc" cidbhāvena
 | "kacati" sphurati | aham iti svaparāmarśaviṣayo bhavatīti yāvat | 
parāmarśābhāve hi tasya cittvam eva na syāt | "tena" tena cidākāśena | 
"tat" kacanākhyaṃ svaṃ rūpaṃ | "jagad ity avabudhyate" jñāyate | 
kacanarūpatvād eva jagataḥ&nbsp;||&nbsp;MoT_3,11.14 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
prakṛtam anusarati<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;ādāv eva hi yan nāsti kāraṇāsambhavāt svayam /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;vartamāne 'pi tan nāsti nāśaḥ syāt tatra kīdṛśaḥ // Mo_3,11.15 //<br>
"hi" niścaye | "yat" yat jagadākhyaṃ vastu | "kāraṇāsambhavāt ādau eva 
svayaṃ nāsti"&nbsp;| "tat vartamāne 'pi nāsti" | "tatra" tasmin vastuni |
 "nāśaḥ" vandhyāputradṛṣṭāntena śaṅkitaḥ nāśaḥ | "kīdṛśaḥ" kiṃrūpaḥ | 
"syāt" viṣayābhāvenāyogyatvān na syād ity arthaḥ ||&nbsp;MoT_3,11.15 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
nanu paramātmalakṣaṇasya kāraṇasya sadbhāvāt kāraṇāsambhavaḥ katham udety&nbsp;| atrāha<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;kvāsambhavadbhūtajāḍyaṃ pṛthvyāder jaḍavastunaḥ /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;kāraṇaṃ bhavituṃ śaktaṃ chāyāyā ātapo yathā // Mo_3,11.16 //<br>
bhūteṣu dṛśyamānaṃ jāḍyaṃ "bhūtajāḍyam" | "asambhavat bhūtajāḍyaṃ" 
yasya&nbsp;| tat "asambhavadbhūtajāḍyaṃ" | arthāt cidākhyaṃ vastu | 
"pṛthvyādeḥ jaḍavastunaḥ kāraṇaṃ bhavituṃ kva śaktaṃ" | na śaktam ity 
arthaḥ | atra dṛṣṭāntam āha "chāyāyā" iti&nbsp;| ātapasya chāyāyā 
nāśakatvena sphuṭaṃ chāyākāraṇatvāyogād 
dṛṣṭāntatā&nbsp;||&nbsp;MoT_3,11.16 ||<br>

<br>
nanu kāraṇābhāve 'pi jagad astu ity | atrāha<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;kāraṇābhāvataḥ kāryaṃ nedaṃ tat kiñcanoditam /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;yat tatkāraṇam evāsti tad evettham avasthitam // Mo_3,11.17 //<br>
"tat" pūrvoktād dhetoḥ | "kāraṇābhāvataḥ" kāraṇābhāvāt | "idam" 
anubhūyamānaṃ | "kāryaṃ" jagadākhyaṃ kāryam | "uditam" utpannaṃ | 
"nāsti" | kathaṃ | "kiñcana" leśenāpīty arthaḥ | punaḥ kim etad dṛśyata 
ity | atrāha "yad" iti | "tad eva" vastu | "itthaṃ" 
jagadrūpeṇ"āvasthitaṃ" vartamānaṃ bhavati | "tad eva" kiṃ | "yat" vastu |

<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;ajātam eva yad bhāti saṃvido bhānam eva tat /<br>

&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;saṃvitkacanam evāntar yathā svapnajagadbhramaḥ /<br>

"antaḥ" manasi | "svapnajagadbhramaḥ" svapnajagadrūpo bhramaḥ |

&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;yad idaṃ dṛśyate kiñcit tat sad evātmani sthitam /<br>

"yat idam" anubhūyamānaṃ | "kiñcit" vastu | "dṛśyate" | "tat sad eva"

&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;yathā dravatvaṃ salilaṃ spandatvaṃ pavano yathā /<br>

&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;yathā puram ivāste 'ntar vid eva svapnasaṃvidi /<br>

"yathā svapnasaṃvidi" svapnajñāne | svapnāvasthāyām iti yāvat | "antaḥ"

atra śrīrāmaḥ pṛcchati<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;evaṃ cet tat kathaṃ brahman sughanapratyayaṃ vada /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;idaṃ dṛśyaviṣaṃ jātam asatsvapnānubhūtivat // Mo_3,11.23 //<br>
he "brahman" | tvaṃ "vada" | "evaṃ cet" pūrvoktaḥ prakāro yadi bhavati |
 "tat" tarhi&nbsp;| "idam" anubhūyamānaṃ | "dṛśyaviṣaṃ" | "dṛśyam" eva 
mohādāyakatvena "viṣaṃ" viṣadravyaṃ | "sughanapratyayaṃ" | "sughanaḥ 
pratyayaḥ" āśvāsaḥ yasmin | tat | tādṛśaṃ | "kathaṃ" kena hetunā | 
"jātam" utpannaṃ | katham | "asatsvapnānubhūtivat" | "asatī" yā

<br>
dṛśyātyantāsambhavaṃ vinā muktim amanyamānaḥ tam eva vistareṇa pṛcchati<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;sati dṛśye kila draṣṭā sati draṣṭari dṛśyatā /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;ekasattve dvayor bandho muktir ekakṣaye dvayoḥ // Mo_3,11.24 //<br>
"kile"ti niścaye | dṛśyasattāyāṃ draṣṭṛsattā bhavati | draṣṭṛsattāyāṃ ca
 dṛśyasattā bhavati | yataḥ tvayaiveti bhāvaḥ | phalitam āha 
"ekasattve"ti | "dvayoḥ" madhye "ekasattve bandhaḥ" syāt | "dvayoḥ" 
madhye "ekakṣaye muktiḥ" syāt | tasmāt muktyartham ekakṣaya eva sādhyaḥ

<br>
nanu tatrāpi kiṃ punaḥ punaḥ dṛśyātyantābhāvam eva pṛcchasīty | atrāha<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;atyantāsambhavo yāvad buddho dṛśyasya nākṣayaḥ /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;tāvad draṣṭur adraṣṭṛtvaṃ na sambhavati mokṣadam // Mo_3,11.25 //<br>
"buddhaḥ" samyak jñātaḥ | "akṣayaḥ" avicchinnaḥ | "adraṣṭṛtvaṃ" 
adraṣṭṛbhāvaḥ | śuddhacinmātrateti yāvat | dṛśyātyantābhāvasya 
sukaratvād draṣṭṛtānirāsasya ca dṛśyātyantābhāvaṃ vinā duṣkaratvāc ca

nanu dṛśyātyantābhāve tava kiṃ prayojanaṃ | dṛśyadhvaṃsenāpi kāryasiddher ity&nbsp;| atrāha<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;dṛśyaṃ cet sambhavaty ādau paścāt kṣayam upāgatam /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;tad dṛśyasmaraṇānartharūpo bandho na naśyati // Mo_3,11.26 //<br>
"tat" tadā | "dṛśyasmaraṇānartharūpaḥ" dṛśyasmaraṇam evānarthaḥ | saḥ

"paścāt kṣayaṃ" nāśam | "upāgataṃ" bhavati | tasmāt traikālika evābhāvo

nanu naṣṭasya dṛśyasya kā smṛtir bhavatīty | atrāha<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;yatra kvacana saṃsthasya svādarśasyeva cidgateḥ /<br>

"hi" niścaye | "ayaṃ" samanantaram uktaḥ | "sargasmṛtimayaḥ"

tarhi muktiḥ kadā sambhavatīty | atrāha<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;ādāv eva hi notpannaṃ dṛśyaṃ nāsty eva cet svayam /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;draṣṭṛdṛśyabhramābhāvāt tat sambhavati muktatā // Mo_3,11.28 //<br>

praśnam upasaṃharati<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;tasmād asambhavanmukter mama protsāhayuktitaḥ /<br>

śrīvasiṣṭha uttaram āha<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;asad eva yathā bhāti jagat sarvātmakaṃ tathā  /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;śṛṇv ahaṃ kathayā rāma dīrghayā kathayāmi te // Mo_3,11.30 //<br>
tvaṃ "śṛṇu" | "ahaṃ tathā" taṃ prakāraṃ | "kathayāmi" | kayā |

nanu kimarthaṃ dīrghayā kathayā kathayasīty | atrāha<br>

nanu dṛśyātyantābhāvajñānena kiṃ mama setsyatīty | atrāha<br>

"tvaṃ vyavahāraṃ" paramparāyātaṃ rājyarūpaṃ vyavahāraṃ | "kariṣyasi"

nanu tato 'pi kim ity apekṣāyāṃ phalāntaram api kathayati<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;bhāvābhāvagrahotsargasthūlasūkṣmacalācalāḥ /<br>

dṛśyātyantābhāvakathanaṃ pratijānīte<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;sa eṣo 'sty eka evātmā na dvitīyāsti kalpanā /<br>

sargāntaślokenaitat saṅgṛhṇāti<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;tasmād imāni sakalāni vijṛmbhitāni<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;yo hīdam aṅga sakale sakalaṃ mahātmā /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;rūpāvalokanamanomananaprakāśa-<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;kośāspadaṃ svayam udeti ca līyate ca // Mo_3,11.35 //<br>
"tasmāt" paramātmalakṣaṇāt upādānakāraṇāt | "imāni" anubhūyamānāni | 
"vijṛmbhitāni" dṛśyarūpāṇi vilāsitāni | mṛda iva ghaṭā niryāntīti śeṣaḥ |
 "tasmāt" kasmāt | "hi" niścaye | he "aṅga" | "yaḥ sakalaṃ" 
samastadṛśyaprapañcarūpaṃ bhūtvā | "svayaṃ" svenaiv"odeti ca" udayaṃ

"rūpāvalokanamanomananaṃ" manaskāraḥ | "prakāśaḥ" indriyeṇālokitasya

oṃ | evaṃ jagato 'tyantābhāvaṃ paramātmaikamayatāṃ ca punaḥ punaḥ uktvā

&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;asmād eva praticchandāj jīvāḥ samprasaranty amī /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;sahakārikāraṇānām abhāvāc ca sa eva te // Mo_3,14.12 //<br>
"asmāt" prajāpatināmnaḥ | "praticchandāt" ābhāsāt | "amī" pratyaksaṃ 
sphuramāṇāḥ | "jīvāḥ" | "samprasaranti" sañcāraṃ yānti | tarhi tata 
utpannatvena tato bhinnā eva syur ity | atrāha "sahakārī"ti | "te" jīvāḥ
 | "sa eva" bhavanti | na tu tato bhinnāḥ | kutaḥ | "sahakārikāraṇānām" 
prāktanakarmarūpāṇāṃ sahakārikāraṇānām | "abhāvāt" | sahakārikāraṇābhāve
 kāryaṃ kāraṇarūpam eveti hi prasiddhiḥ ||&nbsp;MoT_3,14.12 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;sahakārikāraṇānām abhāve kāryakāraṇam /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;ekam etad ato nānyaḥ parasmāt sargavibhramaḥ // Mo_3,14.13 //<br>
kāryaṃ ca tat kāraṇaṃ ca "kāryakāraṇaṃ" | "parasmāt" dṛśyāpekṣayā 
utkṛṣṭāt prajāpateḥ | "sargavibhramaḥ" sargavilāsaḥ ||&nbsp;MoT_3,14.13 
||<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;brahmaivādyo virāḍātmā virāḍātmaiva sargatā /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;jīvākāśaḥ sa evetthaṃ sthitaḥ pṛthvyādy asad yataḥ // Mo_3,14.14 //<br>
"brahma eva" brahmatattvam ev"ādyaḥ virāḍātmā" virāṭsvarūpo paramātmā | 
bhavati&nbsp;| "virāḍātmā eva sargatā" sargaḥ | bhavati | pādapūraṇārtho
 bhāvapratyayaḥ | upasaṃhāraṃ karoti "jīve"ti | "sa" pūrvoktaḥ | 
"jīvākāśa" "eva" cetyatvāditanmātrāntavalitacinmātrākhyaḥ "jīvākāśa eva"
 | "itthaṃ" prajāpatyādisargarūpeṇa&nbsp;| "sthito" bhavati | atra hetum
 āha "pṛthvyādī"ti | "yataḥ" yasmāt kāraṇāt | "pṛthvyādi asat" bhavati 
||&nbsp;MoT_3,14.14 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
jīvākāśa iti śrutvā kiñcit saṃśayam āpannaḥ śrīrāmaḥ pṛcchati<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;kiṃ syāt parimito jīvarāśir āho anantakaḥ /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;āhosvid asty anantātmā jīvapiṇḍo 'calopamaḥ // Mo_3,14.15 //<br>
"jīvarāśiḥ" jīvākāśatvenoktaḥ jīvapuñjaḥ | "parimitaḥ kiṃ syāt āho 
anantakaḥ" aparimitaḥ syāt | "āhosvit anantātmā jīvapiṇḍaḥ acalopamaḥ" 
parvataprakhyaḥ | "asti" | "rāśiḥ" bhinnatvena vartamānānāṃ samūhaḥ | 
"piṇḍaḥ" mṛtpiṇḍavat eka eva kaścij jīvamayaḥ piṇḍa iti bhedaḥ 
||&nbsp;MoT_3,14.15 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
nanu kiṃ tava rāśipiṇḍatvayoḥ praśnenety āśaṅkyāha<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;dhārāḥ payomuca iva śīkarā iva vāridheḥ /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;kaṇās taptāyasa iva kasmān niryānti jīvakāḥ // Mo_3,14.16 //<br>
"dhārā" jaladhārāḥ | "śīkarāḥ" jalakaṇāḥ | "taptāyasaḥ" 
vahnyabhijvalitāt ayasaḥ | "kaṇāḥ" vahnimayāḥ leśāḥ | "kasmād" iti | 
jīvarāśeḥ jīvapiṇḍasya vānaṅgīkāre eteṣāṃ niryāṇaṃ na sambhavatīti 
bhāvaḥ ||&nbsp;MoT_3,14.16 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
praśnam upasaṃharati<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;iti me bhagavan brūhi jīvajālavinirṇayam /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;jñātam etan mayā prāyas tad eva prakaṭīkuru // Mo_3,14.17 //<br>
he "bhagavan" tvaṃ | "iti" pṛṣṭaṃ | "jīvajālavinirṇayaṃ me brūhi" | 
etāvad uktvā tvayā kiṃ na śrutam ity | atrāha "jñātam" iti | "mayā etat 
prāyaḥ" bāhulyena | "jñātam" | na tv aśeṣeṇātaḥ "tad eva prakaṭīkuru" 
yenāśeṣeṇa jānāmīti bhāvaḥ&nbsp;||&nbsp;MoT_3,14.17 ||<br>

<br>
<br>
śrīvasiṣṭha uttaram āha<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;eka eva na jīvo 'sti rāśīnāṃ sambhavaḥ kutaḥ /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;śaśaśṛṅgaṃ samuḍḍīya prayātītīva te vacaḥ // Mo_3,14.18 //<br>
paramārthataḥ "eka eva jīvo nāsti" | tvatpṛṣṭānāṃ "rāśīnāṃ sambhavaḥ 
kutaḥ" syāt&nbsp;| etatpraśnasyāsambaddhārthatvaṃ kathayati "śaśe"ti | 
"śaśaśṛṅgaṃ samuḍḍīya prayāti iti" etadvacanasadṛśaṃ | "te vacaḥ" asti |
 ādau śaśaśṛṅgam eva nāsti | kā kathā taduḍḍayanasya | tathā jīva eva 
nāsti | kā kathā tadrāśyāder iti bhāvaḥ ||&nbsp;MoT_3,14.18 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
sarvam etat pṛṣṭaṃ nirākaroti<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;na jīvo 'sti na jīvānāṃ rāśayaḥ santi rāghava /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;na caikaḥ parvataprakhyo jīvapiṇḍo 'sti kaścana // Mo_3,14.19 //<br>
paramārthataḥ sarvasya śuddhacinmātraikamayatvāt "jīvo nāsti" | he 
"rāghava" | "jīvānāṃ" " rāśayo na santi" | "na ca ekaḥ kaścana 
parvataprakhyaḥ jīvapiṇḍo 'sti" | ataś ca tvatpraśno 'yaṃ na yukta iti 
bhāvaḥ ||&nbsp;MoT_3,14.19 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
āśīḥprakāreṇa niścayam asya kartavyatvena kathayati<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;jīvaśabdārthakalanāḥ samastakalanānvitāḥ /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;na ca kāścana santīti niścayo 'stu tavācalaḥ // Mo_3,14.20 //<br>
"taveti niścayaḥ" ayaṃ niścayaḥ | "acalaḥ" sthiro | "'stu" | "iti" kiṃ |
 "iti jīvaśabdārthakalanāḥ" | tāḥ "samastakalanānvitāḥ" samastābhiḥ 
ahambhāvādikalanābhiḥ anvitāḥ | "na santi" ||&nbsp;MoT_3,14.20 ||<br>

<br>
<br>
nanu jīvādīnāṃ pratyakṣeṇa sphuraṇāt katham ayaṃ niścayaḥ yuktaḥ syād ity&nbsp;| atrāha<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;śuddhaṃ cinmātram amalaṃ brahmāstīha hi sarvagam /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;tad yathā sarvaśaktitvād vindate yāṃ svayaṃ kalām // Mo_3,14.21 //<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;cinmātrānukrameṇaiva sampraphullāṃ latām iva |<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;nanu mūrtām amūrtāṃ vā tām evāśu prapaśyati ||&nbsp;MoT_3,14.22 ||<br>

<br>
"hi" niścaye | "śuddhaṃ cinmātraṃ" śuddhacinmātrasvarūpam | ata 
ev"āmalaṃ brahmāsti" | kathambhūtaṃ | "sarvagam" samastadeśakālavyāpakam
 | tataḥ kim ity | atrāha "tad" iti | "tat" brahma | "sarvaśaktitvāt" 
yataḥ sarvaśaktir asti | tataḥ "yāṃ" jīvādimayīṃ | "kalāṃ" kalanāṃ | 
"yathā" yena prakāreṇa | "svayaṃ" svena | na tu pāratantryeṇa&nbsp;| 
"vindate" svopalabdhiviṣayaṃ karoti | kathambhūtāṃ "kalāṃ" | 
"cinmātrānukrameṇa" cinmātraparipāṭyā | "latām iva" latāvat | 
"sampraphullāṃ" vikasitāṃ | cinmātrasyaiva hīyaṃ paripāṭī yat kalanāḥ 
vikāsayati | "nanu" niścaye | "tāṃ" kalanāṃ&nbsp;| "mūrtām amūrtāṃ vā" 
sthūlāṃ sūkṣmāṃ v"āśu" tasminn eva kṣaṇe | "prapaśyati" sampannām eva 
paśyati | tathā ca | jīvaḥ paramārthataḥ svayaṃ siddho nāsti&nbsp;|

nanu yadi brahma jīvādi paśyati tadā tadbhinnam evaitat syāt | svabhinnasyaiva dṛṣṭigocaratvād ity | atrāha<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;jīvo buddhiḥ kriyāspando mano dvitvaikyam ity api /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;svasattāṃ prakacantīṃ tāṃ niyojayati vedane // Mo_3,14.23 //<br>
tat brahma | "tāṃ" prasiddhāṃ | "svasattāṃ" svasphurattāṃ | "vedane

kathambhūtāṃ | "jīvaḥ buddhiḥ kriyāspandaḥ" hitāhitaprāptiparihārārthāś 
ceṣṭāḥ | "manaḥ" | dvitvaṃ ca tat aikyaṃ ca "dvitvaikyam" | "ity api"

<br>
nanu brahmasattā kathaṃ jīvādibhāvena sphuratīty | atrāha<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;sābuddhaivaṃ bhavaty eva bhaved brahmaiva bodhataḥ /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;abodhaḥ prekṣayā yāti nāśaṃ na tu sa budhyate // Mo_3,14.24 //<br>
"sā" brahmasatt"ābuddhā" brahmasattābhāvenājñātā satī | "evaṃ bhavati

 "brahmaiva bhavet" | sattātadvatoḥ bhedābhāvāt | nanu jīvādeḥ 
brahmasattābhāvena brahmamayatve 'pi brahmasattāviṣayas tu yaḥ abodha 
āsīt saḥ abodhatvena jñātaḥ san ghaṭādivat tathaiva tiṣṭhati | tathā ca 
na brahmaikamayatā sidhyati ity | atrāha "abodha" iti | "abodhaḥ 
prekṣayā" bodhena | "nāśaṃ yāti" | "tu" pakṣāntare | "saḥ" abodhaḥ | "na

<br>
etad eva dṛṣṭāntena dṛḍhīkaroti<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;yathāndhakāro dīpena prekṣyamāṇaḥ praṇaśyati /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;na cāsya jñāyate tattvam abodhasyaivam eva hi // Mo_3,14.25 //<br>
"yathāndhakāraḥ dīpena prekṣyamāṇaḥ" draṣṭum ārabdhaḥ | "praṇaśyati" |

śeṣaḥ | dārṣṭāntike yojayati "abodhasye"ti | "hi" niścaye | 
"'bodhasyā"jñānasy"aivam eva tattvaṃ na jñāyate" ity arthaḥ 
||&nbsp;MoT_3,14.25 ||<br>

jīvasya brahmatvam upasaṃharati<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;evaṃ brahmaiva jīvātmā nirvibhāgo nirantaraḥ /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;sarvaśaktir anādyanto mahācitsārarūpadhṛt // Mo_3,14.26 //<br>
"evaṃ" pūrvoktaprakāreṇa | "jīvātmā brahmaiva" bhavati | 
brahmatvāpādakāny asya viśeṣaṇāny āha "nirvibhāga" iti | "nirvibhāgaḥ" 
vibhāgarahitaḥ | na hi jīvasvarūpe kaścid vibhāgo 'sti niravayavatvāt | 
"nirantaraḥ" prakāśanirbharitatvena madhye 'vakāśahīnaḥ | "sarvaśaktiḥ" 
sarvaśaktitvaṃ cāsya svapnādau pratyakṣadṛṣṭam eva | "anādyantaḥ" 
ādyantarahitatvaṃ cāsyādyantaparicchedakatvenaiva siddham | na hi

"mahācitsārarūpadhṛt" | "mahācit" vimarśaśaktiḥ | tasyāḥ "sāraḥ" 
prakāśaḥ | tasya rūpaṃ dhārayati "mahācitsārarūpadhṛt" | prakāśasvarūpa

sarvathaiva bhedakalanāṃ nirākaroti<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;sarvānantatayā tv asya na kācid bhedakalpanā /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;vidyate yā hi kalanā sā tad evānubhūtitaḥ // Mo_3,14.27 //<br>
"tu" viśeṣe | "'sya" brahmaṇaḥ | "sarvānantatayā" sarvaś cāsāv anantaś 
ca "sarvānantaḥ"&nbsp;| tasya bhāvaḥ "sarvānantatā" | tayā | "kācid 
bhedakalanā" bhedākārā kalanā | bheda iti yāvat | "nā"sti | 
sarvarūpasyānantasya ca bhedāyogāt | na hi ghaṭādyapekṣayānantasya 
ghaṭaśarāvādisarvarūpasya mṛdādeḥ ghaṭabhedo yuktaḥ | nanu sarvatvam 
anantatvaṃ ca asarvāt sāntāc ca bhedakam eva | tathā ca tābhyām eva

"yā kalanā" bhedakalanā | "vidyate" | "sā tad eva" brahmaiva | bhavati |
 kuto | "'nubhūtitaḥ" anubhūtisvarūpataḥ | ayaṃ bhāvaḥ | yā kācit

atra śrīrāmaḥ pṛcchati<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;evam etat kathaṃ brahmann ekajīvecchayākhilāḥ /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;jagajjīvā na yujyante mahājīvaikatāvaśāt // Mo_3,14.28 //<br>
he "brahman" | "etat" tvayoktam | "evaṃ" bhavati | satyam eva bhavatīty

"katham" iti | "akhilāḥ jagajjīvāḥ"&nbsp;| jagati sthitā jīvāḥ 
"jagajjīvāḥ" | "mahājīvaikatāvaśāt" | "mahājīvena"

śrīvasiṣṭha uttaram āha<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;mahājīvātma tad brahma sarvaśaktimayātmakam /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;sthitaṃ yatheccham eveha nirvibhāgaṃ nirantaram // Mo_3,14.29 //<br>
"mahājīvātma" mahājīvaḥ | "tat brahma iha yathecchaṃ" svecchāsadṛśaṃ | 
"sthitaṃ" bhavati | "tat brahma" kathambhūtaṃ | "sarvaśaktimayātmakam" |

sarvaśaktimayātmakatvaṃ ca brahmaṇaḥ sarvaśaktīnāṃ tata evotthānāt | 
punaḥ kathambhūtaṃ | "nirvibhāgaṃ" akhaṇḍasvarūpatvena vibhāgān

nanu brahma yathecchaṃ sthitaṃ bhavatu | tataḥ kim ity | atrāha<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;yad evecchati tat tasya bhavaty āśu mahātmanaḥ /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;pūrvaṃ tu naśyatīcchā cid ato dvitvam udeti tat // Mo_3,14.30 //<br>
tat brahma | "yad evecchati" icchāviṣayaṃ karoti | "tad" eva | na tv 
anyat | "tasya mahātmanaḥ" vyāpakasvarūpasya brahmaṇaḥ | "āśu" 
icchākṣaṇe eva | "bhavati" sampadyate | ekatecchānāśena dvitvotpattim 
asmāt kathayati "pūrvam" iti | "cit" icchā | nīlam utpalam itivat 
cidviśeṣitecchā jñeyā | cidviśeṣitatvaṃ cātra cidviṣayatvaṃ jñeyam | 
yata ity adhyāhāryam | tenāyam arthaḥ | yataḥ "cit" icchā&nbsp;| cidrūpa
 eva bhavāmīty evaṃrūpā ekatecchā | "pūrvaṃ" prathamasargārambhe | 
"'taḥ" saptamyarthe tasil&nbsp;asmin brahmaṇi | "tu"śabdaḥ ivārthe | 
"naśyati tu" susphūrtyaviṣayatārūpaṃ nāśaṃ yātīva | paramārthataḥ tu na 
naśyati tasyāḥ sarvatrānugamāt | iti "tu"śabdopādānam | 
cidviṣayecchānāśaś ca cetyaviṣayecchodbhūter eva jñeyaḥ | "tat" tasmāt 
kāraṇāt | "dvitvaṃ" cetyasvarūpajīvādirūpeṇa sthito dvidhābhāvaḥ | 
"udeti" prādurbhavati&nbsp;| ekatecchānāśahetubhūtatayā dvitvecchayā eva

dvitvodayānantaraṃ śaktikriyākramakaraṇaṃ kathayati<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;paścād dvitvavibhaktānāṃ svaśaktīnāṃ prakalpitaḥ /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;anenetthaṃ hi bhavatīty evaṃ tena kriyākramaḥ // Mo_3,14.31 //<br>

sampannaṃ sveṣṭaṃ kathayati<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;śaktyādyayā tayā brāhmyā niyamo yaḥ prakalpitaḥ /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;taṃ vinā nodayo 'nyāsāṃ pradhānecchaiva rohati // Mo_3,14.32 //<br>
"tayā" prasiddhay"ādyayā" mūlakāraṇabhūtayā | "brāhmyā" 
brahmasambandhinyā | "śaktyā" | "yaḥ niyamaḥ" svecchāsadṛśī niyatiḥ | 
"prakalpitaḥ" | "taṃ" niyamaṃ | "vinā" ṛte | "'nyāsāṃ" jīvasthānānām |

bhavati sa ko 'pi dharmaḥ | tam iti yāvat | "jagat viddhi" jānīhi | atra
 hetum āha "ne"ti | "hi" yasmāt kāraṇāt | "cittvam ajagat" jagato 
vyatiriktaṃ | "nāsti" | cetyarūpajagadabhāve 'nirvācyāyāḥ citaḥ sphuṭaṃ 
cittvāyogyatvāt | avāntaraṃ phalitam āha "ajagad" iti | ata ity 
adhyāhāryam | ato hetoḥ | "cit ajagattvād" dhetor | "acit syāt" 
cinnāmayogyā na syāt&nbsp;| yadi jagan na syād anirvācyāyāḥ citer api 
cittvaṃ na syād iti bhāvaḥ | paramaṃ phalitam āha "bhāvābhedād" iti | 
"bhāvābhedāt" pūrvanyāyasiddhena cijjagator abhedena siddhāt 
padārthābhedāt | "jagat kutaḥ" kathaṃ | syāt | cittvajagator abhede sati
 cittvasya cidekamayatayā cita eva sarvathā sthitatvāt jagan nāstīti 
bhāvaḥ ||&nbsp;MoT_3,14.53 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;citer maricabījasya nijā yāntaś camatkṛtiḥ /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;saivaiṣā jīvatanmātramātraṃ jagad iti sthitā // Mo_3,14.54 //<br>
"citeḥ" cinnāmnaḥ | "maricabījasyāntaḥ" madhye | "yā camatkṛtiḥ" arthāt 
tīkṣṇatāsthānīyaḥ svaśaktyāsvādākhyaḥ camatkāraḥ | bhavati | "saivaiṣā 
jagad iti" jagadrūpeṇa | "sthitā" bhavati | kathambhūtaṃ "jagat" | 
"jīvatanmātramātraṃ" kevalaṃ jīvapañcatanmātrasvarūpaṃ | na tu 
sthūlabhūtamayaṃ | svapnanyāyena sthūlatāyā 
asatyatvāt&nbsp;||&nbsp;MoT_3,14.54 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;cittvāt svaśaktikacanaṃ yad ahambhāvanaṃ citeḥ /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;jīvaḥ spandātmakarmātmā bhaviṣyadabhidho hy asau // Mo_3,14.55 //<br>
"citeḥ" "svaśaktikacanaṃ" svaśaktisphuraṇarūpaṃ | "ahambhāvanaṃ yad" 
asti | kutaḥ&nbsp;| "cittvāt" cidbhāvākhyāt hetoḥ | "hi" niścaye | 
"asau" svaśaktisphuraṇaṃ | "jīvaḥ" bhavati&nbsp;| "jīvā"pekṣayā 
puṃliṅgatā | kathambhūto "jīvaḥ" | "spandātma" 
kiñcitsphuraṇarūpaṃ&nbsp;| yat "karma" | tat "ātmā" svarūpaṃ | yasya | 
"spandātmakarmātmā" citspandarūpa evety arthaḥ | punaḥ kathambhūtaḥ | 
"bhaviṣyadabhidhaḥ" vaikharīprādurbhāva ity 
arthaḥ&nbsp;||&nbsp;MoT_3,14.55 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;yac cic cittvena kalanaṃ susampādyābhidhārthadik /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;vyavacchedavikārais tad bhidyate 'to na vidyate // Mo_3,14.56 //<br>
"cit" ārṣaḥ ṣaṣṭhīlopaḥ citaḥ | "yat cittvena" cidbhāvena | "kalanaṃ" 
paricchedaḥ | bhavati | kathambhūtaṃ | "susampādyā" sukhena 
"sampādayituṃ" śaky"ābhidhārthadik" nāmārthaleśaḥ yena | tat 
"susampādyābhidhārthadik" | paricchinnasyaiva hi vastunaḥ nāma 
tadvācyatvaṃ ca kartuṃ śakyaṃ | "tat bhidyate" citaḥ bhinnatvena 
sthīyate | kaiḥ | "vyavacchedavikāraiḥ" | cittaṃ na spṛśatīti yāvat | 
bhavantu jaḍebhyaḥ bhinnatāpādanāni | ta eva vikārāḥ | taiḥ | 
tadyuktatvād iti yāvat | cito bhinnaṃ | kā hānir ity | atrāh"āta" iti | 
"ataḥ" cito bhinnatvāt | "na vidyate" | cidbhinnasya cetyamānatāyogāt | 
tadayoge ca sato 'pi | tasyāsaṅkalpatvāt | cidrūpatvena kalanābhāvena 
vyarthasya cittvasyāpy abhāvaḥ | cittvābhāve ca jagato 'bhāvaḥ | 
tadabhāve ca śuddhasya cinmātrasyaiva sāmrājyam iti bhāvaḥ 
||&nbsp;MoT_3,14.56 ||<br>

<br>
<br>
nanu bhavatu cidekamayatvaṃ sarvasya | tadaṃśabhūtayoḥ kartṛkarmaṇos tu parasparaṃ bhedo durnivāra ity | atrāha<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;citspandarūpiṇor asti na bhedaḥ kartṛkarmaṇoḥ /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;spandamātraṃ bhavet karma sa eva puruṣaḥ smṛtaḥ // Mo_3,14.57 //<br>
"citspandarūpiṇoḥ" citsphūrtyākhyarūpayuktayoḥ | "kartṛkarmaṇoḥ bhedaḥ 
nāsti"&nbsp;| katham etad ity | atrāha "spande"ti | "spandamātraṃ karma 
bhavet" | bahiḥspandasyaiva karmatvadarśanāt | "sa eva puruṣaḥ smṛtaḥ" |
 paṇḍitair iti śeṣaḥ | ayaṃ bhāvaḥ | antaḥ vicāryamāṇaṃ jñānaṃ vinā na 
kiñcil labhyate | ghaṭapaṭādiś ca bahirbhūtaḥ | ataḥ jñānasya taiḥ saha 
ko 'pi sambandho nāstīti śuddhaṃ jñānaṃ śiṣṭaṃ&nbsp;| sa eva ca citaḥ 
sphuraṇākhyaḥ spandaḥ | tad eva karma | bahiḥsthitasya 
śarīracalanādirūpasya karmaṇo 'pi tatpūrvakatvāt | tat tattvam eva | sa 
eva ca puruṣaḥ | antar anyasyānupalambhāt bahiḥśarīrasya mṛtpiṇḍarūpasya
 puruṣatvāyogāt iti siddhaṃ karmaṇaḥ puruṣatvam&nbsp;||&nbsp;MoT_3,14.57
 ||<br>

<br>
<br>
sarvasya jīvāder vargasyaikatvaṃ sādhayati<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;jīvaś cittve parispandaḥ puṃsāṃ cittaṃ sa eva ca /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;manas tv indriyarūpaṃ san nānānānaiva gacchati // Mo_3,14.58 //<br>
"jīvaḥ cittve" cidbhāve | citsvarūpa iti yāvat | "parispandaḥ" bhavati |
 "puṃsāṃ sa eva" karmāparaparyāyaṃ "cittaṃ" bhavati | parispanda "eva 
ca" | citspandatvavyatiriktasya jīvasya cittasya vābhāvāt | "tu" viśeṣe |
 "mana" eva citspandarūpaṃ cittam | "indriyarūpaṃ sat" | "nānānānā"tvaṃ 
"gacchati" | "cittaṃ" kathambhūtam "eva"&nbsp;| "anānaiva" | 
paramārthataḥ ekatvāt nānātvarahitaṃ | idam atra tātparyam | "jīvas" 
tāvat citspanda eva&nbsp;| taccittam api vikalpātmakaṃ tathaiva | tad 
eva ca cittam indriyarūpeṇa pariṇamate&nbsp;| tataś ca 
svapariṇāmabhūtendriyadvāreṇa bahir nirgatya 
rūpādipañcakasvarūpaviṣayarūpatām āpadyate | tataś ca 
tadādhārabhūtapañcakatām āsādyate | tataś ca tatkāryabhāvena pariṇamate 
iti citspanda eva sthūlasūkṣmabhāvarūpeṇa sthitaḥ | sa ca cidavyatirikta
 iti sarvaṃ cidrūpam eva sthitam iti ||&nbsp;MoT_3,14.58 ||<br>

<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;śāntāśeṣaviśeṣaṃ hi citprakāśacchaṭā jagat /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;kāryakāraṇakāditvaṃ tasmād anyan na vidyate // Mo_3,14.59 //<br>
"hi" yasmāt arthe | 'śeṣaṃ samastaṃ "jagat citprakāśacchaṭā" citprakāśe 
siddhapadārthapaṅktimayatvāt citprakāśapaṅktiḥ | bhavati | kathambhūtaṃ |
 "śāntāśeṣaviśeṣaṃ" | "śāntāḥ" cinmātre pralīnāḥ | "aśeṣāḥ" samastāḥ | 
"viśeṣāḥ" bhāvāḥ yasya | tat | "tasmāt" tato hetoḥ | 
"kāryakāraṇakāditvam anyat" cinmātrāt pṛthak | "na vidyate" | 
kāryakāraṇatvāder api jagattvena citprakāśacchaṭātvānapāyāt 
||&nbsp;MoT_3,14.59 ||<br>

<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;acchedyo 'ham adāhyo 'yam akledyo 'śoṣya eva ca /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;nityaḥ satatagaḥ sthāṇur acalo 'ham iti sthitam // Mo_3,14.60 //<br>
sarvasya jīvāder jagataḥ citprakāśamayatve sati "iti sthitam" bhavati | 
ayaṃ niścaya eva pratiṣṭhito bhavati iti | kim "iti" | "ahaṃ" 
citprakāśarūpaḥ aham | "acchedyaḥ" aśarīravat chedayogyo nāsmi | evam 
"adāhyo 'yam" ity ādāv api sambandhanīyam | "ahaṃ nityo" 'smi | nityatve
 viśeṣaṇadvāreṇa hetum āha "satataga" iti | sarvakālaga ity arthaḥ | 
punaḥ kathambhūtaḥ | "sthāṇuḥ" svasvarūpe dṛḍhaṃ sthitaḥ | atrāpi hetum 
viśeṣaṇatvenāh"ācala" iti | yataḥ niṣkampa ity arthaḥ 
||&nbsp;MoT_3,14.60 ||<br>

nanu cidekamayatve sati vādinaḥ kimarthaṃ vivadanti ity | atrāha<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;vivadante yathā hy atra vivadante tathā bhramaiḥ /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;bhramanto na vayaṃ tv ete jātā vigatavibhramāḥ // Mo_3,14.61 //<br>
vādina iti śeṣaḥ | vādinaḥ tārkikādayaḥ | "atra" citprakāśe | "yathā" 
yena prakāreṇa&nbsp;| "vivadante" vivādaṃ kurvanti | "tathā bhramaiḥ" 
mithyājñānaiḥ | "vivadante" | jñātatattvānāṃ vivādābhāvāt | tathā hi | 
tārkikāḥ ātmānaṃ jñānaguṇaṃ saṃsāriṇaṃ ca kathayanti | sāṅkhyāḥ udāsīnaṃ
 jñānarūpam api paramāṇurūpam | cārvākā bhūtarūpaṃ | bauddhāḥ śūnyarūpaṃ
 | vedāntinaḥ śāntasvarūpaṃ | evam anye 'py anyat kiñcit | yady api ete 
'dhikārikṛpayaiva vivadante tathāpi adhikāriṇāṃ tattatpadaniṣṭhānām 
adhaḥsthaṃ padaṃ parityajyordhvapadagamanārthaṃ vādināṃ bhramaḥ uktaḥ | 
yadi vādinaḥ bhrameṇa vivadante tarhi yūyaṃ kathaṃ sthitāḥ ity | atrāha 
"bhramanta" iti | "tu" vyatireke | "ete vayaṃ vigatabhramāḥ" 
vādyuktanānāguṇottīrṇaśuddhacinmātrāṅgīkārāt dūrībhūtamithyājñānāḥ | 
"jātāḥ" | kathambhūtāḥ | "na bhramanta" ity arthaḥ | nanu śrīvasiṣṭhena 
tanmatanirāsapareṇa vivāda eva kṛtaḥ | maivam | bodhanārthatanmatanirāse
 'pi cinmātrāṅgīkāreṇaiva sarvamatāṅgīkārāt | cinmātraṃ hi sarve 
'ṅgīkurvanty eva | kiṃ tu tadviśeṣeṣu vivadante ||&nbsp;MoT_3,14.61 ||<br>

<br>
punar api cidekamayatvam eva kathayati<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;dṛśye mūrte 'jñasaṃrūḍhe vikārādi pṛthag bhavet /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;nāmūrte tajjñakacite citkhe sadasadātmani // Mo_3,14.62 //<br>
"mūrte" sthūle | "dṛśye" dṛśikriyāviṣaye bhāvajāte | kathambhūte | 
"'jñasaṃrūḍhe" | "ajñeṣu" mūrkheṣu | "saṃrūḍhe" dṛḍhībhūte | mūrkhajñāte
 iti yāvat | "vikārādi" | "ādi"śabdāt pariṇāmāder grahaṇam | "pṛthak 
bhavet" | sthūlasya dṛśyasya vikārādidharmādhikaraṇatve yogyatāstīti

"citkhe" cidākāśe | vikārādi pṛthak "na" bhavet | kathambhūte "citkhe" |
 "sadasadātmani" sadasatsvarūpe | vikārādi yadi sat tadāpi tanmayam eva |
 yady asat tadāpi tathaiveti bhāvaḥ ||&nbsp;MoT_3,14.62 ||<br>

&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;cittattvaṃ cetyarasataḥ śaktīḥ kālādināmikāḥ /<br>

"cinmadhuśrīḥ" cidākhyāvasantalakṣmīḥ | "kālādināmikāḥ" 
kāladeśādināmayuktāḥ | "śaktīḥ svamañjarīḥ tanoti" vistārayati | kutaḥ |
 "cetyarasataḥ" cetyāsvādena yuktam | yuktaṃ ca vasantalakṣmyāḥ rasena 
mañjarītananam | "śaktīḥ" kiṃ | "cittattvam" cinmātrarūpiṇya eva |

svabhāvena cinmātrasya cetyarūpatayā sphuraṇaṃ kathayati<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;svayaṃ vicitraṃ sphurati citkañcukam anāhatam /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;svayaṃ vicitraṃ kacati cidratnam apakāraṇam // Mo_3,14.64 //<br>
"citkañcukam" | "kañcukaṃ" lakṣaṇayā paṭaḥ | cidākhyaḥ paṭaḥ | "svayaṃ" 
svabhāvena | "vicitraṃ sphurati" citrapaṭavat vicitratāyuktaṃ bhavatīty 
arthaḥ | vicitratā cārthacetyakṛtā jñeyā | tathā "cidratnaṃ svayaṃ 
vicitraṃ kacati" | ratnasya ca kacanaṃ yuktam eva | "svayam" ity

&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;svayaṃ vilakṣaṇaspandaś cidvāyur ajaḍātmakaḥ /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;svayaṃ vicitravalanaṃ cidvāri na nikhātagam // Mo_3,14.65 //<br>
"vilakṣaṇaspandaḥ" bāhyavāyoḥ vyatiriktaspandayuktaḥ | atra hetutvena 
viśeṣaṇam āha "ajaḍātmaka" iti | jaḍājaḍayoḥ spando 'vaśyaṃ vilakṣaṇa 
eva syād iti bhāvaḥ | "vāri nikhātagaṃ" sat | "vicitravalanaṃ" 
vicitrasphuraṇaṃ bhavati | "cidvāri" tu "nikhātagaṃ" sat | 
"vicitravalanaṃ" "na" bhavati ||&nbsp;MoT_3,14.65 ||<br>

&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;svayaṃ vicitradhātūccaiś cicchṛṅgam apanirmitam /<br>

"uccaiḥ" "cicchṛṅgam apanirmitam" nirmāṇarahitam | "vicitradhātu" |

&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;svayaṃ sadaiva prakaṭaś cidāloko 'malātmakaḥ /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;svayam astaṅgatevājñe jñe jñānād uditā citiḥ // Mo_3,14.67 //<br>
ālokasya prakaṭatāguṇayuktatvāt iti bhāvaḥ | "svayam" iti | "citiḥ 
svayaṃ ajñe" mūrkhe | "'staṅgateva" bhavati | astaṅgatatvaṃ ca asyāḥ 
sthitāyāḥ api jñānāviṣayībhāva evāta "iva"śabdopādānam | "citiḥ svayaṃ 
jñe" jñānayukte | "jñānād uditā" bhavati&nbsp;| yathākāśe jvalann api 
sūryo 'ndhaṃ praty anuditaḥ | netrasahitaṃ prati tūditaḥ | evam iyam

&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;svayaṃ jaḍeṣu jāḍyena padaṃ sauṣuptam āgatā /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;svayaṃ spandi tathāspandi cittvāc citimahānabhaḥ // Mo_3,14.68 //<br>
citiḥ "jaḍeṣu" sthāvarādiṣu | "jāḍyena" jaḍabhāvena | "svayaṃ 
sauṣuptapadaṃ" suṣuptisthānam | "āgatā" bhavati | "citimahānabhaḥ"

<br>
guṇini guṇavat citi jagataḥ sadasattvaṃ kathayati<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;citprakāśaprakāśo hi jagad asti ca nāsti ca /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;cidākāśaikaśūnyatvaṃ jagad asti ca nāsti ca // Mo_3,14.69 //<br>
"hi" niścaye | "citprakāśaprakāśaḥ" | "citprakāśasya" cidākhyasya 
tejasaḥ | "prakāśaḥ" ālokākhyaguṇabhūtaḥ | "jagat asti ca nāsti ca" | 
"ca"kāraḥ svayaṃ astitvanāstitvayoḥ samapradhānatvaṃ dyotayati | ayaṃ 
bhāvaḥ | yathā tejorūpe guṇini ālokākhyo guṇaḥ bhedena bhāsamānatvāt 
asti | tato vyatirekeṇa labdhum aśakyatvān nāsti | tathā jagad api 
cidākhye ādhārabhūte guṇini bhāsamānatvād asti | tadvyatirekeṇa labdhum 
aśakyatvān nāstīti | evam agre 'pi yojyam | "cidākāśe"ti | 
cidākāśasyaikaṃ "śūnyatvaṃ" śūnyatvākhyo guṇaḥ | "cidākāśaikaśūnyatvam"

&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;cidālokamahārūpaṃ jagad asti ca nāsti ca /<br>

&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;cidghanadhvāntakṛṣṇatvaṃ jagad asti ca nāsti ca /<br>

<br>
pūrvoktaṃ dṛḍhayituṃ sarvathā cidguṇatvam eva jagataḥ kathayati<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;citkajjalarajaḥśailaparamāṇur jagadbhramaḥ /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;cidagnyauṣṇyaṃ jagallekhā jagac cicchaṅkhaśuklatā // Mo_3,14.72 //<br>
"cit" eva "kajjalarajaḥśailaḥ" añjanādriḥ | tasya "paramāṇuḥ" | 
paramāṇoḥ parvataguṇatvaṃ tadāśritatvenopacārāj jñeyam | jagadākāraḥ

oṃ śrīvasiṣṭhaḥ pūrvadine kathyamānam upastauti<br>

&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;piṇḍagrāhaḥ sad ity asmin vijñānākāśarūpiṇi /<br>

<br>
nanv asatsvarūpe jagati dṛśyatā kathaṃ bhāti ity | atrāha<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;jagaty apiṇḍagrāhe 'smin saṅkalpanagaropame /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;marau sarid ivābhāti dṛśyatā bhrāntirūpiṇī // Mo_3,15.8 //<br>
avidyamānaḥ piṇḍavat grāhaḥ yasya | tasmin "apiṇḍagrāhe" | 
"saṅkalpanagaropame" saṅkalpollikhitanagarasadṛśe | "'smin jagati 
dṛśyatā" dṛśyabhāvaḥ | "bhrāntirūpiṇī" mithyājñānarūpā | "bhāti" 
vilasati | k"eva" | "marau" marudeśe | "sarid 
iva"&nbsp;||&nbsp;MoT_3,15.8 ||<br>

<br>
bhramarūpatvenāsadrūpasya jagataḥ svapnavat tulādeśāpūraṇaṃ kathayati<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;svapnādriṇeva jagatā tulādeśau na kaucana /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;pūritau kalanonmuktā dṛśyaśrīr vyoma kevalam // Mo_3,15.9 //<br>
"svapnādriṇeva" svapnādrivat | "jagatā tulādeśau pūritau na" bhavataḥ | 
gurutvasyāsadrūpatvāt "tulā"pūraṇaṃ | vistārasyāsadrūpatvāt 
"deśā"pūraṇaṃ | etac ca svapnādau sarvapratītisiddham eveti tasya 
dṛṣṭāntatā | phalitam āha "kalane"ti&nbsp;| "kalanonmuktā" 
dṛśyatvākhyakalanāmuktā ||&nbsp;MoT_3,15.9 ||<br>

<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;varjayitvājñavijñātajagacchabdārthabhāvanām /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;jagadbrahmakhaśabdānām arthe nāsty eva bhinnatā // Mo_3,15.10 //<br>
"ajñaiḥ" citsvarūpajñānaśūnyaiḥ | "vijñātā" svānubhavaviṣayīkṛtā | 
"jagacchabdārthabhāvanā" | "jagad" iti "śabdasya" | tad"arthasya" ca 
"bhāvanā"nusandhānaṃ | tāṃ "ajñavijñātajagacchabdārthabhāvanāṃ 
varjayitvā" parityajya | "jagadbrahmakhaśabdānām arthe bhinnatā" bhedo |
 "nāsty eva" | paryāyarūpā evaite śabdā ity arthaḥ |

 ||<br>

<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;idaṃ tv acetyacinmātrabhānor bhānaṃ nabhaḥ prati /<br>

"tu" viśeṣe | "acetyacinmātrabhānoḥ" cetyādūṣitacitsūryasya | "bhānam"

&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;yathā svapnapuraṃ svacchaṃ jāgratpuravaraṃ prati /<br>

"yathā" laukikabuddhyā | "jāgratpuravaraṃ prati svapnapuraṃ svacchaṃ"

jñānidṛṣṭyā | "idaṃ" jāgraty anubhūyamānaṃ | "jagat" | "saṅkalpitajagat

&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;tasmād acetyacidrūpaṃ jagad vyomaiva kevalam /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;śūnyau vyomajagacchabdau paryāyau viddhi cinmayau // Mo_3,15.13 //<br>
"tasmāt" pūrvoktāt hetoḥ | "acetyacidrūpaṃ" śuddhacinmātrarūpaṃ | 
"jagat" | "kevalaṃ vyomaiva" bhavati | phalitam āha "śūnyāv" iti | ataḥ

vakṣyamāṇavṛttāntākāṅkṣayā pūrvoktam upasaṃharati tribhiḥ<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;tasmān na kiñcid utpannaṃ jagadādīha dṛśyakam /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;anākhyam anabhivyaktaṃ yathāsthitam avasthitam // Mo_3,15.14 //<br>
"tasmāt" cidekamayatvāt hetoḥ | "jagadādi dṛśyaṃ kiñcit" leśenāpi | 
"utpannaṃ na" bhavati | kathambhūtaṃ | "anākhyaṃ" nāmānarham | atra 
hetutvena viśeṣaṇam āh"ānabhivyaktam" indriyāgocaram | anyarūpatvena

āśaṅkya viśeṣaṇam āh"āvasthitam" iti | "avasthitaṃ" tiṣṭhat | kathaṃ | 
"yathāsthitaṃ" | yathaiva pūrvaṃ tathaiva | na tv apūrvatayety arthaḥ | 
yathā pūrvaṃ sarpatayā jñātā rajjuḥ tataḥ rajjutayā jñātāpi pūrvavad eva

||&nbsp;MoT_3,15.14 ||<br>

tad eva punaḥ viśinaṣṭi<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;ākāśarūpam evācchaṃ piṇḍagrahavivarjitam /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;vyomni vyomamayaṃ citraṃ saṅkalpapuravat sthitam // Mo_3,15.16 //<br>
"ākāśarūpam eva" nakiñcidrūpam eva | "acchaṃ" śuddhabodhasvarūpaṃ | 
"piṇḍagrahavivarjitam" | "piṇḍa"vat yaḥ "grahaḥ" | tena "varjitam" |

||&nbsp;MoT_3,15.16 ||<br>

atha jagataḥ tulādeśādyapūrakatvasādhakaṃ mahāvṛttāntaṃ vṛttāntakāmān prati kṛpayā kathayati<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;atredaṃ maṇḍapākhyānaṃ śṛṇu śravaṇabhūṣaṇam /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;niḥsandeho yathaiṣo 'rthaś citte viśrāntim eṣyati // Mo_3,15.17 //<br>

oṃ tasya rājñaḥ tayā rājñyā saha krīḍām āha<br>

&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;amba māṃ trijaganmātas trāyasva kṛpaṇām imām /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;idaṃ varadvayaṃ dehi yad iha prārthaye śubham // Mo_3,16.39 //<br>
"kṛpaṇāṃ" dīnāṃ | "śubham" iti "varadvaya"viśeṣaṇam ||&nbsp;MoT_3,16.39 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
varadvayamadhye ekaṃ kathayati<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;ekaṃ tāvad videhasya bhartur jīvo mamāmbike /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;asmād eva hi mā yāsīn nijāntaḥpuramaṇḍapāt // Mo_3,16.40 //<br>
varadvayamadhye "ekam" idaṃ varaṃ dehi | kim ity apekṣāyām āha 
"videhe"ti | "videhasya" mṛtasya | "mā yāsīt" mā gacchatu 
||&nbsp;MoT_3,16.40 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
dvitīyaṃ kathayati<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;dvitīyaṃ tvāṃ mahādevi prārthaye 'haṃ yadā yadā /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;darśanāya varārthena tadā me dehi darśanam // Mo_3,16.41 //<br>
"dvitīyam" idaṃ dehi | kim ity apekṣāyām āha "tvām" iti | he "devi" | 
"ahaṃ tvāṃ yadā darśanāya prārthaye tadā tvaṃ varārthena" varānurodhena |
 "darśanaṃ dehi"&nbsp;||&nbsp;MoT_3,16.41 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
varadvayam aṅgīkṛtya jñaptya ...<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>

<br>
<br>
<br>
4. Stitiprakarana (1,1.1-4,24.19, 4,25.12-4,33.26)<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
 oṃ atha sthitiprakaraṇaṃ vyākhyāyate | oṃ<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;pratyakjyotiḥ kim api paramam bhāvayitvātha devaṃ<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;dhyātvā citte bhavabhayaharaṃ śrīgaṇeśaṃ vibhuṃ ca /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;maulau kṛtvā gurucaraṇayor dhūlipuñjaṃ ca ṭīkā<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;sthityākhye 'smin prakaraṇavare tanyate bhāskareṇa // Mo_4,1.0 //<br>
evam utpattiprakaraṇe 'nutpattirūpāṃ jagadutpattim pratipādya 
tacchravaṇena ca tatra śrīrāmam pratītibhājaṃ nirvarṇya tadanantaraṃ 
yogyaṃ sthitiprakaraṇārambhaṃ karoti<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;athotpattiprakaraṇād anantaram idaṃ śṛṇu /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;sthitiprakaraṇaṃ rāma jñātaṃ nirvāṇakāri yat // Mo_4,1.1 //<br>
athaśabdo maṅgalamātraprayojanaḥ | idaṃ vakṣyamāṇam | sthitiprakaraṇaṃ 
kim | yat jñātaṃ śravaṇamanananidadhyāsanaviṣaye kṛtaṃ sat | nirvāṇam 
brahmaṇi ātyantikaṃ layaṃ karotīti tādṛśam | bhavati || MoT_4,1.1 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
sthitiprakaraṇam eva kathayati<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;evaṃ tāvad idaṃ viddhi dṛśyaṃ jagad iti sthitam /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;ahaṃ cetyādy anākāram bhrāntimātram asanmayam // Mo_4,1.2 //<br>
tāvat tvam evaṃ viddhi | anyat svayam eva jñāsyasīti bhāvaḥ | evaṃ 
katham ity apekṣāyām āha idam iti | jagad iti | jagad iti nāmadheyena 
sthitam | idaṃ dṛśyam puraḥsphurat | dṛśikriyāviṣayo bhāvajātam | aham 
ityādi ca bhavati | kathambhūtam | anākāram bhrāntimātram asanmayaṃ ca 
|| MoT_4,1.2 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;akartṛkam anaṅgaṃ ca gagane citram utthitam /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;adraṣṭṛkaṃ sānubhavam anidraṃ svapnadarśanam // Mo_4,1.3 //<br>
gagane cidākāśe | citram ālekhyam iva | uditam prādurbhūtam | kīdṛk 
citram | akartṛkam kartṛrahitam | anaṅgam niḥsvarūpam | punaḥ kim | 
svapnadarśanam svapnadarśanasvarūpam | svapnadarśanam kathambhūtam | 
adraṣṭṛkam draṣṭṛrahitam | sānubhavam draṣṭranubhavaviṣayatāṃ gatam | 
anidram nidrādoṣādṛṣṭam | atrālaukikatvakathanena vismayakāritve eva 
bharaḥ kṛtaḥ || MoT_4,1.3 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;bhaviṣyatpuranirmāṇaṃ citrasaṃstham ivoditam /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;markaṭānalatāpābham ambvāvartavad āsthitam // Mo_4,1.4 //<br>
bhaviṣyatpurasya ca nakiñcidrūpatvaṃ sphuṭam eva | 
markaṭasyānalatvenābhāsamānaḥ analaḥ markaṭānalaḥ | tasya yaḥ tāpaḥ | 
tasyābhā yasya | tat | markaṭo hi kam api phalaviśeṣam agnibhrameṇa 
gṛhṇāti | āsthitam sthitiyuktam || MoT_4,1.4 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;sadrūpam api niḥśūnyaṃ tejaḥ sauram ivāmbare /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;ratnābhājālam iva khe dṛśyamānam abhittimat // Mo_4,1.5 //<br>
sadrūpam cinmātrasāratvāt | niḥśūnyam nakiñcittvāt | ambare hi sauraṃ 
tejaḥ sadrūpam api niḥśūnyam iva bhātīti tasyopamānatvena grahaṇam || 
MoT_4,1.5 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;saṅkalpapuravat prauḍham anubhūtam asanmayam /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;kathārthapratibhānātma na kvacit sthitam asti ca // Mo_4,1.6 //<br>
kathāyāḥ anena kathyamānāyāḥ kathāyāḥ | yaḥ arthaḥ | tasya yat 
pratibhānam sphuraṇam | tadātma tatsvarūpam | kathāḥ śravaṇakāle hi 
śrotuḥ tadarthaḥ puraḥ iva pratibhāti | na kvacit sthitam vicārāsahatvāt
 | asti ca pratibhāsamānatvāt || MoT_4,1.6 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;niḥsāram apy atīvāntaḥsāraṃ svapnācalopamam /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;bhūtākāśam ivākārabhāsuraṃ śūnyamātrakam // Mo_4,1.7 //<br>
niḥsāram piṇḍagrahābhāvāt | atīvātiśayenāntaḥsāram cinmātrasāratvāt | ākārabhāsuram nīlarūpayuktākārabhāsvaram || MoT_4,1.7 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;śaradabhram ivāgrastham alakṣyakṣayam ākṣayi /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;varṇo vyomatalasyeva dṛśyamānam avastukam // Mo_4,1.8 //<br>
spaṣṭam || MoT_4,1.8 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;svapnāṅganāratākāram arthaniṣṭham anarthakam /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;citrodyānam ivotphullam arasaṃ sarasākṛti // Mo_4,1.9 //<br>
arthaniṣṭham retaḥsravākhyārthakriyāratam | anarthakam prabhāte 
'dṛśyamānatvāt vṛthābhātam | punaḥ kathambhūtam | arasam āsvādarahitam 
api | sarasākṛti sarasā ivākṛtiḥ yasya | tat | kim iva | utphullaṃ 
citrodyānam ālekhyodyānam | iva | tasyāpi arasatve 'pi sarasākṛtitvam 
prasiddham || MoT_4,1.9 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;prakāśam iva nistejaś citrārkānalavat sthitam /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;anubhūtam manorājyam ivāsatyam avāstavam // Mo_4,1.10 //<br>
spaṣṭam || MoT_4,1.10 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;citrapadmākara iva sārasaugandhyavarjitam /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;śūnye prakacitaṃ nānāvarṇam ākāritātmakam // Mo_4,1.11 //<br>
śūnye acetyacinmātrākhyāyāṃ śūnyabhittau | ākāritaḥ ākārayuktaḥ | ātmā yasya | tādṛśam || MoT_4,1.11 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;paramārthena śuṣyadbhir bhūtapelavapallavaiḥ /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;tataṃ jaḍam asārātma kadalīstambhabhāsuram // Mo_4,1.12 //<br>
tataṃ vyāptam || MoT_4,1.12 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;sphāritekṣaṇadṛśyāndhakāracakrakavat tatam /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;atyantam abhavadrūpam api pratyakṣavat sthitam // Mo_4,1.13 //<br>
sphāritekṣaṇasya dṛśyāni yāni andhakāracakrakāṇi | tadvat tatam | abhinayagamyaś cāyam arthaḥ || MoT_4,1.13 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;vār budbuda ivābhogi śūnyam antaḥ sphuradvapuḥ /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;rasātmakaṃ satyarasam avicchinnakṣayodayam // Mo_4,1.14 //<br>
rasātmakam icchāsvarūpaṃ jalasvarūpaṃ ca | satyarasaṃ | satyasya 
cinmātratattvasya | rasaḥ yasya | tat | cinmātratattvenaiva puṣṭiṃ gatam
 ity arthaḥ || MoT_4,1.14 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;nīhāra iva vistāri gṛhītaṃ san na kiñcana /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;jaḍaṃ śūnyāspadaṃ śūnyaṃ keṣāñcit paramāṇuvat // Mo_4,1.15 //<br>
keṣāñcit sthūlabuddhīnāṃ tārkikāṇām || MoT_4,1.15 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;kiñcid bhūtamayo 'stīti sthitaṃ śūnyam abhūtakam /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;gṛhyamāṇam asadrūpaṃ niśātama ivotthitam // Mo_4,1.16 //<br>
ayaṃ saṃsāraḥ kiñcit bhūtamayaḥ astīti sthitam bhāsamānam | etair 
viśeṣaṇaiḥ samastaḥ sthitiprakaraṇārthaḥ saṅgṛhyoktaḥ | sthitiprakaraṇe 
evaṃrūpāyā jagatsthiter vaktum iṣṭatvāt || MoT_4,1.16 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
śrīrāmaḥ pṛcchati<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;mahākalpakṣaye dṛśyam āste bīja ivāṅkuram /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;pare bhūya udety etat tata eveti kiṃ vada // Mo_4,1.17 //<br>
iti kim etad eva kim asti atha vā neti | vada kathaya || MoT_4,1.17 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;evambodhāḥ kim ajñāḥ syur uta tajjñā iti sphuṭam /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;yathāvad bhagavan brūhi sarvasaṃśayaśāntaye // Mo_4,1.18 //<br>
evam pūrvaślokoktarūpaḥ | bodhaḥ yeṣāṃ | te | tādṛśāḥ || MoT_4,1.18 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
śrīvasiṣṭha uttaram āha<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;idam bīje 'ṅkura iva dṛśyam āste mahākṣaye /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;brūte yaḥ param ajñatvam etat tasyātiśaiśavāt // Mo_4,1.19 //<br>
atiśaiśavāt atimaurkhyāt || MoT_4,1.19 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
hetukathanam avaśyopadeśyatvenāha<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;sparśe kiṃ tad asambaddhaṃ katham etad avāstavam /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;viparīto bodha eṣa vaktuḥ śrotuś ca maurkhyakṛt // Mo_4,1.20 //<br>
asambaddhaṃ tat kim bhavati | na kiñcid apīty arthaḥ | etat avāstavam 
asambaddhaṃ | katham bhavati | sparśe āmukhe ity | eṣa viparītaḥ bodhaḥ 
vaktuḥ śrotuś ca maurkhyakṛt bhavati | etat anena hetunā asambaddham 
bhavati iti vaktuḥ vaktavyam | anena hetunā etat avāstavaṃ na bhavatīti 
śrotuḥ paryanuyogaḥ kāryaḥ | anyathā tayoḥ maurkhyam eveti bhāvaḥ || 
MoT_4,1.20 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
phalitam āha<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;bījakāle 'ṅkura iva jagad āste itīha yā /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;buddhiḥ sāsatpralāpārthā mūḍhā śṛṇu kathaṃ kila // Mo_4,1.21 //<br>
ata ity adhyāhāryam | asatpralāpārthā asatpralāpasyevārthaḥ yasyāḥ | sā |
 asatpralāparūpeti yāvat | mūḍhā jaḍā | kathaṃ kena hetunā | 
hetvakathane mamāpi maurkhyāpātaḥ syād iti bhāvaḥ || MoT_4,1.21 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;bījam bhavet svayaṃ dṛśyaṃ cittādīndriyagocaraḥ /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;vaṭadhānādi dhānyādi yuktam atrāṅkurodbhavaḥ // Mo_4,1.22 //<br>
cittādīndriyagocaraḥ | ata eva dṛśyam vaṭadhānādi tathā dhānyādi bījam 
bhavet | atra dhānādirūpe tathā dhānyādirūpe bīje | aṅkurodbhavaḥ yuktam
 bhavati || MoT_4,1.22 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;manaḥṣaṣṭhendriyātītaṃ yaḥ khād atitarām api /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;bījaṃ tad bhavituṃ śaktaṃ svayambhūr jagataḥ katham // Mo_4,1.23 //<br>
manaḥ ṣaṣṭhaṃ yeṣām | tāni manaḥṣaṣṭhāni | tādṛśāni ca tānīndriyāṇi | tāny atītam | svayambhūḥ cinmātram || MoT_4,1.23 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;ākāśād api sūkṣmasya parasya paramātmanaḥ /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;sarvākṣānupalabhyasya kīdṛśī bījatā katham // Mo_4,1.24 //<br>
spaṣṭam || MoT_4,1.24 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;sat sūkṣmam asadābhāsam asad eva hy ataddṛśām /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;kīdṛśī bījatā tatra bījābhāve kuto 'ṅkuraḥ // Mo_4,1.25 //<br>
sat api yat cinmātrākhyaṃ vastu | ataddṛśām na tasmin dṛk yeṣām | te | 
tādṛśām | cinmātrajñānarahitānām iti yāvat | asad eva bhavati | atra 
hetum āha | asadābhāsam iti | asadvat ābhāsaḥ yasya | tat | tādṛśam | 
atrāpi hetutvena viśeṣaṇam āha sūkṣmam iti | sūkṣmatvād asadābhāsatvam |
 asadābhāsatvād asattvam ity arthaḥ | tatra tasmin cinmātrākhye vastuni |
 bījatā kīdṛśī bhavati | na bhavati | sthūlasyaiva bījatvayogād ity 
arthaḥ | bījābhāve aṅkuraḥ jagadākhyaḥ aṅkuraḥ | kutaḥ bhavati | naiva 
yukta ity arthaḥ || MoT_4,1.25 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;gaganāṅgād api svacche śūnye tatra pare pade /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;kathaṃ santi jaganmerusamudragaganādayaḥ // Mo_4,1.26 //<br>
gaganāṅgāt svacchatvaṃ jāḍyākhyamālinyarahitatvāt jñeyam || MoT_4,1.26 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;nakiñcid yat kathaṃ kiñcit tatrāste vastv avastuni /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;asti cet tat kathaṃ tatra vidyamānaṃ na dṛśyate // Mo_4,1.27 //<br>
yat cinmātram | bāhyāntaḥkaraṇātītatvāt nakiñcid bhavati | tatra tasmin |
 avastuni nakiñcidrūpe cinmātre | indriyagamyatvena kiñcidrūpaṃ vastu 
jagadākhyaṃ vastu | katham āste | tathāpi cet asti tatra vidyamānaṃ 
kathaṃ na dṛśyate | tarhi vidyamānatvam evāsya yuktaṃ syād iti bhāvaḥ | 
nanu jagataḥ vidyamānatvaṃ kathaṃ nāsti iti cet | vicārāsahatvān nāstīti
 brūmaḥ | yo hi vicāraṃ sahate tasyaiva vidyamānatvam | yathā 
rajjusarpāpekṣayā rajjoḥ || MoT_4,1.27 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;nakiñcidātmanaḥ kiñcit katham eti kuto 'tha vā /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;śūnyarūpād ghaṭākāśāj jāto 'driḥ kva kutaḥ kadā // Mo_4,1.28 //<br>
pūrvaślokavyākhyayaiva gatārtho 'yaṃ ślokaḥ || MoT_4,1.28 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;pratipakṣe kathaṃ kiñcid āste chāyātape yathā /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;katham āste tamo bhānau katham āste hime 'nalaḥ // Mo_4,1.29 //<br>
kiñcit kim api | pratipakṣe katham āste | pratipakṣe avasthānaṃ kasyāpi 
na yuktam iti bhāvaḥ | viśeṣeṇaitad eva darśayati cchāyetyādi || 
MoT_4,1.29 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;merur āste katham aṇau kutaḥ kiñcid anākṛtau /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;tadatadrūpayor aikyaṃ kva cchāyātapayor iva // Mo_4,1.30 //<br>
dṛṣṭāntāni viśeṣatayoktvā dārṣṭāntikam api tattayaiva kathayati kutaḥ 
kiñcid iti | kiñcit indriyagamyatvāt kiñcidrūpaṃ jagat | anākṛtau 
indriyāgamyatvenākārarahite cinmātre | kutaḥ na yuktam etad iti bhāvaḥ |
 nanv ekatve na bījāṅkuratvam anayor astīty atrāha tadatad iti | 
tadatadrūpayoḥ atyantabhinnayoḥ || MoT_4,1.30 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;sākāre vaṭadhānādāv aṅkuro 'stīti yuktimat /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;anākāre mahākāraṃ jagad astīty ayuktimat // Mo_4,1.31 //<br>
spaṣṭam || MoT_4,1.31 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;deśāntare yac ca narāntare ca<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;buddhyādisarvendriyaśaktyadṛśyam /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;nāsty eva tattadvidhabuddhibodhe<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;nakiñcid ity eva tad ucyate ca // Mo_4,1.32 //<br>
deśāntare ca asmin deśe anyasmin deśe ca | narāntare ca tvayi anyeṣu 
nareṣu ca | kālasyāpy etad upalakṣaṇam | tena kālāntare cety api jñeyaṃ |
 tenāyam arthaḥ | buddhyādīnāṃ sarvendriyaśaktīnāṃ cādṛśyaṃ yat vastu | 
deśāntare narāntare ca tattadvidhabuddhibodhe | tattadvidhāḥ 
tattatprakārāḥ | yāḥ buddhayaḥ | tāsāṃ yaḥ bodhaḥ | tatra | nāsti | 
tadviṣayo nāstīti yāvat | paṇḍitaiḥ tat nakiñcid ity eva ucyate kathyate
 || MoT_4,1.32 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
tataḥ kim ity atrāha<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;kāryasya tat kāraṇatām prayātam<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;vaktīti yas tasya vimūḍhabodhaḥ /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;kair nāma tatkāryam udeti tasmāt<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;svaiḥ kāraṇaughaiḥ sahakārirūpaiḥ // Mo_4,1.33 //<br>
tat nakiñcid iti nāmārhaṃ vastu | kāryasya kāraṇatām prayātam bhavati | 
iti yaḥ vakti | tasya vimūḍhabodhaḥ bhavati | nāsau tajjña iti bhāvaḥ | 
sahakārikāraṇābhāvena tasya kāraṇatāṃ nivārayati tatkāryam iti | svaiḥ 
nijaiḥ | sarvasya nakiñcidrūpacinmātrasvarūpatvena sahakārikāraṇasattā 
nāstīti bhāvaḥ || MoT_4,1.33 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
etena siddhaṃ siddhāntaṃ sargāntaślokena kathayati<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;durbuddhibhiḥ kāraṇakāryabhāvaṃ<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;saṅkalpitaṃ dūratare vyudasya /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;yad eva tat satyam anādimadhyaṃ<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;jagat tad eva sthitam ity avehi // Mo_4,1.34 //<br>
durbuddhibhiḥ kubuddhiyuktaiḥ | saṅkalpitaṃ svasaṅkalpenollikhitam | na 
tu paramārthasantaṃ kāryakāraṇabhāvaṃ jagadbrahmaviṣayaṃ 
kāryakāraṇabhāvam | vyudasya parityajya | tvam iti avehi satyatayā 
niścinu iti | kim iti | anādimadhyam ādimadhyayor api sākṣitvena 
sthitatvāt ādimadhyarahitam | yat eva | tat prasiddham | satyam 
satyabhūtam cinmātrākhyaṃ vastu asti | tad eva na tu tatkāryam | jagat 
asti | iti śivam || MoT_4,1.34 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
iti śrībhāskarakaṇṭhaviracitāyāṃ śrīmokṣopāyaṭīkāyāṃ janyajanakanirākaraṇaṃ sthitiprakaraṇe prathamaḥ sargaḥ ||1||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
*********************************************************************<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
vasiṣṭha uvāca<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;athaitadabhyupagame vacmi vedyavidāṃ vara /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;samastakalanātīte mahācidvyomni nirmale // Mo_4,2.1 //<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;jagadādyaṅkuras tatra yady asti tad asau tadā /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;kair ivodeti kathaya kāraṇaiḥ sahakāribhiḥ // Mo_4,2.2 //<br>
he vedyavidāṃ vara | athāham etat bījatvam | aṅgīkṛtya | vacmi kathayāmi
 | kiṃ vakṣīty apekṣāyām āha samasteti | samastakalanātīte 
sarvakāryakāraṇabhāvādikalanātīte | nirmale cetyākhyamalādūṣite | 
sahakāribhiḥ kāraṇaiḥ sahakārikāraṇaiḥ | yugmam || MoT_4,1-2 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;sahakārikāraṇānām abhāve vāṅkurodgatiḥ /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;vandhyākanyā ca dṛṣṭeha na kadācana kenacit // Mo_4,2.3 //<br>
vāśabdaḥ pādapūraṇārthaḥ | caśabdaḥ samuccaye || MoT_4,1.3 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;sahakārikāraṇānām abhāve yac ca voditam /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;mūlakāraṇam evātmā tat svabhāve sthitaṃ tathā // Mo_4,2.4 //<br>
yat ca jagadākhyaṃ kāryam | sahakārikāraṇānām abhāve uditam kāraṇāt 
anyatayā prādurbhūtam bhavati | tat tathā tena prakāreṇa | svabhāve 
svasvarūpe | sthitam | mūlakāraṇam ātmā mūlakāraṇabhūta ātmaiva bhavati |
 na kāryam | sahakārikāraṇasambhava eva kāryatvadarśanāt || MoT_4,1.4 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;sargādau sargarūpeṇa brahmaivātmani tiṣṭhati /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;yathāsthitam anākāraṃ kva janyajanakakramaḥ // Mo_4,2.5 //<br>
sargādau cetyonmukhatāsamaye || MoT_4,1.5 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;atha pṛthvyādayo 'nye vā kuto 'py āgatya kurvate /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;sahakārikāraṇatvaṃ tat pūrvaivātra dūṣaṇā // Mo_4,2.6 //<br>
pūrvā dūṣaṇeti | sargāgame yā dūṣaṇā asti sā eva sahakāryabhimatapṛthvyādyāgame 'py astīty arthaḥ || MoT_4,1.6 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
phalitam āha<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;tasmāt pare jagac chāntam āste tat sahakāraṇaiḥ /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;vinā prasaratīty uktir bālasya na vipaścitaḥ // Mo_4,2.7 //<br>
tasmāt tato hetoḥ | jagat pare śāntam bījatvena sthitam asti | 
sahakāraṇaiḥ sahakārikāraṇaiḥ vinā | tat prasarati ity uktiḥ bālasya 
mūrkhasya | bhavati | vipaścitaḥ paṇḍitasya | na bhavati || MoT_4,1.7 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
paramaphalitaṃ kathayati<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;tasmād rāma jagan nāsīn na cāsti na bhaviṣyati /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;cetanākāśam evācchaṃ kacatīttham ivātmani // Mo_4,2.8 //<br>
he rāma | tasmāt jagat nāsīt na cāsti na ca bhaviṣyati 
sahakārikāraṇābhāvāt | punaḥ kim etat sphuratīty | atrāha cetaneti | 
accham cetyarahitaṃ | cetanākāśam cinmātrākāśam | ātmani ittham 
jagadrūpeṇa | sphurati iva kacati iva || MoT_4,1.8 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;atyantābhāva evāsya jagato vidyate yadā /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;tadā brahmedam akhilam iti sad rāma nānyathā // Mo_4,2.9 //<br>
anyathā asat || MoT_4,1.9 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
nanu prāgabhāvādir eva kathaṃ nātrāsti | kim atyantābhāvenety | atrāha<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;pūrvapradhvaṃsanānyo'nyābhāvair yad upaśāmyati /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;aśāntam eva tac citte na śāmyaty eva tad yataḥ // Mo_4,2.10 //<br>
pūrvapradhvaṃsanānyo'nyābhāvaiḥ prāgabhāvena pradhvaṃsābhāvena 
anyo'nyābhāvena ca | yat śāmyati tat aśāntam eva bhavati | yataḥ tat 
vastu | citte manasi | na śāmyati saṃskāratvena sthitatvāt | tasmād 
atyantābhāva evātra yukta iti bhāvaḥ || MoT_4,1.10 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;atyantābhāvam evāto jagaddṛśyasya sarvadā /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;varjayitvetarā yuktir nāsty evānarthasaṅkṣaye // Mo_4,2.11 //<br>
jagaddṛśyasyātyantābhāva eva jagadrūpasyānarthasya kṣaye yuktiḥ nānyat kiñcid iti piṇḍārthaḥ || MoT_4,1.11 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;cidākāśasya bodho 'yaṃ jagadādīti yat sthitam /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;ayaṃ so 'ham idaṃ rūpālokacittakalādy api // Mo_4,2.12 //<br>
idaṃ jagadādīti yat sthitam asti | ayam cidākāśasya bodha eva bhavati | 
nānyat | ādiśabdena pralayasya grahaṇam | jagadādīti viśeṣeṇa kathayati 
ayaṃ so 'ham ityādi | cittakalā manaskāraḥ || MoT_4,1.12 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;idam arkādi pṛthvyādi tathedaṃ vatsarādi ca /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;ayaṃ kalpaḥ kṣaṇaś cāyam ime maraṇajanmane // Mo_4,2.13 //<br>
spaṣṭam || MoT_4,1.13 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;ayaṃ kalpāntasaṃrambho mahākalpānta eṣa saḥ /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;ayaṃ sa sargaprārambho bhāvābhāvakramas tv asau // Mo_4,2.14 //<br>
spaṣṭam || MoT_4,1.14 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;lakṣāṇīmāni kalpānām imā brahmāṇḍakoṭayaḥ /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;ime brahmendranicayā imā viṣṇvādiśaktayaḥ // Mo_4,2.15 //<br>
viṣṇvādirūpāḥ śaktayaḥ viṣṇvādiśaktayaḥ || MoT_4,1.15 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;ete ceme pariṇatā ime bhūya upāgatāḥ /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;imāni dhiṣṇyajālāni deśakālakalā imāḥ // Mo_4,2.16 //<br>
ete ime pariṇatāḥ mṛtāḥ || MoT_4,1.16 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
upasaṃhāraṃ karoti<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;mahācitparamākāśam anāvṛttam anantakam /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;yathā pūrvaṃ sthitaṃ śāntam ity evaṃ kacati svayam // Mo_4,2.17 //<br>
anāvṛttam āvṛttirahitam | anantakam antarahitam | śāntam svasmin svarūpe
 eva sarvadā nilīnam | mahācitparamākāśam | iti anena prakāreṇa | evam 
jagadrūpeṇa | kacati sphurati || MoT_4,1.17 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;paramāṇusahasrāṃśabhāsa etā mahāciteḥ /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;svabhāvabhūtā evāntaḥsthitā nāyānti yānti no // Mo_4,2.18 //<br>
mahāciteḥ antaḥsthitāḥ | ata eva svabhāvabhūtāḥ | paramāṇoḥ yaḥ 
sahasrāṃśaḥ | tatparimāṇāḥ bhāsaḥ dīptayaḥ | etāḥ sargaparamparāḥ | na 
āyānti no yānti sadā sthitatvāt || MoT_4,1.18 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;svayam antaś camatkāro yas samudgīryate citā /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;tat sargabhānam bhātīdam bhārūpaṃ na ca bhittimat // Mo_4,2.19 //<br>
citā cinmātreṇa | antaḥsthitaḥ yaḥ camatkāraḥ svarūpaparāmarśarūpaḥ 
āsvādaḥ | bahiḥ samudgīryate samyak udgīryate | tat idaṃ samudgiraṇaṃ | 
sargabhānam bhāti | idaṃ kathambhūtam | bhārūpam jñānasvarūpam | na 
bhittimat bhittirahitam || MoT_4,1.19 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;nodyanti na ca naśyanti nāyānti na ca yānti ca /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;mahāśilāntarlekhānāṃ sanniveśa ivācalāḥ // Mo_4,2.20 //<br>
sargā iti śeṣaḥ || MoT_4,1.20 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;ime sargāḥ prasphuranti svataḥ svātmani nirmale /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;nabhasīva nabhobhāgā nirākārā nirākṛtau // Mo_4,2.21 //<br>
svataḥ svabhāvena || MoT_4,1.21 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;dravatvānīva toyasya spandā iva sadāgateḥ /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;āvartā iva vāmbhodher guṇino vāthavā guṇāḥ // Mo_4,2.22 //<br>
pūrvaślokadṛṣṭāntatvenaiva yojyam || MoT_4,1.22 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; vijñānaghana evaikam idam ittham iva sthitam /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;sodayāstamayārambham anantaṃ śāntam ātatam // Mo_4,2.23 //<br>
vijñānaghane jñānaikasvarūpe cinmātratattve | idam jagat || MoT_4,1.23 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;sahakāryādihetūnām abhāve śūnyatā jagat /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;svayambhūr jāyate ceti kilonmattakaphūtkṛtam // Mo_4,2.24 //<br>
unmattakaphūtkṛtam unmattapralāpaḥ || MoT_4,1.24 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
sargāntaślokena phalitaṃ kathayati<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;praśāntasarvārthakalākalaṅko<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;nirastaniḥśeṣavikalpatalpaḥ /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;cirāya vidrāvitadīrghanidro<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;bhavābhayo bhūṣitabhūḥ prabuddhaḥ // Mo_4,2.25 //<br>
tasmād ity adhyāhāryam | tasmāt tvam bhava | kīdṛśa ity apekṣāyāṃ 
viśeṣaṇāny āha praśānta ityādi | praśāntaḥ brahmaikatāvijñānena 
prakarṣeṇa śāntaḥ | sarvārtharūpaḥ kalaṅkaḥ yasya | saḥ | nirastā 
niḥśeṣavikalpā eva talpam yena | saḥ | vidrāvitā dīrghanidrā avidyārūpā 
dīrghanidrā yena | saḥ | ata eva prabuddhaḥ samyagjñānayuktaḥ | ataḥ 
abhayaḥ bhayarahitaḥ | iti śivam || MoT_4,1.25 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
iti śrībhāskarakaṇṭhaviracitāyāṃ śrīmokṣopāyaṭīkāyāṃ sthitiprakaraṇe dvitīyaḥ sargaḥ ||2||<br>
<br>

*********************************************************************<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
śrīrāmaḥ pṛcchati<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;mahāpralayasargādau prathamo 'sau prajāpatiḥ /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;smṛtyātmā jāyate sarge smṛtyātmaiva tato jagat // Mo_4,3.1 //<br>
 prathamaḥ prajāpatiḥ śuddhamanorūpaḥ brahmā | smṛtyātma smṛtirūpam || MoT_4,3.1 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
śrīvasiṣṭhaḥ uttaraṃ kathayati<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;mahāpralayasargādāv evam etad raghūdvaha /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;smṛtyātmaiva bhavaty ādau prathamo 'sau prajāpatiḥ // Mo_4,3.2 //<br>
evam etat etat satyam evety arthaḥ || MoT_4,3.2 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;tatsaṅkalpātma ca jagat smṛtyātmaivam idaṃ tataḥ /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;iti saṅkalpanagaraṃ sthitam pūrvaprajāpateḥ // Mo_4,3.3 //<br>
tatsaṅkalpātma smṛtisvarūpaprajāpatisvarūpam || MoT_4,3.3 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;iti sthite 'pi sā rāma tasya pūrvaprajāpateḥ /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;sthitir na sambhavaty eva nabhasīva mahādrumaḥ // Mo_4,3.4 //<br>
sā smṛtirūpā || MoT_4,3.4 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
śrīrāmaḥ pṛcchati<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;na sambhavati kim brahman sargādau prāktanī smṛtiḥ /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;mahāpralayasammohair naśyati prāksmṛtiḥ katham // Mo_4,3.5 //<br>
mahāpralayasammohaiḥ mahāpralayakṛtābhiḥ mūrcchābhiḥ || MoT_4,3.5 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
śrīvasiṣṭha uttaraṃ kathayati<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;prāṅmahāpralaye prājña pūrve brahmādayaḥ purā /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;kila nirvāṇam āyātās te 'vaśyam brahmatāṃ gatāḥ // Mo_4,3.6 //<br>
nirvāṇam muktim || MoT_4,3.6 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;prāktanyāḥ kaḥ smṛtes smartā tasmāt kathaya suvrata /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;smṛtir nirmūlatāṃ yātā smartur muktatayā yataḥ // Mo_4,3.7 //<br>
spaṣṭam || MoT_4,3.7 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;ataḥ smartur abhāve sā smṛtiḥ kodetu kiṃ katham /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;avaśyaṃ hi mahākalpe sarve mokṣaikabhāginaḥ // Mo_4,3.8 //<br>
spaṣṭam || MoT_4,3.8 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;nānubhūte 'nubhūte ca svataś cidvyomni yā smṛtiḥ /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;sā jagacchrīr iti prauḍhā dṛśyābhāve hi citprabhā // Mo_4,3.9 //<br>
svataḥ na tu prajāpatirūpagrahāt | nānubhūte pūrvānanubhūte viṣaye | 
anubhūte pūrvam anubhūte viṣaye | cidvyomni yā smṛtiḥ bhavati | sā 
jagacchrīr iti prauḍhā bhavati | na prajāpatismṛtir iti bhāvaḥ | kuta 
etad ity | atrāha dṛśyeti | hi yasmāt | dṛśyābhāve smṛtirūpadṛśyābhāve |
 citprabhā eva bhavati | na prajāpatiprabhā || MoT_4,3.9 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
athavālam anayā smṛtikalpanayā | yataḥ citprabhaiva jagad astīty abhiprāyenāha<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;bhāti saṃvitprabhaivāccham anādyantāvabhāsinī /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;yat tad etaj jagad iti svayambhūr iti ca sthitam // Mo_4,3.10 //<br>
anādyantāvabhāsinī sadā bhātatvenādyantāvabhāsarahitā | saṃvitprabhā eva
 acchaṃ yat bhāti tat etat jagad iti sthitam bhavati | svayambhūr iti ca
 sthitam bhavati | ataḥ smṛteḥ svayambhuvaś ca na kāpi sattāstīti bhāvaḥ
 || MoT_4,3.10 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;anādikālasaṃsiddhaṃ yad bhānam brahmaṇo nijam /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;sa ātivāhiko deho virājo jagadākṛtiḥ // Mo_4,3.11 //<br>
anādikālasaṃsiddham satatasiddham | brahmaṇaḥ cinmātratattvasya | yat 
nijaṃ svasambandhi | bhānam bhavati | saḥ virājaḥ virāḍrūpasya 
prajāpateḥ | ātivāhikaḥ dehaḥ bhavati | kathambhūtaḥ | jagadākṛtiḥ 
samastajagatsvarūpaḥ || MoT_4,3.11 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;paramāṇāv idam bhāti jagat sabhuvanatrayam /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;deśakālakriyādravyadinarātrikramānvitam // Mo_4,3.12 //<br>
dravyam kriyāviṣayaḥ padārthaḥ | paramāṇvantas tribhuvanābhānam indrasya nirvāṇaprakaraṇe vakṣyati || MoT_4,3.12 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;paramāṇum prati tatas tasyāntas tādṛg eva ca /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;bhāti bhāsvaritākāraṃ tādṛggirikulāvṛtam // Mo_4,3.13 //<br>
tataḥ tato hetoḥ | tasya paramāṇvantarvartinaḥ tribhuvanasya | prati 
paramāṇum antaḥ pratiparamāṇumadhye | tādṛk eva na tv anyarūpam | 
bhāsvaritākāraṃ tādṛggirikulāvṛtam tādṛśaparvatasamūhākulam | arthāt 
tribhuvanam bhāti || MoT_4,3.13 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;tatrāpi tādṛgākāram evam praty aṇum ātatam /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;dṛśyam ābhāti bhārūpam etad aṅga na vāstavam // Mo_4,3.14 //<br>
tatrāpi pratyaṇuvartini tribhuvane 'pi | bhārūpam jñānasvarūpam | 
phalitam āha etad iti | he aṅga | ataḥ etat tribhuvanam | vāstavam 
paramārthasat | na bhavati | svapnavad bhārūpatvāt || MoT_4,3.14 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;ity asty anto na saddṛṣṭer asaddṛṣṭeś ca vā kvacit /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;asyās tv abhyuditam buddham abuddham prati vānagha // Mo_4,3.15 //<br>
iti anena prakāreṇa | saddṛṣṭeḥ cinmātradṛṣṭeḥ | asaddṛṣṭeḥ cetyadṛṣṭeḥ 
vā | anto 'vasānam | nāsti | asyāḥ saddṛṣṭer asaddṛṣṭeś ca | abhyuditam 
abhyudayaḥ | prādurbhāva iti yāvat | buddham prati abuddham prati vā 
bhavati | buddham prati saddṛṣṭeḥ abhyudayaḥ asaddṛṣṭeḥ abuddham pratīti
 kramo jñeyaḥ || MoT_4,3.15 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
nanu ekā eva bhāsamānā jagadākhyā dṛṣṭir asti | tat katham uktam buddham
 prati saddṛṣṭer anto nāsti asaddṛṣṭer abuddham pratīty | āha<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;buddham pratīdam brahmaiva kevalaṃ śāntam avyayam /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;abuddham prati tu dvaitam bhāsuram bhuvanānvitam // Mo_4,3.16 //<br>
idam eva jagat | buddhasya saddṛṣṭyā bhāti | abuddhasyāsaddṛṣṭyā | yathā
 ekaḥ rajjuḥ buddham prati rajjutayā bhāti | abuddham prati sarpatayeti 
bhāvaḥ || MoT_4,3.16 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;yathedam bhāsuram bhāti jagad aṇḍakajṛmbhitam /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;tathā koṭisahasrāṇi bhānty anyāny apy aṇāv aṇau // Mo_4,3.17 //<br>
spaṣṭam || MoT_4,3.17 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;yathā stambhe putrikāntas tasyāś cāṅgeṣu putrikā /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;tasyāś ca putrikāsty aṅge tathā trailokyaputrikā // Mo_4,3.18 //<br>
trailokyākhyā putrikā trailokyaputrikā || MoT_4,3.18 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;na bhinnā na ca saṅkhyeyā yathādrau paramāṇavaḥ /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;tathā brahmabṛhanmerau trailokyaparamāṇavaḥ // Mo_4,3.19 //<br>
spaṣṭam || MoT_4,3.19 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;sūryaughāṃśuṣv asaṅkhyātuṃ śakyante laghavo 'ṇavaḥ /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;nānādyantāś cidāditye trailokyaparamāṇavaḥ // Mo_4,3.20 //<br>
spaṣṭam || MoT_4,3.20 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;yathāṇavo vahanty arkadīptiṣv apsu rajaḥsu ca /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;tathā vahante cidvyomni trailokyaparamāṇavaḥ // Mo_4,3.21 //<br>
spaṣṭam || MoT_4,3.21 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;śūnyānubhavamātrātma bhūtākāśam idaṃ yathā /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;sargānubhavamātrātma cidākāśam idaṃ tathā // Mo_4,3.22 //<br>
śūnyasya yaḥ anubhavaḥ | tanmātram ātmā svarūpaṃ yasya | tat || MoT_4,3.22 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;sargas tu sargaśabdārthatayā buddho nayaty adhaḥ /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;sa brahmaśabdārthatayā buddhaḥ śreyo bhavaty alam // Mo_4,3.23 //<br>
śreyaḥ mokṣarūpam || MoT_4,3.23 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
sargāntaślokenāpy etad eva kathayati<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;vijñānātmā śāsitā viśvabījam<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;brahmaivādyaṃ svaṃ cidākāśamātraṃ /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;tasmāj jātaṃ yat tad eveti vedyaṃ<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;viddhi svāntar bodhasambodhamātram // Mo_4,3.24 //<br>
vijñānātmā jñānaikasvarūpaḥ | śāsitā prerakaḥ | svam sarveṣām ātmatvena 
sthitam | cidākāśamātram ādyam brahmaiva viśvabījaṃ viśvasya bījam iva 
bījam | na tu sākṣād bījam | tasya samanantaram eva nirākṛtatvāt | 
bhavati | tasmāt tādṛśāt brahmaṇaḥ | yat jātam bhavati | tat tad eva 
bhavati | iti ato hetoḥ | tvam vedyam vidikriyāviṣayam bhāvajātam | 
svāntaḥ svamanasi | bodhasya yaḥ sambodhaḥ svaparāmarśaḥ | tanmātraṃ 
viddhi jānīhi | liṅgasaṅkaro 'liṅgatvadyotanārthaḥ | iti śivam || 
MoT_4,3.24 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
iti śrībhāskarakaṇṭhaviracitāyāṃ śrīmokṣopāyaṭīkāyāṃ sthitiprakaraṇe tṛtīyaḥ sargaḥ ||3||<br>

<br>
*********************************************************************<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
 indriyagrāmasaṅgrāmasetunā bhavasāgaraḥ |<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;tīryate netareṇeha kenacin nāma karmaṇā // Mo_4,4.1 //<br>
 indriyagrāmeṇendriyasamūhena | yaḥ saṅgrāmaḥ | sa eva setuḥ | tena || MoT_4,4.1 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;śāstrasatsaṅgamābhyāsaiḥ saviveko jitendriyaḥ /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;atyantābhāvam evāsya dṛśyaughasyāvagacchati // Mo_4,4.2 //<br>
avagacchati jānāti || MoT_4,4.2 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;etat te kathitaṃ sarvaṃ svarūpaṃ rūpiṇāṃ vara /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;saṃsārasāgaraśreṇyo yathāyānti prayānti ca // Mo_4,4.3 //<br>
he rūpiṇāṃ vara | mayā te | arthāt saṃsārasāgaraśreṇīnāṃ sarvam svarūpam
 | kathitam | tathā saṃsārasāgaraśreṇyāḥ yathāyānti prayānti ca | tad 
api kathitam || MoT_4,4.3 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;bahunātra kim uktena manaḥ karmadrumāṅkuram /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;tasmiṃś chinne jagacchākhaś chinnaḥ karmatarur bhavet // Mo_4,4.4 //<br>
karmataruḥ kathambhūtaḥ | jaganty eva śākhāḥ yasya | saḥ | tādṛśaḥ || MoT_4,4.4 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;manaḥ sarvam idaṃ rāma tasminn antaś cikitsite /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;cikitsito 'yaṃ sakalo janmajālamayo bhavaḥ // Mo_4,4.5 //<br>
spaṣṭam || MoT_4,4.5 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;tad etaj jāyate loke mano malalavākulam /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;manaso vyatirekeṇa dehaḥ kva kila dṛśyate // Mo_4,4.6 //<br>
jāyate jagattayā utpadyate | malalavākulam saṅkalpākhyamalaleśākulam || MoT_4,4.6 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;dṛśyātyantāsambhavanam ṛte nānyena hetunā /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;manaḥpiśācaḥ praśamaṃ yāti kalpaśatair api // Mo_4,4.7 //<br>
dṛśyātyantāsambhavanaṃ dṛśyātyantābhāvam || MoT_4,4.7 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;etac ca sambhavaty eva manovyādhicikitsane /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;dṛśyātyantāsambhavātma paramauṣadham uttamam // Mo_4,4.8 //<br>
manovyādhicikitsane kārye | sambhavaty eva prabhavaty eva || MoT_4,4.8 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;mano moham upādatte mriyate jāyate punaḥ /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;kasyacit tu prasādena badhyate mucyate punaḥ // Mo_4,4.9 //<br>
kasyacid anākhyasya cinmātrasya || MoT_4,4.9 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;sphuratītthaṃ jagat sarvaṃ citte mananamanthare /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;śūnya evāmbare sphāre gandharvāṇām puraṃ yathā // Mo_4,4.10 //<br>
mananamanthare mananabharite || MoT_4,4.10 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;manasīdaṃ jagat kṛtsnaṃ sphāraṃ sphurati cāsti ca /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;puṣpaguccha ivāmodas tatsthas tasmād ivetaraḥ // Mo_4,4.11 //<br>
sphāram vistīrṇam || MoT_4,4.11 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;yathā tilakaṇe tailaṃ guṇo guṇini vā yathā /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;yathā dharmiṇi vā dharmas tathedam manasi sthitam // Mo_4,4.12 //<br>
spaṣṭam || MoT_4,4.12 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;yathāmbhasi taraṅgaugha indau dvīndubhramo yathā /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;mṛgatṛṣṇā yathā tāpe saṃsāraś cittake tathā // Mo_4,4.13 //<br>
spaṣṭam || MoT_4,4.13 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;raśmijālaṃ yathā sūrye yathālokaś ca tejasi /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;yathauṣṇyaṃ citrabhānau ca manasīdaṃ tathā jagat // Mo_4,4.14 //<br>
spaṣṭam || MoT_4,4.14 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;śaityaṃ yathaiva tuhine yathā nabhasi śūnyatā /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;yathā cañcalatā vāyau manasīdaṃ tathā jagat // Mo_4,4.15 //<br>
spaṣṭam || MoT_4,4.15 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
sargāntaślokenāpy etad eva kathayati<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;mano jagaj jagad akhilaṃ tathā manaḥ<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;parasparaṃ tv avirahitaṃ sadaiva hi /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;tayor dvayor manasi nirantaraṃ kṣate<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;kṣataṃ jagan na tu jagati kṣate manaḥ // Mo_4,4.16 //<br>
nirantaram atiśayena | tayoḥ dvayor iti nirdhāraṇe ṣaṣṭhī | tasmān mana 
eva samyagjñānādyupāyena nāśanīyam iti bhāvaḥ | iti śivam || MoT_4,4.16 
||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
iti śrībhāskarakaṇṭhaviracitāyāṃ śrīmokṣopāyaṭīkāyāṃ sthitiprakaraṇe caturthaḥ sargaḥ ||4||<br>

*********************************************************************<br>
