nanu kathaṃ tāni na dṛśyante ity apekṣāyāṃ viśeṣaṇam āha mitho 
'dṛṣṭānīti | mithaḥ anyo'nyam | adṛṣṭāni darśanaviṣayatāṃ na nītāni || 
MoT_4,17.9 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
mitho'darśanadṛṣṭāntaṃ kathayati<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;svapnasaṅkalpanagaravyavahārāḥ parasparam /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;pṛthag yathā na dṛśyante tathaite saṃsṛtibhramāḥ // Mo_4,17.10 //<br>
yathā anyasya svapnādi anyo nānubhavati tathānyasya saṃsāram anyo 
nānubhavatīti piṇḍārthaḥ | nanu kathaṃ sargānām pratipuruṣam bhedaḥ iti 
cet | na | ekasminn eva vastuni puruṣabhedena heyatvopādeyatvadarśanāt 
|| MoT_4,17.10 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
upasaṃhāraṃ karoti<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;evaṃ nagaravṛndāni nabhaḥsaṅkalparūpiṇām /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;santi tāni na dṛśyante mitho jñānadṛśaṃ vinā // Mo_4,17.11 //<br>
evaṃ sati | nabhasi yaḥ saṅkalpaḥ purādisaṅkalpaḥ | tadvat rūpaṃ yeṣām |
 tādṛśānāṃ nagarāṇāṃ vṛndāni samūhāḥ | santi | samāse upasarjanībhūtasya
 nagarapadasya viśeṣaṇadānam ārṣam | taiḥ nagaravṛndaiḥ tāni 
nagaravṛndāni | jñānadṛśaṃ vinā cinmātrajñānākhyāṃ dṛṣṭiṃ vinā | mithaḥ 
anyo'nyam | na dṛśyante nānubhūyante | jñānadṛśā tu dṛśyante eva | ata 
evāhaṃ tān paśyāmi tvaṃ na paśyasīti bhāvaḥ || MoT_4,17.11 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
sarvaprasiddhānām piśācādīnām apy etadrūpatvaṃ kathayati<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;piśācayakṣarakṣāṃsi santy evaṃrūpakāṇi hi /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;saṅkalpamātradehāni sukhaduḥkhamayāni ca // Mo_4,17.12 //<br>
spaṣṭam || MoT_4,17.12 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
svasminn apy etadrūpatvam evātidiśati<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;evam eva vayaṃ ceme sampannā raghunandana /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;svasaṅkalpātmakākārā mithyāsatyatvabhāvitāḥ // Mo_4,17.13 //<br>
mithyāsatyatve svasatyatāyām | bhāvitāḥ bhāvanāyuktāḥ || MoT_4,17.13 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
evaṃ stokaṃ viśeṣeṇoktvā punar api sāmānyena kathayati<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;evaṃrūpaiva hi pare vartate sargasaṃsṛtiḥ /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;na vāstavī vastutas tu saṃsthiteyam avastuni // Mo_4,17.14 //<br>
evaṃrūpā pratibhāsarūpā | pare uttīrṇe cinmātre | sargeti nāmadheyā 
saṃsṛtiḥ sargasaṃsṛtiḥ | na vāstavī asatyarūpā | tu pakṣāntare | 
vastutaḥ paramārthataḥ | iyaṃ sargasaṃsṛtiḥ | avastuni śūnye | sthitā 
bhavati | vastutvena sthite cinmātre avastubhūtasargādhāratvāyogāt || 
MoT_4,17.14 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
pūrvoktanyāyena siddhasya svābhīṣṭasyopasaṃhāraṃ karoti<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;pratyekam uditaṃ viśvam evam eva mudhaiva hi /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;navagulmakarūpeṇa vāsantikaraso yathā // Mo_4,17.15 //<br>
evam pūrvoktaprakāreṇa | vāsantikarasaḥ vasantasambandhī rasaḥ || MoT_4,17.15 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;prathamo 'yaṃ svasaṅkalpaḥ suprathām āgatas tathā /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;yathātipāramārthyena dṛḍhenetthaṃ vibhāvyate // Mo_4,17.16 //<br>
ayam prathamaḥ brahmaṇaḥ tatpūrvatvenotthitaḥ | svasaṅkalpa eva | tathā 
tena prakāreṇa | suprathām atirūḍhim | gataḥ | yathā ittham anena 
prakāreṇa | dṛḍhenāvicalatā | atipāramārthyenātiparamārthabhāvena | 
vibhāvyate niścīyate | janair iti śeṣaḥ || MoT_4,17.16 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;pratyekam uditaṃ cittaṃ svasvabhāvodarasthitam /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;idam itthaṃsamārambhaṃ jagat paśyad vinaśyati // Mo_4,17.17 //<br>
svaḥ ātmīyaḥ | svabhāvaḥ cinmātrākhyaṃ svarūpam | tasyodare udara 
ivodare | na tu sākṣād udare | sthitam vartamānam | pratyekam ekasmin 
ekasmin pratyekam | uditam utpannam | cittam | itthaṃsamārambham 
dṛśyamānārambhayuktam | idaṃ jagat paśyat anubhavat | vinaśyati 
svarūpaparāmarśāt bhraśyatīty arthaḥ || MoT_4,17.17 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;pratibhāsavaśād asti nāsti vastvavalokanāt /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;dīrghaḥ svapno jagajjālam ālānaṃ cittadantinaḥ // Mo_4,17.18 //<br>
pratibhāsavaśāt | na hi asataḥ pratibhāsaḥ yukta iti bhāvaḥ | 
vastvavalokanāt paramārthāvalokanāt | na hi samyagjñānena jagat tiṣṭhati
 | jagajjālam kaḥ | dīrghaḥ svapnaḥ || MoT_4,17.18 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;cittasattaiva hi jagaj jagatsattaiva cittakam /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;ekābhāve dvayor nāśas tac ca satyavicāraṇāt // Mo_4,17.19 //<br>
tat ekābhāvaḥ | satyavicāraṇāt satyavicārāt || MoT_4,17.19 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
śrīrāmakṛtasya praśnasyottaram anusmarati<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;śuddhasya pratibhāso hi satyo bhavati cetasaḥ /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;niṣkalaṅke hi lagati paṭe kuṅkumarañjanā // Mo_4,17.20 //<br>
atra dṛṣṭāntam āha niṣkalaṅka iti | niṣkalaṅke malarahite || MoT_4,17.20 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;anyenānāhṛtasyānyo guṇo 'vaśyaṃ vivardhate /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;anākrāntasya saṅkalpaiḥ pratibhodeti cetasaḥ // Mo_4,17.21 //<br>
anāhṛtasya anākrāntasya | dṛṣṭāntam uktvā dārṣṭāntikaṃ kathayati 
anākrāntasyeti | pratibhā pratibhāsaḥ | udeti saphalatvena prādurbhavati
 || MoT_4,17.21 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;suvarṇo na sthitiṃ yāti malavaty aṃśuke yathā /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;ekā dṛṣṭiḥ sthitiṃ yāti na mlāne cittake tathā // Mo_4,17.22 //<br>
suvarṇaḥ śobhanaḥ śuklādivarṇaḥ | mlāne saṅkalparūṣite || MoT_4,17.22 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;pramārjanād iva maṇes tāmrasyeva ca yuktitaḥ /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;ciram ekadṛḍhābhyāsāc chuddhir bhavati cetasaḥ // Mo_4,17.23 //<br>
ekasmin samyagjñānādau | yaḥ dṛḍhābhyāsaḥ nairantaryeṇa taccintanam | tasmāt || MoT_4,17.23 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
śrīrāmaḥ pṛcchati<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;pratibhāsātmani jagaty ete kālakriyākramāḥ /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;sodayāstamayā jātāḥ kathaṃ śukrasya cetasaḥ // Mo_4,17.24 //<br>
pratibhāsātmani jagati sphuritānāṃ kālakriyākramāṇāṃ sodayāstamayatvam 
na yuktam | tac ca śukracetasaḥ kathaṃ jātam iti bhāvaḥ || MoT_4,17.24 
||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
śrīvasiṣṭhaḥ uttaram āha<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;yādṛg jagad idaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ śukreṇa pitṛmātṛtaḥ /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;tādṛk tasya sthitaṃ citte mayūrāṇḍe mayūravat // Mo_4,17.25 //<br>
pitṛmātṛtaḥ utpannena śukreṇa yādṛk idaṃ jagat dṛṣṭam | tat tasya 
śukrasya | citte tādṛk sthitam āsīt | katham | mayūravat | yathā 
mayūrāṇḍe mayūraḥ asti | tathety arthaḥ || MoT_4,17.25 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;svabhāvakośāt svaditaṃ tad anena kramoditam /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;bījenāṅkurapattrādilatāpuṣpaphalaṃ yathā // Mo_4,17.26 //<br>
tataḥ anena śukreṇa | tat cittasthaṃ jagat | svabhāvakośāt cittarūpaḥ 
yaḥ svabhāvaḥ | tadrūpāt kośāt | kramoditam sat svaditam 
āsvādaviṣayīkṛtam | atra dṛṣṭāntam āha bījeneti || MoT_4,17.26 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;jīvo yadvāsanāsāras tad evāntaḥ prapaśyati /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;svapna evātra dṛṣṭānto dīrghasvapnas tv idaṃ jagat // Mo_4,17.27 //<br>
nanu katham atra svapnaḥ dṛṣṭāntaḥ astīty | atrāha dīrghasvapna eveti | 
dīrghatvam cātra cirapratibhāsavaśāj jñeyam || MoT_4,17.27 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;pratyekam udito rāma nanu saṃsāraṣaṇḍakaḥ /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;rātrau sainyanarasvapnajālavat svātmani sphuṭaḥ // Mo_4,17.28 //<br>
rātrau hi sainyanarasvarūpaṃ svapnajālam pratyekam pṛthag | udeti || MoT_4,17.28 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
śrīrāmaḥ pṛcchati<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;eṣa saṃsṛtiṣaṇḍaugho mithaḥ sammilati svayam /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;no vāpi yadi tan me tvaṃ yathāvad vaktum arhasi // Mo_4,17.29 //<br>
eṣaḥ saṃsṛtiṣaṇḍaughaḥ svayam svabhāvena | mithaḥ anyo'nyam | yadi 
milati yadi vā no milati api | tvam etat yathāvat samyak | vaktum arhasi
 samyak kathayeti yāvat || MoT_4,17.29 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
śrīvasiṣṭha uttaram āha<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;malinaṃ hi mano 'vīryaṃ na mithaḥ śleṣam arhati /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;ayo 'yasīvāsantapte śuddhe tapte tu līyate // Mo_4,17.30 //<br>
hi niścaye | malinam rāgādimaladūṣitam | ata evāvīryam | manaḥ mithaḥ 
anyo'nyam | śleṣam melanam | nārhati | kim iva | aya iva | yathāyaḥ 
asantapte ayasi śleṣaṃ nārhati | tathety arthaḥ | tu pakṣāntare | manaḥ |
 śuddhe manasi | līyate milati | ayaś ca santapte 'yasi līyate || 
MoT_4,17.30 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;cittatattvāni śuddhāni sammilanti parasparam /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;ekarūpāṇi toyāni yānty aikyaṃ nābilāni hi // Mo_4,17.31 //<br>
spaṣṭam || MoT_4,17.31 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
sargāntaślokenāpy etad eva kathayati<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;śuddhir hi cittasya vivāsanatvam<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;abhūtasaṃvedanarūpam ekam /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;tasyāḥ suṣuptātmapadāt prabudhya<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;tanmātrayuktyā parasaṅgam eti // Mo_4,17.32 //<br>
hi niścaye | abhūtasaṃvedanātma asiddhapadārthasaṃvedanasvarūpam | 
vivāsanatvam padārthaviṣayabhāvanākhyasaṃskārarāhityam | ekam kevalam | 
cittasya śuddhiḥ bhavati | tat cittam | suṣuptātma suṣuptasvarūpam | yat
 padam sthānam | tasmāt | tasyāḥ śuddheḥ hetoḥ | prabudhya turyākhyam 
bodham prāpya | tanmātrayuktyā sūkṣmabhūtayogena | parasaṅgam anyaiḥ 
saha śleṣam | eti gacchati | tanmātrayuktyā melanaṃ ca svena saha 
sarvasyaikopādānatvajñānam eva jñeyam | iti śivam || MoT_4,17.32 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
iti śrībhāskarakaṇṭhaviracitāyāṃ śrīmokṣopāyaṭīkāyāṃ sthitiprakaraṇe saptādaśaḥ sargaḥ ||17||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
*********************************************************************<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
oṃ | nanu kathaṃ tanmātrayuktyā cetaḥ anyaiḥ saha milatīty | atrāha<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;sarvasaṃsṛtiṣaṇḍeṣu bījarūpakalātmanaḥ /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;tanmātrapratibhāsasya pratibhāse na bhinnatā // Mo_4,18.1 //<br>
bījarūpā bījasvarūpā | yā kalā | tadātmanaḥ tatsvarūpasya | 
sthūlabhūtabījarūpasyeti yāvat | tanmātrapratibhāsasya 
pañcatanmātrākārasya pratibhāsasya | sarvasaṃsṛtiṣaṇḍeṣu samasteṣu 
sargarūpeṣu ṣaṇḍeṣu | pratibhāse sphuraṇe | bhinnatā nāsti | mṛda iva 
ghaṭādiṣu sphuraṇe | ataḥ tanmātrayuktyā cittasyānyamelanaṃ yuktam eveti
 bhāvaḥ | tanmātrāṇi ca sthūlabhūtabījabhūtāni saṃskāramātraśarīrāṇi 
ākāśādibhyo buddhyā pṛthakkṛtāni pañca śabdādīni jñeyāni || MoT_4,18.1 
||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
na kevalaṃ sargaiḥ saha melanam eva tanmātrayuktyā bhavati kiṃ tu brahmaṇi melanam api tayaivety abhiprāyeṇāha<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;pravṛttir vā nivṛttir vā tanmātrāpattipūrvakam /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;sarvasya jīvajātasya suṣuptatvād anantaram // Mo_4,18.2 //<br>
sarvasya jīvajātasya jīvasamūhasya | suṣuptatvāt suṣuptabhāvāt | 
anantaram paścāt | pravṛttiḥ vā anyasargaiḥ saha melanaṃ vā | nivṛttir 
vā sargebhyaḥ nivṛttirūpam brahmaṇi melanaṃ vā | tanmātrāpattipūrvakam 
tanmātrayogapūrvakam eva | bhavati | suṣuptau sargāṇām 
bījatvenāvasthānāt nivṛttyasambhavaḥ sargāṇām prākaṭyenānavasthānāt 
pravṛttyasambhava iti suṣuptatvād anantaram ity uktam | anantaram iti 
kathanena ca suṣupter atrāvaśyambhāvaḥ sūcitaḥ | brahmasargayoḥ 
setutvena sthitāyāḥ suṣupter avaśyambhāvasya suspaṣṭatvāt | atra ca 
pravṛttiḥ jīvanmuktānāṃ nivṛttiḥ videhamuktānām iti viṣayavibhāgo 
draṣṭavyaḥ | itareṣām pravṛttis tu ajñānamūlatvena neha vaktuṃ yuktā || 
MoT_4,18.2 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
prakṛtatvāt pravṛtteḥ tanmātrāpattipūrvakatvam pṛthak kathayati<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;pravṛttibhājo ye jīvās te tanmātrapadaṃ gatāḥ /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;tanmātraikatayā sargān mithaḥ paśyanti kalpitān // Mo_4,18.3 //<br>
ye jīvāḥ jīvanmuktasvabhāvāḥ jīvāḥ | pravṛttibhājaḥ sattvaśeṣatayā 
pravṛttiyuktāḥ bhavanti | te tanmātraikatayā tanmātrayuktyā | kalpitān 
paramārthatayā kalpitasvarūpān | sargān | mithaḥ anyo'nyam | paśyanti | 
jīvanmuktānām manāṃsy anyo'nyam milantīty atra paramaṃ rahasyam || 
MoT_4,18.3 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;tanmātraikyapraṇālena citrāḥ sargajalāśayāḥ /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;parasparaṃ sammilanti ghanatāṃ yānti cābhitaḥ // Mo_4,18.4 //<br>
tanmātrāṇām pañcatanmātrāṇām | yad aikyam | tad eva praṇālaḥ jalapravāhamārgaḥ | tena | ghanatām ghanībhāvam || MoT_4,18.4 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
nanu sarve sargaughāḥ tanmātraikyapraṇālena milanty atha vā katipaye evety | atrāha<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;kecit pṛthak sthitim itāḥ pṛthag eva layaṃ gatāḥ /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;kecin mithaḥ sammilitā jagatṣaṇḍāḥ sthitāḥ kṛtāḥ // Mo_4,18.5 //<br>
kecid aśuddhamatayaḥ | uttarārdhe kecit śuddhamatayaḥ | kṛtāḥ kalpitāḥ | na tu sahajāḥ || MoT_4,18.5 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
nanv etādṛśāḥ sargaughāḥ kasminn ādhāre sthitāḥ bhavantīty | atrāha<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;jagatṣaṇḍasahasrāṇi yatrāsaṅkhyāny aṇāv aṇau /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;aparasparalagnāni kānanam brahma nāma tat // Mo_4,18.6 //<br>
aparasparalagnāni anyo'nyam asaṅkīrṇāni | aṇau aṇau pratyaṃśam || MoT_4,18.6 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;mithaḥ sa melanaṃ naiti ghanatāṃ samupāgataḥ /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;yad yad yatra yathā rūḍhaṃ tat tat paśyati netarat // Mo_4,18.7 //<br>
ghanatām ghanībhāvam | gataḥ sargaḥ | mithaḥ sa melanaṃ naiti na 
gacchati | yataḥ saḥ sargaḥ | lakṣaṇayā tatrasthaḥ pramātā | yat yat 
yatra rūḍham paricitam | tat tat tatra paśyati | na itarat | atra 
pramātur aśuddhamatitvaṃ hetutvena bahuśaḥ uktam || MoT_4,18.7 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;vartamānamanorājyavaśāj jīvaparamparāḥ /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;parasparaṃ sammilitāḥ sargāṇāṃ rūḍhibhāvanāḥ // Mo_4,18.8 //<br>
vartamānam yat manorājyam saṅkalpaḥ | tadvaśāt | jīvaparamparāḥ 
parasparaṃ sammilitāḥ bhavanti | samānamanorājyatvāj jīvāḥ parasparam 
milantīti bhāvaḥ | jīvaparamparāḥ kathambhūtāḥ | sargāṇāṃ rūḍhau 
satyatāyām | bhāvanāḥ yāsām | tāḥ | ayam bhāvaḥ | śuddhamatīnāṃ sargāḥ 
tanmātraikyapraṇālena sarvadā milanti | aśuddhamatīnāṃ tu kadācid 
ekasaṅkalpatveneti || MoT_4,18.8 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
nanu katham iyaṃ dehasattā prākaṭyaṃ gatā 
yadvaśoditasaṅkalpākhyamalāvṛtabuddhīnāṃ tanmātraikyapraṇālenānyasargaiḥ
 saha melanaṃ na bhavatīty | atrāha<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;dehasattā bhṛśaṃ rūḍhā dehābhāvas tu vismṛtaḥ /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;dehatvaparirūḍhatvāc cidvyomnā vismṛtātmanā // Mo_4,18.9 //<br>
cidvyomnā dehatvaparirūḍhatvāt cidvyomakartṛkāt dehabhāve parirūḍhatvāt |
 cidvyomnā svātmatvena bhāvitāt dehabhāvāt iti yāvat | dehasattā rūḍhā 
prarohaṃ gatā | tu pakṣāntare | dehābhāvaḥ paramārthasan 
dehapratiyogikas traikāliko 'bhāvaḥ | cidvyomnā kathambhūtena | 
vismṛtātmanā vismṛtasvarūpeṇa | vismṛtaḥ vismṛtiṃ nītaḥ || MoT_4,18.9 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
athānyena dṛṣṭāntenānyasargaiḥ sammelanaṃ kathayati<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;yathā śuddhaprāṇamarut paraprāṇābhivedhanāt /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;vetti vedhyamanorājyaṃ tathā sargān narāśrayī // Mo_4,18.10 //<br>
yathā śuddhaprāṇamarut prāṇāyāmādinā śuddhaprāṇaḥ | prāṇayogīti yāvat | 
paraprāṇābhivedhanāt | paraprāṇeṣu yat abhivedhanam abhivyāptiḥ | tasmāt
 | parapurapraveśād iti yāvat | vedhyamanorājyam | vedhyasya 
abhivyāpyasya puruṣasya | manorājyaṃ vetti | tathā tadvat | narāśrayī 
tanmātrapraṇālenānyapuruṣāviṣṭaḥ jīvanmuktaḥ puruṣaḥ brahmaṇaḥ prathamam
 utthitaḥ puruṣo vā | sargān āśritapuruṣasargān | vetti || MoT_4,18.10 
||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
evaṃ śrīrāmakṛte praśne uttaraṃ samyag uktvā pūrvatra yatra tatroktāni viśīrṇāni upadeśavākyāni kathayati<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;sarveṣāṃ jīvarāśīnām ātmāvasthātrayaṃ śritaḥ /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;jagratsvapnasuṣuptākhyam atra deho na kāraṇam // Mo_4,18.11 //<br>
atra avasthātrayāśrayaṇe || MoT_4,18.11 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;evam ātmani jīvatvam anyāvasthātrayātmani /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;tāpāmbhasīva vīcitvam asmin kacati dehatā // Mo_4,18.12 //<br>
anyāvasthātrayātmani | anyat svavyatiriktatvena bhāsamānam | yat 
avasthātrayam jāgradādyavasthātrayam | tat | ātmā svarūpaṃ yasya | 
tādṛśe | asmin jīvatvāvacchinne | ātmani || MoT_4,18.12 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;citkalāpadam āsādya suṣuptāntapade sthitam /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;buddho nivartate jīvo mūḍhaḥ sarge pravartate // Mo_4,18.13 //<br>
citkalāpadam turyākhyam padam | buddhaḥ citkalāvimarśanasamarthaḥ | 
nivartate punaḥ viṣayeṣv āsaktiṃ na bhajate | pravartate viṣayāsaktim 
bhajate || MoT_4,18.13 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;svabhāvaśuddhir hi yadā tadā maitrī pravartate /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;dvayor ekatvarūpaiva susauhārdanidarśanā // Mo_4,18.14 //<br>
maitrī kathambhūtā eva | dvayoḥ ekatvarūpā eva | dvayor ekatvam eva hi 
maitrīśabdārthaḥ | punaḥ kathambhūtā | susauhārdanidarśanā | susauhārdam
 praśastamitrabhāvaḥ | nidarśanam dṛṣṭāntaḥ yasyāḥ | sā | susauhārde hi 
dvayor ekatvam eva bhavati || MoT_4,18.14 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;ajñaḥ suṣuptāt sambuddho jīvaḥ kaścit svasargabhāk /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;sarvagatvāc citaḥ kaścit parasargeṇa nīyate // Mo_4,18.15 //<br>
svasargabhāk suṣuptāvasthāyāḥ pūrvaṃ yādṛksvabhāva āsīt | tādṛksvabhāva 
evety arthaḥ | parasargeṇa nayanam svabhāvaparivṛttiḥ jñeyā | 
śukrādisargadṛṣṭāntena vā parasarganayanaṃ yojyam || MoT_4,18.15 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
nanu tasmin sarge 'nyaḥ sargaḥ kutrāsti yenāsau nīyata ity | atrāha<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;sarge sarge pṛthagrūpaṃ santi sargāntarāṇy api /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;teṣv apy antaḥsthasargaughāḥ kadalīdalapīṭhavat // Mo_4,18.16 //<br>
yathā kadalīdaleṣv antar anyāni dalāni santi teṣv antar apy anyāni tathā
 sargeṣv api sargāntarāṇi santi | teṣv antar apy anyāni santīti 
piṇḍārthaḥ || MoT_4,18.16 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;sarge sargāntarāpūrapattrapīvaravṛttimān /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;svabhāvaśītalo brahmakadalīdalamaṇḍapaḥ // Mo_4,18.17 //<br>
sarge ekasmin sarge | yaḥ sargāntarāpūraḥ anyasargasamūhaḥ | sa eva 
pattrāṇi | taiḥ pīvarā bṛṃhaṇarūpā | vṛttiḥ sthitiḥ yasya | saḥ | 
tādṛśaḥ || MoT_4,18.17 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;kadalyām anyatā nāsti yathā pattraśateṣv api /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;brahmatattve 'nyatā nāsti tathā sargaśateṣv api // Mo_4,18.18 //<br>
spaṣṭam || MoT_4,18.18 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;bījāt phalaṃ rasād bhūtvā yathā bījam punar bhavet /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;tathā brahma mano bhūtvā bodhād brahma punar bhavet // Mo_4,18.19 //<br>
yathā phalam bījāt upādānabhūtāt bījāt | bhūtvā prādurbhūya | rasāt 
hetoḥ | punaḥ bījam bhavet | tathā brahma mano bhūtvā bodhāt | punaḥ 
brahma bhavet || MoT_4,18.19 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;rasakāraṇakam bījam phalabhāvena jṛmbhate /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;brahmakāraṇako jīvo jagadrūpeṇa jṛmbhate // Mo_4,18.20 //<br>
spaṣṭam || MoT_4,18.20 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;rasasya kāraṇaṃ kiṃ syād iti vaktuṃ na yujyate /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;svabhāvo nirviśeṣatvāt paraṃ vaktuṃ na yujyate // Mo_4,18.21 //<br>
kathaṃ na yujyata ity | atrāha svabhāva iti | svabhāvaḥ param kevalam | 
nirviśeṣatvāt | vaktum abhiyogaviṣayatāṃ netum | na yujyate | 
svabhāvasyābhiyoge kriyamāṇe aviśeṣāt sarveṣu svabhāveṣv abhiyogaḥ 
prāpnotīti nirviśeṣatvād iti padasyābhiprāyaḥ || MoT_4,18.21 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;na cāsattā sarvamaye vaktuṃ kvacana śakyate /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;nākāraṇe kāraṇādi pare vāsty ādikāraṇe // Mo_4,18.22 //<br>
asataḥ sarvamayatvāyogāt iti bhāvaḥ | nākāraṇa iti | akāraṇe na vidyate 
kāraṇaṃ yasya | tādṛśe | ādikāraṇe pare utkṛṣṭe cinmātre | kāraṇādi na 
asti | ādikāraṇatvāpāyād iti bhāvaḥ || MoT_4,18.22 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;bījaṃ jahan nijavapuḥ phalībhūtaṃ vilokyate /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;brahmājahan nijavapuḥ phalam bījaṃ ca saṃsthitam // Mo_4,18.23 //<br>
brahmaṇaḥ bījatvāvasthāne nijavapuṣaḥ ahānam eva hetuḥ || MoT_4,18.23 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;bījasyākṛtimat sarvaṃ tenānākṛti tatpadam /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;na yujyate samīkartuṃ tasmān nāsty upamā śive // Mo_4,18.24 //<br>
sarvam samastam svarūpam | bījasyākṛtimat bhavati | tena tato hetoḥ | śive śuddhacinmātratattve | upamā nāsti || MoT_4,18.24 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;kham eva jāyate khābhān na ca taj jāyate 'nyadṛk /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;ato na jātaṃ vā jātaṃ viddhi brahmanabho jagat // Mo_4,18.25 //<br>
khābhāt atyantanairmalyenākāśatulyāt brahmaṇaḥ | kham eva jāyate | nanu 
katham etad ity āha | na ceti | caśabdo hetau | yataḥ tat jagannāma kham
 | anyadṛk brahmetaradṛgrūpam | na jāyate notpadyate | phalitaṃ 
kathayati ata iti | ataḥ paramārthato | na jātam | ābhāsataḥ jātaṃ vā | 
jagat brahmanabhaḥ brahmākāśam | viddhi || MoT_4,18.25 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;dṛśyam paśyan svam ātmānaṃ na draṣṭā samprapaśyati /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;prapañcākrāntasaṃvitteḥ kasyodeti nijā sthitiḥ // Mo_4,18.26 //<br>
draṣṭā dṛśyam dṛśikriyāviṣayībhūtam bhāvajātam | paśyan | svam ātmānam 
draṣṭṛrūpam nijam ātmānam | na paśyati nānubhavati | prapañcenākrāntā 
svonmukhatāṃ nītā | saṃvittiḥ yasya | tādṛśasya | kasya puruṣasya | nijā
 sthitiḥ svaṃ svarūpam | udeti sphurati | na kasyāpīty arthaḥ || 
MoT_4,18.26 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;mṛgatṛṣṇājalabhrāntau satyāṃ keva vidagdhatā /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;vidagdhatāyāṃ satyāṃ tu kevāsau mṛgatṛṣṇikā // Mo_4,18.27 //<br>
ato vidagdhatā eva satsaṅgamādinā poṣaṇīyeti bhāvaḥ || MoT_4,18.27 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;ākāśaviśado draṣṭā sarvago 'pi na paśyati /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;netraṃ nijam ivātmānaṃ dṛśībhūtam aho bhramaḥ // Mo_4,18.28 //<br>
ākāśavad viśadaḥ śuddhacinmātrarūpatvenātyantanirmalaḥ | draṣṭā | 
dṛśībhūtam dṛśyabhāvaṃ gatam | ātmānam draṣṭākhyam ātmānam | na paśyati |
 kim iva | netram iva | yathā netraṃ nijam ātmānaṃ na paśyati | tathety 
arthaḥ | aho bhramaḥ bhavati || MoT_4,18.28 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;ākāśaviśadam brahma yatnenāpi na labhyate /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;dṛśye dṛśyatayādṛṣṭe tv asya lābhaḥ sudūrataḥ // Mo_4,18.29 //<br>
kuto na labhyate ity | atrāha dṛśya iti | tena dṛśye dṛśyatvādarśanam eva brahmalabdhir iti bhāvaḥ || MoT_4,18.29 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;tvādṛksthūlo 'vadhānena vinā yatra na dṛśyate /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;tatrātidūrodastaiva draṣṭuḥ sūkṣmasya dṛśyatā // Mo_4,18.30 //<br>
yatra yasmin viṣaye | avadhānena vinā tvādṛksthūlaḥ na dṛśyate | tatra 
tasmin viṣaye | sūkṣmasya draṣṭuḥ dṛśyatā atidūrodastā eva bhavati | 
tvādṛg iti dehābhiprāyeṇoktiḥ || MoT_4,18.30 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;draṣṭā draṣṭaiva bhavati na tu spṛśati dṛśyatām /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;dṛśyaṃ ca dṛśyate tena draṣṭā rāma na dṛśyate // Mo_4,18.31 //<br>
draṣṭā dṛśikriyākartā | draṣṭā eva bhavati | asau draṣṭā dṛśyatām 
dṛśyabhāvam | na spṛśati | he rāma | tena draṣṭrā | dṛśyaṃ dṛśyate yena |
 dṛśyasya dṛśyatvam astīti bhāvaḥ | tena draṣṭrā | draṣṭā draṣṭṛrūpaḥ 
svātmā | na dṛśyate | atisūkṣmatvād iti bhāvaḥ || MoT_4,18.31 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;draṣṭaiva sambhavaty eko na tu dṛśyam ihāsti hi /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;draṣṭā sarvātmako dṛśyaṃ sthitaś cet keva dṛśyatā // Mo_4,18.32 //<br>
sambhavatīti | tasyaiva vicārasahatvād iti bhāvaḥ | sarvātmakaḥ draṣṭā 
dṛśyaṃ sthitaḥ dṛśyatayā sthitaḥ | cet bhavati | tadā dṛśyatā kā iva 
bhavati | avaśyaṃ ca svapnanyāyena draṣṭuḥ dṛśyatayāvasthānam 
aṅgīkartavyam || MoT_4,18.32 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
nanu kathaṃ draṣṭā dṛśyatvena tiṣṭhatīty āśaṅkya dṛṣṭāntaṃ kathayati<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;sarvaśaktimatā rājñā yat yat sampādyate yathā /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;tat tat tathā bhavaty āśu sa evodeti tattayā // Mo_4,18.33 //<br>
yathā sarvaśaktimatā samrāṭtvena sarvaśaktiyuktena | rājñā | yat yat 
vastu | yathā sampādyate sampādanakriyāviṣayatāṃ nīyate | tat tat vastu |
 āśu tathā bhavati sampadyate | vicāre kriyamāṇe sa eva rājā eva | 
tattayā tattadvasturūpeṇa | udeti sphurati | ayam bhāvaḥ | yathā 
sarvaśaktimān rājā svāvyatiriktajñānadvāreṇa 
jñānavivartabhūtasampadyamānavastutayā sphurati | tathā draṣṭā 
svāvyatiriktadṛśikriyādvāreṇa dṛśikriyāvivartabhūtadṛśyamānapadārthatayā
 sphuratīti || MoT_4,18.33 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;yathā madhurasollāsaḥ ṣaṇḍo bhavati bhāsuraḥ /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;rasatām ajahac caiva phalapuṣpadalonnataḥ // Mo_4,18.34 //<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;cidullāsas tathā jīvo bhūtvā bhavati dehakaḥ /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;cinmātratāṃ tām ajahad eva darśanadṛṅmayaḥ // Mo_4,18.35 //<br>
darśanadṛṅmayaḥ karmasādhano 'yaṃ darśanaśabdaḥ | tena dṛśyadṛṅmayaḥ ity arthaḥ | yugmam || MoT_4,18.34-35 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;nānāṣaṇḍasahasraughair advitīyair nijātmanaḥ /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;yathodeti raso bhaumaś cit tathodety ahambhramaiḥ // Mo_4,18.36 //<br>
bhaumaḥ bhūmisambandhī || MoT_4,18.36 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;cidrasollāsavṛkṣāṇāṃ kacatām ātmanātmani /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;dṛśyaśākhāśatāḍhyānām iha nānto 'vagamyate // Mo_4,18.37 //<br>
cid eva rasaḥ | tasya yaḥ ullāsaḥ | tasya vṛkṣāṇām jagatām iti yāvat || MoT_4,18.37 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;ṣaṇḍaḥ pratyekam evāntar yathā rasacamatkṛtim /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;svādayaty evam eṣā cit pṛthak paśyati saṃsṛtīḥ // Mo_4,18.38 //<br>
rasena kṛtām ucchūnatārūpāṃ camatkṛtim rasacamatkṛtim || MoT_4,18.38 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;yā yodeti yathā yasyā jīvaśakteḥ svasaṃsṛtiḥ /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;tām tāṃ tathaiti sā svāntaś cid bhūtabhuvanasthitim // Mo_4,18.39 //<br>
udeti sphurati | cit citsvarūpā | sā jīvaśaktiḥ | svāntaḥ svamadhye | 
tāṃ tām bhūtabhuvanasthitim | bhūtānāṃ tadādhārabhūtānām | bhuvanānāṃ ca
 saṃsthitim saṃsthām | eti prāpnoti || MoT_4,18.39 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;jīvasaṃsṛtayaḥ kāścit pramilanti parasparam /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;svayaṃ vihṛtya saṃsāre śāmyanti cirakālataḥ // Mo_4,18.40 //<br>
kāścit śuddhamatiyuktāḥ | cirakālataḥ dehapātānantaram || MoT_4,18.40 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;sūkṣmayā parayā dṛṣṭyā svam paśyasy anayā tathā /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;jagajjālasahasrāṇi paramāṇvantareṣv api // Mo_4,18.41 //<br>
tvam | svam cinmātrākhyaṃ svātmānam | anayā asmin prakaraṇe proktayā | 
parayā utkṛṣṭayā | sūkṣmayā sūkṣmavastuviṣayatvena sūkṣmarūpayā | dṛṣṭyā
 samyagjñānena | paśyasi anubhavasi | tathāśabdaḥ samuccaye | tathā 
paramāṇvantareṣv api jagajjālasahasrāṇi paśyasi | apiśabdaḥ 
paramāṇvantareṣu jagajjālasahasradarśanāsambhavadyotakaḥ || MoT_4,18.41 
||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;bhittau nabhasi pāṣāṇe jvālāyām anile jale /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;santi saṃsāralakṣyāṇi tile tailam ivākhile // Mo_4,18.42 //<br>
jagadbījabhūtacinmātrasāratveneti bhāvaḥ || MoT_4,18.42 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;śuddham eti yadā cetas tadā jīvo bhavec citiḥ /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;śuddhā ca sā sarvagatā tena sammelanam mithaḥ // Mo_4,18.43 //<br>
sā cit | tena ś MoT_4,18.uddhatvena ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
43||<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;sarveṣām padmajādīnāṃ svasattābhramapūrakaḥ /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;jagaddīrghamahāsvapnaḥ svayam antaḥ samutthitaḥ // Mo_4,18.44 //<br>
svasattābhramapūrakaḥ svasattābhramakārīty arthaḥ || MoT_4,18.44 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;svapnāt svapnāntaraṃ yānti kāścid bhūtaparamparāḥ /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;tenopalambhaḥ kuḍyādāv āsāṃ dṛḍhataraḥ sthitaḥ // Mo_4,18.45 //<br>
kāścid bhūtaparamparāḥ bhūtapaṅktayaḥ | svapnāt ekasmāt saṃsṛtirūpāt 
svapnāt | svapnāntaram anyasaṃsṛtirūpaṃ svapnam | yānti | tena tataḥ 
hetoḥ | āsām svapnāt svapnāntaraṃ gatānām bhūtapaṅktīnām | kuḍyādau 
dṛḍhataraḥ upalambhaḥ sthitaḥ asti | idaṃ kuḍyam ityādirūpaṃ jñānam asti
 || MoT_4,18.45 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;yad yatra cid bhāvayati tat tatrāśu bhavaty alam /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;tayā svapne 'pi yad dṛṣṭaṃ tatkāle satyam eva tat // Mo_4,18.46 //<br>
tayā citā || MoT_4,18.46 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;cidaṇor antare santi samastānubhavāṇavaḥ /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;yathā bījāntare pattralatāpuṣpaphalāṇavaḥ // Mo_4,18.47 //<br>
samastāḥ samastaghaṭapaṭādyākārāḥ | anubhavāṇavaḥ anubhavaleśāḥ || MoT_4,18.47 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;paramāṇuṃ jagad antar dhatte citparamāṇukaḥ /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;līnam ākāśam ākāśe dvaitaikyabhramam utsṛja // Mo_4,18.48 //<br>
citparamāṇukaḥ cidrūpaḥ paramāṇuḥ | jagat paramāṇum jagadrūpam paramāṇum
 | antaḥ svātmabhittau | dhatte dhārayati | phalitam āha līnam iti | 
ataḥ ākāśam jagadākhyam ākāśam | ākāśe cidākhya ākāśe | līnam bhavati | 
etasya phalaṃ kathayati dvaitaikyam iti | ataḥ tvam dvaitaikyabhramam 
utsṛja tyaja | ekatayāpi vaktum aśakyasya kevalasya cinmātrasya 
sthitatvāt || MoT_4,18.48 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;deśakālakriyādyākhyaiḥ svair evāṇubhir eva cit /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;aṇūn anubhavaty antar itarāṇor asambhavāt // Mo_4,18.49 //<br>
svair eva svarūpabhūtair eva | aṇūn nānābhūtarūpān aṇūn | antaḥ svasmin |
 itarāṇoḥ deśādirūpasya cidvyatiriktasyāṇoḥ || MoT_4,18.49 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;svayaṃ sarvasya kacitaḥ svacchaś cidaṇuṣaṇḍakaḥ /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;brahmādeḥ kīṭaniṣṭhasya dehadṛṣṭyānubhāvitaḥ // Mo_4,18.50 //<br>
dehadṛṣṭyā anubhāvitaḥ anubhavaviṣayatāṃ nītaḥ | kīṭaniṣṭhasya 
kīṭāvasānasya | anubhāvita ity atra svārthe ṇic ārṣaḥ || MoT_4,18.50 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;kacitaṃ kiñcid eveha vastutas tu na kiñcana /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;svayaṃ svatvaṃ svādayante dvaitaṃ citparamāṇavaḥ // Mo_4,18.51 //<br>
punaḥ kim etat sphuratīty | atrāha svayam iti | citparamāṇavaḥ cilleśāḥ |
 dvaitam ghaṭapaṭādirūpadvaitasvarūpam | svatvam svabhāvam | svādayante 
camatkāraviṣayatāṃ nayanti || MoT_4,18.51 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;svayam prakacati sphāradehaś cidaṇuṣaṇḍakaḥ /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;netrādikusumadvāraiḥ saṃvidāmodam udgiran // Mo_4,18.52 //<br>
sphāradehaḥ sphārasvarūpaḥ | saṃvidāmodam ghaṭapaṭādijñānarūpam āmodam || MoT_4,18.52 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;sampaśyatītarān kaścid bahīrūpeṇa cidghanān /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;sarvagatvād anāśatvād dṛśyabījasya vai citeḥ // Mo_4,18.53 //<br>
kaścit puruṣaḥ | jāgradavasthāviṣṭa iti yāvat | citeḥ dṛśyabījasya 
cidākhyasya dṛśyabījasya | sarvagatvāt tathā anāśatvāt | cidghanān 
citsvarūpatvena cidbharitān | itarān svato bhinnatvena bhātān padārthān |
 bahīrūpeṇa paśyati bāhyā ete iti anubhavati || MoT_4,18.53 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;antar evākhilaṃ kaścit paśyaty avikalaṃ jagat /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;tatrātikālaṃ kalanād unmajjati nimajjati // Mo_4,18.54 //<br>
kaścit svapnāvasthāviṣṭa iti yāvat | antar eva svasminn eva | na tu bāhye || MoT_4,18.54 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;svapnāt svapnāntaraṃ tatra tathā paśyan punaḥ punaḥ /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;mithyāvaṭeṣu luṭhitaḥ śileva śikharacyutā // Mo_4,18.55 //<br>
kaścit kiṃ kurvan | svapnāt svapnāntaram punaḥ punaḥ paśyan iti 
pūrveṇaiva sambandhaḥ | kaścit kathambhūtaḥ | mithyā vyartham | avaṭeṣu 
bhāvābhāvākhyeṣv avaṭeṣu | luṭhitaḥ | kā iva | śikharacyutā śilā iva || 
MoT_4,18.55 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;kecit sammīlitāḥ kecid ātmany eva bhrame sthitāḥ /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;magnāḥ svasaṃvidrasataḥ sphuranto dehiṣaṇḍakāḥ // Mo_4,18.56 //<br>
kecit suṣuptyavasthāviṣṭāḥ | sammīlitāḥ nidrāgrastāḥ | ātmani ajñānavalite svātmani | dehiṣaṇḍakāḥ jīvasamūhāḥ || MoT_4,18.56 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
turyāvasthāviṣṭān kathayati<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;svayam antaḥ prapaśyanti ye jagajjīvasambhramam /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;taiḥ kaiścit tat tathā dṛśyam asatsvapnavad āśritam // Mo_4,18.57 //<br>
ye jīvanmuktāḥ jīvāḥ | jagajjīvasambhramam jagadākhyaṃ jīvasambhramam | 
antaḥ manasi | paśyanti | na tu bahiḥ | taiḥ kaiścit tat dṛśyaṃ tathā 
āśritam antastvenaivāśritam | katham | asatsvapnavat | turyāvasthāviṣṭā 
jīvanmuktā hi bāhyam api jagat svapnavad antaḥstham evānubhavanti 
bhramasvarūpatvadarśanāt || MoT_4,18.57 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;sarvātmatvāt svabhāvasya tad dṛśyaṃ satyam ātmani /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;sarvago vidyate yatra tatra sarvam udeti hi // Mo_4,18.58 //<br>
tat dṛśyam ātmani svasmin svarūpe | satyam bhavati | kutaḥ | svabhāvasya
 cinmātrākhyasya svabhāvasya | sarvātmatvāt sarvarūpeṇa vartamānatvāt | 
ayam bhāvaḥ | dṛśyaṃ draṣṭrapekṣayā siddhena dṛśyatvenāsatyam api sat | 
sarvarūpatvāvasthitacinmātrāparaparyāyasvabhāvasāratvena svasvarūpe 
satyam eveti | nanu katham etad ity | atrāha sarvaga iti | hi yasmāt | 
sarvagaḥ sarvavyāpakaṃ svabhāvāparaparyāyam cinmātratvam | yatra vidyate
 | tatra sarvam dṛśyam | udeti prādurbhavati | ataḥ 
svabhāvabhūtacinmātravat tatsattāvinābhāvi dṛśyam api satyam eveti 
bhāvaḥ || MoT_4,18.58 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;jīvāntaḥ pratibhāsasya sargasya punar antare /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;jīvaṣaṇḍa udety uccais tasyāntar itaro 'pi ca // Mo_4,18.59 //<br>
spaṣṭam || MoT_4,18.59 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;jīvāntar jāyate jīvas tasyāntar api jīvakaḥ /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;sarvatra rambhādalavaj jīvabījam prajīvati // Mo_4,18.60 //<br>
prajīvati prakṛṣṭāyāḥ jīvanakriyāyāḥ kartṛtvam bhajati || MoT_4,18.60 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;dṛśyabuddhiparāvṛddhi samam etad anantakam /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;hemnīva kaṭakāditvam parijñaptyaiva naśyati // Mo_4,18.61 //<br>
anantakam antarahitatvena bhāsamānam | etat dṛśyam | parijñaptyaiva 
cinmātram evedam iti jñānenaiva | na tv anyena kenāpi hetunā | samam 
yugapat | na tu krameṇa | naśyati adarśanaṃ yāti | 
cinmātrarūpatvenānubhūyamānatvasiddher ity arthaḥ | etat kathambhūtam | 
dṛśyabuddhyā dṛśyam idam iti buddhyā | parā utkṛṣṭā | ā samantāt | 
vṛddhiḥ yasya | tat | etat kim iva | kaṭakāditvam iva | yathā hemni 
sthitaṃ kaṭakāditvam parijñaptyā hemaivedam iti jñānena naśyati | 
tathety arthaḥ || MoT_4,18.61 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;vicāro yasya nodeti ko 'haṃ kim idam ity alam /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;tasyādyantāvimukto 'sau dīrgho jīvajvarabhramaḥ // Mo_4,18.62 //<br>
ādyantāvimuktaḥ avicchinnapravāhaḥ | jīvo 'ham iti jvararūpaḥ bhramaḥ jīvajvarabhramaḥ || MoT_4,18.62 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;vicāraḥ phalitas tasya vijñeyo yasya sanmateḥ /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;dinānudinam āyāti tānavam bhogagṛdhnutā // Mo_4,18.63 //<br>
vijñeya ity | atra paṇḍitair iti śeṣaḥ | bhogagṛdhnutā bhogākāṅkṣā || MoT_4,18.63 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;yathā dehopayuktaṃ hi karoty ārogyam auṣadham /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;tathendriyajaye nyasto vivekaḥ phalito bhavet // Mo_4,18.64 //<br>
dehopayuktam dehe prayuktam | phalitaḥ mokṣākhyavyavahite phalayuktaḥ | 
indriyajayasyaiva mokṣam prati sākṣād upāyatvād iti bhāvaḥ || 
MoT_4,18.64 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;viveko 'sti vacasy eva citre 'gnir iva bhāsvaraḥ /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;yasya tena parityaktā duḥkhāyaiva vivekitā // Mo_4,18.65 //<br>
yasyety asya pūrvārdhena sambandhaḥ | parityakteti cittābhiprāyeṇoktam || MoT_4,18.65 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;yathā sparśena pavanaḥ sattām āyāti no girā /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;tathecchātānavenaiva viveko 'syeti budhyate // Mo_4,18.66 //<br>
spaṣṭam || MoT_4,18.66 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;citrāmṛtaṃ nāmṛtam eva viddhi<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;citrānalaṃ nānalam eva viddhi /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;citre 'ṅganā nūnam anaṅganaiva<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;vācā vivekas tv aviveka eva // Mo_4,18.67 //<br>
yathā citrasthasyāmṛtādeḥ tṛptyādyarthakriyākāritvābhāvāt 
anamṛtādirūpatvam eva | tathā kevalaṃ vācaiva kathyamānasya | ata eva 
indriyajayāsādhakasya vivekasya mokṣākhyārthakriyākāritvābhāvād 
avivekatvam eveti bhāvaḥ || MoT_4,18.67 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
punaḥ kīdṛk puruṣo vivekī asty | atra sargāntaślokenāha<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;pūrvaṃ vivekena tanutvam eti<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;rāgo 'tha vairaṃ ca samūlam eva /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;paścāt parikṣīyata eva yatra<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;sa pāvanas tatra vivekitāsti // Mo_4,18.68 //<br>
yatra yasmin puruṣe | rāgaḥ atha vairaṃ ca dveṣaḥ | vivekena vicāreṇa | 
pūrvam prathamam | tanutvam tānavam | eti gacchati | paścāt 
tanutvānantaram | kṣīyate eva naśyaty eva | saḥ puruṣaḥ | pāvanaḥ asti |
 tatra tasmin puruṣe | vivekitā vicārayuktatvam | asti | na tu 
vākyamātreṇa sadasannirṇāyake ity arthaḥ | iti śivam || MoT_4,18.68 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
iti śrībhāskarakaṇṭhaviracitāyāṃ śrīmoksopāyaṭīkāyāṃ sthitiprakaraṇe 'ṣṭādaśaḥ sargaḥ ||18||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
*********************************************************************<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
atidurbodhatvena punar api pūrvoktam evārthaṃ kathayati<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;jīvabījam param brahma sarvatra kham iva sthitam /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;tena jīvodarajagaty api jīvo 'sty anekadhā // Mo_4,19.1 //<br>
jīvānām bījam prādurbhavasthānam | param brahma kham ivākāśavat | 
sarvatra dṛśyatayābhimate samaste jagajjāle | sthitam svarūpasāratayā 
sthitam bhavati | tena tato hetoḥ | jīvasya yat udaram madhyapradeśaḥ | 
tatrasthitaṃ yat jagat svapnādirūpaṃ jagat | tasmin api anekadhā 
nānāvidhasthāvarajaṅgamātmakaprakāreṇa nānāprakāro | jīvo 'sti || 
MoT_4,19.1 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
tataḥ kim ity apekṣāyām āha<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;cidghanaikaghanātmatvāj jīvāntar jīvajātayaḥ /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;kadalīdalavat santi kīṭā iva narodare // Mo_4,19.2 //<br>
ataḥ cidghanena ekam kevalam | ghanaḥ ātmā yasya | saḥ | tasya bhāvaḥ 
cidghanaikātmatvam | tasmāt hetoḥ | jīvāntaḥ jīvānām madhye | 
jīvajātayaḥ kadalīdalavat santi | kadalīdaleṣu hy antar anyāni dalāni 
santi | jīvajātayaḥ ke iva | kīṭā iva | yathā narodare kīṭāḥ santi | 
tathety arthaḥ || MoT_4,19.2 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
nanu jīvaḥ kuta utpadyate ity | atrāha<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;yo yo rāma yathā grīṣme kalkasvedād bhavet krimiḥ /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;tattannāma tathā cittvāt khaṃ jīvībhavati svataḥ // Mo_4,19.3 //<br>
he rāma | grīṣme grīṣmakāle | kalkasvedāt | kalko malam | sa ca svedaś 
ca | tat kalkasvedam | tasmāt | yaḥ yaḥ krimiḥ yathā yena rūpeṇa | 
bhavet jāyate | kham ākāśam | cittvāt tathā tena rūpeṇa | svataḥ 
jīvībhavati | kham kathambhūtam | tattannāma tasya tasya krimer nāma 
yasya | tat | ayam bhāvaḥ | grīṣme tāvat nānāvidhāḥ krimayaḥ kalkasvedāt
 jāyante | teṣāṃ śarīraṃ tāvat kalkasvedamayam bhavatu | taccālakas tu 
jīvaḥ jīvatvānyathānupapattyā cittvayuktam ākāśam eva | kalkasvedasya 
śarīramātrasampādane parisamāptatvāt tadanyasyāsannidhānāc ca | atas 
sarve jīvāḥ ākāśārūpā eveti || MoT_4,19.3 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;yathā yathā yatante te jīvakāḥ svātmasiddhaye /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;tathā tathā bhavanty āśu vicitropāsanakramaiḥ // Mo_4,19.4 //<br>
te ākāśamayāḥ | jīvakāḥ | svātmasiddhaye yathā yathā yatante 
vicitropāsanākramaiḥ yatanarūpaiḥ nānāvidhair upāsanākramaiḥ | tathā 
tathā bhavanti || MoT_4,19.4 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
sāmānyenoktvā viśeṣeṇa kathayati<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;devān devayajo yakṣayajo yakṣān vrajanti hi /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;brahma brahmayajo yānti yad atucchaṃ tad āśrayet // Mo_4,19.5 //<br>
phalitam āha yad iti | ata ity adhyāhāraḥ | ataḥ puruṣaḥ yat atuccham bhavati | tat āśrayet || MoT_4,19.5 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
nanu tarhi śukraḥ kathaṃ svayatanaṃ vinā nānārūpatāṃ gata ity | atrāha<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;sa śukro bhṛguputro hi nirmalatvāt svasaṃvidaḥ /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;baddhaḥ prathamadṛṣṭena dṛśyenāśu svabhāvataḥ // Mo_4,19.6 //<br>
saḥ pūrvaprakaraṇoktaḥ | bhṛguputraḥ śukraḥ | hi niścaye | 
idamprathamatāvaroheṇa svasaṃvidaḥ nirmalatvāt prathamadṛṣṭena dṛśyena 
svabhāvataḥ prayatanaṃ vināśu baddhaḥ svonmukhaḥ kṛtaḥ | ato na virodha 
iti bhāvaḥ || MoT_4,19.6 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;abhijātāparimlānā bālā yat prathamam puraḥ /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;saṃvit prāpnoti tadrūpā bhavaty anyā na kācana // Mo_4,19.7 //<br>
abhijātā śuddhā | ata evāparimlānā tāvat kāluṣyam agatā | bālā brahmaṇaḥ
 sadyaḥ utthitā | saṃvit | prathamam ādau | yat puraḥ paśyati | tadrūpā 
bhavati | anyā brahmaṇaḥ pūrvataram utthitā | kācana saṃvit | na bhavati
 yatnaṃ vinā na bhavati | yatnena tu bhavaty eva | anyathā 
mokṣābhāvaprasaṅgāt || MoT_4,19.7 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
pūrvaṃ sphuritam praśnaṃ śrīrāmaḥ asmin samaye pṛcchati<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;jāgratsvapnadaśābhedam bhagavan vaktum arhasi /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;kathaṃ ca jāgraj jāgrat syāt svapno 'jāgrat katham bhavet // Mo_4,19.8 //<br>
kiṃ kathayāmīty apekṣāyām āha katham iti | jāgrat jāgrat kathaṃ syāt | 
svapnaḥ ajāgrat svapnaḥ | katham bhavet | etad eva kathaya me iti bhāvaḥ
 || MoT_4,19.8 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
śrīvasiṣṭha uttaraṃ kathayati<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;sthirapratyayayuktaṃ yat taj jāgrad iti kathyate /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;asthirapratyayaṃ yat syāt sa svapnaḥ samudāhṛtaḥ // Mo_4,19.9 //<br>
sthirapratyayena sa evāyam ity evaṃrūpapratyabhijñāyāṃ kṣameṇa 
sthirajñānena | yuktaṃ yat bhavati | paṇḍitaiḥ taj jāgrad iti kathyate |
 yat asthirapratyayam pratyabhijñākṣamāsthirajñānayuktam | syāt | 
paṇḍitaiḥ saḥ svapnaḥ samudāhṛtaḥ kathitaḥ || MoT_4,19.9 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
jāgratsvapnayoḥ kadācitsambhavayuktaṃ svapnajāgrattvaṃ kathayati<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;jāgrac cet kṣaṇadṛṣṭaḥ syāt svapnaḥ kālāntarasthitaḥ /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;taj jāgrat svapnatām eti svapno jāgrattvam ṛcchati // Mo_4,19.10 //<br>
jāgral lakṣaṇayā jāgrajjñānaviṣayībhūtaṃ vastu | cet yadi | kṣaṇadṛṣṭaḥ 
kṣaṇam eva dṛṣṭaḥ | syāt | arthāt tataḥ naṣṭaḥ | tathā svapnaḥ 
svapnajñānaviṣayībhūtaṃ vastu | kālāntarasthitaḥ svapnakālād anyasmin 
kāle 'pi sthitaḥ | cet syāt | kadācid dhi svapnadṛṣṭam api vastu 
prabhāte pratyakṣaṃ dṛśyate | tat tadā | jāgrat jāgradvastugrāhakaṃ 
jñānam | svapnatām eti asthirapratyayatvāt | svapnaḥ svapnavastugrāhakaṃ
 jñānam | jāgrattvam ṛcchati sthirapratyayatvāt || MoT_4,19.10 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
nanu katham etad ity | atrāha<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;jāgratsvapnadaśābhedo na sthirāsthiratāṃ vinā /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;samaḥ sadaiva sarvatra samastānubhavo 'nayoḥ // Mo_4,19.11 //<br>
yataḥ jāgratsvapnadaśābhedaḥ sthiratāsthiratāṃ vinā na bhavati | ataḥ 
kṣaṇikajāgrataḥ svapnatvaṃ sthirasvapnasya jāgrattvaṃ yuktam eveti 
bhāvaḥ | atra samastānubhavam pramāṇatvena kathayati sama iti | anayoḥ 
jāgratsvapnayoḥ | samasteṣu sthitaḥ anubhavaḥ samastānubhavaḥ | sadā 
sarveṣu kāleṣu | sarvatra sarveṣu deśeṣu | samaḥ eva bhavati | 
sthirāsthiratāṃ vineti atrāpi sambandhanīyam || MoT_4,19.11 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
phalitam āha<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;yad eva sthiratām eti taj jāgrad iti kathyate /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;kṣaṇabhaṅgātmakaḥ svapno yathā bhavati tac chṛṇu // Mo_4,19.12 //<br>
ataḥ yad eva sthiratām eti paṇḍitaiḥ tat svapno 'pi san jāgrad iti 
kathyate | yaḥ kṣaṇabhaṅgātmakaḥ saḥ jāgrad api san svapnaḥ bhavati | 
yathaitad bhavati tvam tat śṛṇu | yathā jāgratsvapnayoḥ 
sthiratvāsthiratvam asti tathā śṛṇv ity arthaḥ || MoT_4,19.12 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
tad eva kathayati<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;jīvadhātuḥ śarīre 'ntar vidyate yena jīvyate /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;tejo vīryaṃ jīvadhātur ityādyabhidham aṅga tat // Mo_4,19.13 //<br>
jīvākhyaḥ dhātuḥ jīvadhātuḥ | śarīre 'ntaḥ vidyate | yena jīvadhātunā | 
śarīraṃ jīvyate prāṇadhāraṇakriyāṃ kāryate | jīvyata iti ṇicantaḥ 
prayogaḥ | he aṅga | tat saḥ jīvadhātuḥ | tejo vīryaṃ jīvadhātur 
ityādyabhidham bhavati | atra ca dhātuśabdaḥ majjādivat śarīrāntaś 
cāritvasādṛśyāt upacāreṇa prayuktaḥ || MoT_4,19.13 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;vyavahārī yadā kāyo manasā karmaṇā girā /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;bhavet tadā sa sampanno jīvadhātuḥ prasarpati // Mo_4,19.14 //<br>
yadā yasmin kāle | kāyaḥ | manasā karmaṇā svāśritayā kriyayā | girā ca |
 vyavahārī vyavahārayukto | bhavet | tadā saḥ jīvadhātuḥ sampannaḥ 
sampūrṇaḥ san | prasarpati sarvasmiñ śarīre sañcāraṃ karotīty arthaḥ || 
MoT_4,19.14 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
tataḥ kim ity | āha<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;tasmin prasarpaty aṅgeṣu sparśāt saṃvid udeti hi /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;puṣṭatvāt saiti cittākhyām antarlīnajagadbhramā // Mo_4,19.15 //<br>
tasmin saṃvinmaye jīvadhātau | prasarpati sati | aṅgeṣu sparśāt 
jīvadhātusparśāt | hi niścaye | saṃvit jīvadhātuspandabhūtā 
śītoṣṇādisañcetanarūpā saṃvit | udeti prādurbhavati | sā saṃvit | 
antarlīnajagadbhramā satī | puṣṭatvāt jīvadhātuprasarpaṇena puṣṭatvāt | 
cittākhyām eti | nanu antarlīnajagadbhramatvaṃ saṃvidaḥ katham iti cet |
 satyam | saṃvit tāvat jīvadhātoḥ utpadyate | jīvadhātuś ca 
pitṛjīvadhātoḥ utthānasamaye jagadbhramayukta eva uttiṣṭhati | 
pitṛjīvadhātor antarlīnajagadbhramatvāt | ataḥ saṃvido 'py 
antarlīnajagadbhramatvaṃ siddham || MoT_4,19.15 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;sekṣaṇādiṣu randhreṣu prasarpantī bahirmayam /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;nānākāravikārāḍhyaṃ rūpam ātmani paśyati // Mo_4,19.16 //<br>
sā saṃvit | īkṣaṇādirandhreṣu prasarpantī satī | bahirmayam 
bahiḥsvarūpam | nānākāravikāraiḥ ghaṭapaṭādirūpaiḥ ākāravikāraiḥ | 
āḍhyaṃ rūpam | ātmani paśyati vimṛśati | antar iva 
saṅkalpasiddhaghaṭapaṭāditām | na caitat katham iti vācyam | svapne 
dṛṣṭatvāt | yathā svapne saṃvid eva nānārūpair bhāti | tathā bahir apīti
 na virodhaḥ || MoT_4,19.16 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;tat sthiratvāt tayaivātha jāgrad ity avagamyate /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;jāgratkrama iti proktaḥ suṣuptādikramaṃ śṛṇu // Mo_4,19.17 //<br>
tayā eva saṃvidā eva | na tv anyena dehādinā jaḍena | tat 
nānākāravikārāḍhyaṃ nijaṃ svarūpam | sthiratvāt kam api kālam tathaiva 
sthitatvāt | jāgrad ity avagamyate jñāyate | 
jāgratprakriyopasaṃhārapūrvaṃ suṣuptādiprakriyāṃ vaktum pratijānīte 
jāgratkrama iti || MoT_4,19.17 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
suṣuptādikramam eva kathayati<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;manasā karmaṇā vācā yadā kṣubhyati no vapuḥ /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;śānta ātiṣṭhati svaccho jīvadhātus tadā tv asau // Mo_4,19.18 //<br>
na kṣubhyati śrāntatvāt | vyavahāraṃ na karotīty arthaḥ | tadā tasmin 
kāle | jīvadhātuḥ svacchaḥ suptaprasarpaṇākhyamalaḥ | ata eva śāntaḥ 
kṣobharahitaḥ | ā samantāt | tiṣṭhati | tuśabdo niścaye | yady api 
suṣuptaviṣayaḥ śrīrāmakṛtaḥ praśno nāsti tathāpi jāgratsvapnayor avaśyam
 madhyavartitvāt suṣuptinirṇayaḥ | na hi jāgrataḥ nirgatya suṣuptim 
agatvā svapnagamanam puruṣasya yuktam | setuvat sarvatra maryādātvena 
suṣupteḥ sthitatvāt | yady api śuddhacid api sarvatra madhye setutvena 
vartata eva tathāpi vidyuddyotaratnavat sthūladṛṣṭyaviṣayatvāt tasyāḥ 
setutvākathanam | sūkṣmadṛṣṭīn prati tv anupayogāt kathanaṃ na yuktam ||
 MoT_4,19.18 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
tadā kiṃ sampatsyate ity | atrāha<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;samatām āgatair vātaiḥ kṣobhyate na hṛdantare /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;nirvātasadane dīpo yathālokaikakārakaḥ // Mo_4,19.19 //<br>
samatām manaḥkṛtakṣobhābhāvāt samavāhitvam | āgataiḥ vātaiḥ prāṇaiḥ | 
asau jīvadhātuḥ hṛdantare na kṣobhyate kṣobhayukto na kriyate | anena 
manonāśena prāṇarodhaḥ prāṇarodhena ca manonāśaḥ sampatsyate iti sūcitam
 | tatrāpi keṣāñcit prāṇarodhena manonāśaḥ mataḥ | asmākaṃ tu 
samyagjñānasādhitena manonāśenaiva prāṇarodhaḥ | sa cet tatra sahakārī 
tan na doṣaḥ | tataḥ sarvathā manonāśaḥ prāṇarodhena | manonāśas tu 
madirādiprayuktamanonāśavan nātyantika iti matam | atra pratibhānvitā 
eva pramāṇam ity alam bahunā | jīvadhātuḥ ka iva | dīpa iva | yathā 
nirvātasadane vātaiḥ ālokaikakārakaḥ dīpo na kṣobhyate | tathety arthaḥ 
|| MoT_4,19.19 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
tataḥ kiṃ sampadyata ity | atrāha<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;tataḥ sarati nāṅgeṣu saṃvit kṣubhyati tena no /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;na cekṣaṇādīny āyāti randhrāṇy āyāti no bahiḥ // Mo_4,19.20 //<br>
tataḥ sa jīvadhātuḥ | aṅgeṣu na sarati sañcāraṃ na karoti | tena 
jīvadhātusaraṇena | saṃvit jīvadhātuspandarūpā saṃvit | no kṣubhyati na 
udeti | sā saṃvit īkṣaṇādīni randhrāṇi na cāyāti bahiḥ no āyāti || 
MoT_4,19.20 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
tadāsau kutra tiṣṭhatīty apekṣāyām āha<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;jīve 'ntar eva sphurati tailasaṃvid yathā tile /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;śītasaṃvid dhima iva snehasaṃvid yathā ghṛte // Mo_4,19.21 //<br>
asau saṃvit jīve 'ntaḥ svadharmibhūtajīvamadhye eva | sphurati | kā iva |
 tailasaṃvid iva tailākārā saṃvit | tailasaṃvit tailam iti yāvat | yathā
 sā tile sphurati | tathety arthaḥ | evam anyasmin dṛṣṭāntadvaye 'pi 
yojyam || MoT_4,19.21 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
nanu tadā jīvaḥ kiṃ karotīty | atrāha<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;jīvaḥ kālakalāṃ kāñcit tiṣṭhan śāntatayātmani /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;daśām āyāti sauṣuptīṃ saumyavātāṃ vicetanām // Mo_4,19.22 //<br>
tadā jīvaḥ kāñcit atisūkṣmatayā vaktum aśakyām | kālakalāṃ kālaleśaṃ 
tāvat | śāntatayā ātmani jñānātmani svarūpe | tiṣṭhan prathamaṃ tiṣṭhan |
 tataḥ vicetanām ajñānamayīm | saumyavātām samavāhiprāṇām | sauṣuptīṃ 
daśām āyāti | anena jāgratsuṣuptayor madhye sūkṣmadṛṣṭibhiḥ vedyaḥ 
madhyadhāmapraveśaḥ uktaḥ | anenaiva cābhiprāyeṇa nidrādau jāgarasyānta 
ityādy uktam | ity alaṃ rahasyodghāṭanena || MoT_4,19.22 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
nanu suṣupta eva jīvaḥ kṣobharāhityāt kathaṃ na turyavān astīty apekṣāyām āha<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;jñātvā cetasy uparate śāmyan vyavaharann api /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;jāgratsvapnasuṣupteṣu prabuddhas turyavān smṛtaḥ // Mo_4,19.23 //<br>
jñātvā śuddhacinmātrarūpaṃ svātmānaṃ samyag jñātvā | cetasi 
vikalpasvarūpe manasi | uparate līne sati | vyavaharann api 
śarīrayātrānimittaṃ vyavahāraṃ kurvann api | śāmyan vyavahārakṛtaṃ 
kṣobham atyantanaipuṇyāt agacchan | tathā jāgratsvapnasuṣupteṣu 
prabuddhaḥ kīdṛgrūpāṇy etānīti samyagjñānayuktaḥ | na tu jaḍaḥ | 
paṇḍitaiḥ turyavān smṛtaḥ | suṣuptas tu naitādṛśo 'stīti nāsau turyavān 
iti bhāvaḥ || MoT_4,19.23 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
svapnaṃ nirūpayitum prastauti<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;sauṣuptāt somyatāṃ yātaiḥ prāṇaiḥ sañcālyate yadā /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;sa jīvadhātus sā saṃvit tataś cittatayoditā // Mo_4,19.24 //<br>
suṣuptam eva sauṣuptam | tasmāt | somyatāṃ yātaiḥ vātaiḥ | yadā 
suṣuptapariṇāmakāle | sa jīvadhātuḥ cālyate | tataḥ tadā | sā saṃvit 
jīvadhātuspandarūpā saṃvit | cittatayā cittabhāvena | uditā prādurbhūtā |
 bhavati || MoT_4,19.24 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
cittatayā uditya kiṃ karotīty | atrāha<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;svāntaḥsaṃsthaṃ jagajjālam bhāgabhāgaiḥ kramabhramaiḥ /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;paśyati svāntar evāśu sphāram bījam iva drumam // Mo_4,19.25 //<br>
tataḥ sā cittarūpā saṃvit svāntaḥsaṃstham saṃskārarūpeṇa svātmani 
sthitam | jagajjālaṃ svāntar eva na tu bāhye | āśu kramabhramaiḥ na tu 
sahajakramayuktaiḥ | bhāgabhāgaiḥ padārtharūpaiḥ leśaleśaiḥ | paśyati 
anubhavati | kim iva | bījam iva | yathā sphāram aṅkuronmukham | bījam |
 drumam svāntaḥ paśyati | anyathā tannirgamānupapatteḥ | tathety arthaḥ 
|| MoT_4,19.25 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
tad eva viśeṣataḥ kathayati<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;jīvadhātur yadā vātaiḥ kiñcit saṅkṣobhyate bhṛśam /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;tadohyate 'mbara iva paśyaty ātmani khe gatim // Mo_4,19.26 //<br>
vātabāhulyasvabhāva evāyaṃ yat puruṣaḥ svapne khe gatim paśyatīti vākyārthaḥ || MoT_4,19.26 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;yadāmbhasā plāvyate 'sau tadā vāryādisambhramam /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;antar evānubhavati svāmodaṃ kusumaṃ yathā // Mo_4,19.27 //<br>
asau jīvadhātuḥ | ambhasā kapharūpeṇa jalena | plāvyate pūryate | 
vāryādisambhramam udakaplavādirūpaṃ sambhramam || MoT_4,19.27 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;yadā pittādinākrāntas tadāgnyauṣṇyādisambhramam /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;antar evānubhavati sphāram bahir ivākhilam // Mo_4,19.28 //<br>
paramārthatas tu na bahiḥ sphāram iti ivaśabdopādanam || MoT_4,19.28 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;raktāpūrṇo raktavarṇān deśakālān bahir yadā /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;paśyaty anubhavātmatvāt tatraiva ca nimajjati // Mo_4,19.29 //<br>
yadā raktāpūrṇaḥ raktapūritaḥ | syāt | tadā bahiḥ raktavarṇān deśakālān 
paśyati | na kevalam paśyati | tatraiva ca nimajjati || MoT_4,19.29 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
nanu nānāvyavahārān katham paśyatīty | atrāha<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;sevate vāsanāṃ yāṃ tāṃ so 'ntaḥ paśyati nidritaḥ /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;pavanakṣobhitai randhrair bahir akṣādibhir yathā // Mo_4,19.30 //<br>
saḥ jīvadhātuḥ | yām śubhāśubharūpām | vāsanāṃ sevate nidritaḥ san | tām
 antaḥ paśyati | kathaṃ tathā | tathā katham pavanakṣobhitaḥ akṣādibhiḥ 
randhraiḥ netrādidvāraiḥ | yathā bahiḥ paśyati || MoT_4,19.30 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
saṅgṛhya svapnalakṣaṇaṃ kathayati<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;anākrantendriyacchidro yad akṣubdho 'ntar eva saḥ /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;saṃvidānubhavaty āśu sa svapna iti kathyate // Mo_4,19.31 //<br>
saḥ jīvadhātuḥ | anākrantendriyacchidraḥ antar eva akṣubdhaḥ 
bāhyakṣobharahitaḥ san | saṃvidā saṃvidākhyena dharmeṇa | svapne yat 
anubhavati jagadviṣayam anubhavaṃ karoti | paṇḍitaiḥ sa svapna iti 
kathyate || MoT_4,19.31 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
jāgrallakṣaṇaṃ kathayati<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;samākrantendriyacchidro yat kṣubdho bāhyasaṃvidā /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;paripaśyati taj jāgrad ity āhur matimattamāḥ // Mo_4,19.32 //<br>
atiśayena matimantaḥ matimattamāḥ | jāgratsvapnayor eva pṛṣṭatvāt tayor 
evehopasaṃhāre saṅgraheṇa lakṣaṇābhidhānam | na suṣupteḥ || MoT_4,19.32 
||<br>
<br>
<br>
sargāntaślokenaitad upasaṃharati<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;iti viditavatā tvayādhunāntaḥ<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;prathitamahāmatineha satyatāsthā /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;asati jagati naiva bhāvanīyā<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;mṛtihṛtisaṃsṛtidoṣabhāvanīyā // Mo_4,19.33 //<br>
iti evam | viditavatā jñātavatā | ata eva prathitā visṛtiṃ gatā | 
mahāmatiḥ yasya | tādṛśena tvayā | asati jagati adhunā antaḥ manasi | 
satyatāsthā satyam idam ity evaṃrūpā āsthā | na bhāvanīyā 
bhāvanāviṣayatāṃ na neyā | satyatāsthā kā | yā | mṛtiś ca hṛtiś ca 
saṃsṛtiś ca tāḥ mṛtihṛtisaṃsṛtayaḥ | tā eva doṣāḥ | tān bhāvayati 
sampādayatīti tādṛśī | bhavati | saṃsārasatyatāsthāyāṃ hi tadgatāḥ 
mṛtyādidoṣāḥ bādhante | tadasatyatāsthāyāṃ tu tā api asatyabhūtā eva kām
 bādhāṃ kartuṃ śaknuvanti | na hi vandhyāputraḥ kañcid bādhate | iti 
śivam || MoT_4,19.33 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
iti śrībhāskarakaṇṭhaviracitāyāṃ śrīmokṣopāyaṭīkāyāṃ sthitiprakaraṇe ekonaviṃśaḥ sargaḥ ||19||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
*********************************************************************<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
oṃ | evaṃ śrīrāmeṇa madhye pṛṣṭaṃ jāgradādisvarūpaṃ nirṇīya prakṛtam evānusandadhāti<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;etat te kathitaṃ sarvam manorūpanirūpaṇe /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;mayā rāghava nānyena kenacin nāma hetunā // Mo_4,20.1 //<br>
etat sarvam yo yathā yatate saḥ tathā bhavatīty etat samastam | mayā | 
he rāghava | manorūpanirūpaṇe manonirūpaṇanimittam | te kathitam | 
anyena hetunā na kathitam vyarthatvāt || MoT_4,20.1 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
manonirūpaṇam eva karoti<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;dṛḍhaniścayavac ceto yad bhāvayati bhūriśaḥ /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;tattāṃ yāty analāśleṣād ayaḥpiṇḍo 'gnitām iva // Mo_4,20.2 //<br>
bhūriśaḥ abhyāsena || MoT_4,20.2 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;bhāvābhāvagrahotsargadṛśaś cittena kalpitāḥ /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;nāsatyā nāpi satyās tā manaścāpalakāraṇāḥ // Mo_4,20.3 //<br>
manaścāpalam eva kāraṇaṃ yāsām | tāḥ manaścāpalakāraṇāḥ | 
manaścāpalakāraṇaṃ hi rajjusarpādikam arthakriyākāritvābhāvena na satyam
 bhavati | bhāsamānatvenāsatyaṃ ca na bhavati || MoT_4,20.3 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;mano hi hetuḥ kartṛ syāt kāraṇaṃ ca jagatsthiteḥ /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;viśvarūpatayaivedaṃ tanoti malinam manaḥ // Mo_4,20.4 //<br>
hi niścaye | manaḥ jagatsthiteḥ hetuḥ nimittakāraṇaṃ kartṛ | kartṛ 
kārakaḥ | kāraṇam samavāyikāraṇam asamavāyikāraṇaṃ ca | bhavati | yataḥ 
idam manaḥ malinam vāsanāmaladūṣitaṃ sat | viśvarūpatayā idam jagat | 
tanoti | nātrānyaḥ kaścit kārakatvaṃ yātīti bhāvaḥ | svapnasya cātra 
dṛṣṭāntatvaṃ sphuṭam eva || MoT_4,20.4 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;mano hi puruṣo rāma tan niyojyaṃ śubhe pathi /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;tajjayaikāntasādhyā hi sarvā jagati bhūtayaḥ // Mo_4,20.5 //<br>
niyojyam preraṇīyam | śubhe pathi vivekasvarūpe | hi yasmāt | jagati 
sarvāḥ vibhūtayaḥ bhogamokṣarūpāṇy aiśvaryāṇi | tasya manasaḥ | yaḥ 
jayaḥ śubhe pathi niyojanam | tena sādhyāḥ bhavanti || MoT_4,20.5 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
nanu śarīrasya puruṣatvena sthitatvāt kathaṃ cakṣuṣālabhyamānasya manasaḥ puruṣatvaṃ kathayasīty | atrāha<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;śarīraṃ cet śarīraṃ syāt kathaṃ śukro mahāmatiḥ /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;agamad vividham bhedam bahudehasamudbhavam // Mo_4,20.6 //<br>
śarīram sthūlaśrīram | śarīram lakṣaṇayā puruṣaḥ | cet syāt | tadā saḥ 
śukraḥ | bahudehebhyaḥ samudbhavaḥ yasya | tādṛśam vividham bhedam | 
katham agamat | śarīrasyaikenaiva rūpeṇa sthitatvāt || MoT_4,20.6 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
phalitaṃ kathayati<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;tasmāc cittaṃ hi puruṣaḥ puruṣaś cittam eva hi /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;yanmayaṃ ca bhavaty etat tad avāpnoty asaṃśayam // Mo_4,20.7 //<br>
hi niścaye | etat cittam | yanmayam yadviṣayānusandhānamayam || MoT_4,20.7 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
paramaphalitam āha<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;yad atuccham anāyāsam anupādhi gatabhramam /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;yatnāt tadanusandhānaṃ kuru tattāṃ ca yāsyasi // Mo_4,20.8 //<br>
ataḥ yat vastu | atuccham anāyāsam āyāsasādhyatārahitam | anupādhi tathā
 gatabhramam | bhavati | tvam tadanusandhānaṃ kuru | tataḥ tattām 
atucchatvādidharmarahitavastubhāvam | yāsyasi || MoT_4,20.8 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
sargāntaślokenāpy etad eva kathayati<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;abhipatati manaḥsthitiṃ śarīraṃ<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;na tu vapurācaritam manaḥ prayāti /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;abhipatatu tavātra tena satyaṃ<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;subhaga manaḥ prajahātv asatyam anyat // Mo_4,20.9 //<br>
spaṣṭam | iti śivam || MoT_4,20.9 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
iti śrībhāskarakaṇṭhaviracitāyāṃ śrīmokṣopāyaṭīkāyāṃ sthitiprakaraṇe viṃśaḥ sargaḥ ||20||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
*********************************************************************<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
atra śrīrāmaḥ pṛcchati<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;bhagavan sarvadharmajña saṃśayo me mahān ayam /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;hṛdi vyāvartate lolaḥ kallola iva sāgare // Mo_4,21.1 //<br>
vyāvartate sphurati || MoT_4,21.1 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;dikkālādyanavacchinne tate nitye nirāmaye /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;mlānā saṃvin manonāmnī kutaḥ keyam upasthitā // Mo_4,21.2 //<br>
dikkālādibhiḥ aparicchinne svaparicchedakasya paricchedaṃ kartum 
aśakyatvāt | ādiśabdena vastvādeḥ grahaṇam | tate vyāpake | nitye 
prākpradhvaṃsātyantābhāvarahite | nirāmaye kalanākhyarogarahite | mlānā 
saṅkalpavikalparūpatvena malinā | manonamnī | iyaṃ saṃvit saṃvidākhyaḥ 
spandaḥ | kutaḥ upasthitā | naitasyā upasthānam atra yuktam iti bhāvaḥ 
|| MoT_4,21.2 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;yasmād anyan na nāmāsti na bhūtaṃ na bhaviṣyati /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;kutaḥ kīdṛk kathaṃ tasya kalaṅkaḥ kutra vidyate // Mo_4,21.3 //<br>
yasmāt śuddhacinmātratattvāt | anyat bhinnaṃ vastu | nāma niścaye | 
nāsti na bhūtaṃ na bhaviṣyati | tasya kalaṅkaḥ manorūpaḥ kalaṅkaḥ | 
kutaḥ vidyate kīdṛk vidyate kathaṃ vidyate | kutra vidyate sarvathā 
sambhavānupapatteḥ na vidyate ity arthaḥ || MoT_4,21.3 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
śrīvasiṣṭhaḥ uttaraṃ kathayati<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;sādhu rāma tvayā proktaṃ jñātā te mokṣabhāginī /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;matir uttamaniḥṣyandā nandanasyeva mañjarī // Mo_4,21.4 //<br>
uttamaniḥṣyandā śreṣṭhapravāhā || MoT_4,21.4 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;pūrvāparavicārārthatatpareyam matis tava /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;samprāpsyati padam proccair yat prāptaṃ śaṅkarādibhiḥ // Mo_4,21.5 //<br>
pūrvāparavicārarūpaḥ yaḥ arthaḥ | tatra parā | proccaiḥ padam mokṣākhyaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ sthānam || MoT_4,21.5 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
tarhi matpraśnasyottaraṃ kathayety | atrāha<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;praśnasyāsya tu he rāma na kālas tava samprati /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;siddhāntaḥ kathyate yatra tatrāyam praśna ucyate // Mo_4,21.6 //<br>
mayāyam praśna ucyate kṛtottaraḥ sampādyate iti sambandhaḥ || MoT_4,21.6 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
nanu yadi siddhāntakāle 'sau praśnaḥ tava smṛtipathaṃ nāyāsyati tadā kiṃ kāryam ity | atrāha<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;siddhāntakāle bhavatā praṣṭavyo 'ham idam padam /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;karāmalakavat tena siddhāntas te bhaviṣyati // Mo_4,21.7 //<br>
karāmalakavat prayatnarahitam || MoT_4,21.7 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
nanv asmin samaya eva kathaṃ na kathayasīty | atrāha<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;siddhāntakāle praśnoktir eṣā tava virājate /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;prāvṛṣy eva hi kekoktir yuktā śaradi haṃsagīḥ // Mo_4,21.8 //<br>
spaṣṭam || MoT_4,21.8 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;sahajo nīlimā vyomni śobhate prāvṛṣaḥ kṣaye /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;prāvṛṣi tu danūdagrapayodapaṭalotthitaḥ // Mo_4,21.9 //<br>
prāvṛṣaḥ kṣaye śaradi | tu pakṣāntare | prāvṛṣi nīlimā śobhate | 
kathambhūtaḥ | danuvat dānavamātṛvat | udagraṃ yat payodapaṭalam | 
tasmād utthitaḥ jātaḥ || MoT_4,21.9 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
etad upasaṃhṛtya prakṛtam evānusarati<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;ayam prakṛta ārabdho manonirṇaya uttamaḥ /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;yadvaśāj janatājanma tad ākarṇaya suvrata // Mo_4,21.10 //<br>
ayam uttamaḥ manonirṇayaḥ asmābhiḥ ārabdhaḥ | kathambhūtaḥ | prakṛtaḥ 
prakaraṇavaśena prāptaḥ | enam eva śṛṇv iti bhāvaḥ | he suvrata | 
yadvaśāt janatājanma janasamūhajanma bhavati | tvam tad ākarṇaya śṛṇu | 
manonirṇayāṅgabhūtatvād iti bhāvaḥ || MoT_4,21.10 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
tad eva kathayati<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;evam prakṛtir eveyam manomananadharmiṇī /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;karmeti rāma nirṇītaṃ sarvair eva mumukṣubhiḥ // Mo_4,21.11 //<br>
he rāma | evaṃ sati | pūrvasargokte niścaye paramārthatayā sthite sati |
 manasaḥ yat mananam anusandhānākhyo vyāpāraḥ | taddharmiṇī tatsvarūpiṇī
 | iyam prakṛtiḥ eva jagadupādānarūpā mūlaprakṛtir eva | sarvaiḥ 
mumukṣubhiḥ karmeti nirṇītam | manomananam eva karmeti piṇḍārthaḥ || 
MoT_4,21.11 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;śṛṇu lakṣaṇabhedena tan nānāmatatāṃ katham /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;vāgmināṃ vadatāṃ yātaṃ citrābhiḥ śāstradṛṣṭibhiḥ // Mo_4,21.12 //<br>
tvaṃ śṛṇu | tat manomananarūpaṃ karma | lakṣaṇabhedena | vāgminām 
vādinām | nānāmatatām | kathaṃ yātam | tad eva kathayāmīti bhāvaḥ | 
vāgminām kathambhūtānām | citrābhiḥ nānāvidhābhiḥ | śāstradṛṣṭibhiḥ 
śāstrarūpābhiḥ dṛṣṭibhiḥ | vadatāṃ vivādaṃ kurvatām | anyathā matabhedo 
na syāt || MoT_4,21.12 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
tad eva kathayati<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;yaṃ yam bhāvam upādatte mano mananacañcalam /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;taṃ tam eti ghanāmodamadhyasthaḥ pavano yathā // Mo_4,21.13 //<br>
mananena mananākhyena dharmeṇa | cañcalam nānāpadārthayāyi | manaḥ | yaṃ
 yam bhāvam śubham aśubhaṃ vā padārthamananodbhūtaṃ vāsanāviśeṣam | 
upādatte gṛhṇāti | taṃ tam eti tattadanusandhānamayo bhavatīty arthaḥ | 
ko yathā | pavanaḥ yathā | yathā ghanāmodamadhyasthaḥ pavanaḥ āmodam eti
 | tathety arthaḥ || MoT_4,21.13 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;tatas tam eva nirṇīya tam eva ca vikalpayan /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;antas tayā rañjanayā rañjayan svām ahaṅkṛtim // Mo_4,21.14 //<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;tanniścayam upādāya tatraiva rasam ṛcchati /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;tanmayatvaṃ śarīre tu tato buddhīndriyeṣv api // Mo_4,21.15 //<br>
tataḥ tat manaḥ | tam eva bhāvam | nirṇīyānusandhāya | tathā niścitya | 
tam eva ca na tv anyat | vikalpayan punaḥ punaḥ parāmṛśan | tayā 
tadbhāvarūpayā | rañjanayā rāgadravyeṇa | svām ahaṅkṛtim nijām 
ahaṅkāravṛttim | rañjayan uparaktāṃ kurvan | mama kadā etat syāt iti 
parāmṛśann iti yāvat | tataḥ tanniścayam tasya bhāvasya niścayam | 
camatkārakāri idam ity evaṃrūpaṃ niścayam | upādāya | tatraiva tasmin 
śubhe aśubhe vā vāsanāviśeṣe eva | rasam āsvādam | āsaktim iti yāvat | 
ṛcchati gacchati | tataḥ tadanantaram | tu niścaye | śarīre tanmayatvam 
bhavati | anyathā tatsvarūpe bāhye padārthe pravṛttiparihārarūpāyāḥ 
ceṣṭāyā asambhavāt na kevalaṃ śarīre eva kiṃ tu buddhīndriyeṣv api 
tanmayatvam bhavati | anyathā teṣām api tatra punaḥ punaḥ 
svakriyākāritvāyogāt | karmendriyāṇāṃ tu śarīreṇaiva grahaṇam | tathā hi
 | bāhye puruṣaḥ prathamaṃ kapitthādikam bhuṅkte | tataḥ tasya manaḥ 
tasya phalasya vāsanām antaḥ dhārayati | tataḥ vāsanārūpasya 
tasyaivānusandhānam punaḥ punaḥ karoti | tataḥ vāsanārūpeṇa tena svām 
ahaṅkṛtiṃ rañjayati | tataḥ tadāśritāni buddhīndriyāṇy api tad eva 
pratisammukhāni bhavanti | tataḥ tadāśrayaṃ śarīraṃ tat praty eva ceṣṭāṃ
 karotīti | yugmam || MoT_4,21.14-15||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
nanu kutaḥ etad ity | atrāha<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;yanmayaṃ hi mano rāma dehas tadanu tadvaśāt /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;tattām āyāti gandhāntaḥ pavano gandhatām iva // Mo_4,21.16 //<br>
yanmayam yadbhāvamayam | tattām tanmayatām || MoT_4,21.16 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;buddhīndriyeṣu valgatsu karmendriyagaṇas tataḥ /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;sphurati svata evorvīrajo lola ivānile // Mo_4,21.17 //<br>
sphurati svāṃ kriyām prati sammukhībhavati | svata eva preraṇāṃ vinā | 
karmendriyagaṇaḥ kim iva | urvīraja iva | yathā urvīrajaḥ anile lole 
sati | svata eva sphurati | tathety arthaḥ || MoT_4,21.17 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;karmendriyagaṇe kṣubdhe svaśaktim prathayaty alam /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;karma niṣpadyate sphāram pāṃsujālam ivānilāt // Mo_4,21.18 //<br>
svaśaktim svakāryam prati nijaṃ sāmarthyam | prathayati vistārayati | 
karma viṣayādānarūpaṃ karma | niṣpadyate sampadyate || MoT_4,21.18 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
phalitaṃ kathayati<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;evaṃ hi manasaḥ karma karmabījam manaḥ smṛtam /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;abhinnaiva tayoḥ sattā yathā kusumagandhayoḥ // Mo_4,21.19 //<br>
evaṃ hi sati | manasaḥ manaḥsakāśāt | karma utpadyate iti śeṣaḥ | 
paṇḍitaiḥ | manaḥ | karmaiva bījam yasya | tat | tādṛśam | smṛtam | 
karmaṇaḥ manaḥ utpadyate iti bhāvaḥ | phalitam āhābhinneti | ataḥ etayoḥ
 karmamanasoḥ | sattā abhinnaiva bhavati | kayoḥ yathā | kusumagandhayoḥ
 yathā | na hi mano'nuvṛttiṃ vinā śarīrāśrayam bāhyam api karma 
sampadyate | na ca hi karmasādhitavāsanāmātrarūpatāṃ vinā mano nāma 
kiñcid astīti bhāvaḥ || MoT_4,21.19 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;yādṛśam bhāvam ādatte dṛḍhābhyāsavaśān manaḥ /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;tathā spando 'sya karmākhyas tathā śākhā vimuñcati // Mo_4,21.20 //<br>
yādṛśam śubham aśubhaṃ vā | śākhāḥ saṅkalparūpāḥ || MoT_4,21.20 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;tathā kriyāṃ tatphaladāṃ niṣpādayati cādarāt /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;tatas tad eva cāsvādam anubhūyāśu badhyate // Mo_4,21.21 //<br>
śarīradvāreṇeti śeṣaḥ | tad eva bhāvaviṣayīkṛtaṃ vastv eva | badhyate 
ghanataraṃ tadvāsanāviṣṭo bhavatīty arthaḥ || MoT_4,21.21 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
punar apy etad eva kathayati<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;yaṃ yam bhāvam upādatte tat tad vastv iti vindati /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;tac chreyo 'nyat tu nāstīti niścayo 'sya prajāyate // Mo_4,21.22 //<br>
vastu satyabhūtam || MoT_4,21.22 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;dharmārthakāmamokṣārtham prayatante sadaiva hi /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;manāṃsi dṛḍhabhāvāni pratipattyā svayaiva hi // Mo_4,21.23 //<br>
svayā pratipattyā na tu parapreraṇayā || MoT_4,21.23 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
yadartham iyam prakriyā kṛtā tad eva kathayati<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;manobhiḥ kāpilānāṃ tu pratipattiṃ nijām alam /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;urarīkṛtya nirṇīya kalpitāḥ śāstradṛṣṭayaḥ // Mo_4,21.24 //<br>
kāpilānām kapilānusāriṇām | sāṅkhyānām iti yāvat | manobhiḥ | nijām 
pratipattim niścayam | urarīkṛtya |śāstradṛṣṭayaḥ 
prakṛtipuruṣapratipādikāḥ śāstradṛṣṭayaḥ | kalpitāḥ || MoT_4,21.24 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
kāpilān eva viśinaṣṭi<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;mokṣe tu nānyathā prāptir iti bhāvitacetasaḥ /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;svāṃ dṛṣṭim pravivṛṇvantaḥ sthitāḥ svaniyamabhramaiḥ // Mo_4,21.25 //<br>
bhāvitam bhāvanāyuktam | cetaḥ yeṣām | te | svena kṛtā ye niyamabhramāḥ |
 taiḥ | eṣām api manovaśād eva matabhedo 'stīti bhāvaḥ || MoT_4,21.25 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;vedāntavādino buddhyā brahmedam iti dṛḍhayā /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;yuktiṃ śamadamopetāṃ nirṇīya parikalpya ca // Mo_4,21.26 //<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;muktau tu nānyathā prāptir iti bhāvitacetasaḥ /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;svāṃ dṛṣṭim pravivṛṇvantaḥ sthitāḥ svaniyamabhramaiḥ // Mo_4,21.27 //<br>
yuktim śravaṇādirūpam upāyam || MoT_4,21.26-27 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;vijñānavādino buddhyā sphuratsvabhramarūpayā /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;svāṃ dṛṣṭim pravivṛṇvanti svair eva niyamabhramaiḥ // Mo_4,21.28 //<br>
vijñānavādinaḥ vijñānādvaitavādinaḥ bauddhāḥ | svāṃ dṛṣṭim vijñānam 
evedam itirūpām | pravivṛṇvanti prakaṭīkurvanti || MoT_4,21.28 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;ārhatādibhir anyaiś ca svayābhimatayecchayā /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;citrāś citrasamācārāḥ kalpitāḥ śāstradṛṣṭayaḥ // Mo_4,21.29 //<br>
ādiśabdena cārvākādīnāṃ grahaṇam || MoT_4,21.29 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;nirnimittotthasaumyāmbubudbudaughair ivotthitaiḥ /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;svaniścayair iti prauḍhā nānākārā hi rītayaḥ // Mo_4,21.30 //<br>
nirnimittotthāḥ ye saumyāmbubudbudaughāḥ | tair iva akasmād | utthitair | ity arthaḥ | rītayaḥ śāstrarītayaḥ || MoT_4,21.30 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;sarvāsām eva caitāsāṃ rītīnām eka ākaraḥ /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;mano nāma mahābāho maṇīnām iva sāgaraḥ // Mo_4,21.31 //<br>
sarvāsām sāṅkhyādipraṇītānām | ākaraḥ utpattisthānam || MoT_4,21.31 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;na nimbekṣū kaṭusvādū śītoṣṇau nendupāvakau /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;yad yathā manasābhyastam upalabdhaṃ tathaiva tat // Mo_4,21.32 //<br>
kaṭusvādū tiktamadhurau | anyathā cittavṛttibhedena heyopādeyatvaṃ na 
syāt | yad eva hi yasya heyatvena sthitaṃ tad evānyasyopādeyatayā || 
MoT_4,21.32 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
phalitaṃ kathayati<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;yas tv akṛtrima ānandas tadartham prayateta na vai /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;manas tanmayatāṃ neyaṃ tenāsau samavāpyate // Mo_4,21.33 //<br>
ata ity adhyāhāryam | yataḥ kasmiṃścid api bāhye vastuni svabhāvena 
svādutā nāsti | ataḥ yaḥ akṛtrimaḥ bhogādiviṣayanirapekṣatvena 
sthitatvāt svābhāvikaḥ | ānandaḥ svātmarūpaḥ ānandaḥ | bhavati | puruṣaḥ
 tadartham | vai niścaye | yateta | nanu kena yatnenāsau prāpyate ity | 
atrāha mana iti | puruṣeṇa manaḥ saṅkalpātmakaṃ cittam | tanmayatām 
svātmabhūtānandarūpatām | neyam | adhyātmaśāstropadiṣṭamārgeṇa 
tatparāmarśaikapravaṇaṃ kāryam ity arthaḥ | tena manasaḥ 
tanmayatvanayanamātreṇa yatnenāsau akṛtrimaḥ ānandaḥ | prāpyate || 
MoT_4,21.33 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
nanu sukhaduḥkhavaśīkṛtam manaḥ kathaṃ tanmayatāṃ neyam ity | atrāha<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;dṛśyaṃ saṃsāraḍimbasthaṃ tuccham parijahan manaḥ /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;tajjābhyāṃ sukhaduḥkhābhyāṃ nāvaśaḥ parikṛṣyate // Mo_4,21.34 //<br>
saṃsāra eva ḍimbaḥ bālaḥ | tatra tiṣṭhatīti tādṛśam | dṛśyam 
dṛśikriyāviṣayam bhāvajātam | jahat svaunmukhyāviṣayatāṃ nayat | manaḥ |
 tajjābhyām dṛśyotpannābhyām | sukhaduḥkhābhyām | nāvaśaḥ parikṛṣyate na
 balātkāreṇāsvādhīnīkriyate | avaśa iti āviṣṭaliṅgam || MoT_4,21.34 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
nanu dṛśye ko doṣo 'stīty | atrāha<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;apavitram asadrūpam mohanam bhayakāraṇam /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;dṛśyam ābhāsam ābhogi bandham mā bhāvayānagha // Mo_4,21.35 //<br>
anagha | dṛśyabhāvanānarhatvaṃ dṛśyam mā bhāvaya mano'nusandhānaviṣayam 
mā kuru | kimarthaṃ na bhāvayāmīty apekṣāyāṃ viśeṣaṇāny āha apavitram 
ityādi | apavitram rāgādirūpapāpotpādakatvāt pavitratārahitam | 
asadrūpam kiṃrūpam iti vicārāsahatvāt pāramārthikasattārahitam | mohanam
 anātmany ātmatvarūpamohotpādakam | bhayakāraṇam 
mṛtyādyupādānabhayahetum | ābhāsam ābhāsamātrasvarūpam | na tu vastutayā
 sthitam | ābhogi vistārayuktam | bandham ātmajñānam prati rodhakatvāt 
bandhasvarūpam || MoT_4,21.35 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;māyaiṣā sā hy avidyaiṣā bhāvanaiṣā bhayāvahā /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;saṃvidas tanmayatvaṃ yat tat karmeti vidur budhāḥ // Mo_4,21.36 //<br>
eṣā dṛśyabhāvanā | sā svasiddhā | māyā bhavati | eṣā avidyā bhavati | 
eṣā bhayāvahā bhāvanā vāsanā | bhavati | nanu tarhi karma kiṃrūpam 
astīty | atrāha saṃvida iti | saṃvidaḥ manorūpāyāḥ saṃvidaḥ | 
tanmayatvam dṛśyamayatvam | yad bhavati | budhāḥ tat karmeti viduḥ | 
karmāpi eṣaiveti bhāvaḥ || MoT_4,21.36 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
nanu manaḥ kiṃrūpam asti yena kṛtā dṛśyabhāvanā māyādināmatvenoktety | atrāha<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;draṣṭur dṛśyaikatānatvaṃ viddhi tvam mohanam manaḥ /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;bhramāyaiva ca tan mithyā mahīmakkolakarmavat // Mo_4,21.37 //<br>
draṣṭuḥ dṛśikriyākartuḥ | dṛśyaikatānatvam dṛśyam prati sammukhatām | 
mohanam mohakāri | mano viddhi | tat bhramāya bhramotpādāya sat | mithyā
 bhavati | ābhāsamātratvena vastusat na bhavatīty arthaḥ | katham | 
mahyām mṛttikāyām | makkolakarma sudhālepaḥ | tadvat | yathā mṛttikāyāṃ 
kṛtasudhālepaḥ vastutaḥ san nāsti | mṛttikāyāḥ eva tathā sthitatvāt 
sudhāyāḥ lepatayaiva bhāvāt | tathā cinmātre bhāsamānam manaḥ vastutaḥ 
nāsti cinmātrasyaiva tathā sthitatvāt ity arthaḥ || MoT_4,21.37 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
nanu kathaṃ draṣṭṛdṛśyaikatānatārūpam manaḥ mithyārūpam astīty | atrāha<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;dṛśyatanmayatā yaiṣā svabhāvasyānubhūyate /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;saṃsāramadirā seyam avidyety ucyate budhaiḥ // Mo_4,21.38 //<br>
asmābhiḥ | svabhāvasya draṣṭṛrūpasya svabhāvasya | yā dṛśyatanmayatā 
dṛśyaikatānatā | dṛśyate | budhaiḥ sā iyam bhramotpādakatvāt 
saṃsāramadirārūpā avidyeti ucyate | ato manaḥ avidyārūpam evāvastubhūtam
 ity arthaḥ || MoT_4,21.38 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
ko 'narthaḥ anayāvidyayā kriyate ity | atrāha<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;anayopahato lokaḥ kalyāṇaṃ nādhigacchati /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;bhāsvaraṃ tapanālokam paṭalāndhekṣaṇo yathā // Mo_4,21.39 //<br>
anayā draṣṭuḥ dṛśyatanmayatārūpayā | avidyayā | kalyāṇam svātmani viśrāntirūpam | paṭalam netrarogaviśeṣaḥ || MoT_4,21.39 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
nanu sā kuta utpadyata ity | atrāha<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;svayam utpadyate sā ca saṅkalpād vyomavṛkṣavat /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;asaṅkalpanamātreṇa svayam eva vinaśyati // Mo_4,21.40 //<br>
utpadyate prādurbhavati | nanu sā kathaṃ naśyati ity | 
atrāhāsaṅkalpanamātreti | asaṅkalpanamātreṇa saṅkalpākaraṇamātreṇa | ata
 evāha svayam iti | na hi asaṅkalpanaṃ yatnaḥ | api tu saṅkalpanam eva 
|| MoT_4,21.40 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
nanv avidyānāśena kiṃ sampadyate ity | atrāha<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;asaṅkalpanamātreṇa bhāvanāyām mahāmate /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;kṣīṇāyāṃ svaprasādena vimarśena vilāsinā // Mo_4,21.41 //<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;asaṃsaṅge padārtheṣu sarveṣu sthiratāṃ gate /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;satyadṛṣṭau prasannāyām asatye kṣayam āgate // Mo_4,21.42 //<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;nirvikalpacid acchātmā sa ātmā samavāpyate /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;nāsattā yasya no sattā na sukhaṃ nāpi duḥkhitā // Mo_4,21.43 //<br>
bhāvanāyām avidyāyām | vimarśena svātmavicāreṇa | kathambhūtena | 
svaprasādena svātmaprasādenotpanneneti śeṣaḥ | punaḥ kathambhūtena | 
vilāsinā vistārayuktena | asaṃsaṅge anāsaktau | satyaviṣayā dṛṣṭiḥ 
satyadṛṣṭiḥ | tasyām prasannāyām | siddhāyām iti yāvat | asatye 
asatyabhūte dṛśye ity arthaḥ | ātmā kathambhūtaḥ | nirvikalpaḥ 
dṛśyaviṣayavikalpaniṣkrāntā yā cit tadrūpaḥ | acchaḥ ātmā svarūpaṃ yasya
 | tādṛśaḥ | na tu acidrūpadehādisvarūpa ity arthaḥ | ato nāvidyānāśasya
 vaiphalyam iti bhāvaḥ | kīdṛśo 'sāv ātmety apekṣāyām āha nāsatteti | 
yasya ātmanaḥ | asattā na bhavati | sarveṣām ātmatvena sphuraṇāt | na hi
 kaścin nāham asmīti bravīti | bruvāṇaś copahāsapātram eva | tathā sattā
 no bhavati | bāhyāntaḥkaraṇāviṣayatvāt śaśaśṛṅgavat | sukham lakṣaṇayā 
sukhitā | na bhavati | sukhāder antaḥkaraṇādhikaraṇatvād | anyathā 
suṣuptādāv api bhānaprasaṅgāt | duḥkhitā duḥkhādhikaraṇatvam | na 
bhavati | proktahetoḥ || MoT_4,21.41-43 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
punaḥ kiṃ tatrāsti ity | atrāha<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;kevalaṃ kevalībhāvo yasyāntar upalabhyate /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;abhavyayā bhāvanayā na cittendriyadṛṣṭibhiḥ // Mo_4,21.44 //<br>
samyagjñānayuktena puruṣeṇa | yasyātmanaḥ | antaḥ svabhittau | 
kevalībhāvaḥ śuddhacinmātratāṃ vinā samastābhāvaḥ | kevalaṃ labhyate | 
upacārāl labhyate ity uktiḥ | labdhaikarūpasya labhyatāyogāt | 
paramārthas tu labhyānapekṣam | labdhṛtvam api tatra na yuktam ity alam 
vikalpāpādikayā vācā | tanmuvraṇayā vā abhavyayā bhāvanayā na labhyate |
 cittendriyadṛṣṭibhiś ca na labhyate || MoT_4,21.44 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;ātmano 'nanyabhūtābhir api yaḥ parivarjitaḥ /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;vāsanābhir anantābhir vyomeva vanarājibhiḥ // Mo_4,21.45 //<br>
yaḥ ātmā | ātmanaḥ ananyabhūtābhir api svasvarūpabhūtābhir api | 
vāsanābhiḥ parivarjitaḥ bhavati | śuddhacinmātrasvarūpatvāt | vāsanānāṃ 
cātmarūpatvaṃ tadviṣayatvaṃ vināsiddhabhāvaprayuktam eva jñeyam | na hi 
cinmātrāviṣayīkṛtā vāsanā vāsanā bhavati | viṣayīkṛtiś ca svasambandhina
 eva yuktā | sambandhaś ca vicāritaḥ san ekatāyāṃ viśrāmyati | dvitve tu
 virodhalabdhasiddheḥ dvitvād eva sambandhānupapatteḥ | na hi 
viruddhayoḥ tamaḥprakāśayoḥ sambandhaḥ yukta ity alam bahunā | yaḥ kim 
iva | vyoma iva | yathā vyoma vanarājibhiḥ parivarjitaḥ bhavati | 
tathety arthaḥ || MoT_4,21.45 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
nanu yadi kevalaḥ sa evātmāsti tarhi dṛśyarūpaḥ bandhaḥ kuta āgata ity | atrāha<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;sandigdhāyāṃ yathā rajjvāṃ sarpatvaṃ tadvad eva hi /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;cidākāśātmanā bandhas tv abaddhenaiva kalpitaḥ // Mo_4,21.46 //<br>
yathā puruṣeṇa sandigdhāyāṃ rajjvāṃ sarpatvam kalpyate | hi niścaye | 
tadvad eva cidākāśātmanā cidākāśasvarūpeṇātmanā | abaddhenaiva satā |
