bandhaḥ dṛśyākhyo bandhaḥ | kalpitaḥ kalpanayā sampāditaḥ || MoT_4,21.46
 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
nanu kalpita eṣa bandhaḥ kathaṃ naśyatīty | atrāha<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;kalpitaṃ kalpitaṃ vastu pratikalpanayānyayā /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;tad evānyatvam ādatte kham ahorātrayor iva // Mo_4,21.47 //<br>
kalpitaṃ kalpitaṃ vastu sarvaṃ kalpitavastu | anyayā svasmād bhinnayā | 
pratikalpanayā | tad eva sat | anyatām ādatte | kim iva | kham iva | 
yathā kham ahorātrayoḥ tad eva sat anyatām ādatte | tathety arthaḥ | 
ataḥ pratikalpanayaiva kalpitasya nāśa iti bhāvaḥ || MoT_4,21.47 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
nanv atucchatvādiguṇaviśiṣṭaḥ kalpito nāstīti kathaṃ saḥ kalpyate yena 
tucchatvādiguṇaviśiṣṭasaṃsārakalpanā naśyati | na ca kalpanāṃ vinā 
kalpanāyāḥ nāśaḥ śakyakriyaḥ ayasaḥ ivāyo vinety | atrāha<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;yad atuccham anāyāsam anupādhi gatabhramam /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;tat tatkalpanayā tādṛk tat sukhāyaiva kalpate // Mo_4,21.48 //<br>
yat vastu | atuccham tucchaguṇarahitam | anāyāsam āyāsasādhyatvarahitam |
 anupādhi upādhitvenābhimatasyāpi tattāvyabhicārāt upādhirahitam | 
gatabhramam śuddhasatyabodhasvarūpatvāt bhramasparśarahitam | bhavati | 
tat tad vastu | tatkalpanayā tasyātucchatvādeḥ kalpanayā eva | tādṛk 
atucchādirūpam | bhavati | śuddhe svarūpe 
tucchatvātucchatvādisāpekṣaśabdāvakāśābhāvāt | nanu tarhi tad api heyam 
evety | atrāha tat sukhāyaiveti | tat atucchatvādiguṇakaṃ vastu kalpitam
 api | sukhāyaiva tucchatvātucchatvarahitaśuddhasvarūpaviśrāntaya eva | 
bhavati | tathā cātucchatvādiguṇakakalpanayā pratipakṣabhūtayā 
tucchatvādiguṇakakalpanā nāśayituṃ śākyeti bhāvaḥ || MoT_4,21.48 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
nanu satyabhūtasya dṛśyarūpasya bandhasya kathaṃ kalpanāmātreṇa nāśaḥ śakyakriyaḥ ity | atrāha<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;śūnya eva kusūle 'ntaḥ siṃho 'stīti bhayaṃ yathā /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;śūnya eva śarīre 'ntar baddho 'smīti bhayaṃ tathā // Mo_4,21.49 //<br>
kusūlaḥ siṃhabandhanārthaṃ yantrarūpaṃ koṣṭhakam | dṛśyarūpo bandhaḥ 
satyo 'pi bhavatu | tathāpi paramārthataḥ śuddhacidrūpasya bhavataḥ saḥ 
bandhakārī na bhavati | na hy ambaraṃ rajjubhiḥ badhyate iti bhāvaḥ || 
MoT_4,21.49 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;yathā śūnye kusūle 'ntaḥ prekṣya siṃho na labhyate /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;tathā saṃsārabandhārhaḥ prekṣitaḥ san na labhyate // Mo_4,21.50 //<br>
spaṣṭam || MoT_4,21.50 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
nanu tarhi idaṃ jagat ayam aham ity evam bandhabadhyarūpā pratītiḥ katham astīty | atrāha<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;idaṃ jagad ayaṃ cāham itīyam bhrāntir utthitā /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;bālānāṃ śyāmale kāle chāyā vaitālikī yathā // Mo_4,21.51 //<br>
śyāmale kāle rātrau | idaṃ jagat ayam aham ity evaṃrūpā pratītiḥ | bhrāntir evotthitā bhavati iti piṇḍārthaḥ || MoT_4,21.51 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
nanu etādṛśī bhrāntiḥ katham utthitety | atrāha<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;kalpanāvaśato jantor bhāvābhāvāḥ śubhāśubhāḥ /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;kṣaṇād asattām āyānti sattām api punaḥ punaḥ // Mo_4,21.52 //<br>
kalpanāvaśataḥ svavikalpavaśataḥ || MoT_4,21.52 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
etad eva viśeṣataḥ kathayati<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;mātaiva gṛhiṇībhāvagṛhītā kaṇṭhalambinī /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;karoti gṛhiṇīkāryaṃ suratānandadāyinī // Mo_4,21.53 //<br>
bhrameṇeti śeṣaḥ || MoT_4,21.53 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;kāntaiva mātṛbhāvena gṛhītākaṇṭhalambinī /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;dūraṃ vismārayaty eva manmathonmādabhāvanām // Mo_4,21.54 //<br>
ihāpi bhrameṇeti śeṣaḥ | iyaṃ cāvasthā madhyamapāpiprabhṛtīnāṃ jñeyā | mahāpāpināṃ tu atrāpi ratir eva jāyate || MoT_4,21.54 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
phalitam āha<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;bhāvānusāriphaladam padārthaugham avekṣya ca /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;na jñeneha padārtheṣu rūpam ekam udīryate // Mo_4,21.55 //<br>
jñena padārthatattvajñena puruṣeṇa | padārthaugham bhāvānusāriphalaṃ 
dadātīti tādṛśam | avekṣya | iha loke | padārtheṣv ekaṃ rūpaṃ na 
udīryate na kathyate || MoT_4,21.55 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;dṛḍhabhāvanayā ceto yad yathā bhāvayaty alam /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;tat tatphalaṃ tadākāraṃ tāvatkālam prapaśyati // Mo_4,21.56 //<br>
cetaḥ | yat vastu | dṛḍhabhāvanayā yathā bhāvayati anusandhatte | 
tatphalam bhāvanāphalabhūtam | tat | tadākāram | tāvatkālam tasmin 
samaye | prapaśyati | svapnaś cātra dṛṣṭāntatvena jñeyaḥ || MoT_4,21.56 
||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
siddhāntaṃ kathayati<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;na tad asti na yat satyaṃ na tad asti na yan mṛṣā /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;yad yathā yena nirṇītaṃ tat tathā tena lakṣyate // Mo_4,21.57 //<br>
nirṇīṭam bhāvitam | anyathā ekam eva vastu ekasya harṣadam anyasya duḥkhadaṃ na syād iti bhāvaḥ || MoT_4,21.57 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;bhāvitākāśamātaṅgaṃ vyomahastitayā manaḥ /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;vyomakānanamātaṅgīṃ vyomasthām anudhāvati // Mo_4,21.58 //<br>
bhāvitākāśamātaṅgam sat | manaḥ | vyomahastitayā vyomahastibhāvena | 
vyomahastī bhūtveti yāvat | vyomakānanamātaṅgīm anudhāvati | 
kathambhūtām | kānanādhārabhūte vyomni tiṣṭhatīti tādṛśīm || MoT_4,21.58
 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
paramaphalitam āha<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;tasmāt saṅkalpam eva tvaṃ sarvabhāvamayātmakam /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;tyaja rāghava susvasthaḥ svātmanaiva bhavātmani // Mo_4,21.59 //<br>
sarvabhāvamayaḥ sarvapadārthasvarūpaḥ | ātmā yasya | tat | saṅkalpa eva 
hi bahiḥ nānākāraiḥ sphurati | tyaja mā prādurbhāvaya | prādurbhūte 'pi 
upekṣām eva kurv ity arthaḥ | na hi sarvathā tyāgaḥ videhamuktiṃ yāvat 
śakyakriyaḥ || MoT_4,21.59 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
nanu katham āgacchantaṃ saṅkalpaṃ tyajāmīty | atrāha<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;maṇir hi pratibimbānām pratiṣedhakriyām prati /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;aśakto jaḍabhāvena na tu rāma bhavādṛśaḥ // Mo_4,21.60 //<br>
jaḍabhāvena jaḍatayā | bhavādṛśaḥ tvādṛkcetanaḥ | saṅkalpatyāgo hi 
saṃvedanasādhyaḥ | tac ca tavāsty eveti bhāvaḥ || MoT_4,21.60 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
tyāgopāyaṃ kathayati<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;yad yan manomaṇau rāma taveha pratibimbati /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;tad avastv iti nirṇīya mā tenāgaccha rañjanām // Mo_4,21.61 //<br>
rañjanām uparaktatvam || MoT_4,21.61 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
upāyāntaraṃ kathayati<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;tad eva satyam iti vāpy abhinnam paramātmanaḥ /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;manvānas tvam anādyantam bhāvayātmānam ātmanā // Mo_4,21.62 //<br>
sarvasya paramātmanaḥ abhinnatvabhāvanena hi anādyantātmabhāvanam eva sampadyate || MoT_4,21.62 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;cetasi pratibimbanti ye bhāvās tava rāghava /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;rañjayantv anyasaktātman mā te tvāṃ sphaṭikaṃ yathā // Mo_4,21.63 //<br>
he rāghava | kathambhūta | anyasmin bhāvebhyaḥ bhinnasvarūpe paramātmani
 | saktaḥ ātmā manaḥ yasya | tādṛśa | anyathā 
pratibimbitabhāvarañjanābhāvo na yukta iti bhāvaḥ | tvām kaṃ yathā | 
sphaṭikaṃ yathā | yathā anyarāgayuktaṃ sphaṭikam anyarāgakṛtā rañjanā na
 rañjayati | tathety arthaḥ || MoT_4,21.63 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
nanu kathaṃ rañjanābhāvo dehaṃ tāvat śakya ity | atra sargāntaślokena kathayati<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;sphaṭikam apamalaṃ yathā viśanti<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;prakaṭatayā navarañjanā vicitrāḥ /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;iha hi vimananaṃ tathā viśantu<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;prakaṭatayā bhuvaṇaiṣaṇā bhavantam // Mo_4,21.64 //<br>
vimananam mananākhyamanodharmarahitam | yathā nirmalaṃ sphaṭikaṃ 
vicitrāḥ rañjanā viśanti | tathā mananāparaparyāyānusandhānarāhityena 
śuddham bhavantam api padārthasaṅkalpanārūpāḥ rañjanā viśantv iti 
piṇḍārthaḥ | lepākāriṇī rañjanā yady āyāti tadā na kācid dhānir iti 
bhāvaḥ | iti śivam || MoT_4,21.64 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
iti śrībhāskarakaṇṭhaviracitāyāṃ śrīmokṣopāyaṭīkāyāṃ sthitiprakaraṇe ekaviṃśaḥ sargaḥ ||21||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
*********************************************************************<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
pūrvoktam evārthaṃ sthitiprakaraṇavācyatayā sthitatvāt punar api kathayati<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;jantoḥ kṛtavicārasya vigaladvṛtticetasaḥ /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;mananaṃ tyajato jñatvāt kiñcit parigatātmanaḥ // Mo_4,22.1 //<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;dṛśyaṃ santyajato heyam upādeyam upeyuṣaḥ /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;draṣṭāram paśyato dṛśyam adraṣṭāram apaśyataḥ // Mo_4,22.2 //<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;asuptasya pare tattve jāgarūkasya jīvataḥ /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;suptasya ghanasammohamaye saṃsāravartmani // Mo_4,22.3 //<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;paryantātyantavairasyād araseṣu raseṣv api /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;bhogeṣv ābhogaramyeṣu nīrasasya nirāśiṣaḥ // Mo_4,22.4 //<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;vrajaty ātmāmbhasaikatvaṃ jīrṇajāḍye manasy alam /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;galaty apagatāsaṅge himapūra ivātape // Mo_4,22.5 //<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;taraṅgitāsu kallolajālalolāntarāsu ca /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;śāmyantīṣv atha tṛṣṇāsu nadīṣv iva ghanātyaye // Mo_4,22.6 //<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;saṃsāravāsanājāle khagajāla ivākhunā /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;troṭite cādṛḍhagranthiśleṣe vairasyaraṃhasā // Mo_4,22.7 //<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;katakam phalam āsādya yathā vāri prasīdati /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;tathā vijñānavaśataḥ svabhāvaḥ samprasīdati // Mo_4,22.8 //<br>
jantoḥ puruṣasya | vijñānavaśataḥ śuddhātmajñānavaśena | svabhāvaḥ 
svasvarūpam | tathā prasīdati nirmalībhavati | tathā katham | yathā 
katakam phalam āsādya vāri prasīdati | keṣu satsu prasīdatīty apekṣāyām 
āha vrajaty ātmetyādi | apagatāsaṅge naṣṭāsaktyākhyadoṣe | jīrṇajāḍye 
jāḍyanirgate | ata eva galati galanonmukhe | manasi | ātmāmbhasā 
paramātmākhyajalena saha | ekatvaṃ vrajati sati | kasminn iva | ātape 
tāpadeśe | sthite himapūre iva | punaḥ kāsu satīṣu | atha tadanantaram |
 tṛṣṇāsu śāmyantīṣu satīṣu | kathambhūtāsu | taraṅgitāsu vṛddhiyuktāsu |
 kallolajālaiḥ vikalpasvarūpaiḥ kallolasamūhaiḥ | lolam antaram yāsām | 
tāḥ | tādṛśīṣu | kāsv iva | nadīṣv iva | yathā tāḥ ghanātyaye śaradi | 
śāmyanti | tathety arthaḥ | punaḥ kasmin sati | saṃsāravāsanājāle 
vairasyaraṃhasā ākhunā iva khagajāle troṭite sati | kathambhūte | 
adṛḍhaḥ | granthīnām kāmādirūpāṇāṃ granthīnām | śleṣaḥ sambandhaḥ yasya |
 tādṛśe | jantoḥ kathambhūtasya | kṛtaḥ vicāraḥ ko 'haṃ kasya saṃsāra 
ity evaṃrūpaḥ vivekaḥ yena | tādṛśasya | vigaladvṛtticetaḥ yasya | 
tādṛśasya | jñasyaiva hi mananatyāge śaktir astīti jñatvād ity uktam | 
kiñcit parokṣatayā | na tv aparokṣatayety arthaḥ | upādeyam arthāt 
śuddhadraṣṭṛrūpam | dṛśyam | draṣṭāram draṣṭṛrūpam | paśyataḥ | 
adraṣṭāram draṣṭṛvyatiriktam | apaśyataḥ | raseṣv api suptasyeti yojyam |
 nirāśiṣaḥ āśārahitasya | kulakam || MoT_4,22.1-8||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
anyat kiṃ tasya sampatsyate ity | atrāha<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;nīrāgaṃ nirupāsaṅgaṃ nirdvandvaṃ nirupāśrayam /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;viniryāti mano mohād vihagaḥ pañjarād iva // Mo_4,22.9 //<br>
nirupāsaṅgam āsaktirahitam | nirupāśrayam nirapekṣam | mohāt anātmany ātmābhimānarūpād avicārāt || MoT_4,22.9 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;śāntasandehadaurātmyaṃ gatakautukavibhramam /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;paripūrṇāntaraṃ cetaḥ pūrṇendur iva rājate // Mo_4,22.10 //<br>
kautukam atra padārthaviṣayaṃ jñeyam | paripūrṇam sahajānandanirbharam | antaram yasya | tādṛśam || MoT_4,22.10 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;janitottamasaundaryā dūrodastanatonnatā /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;samatodeti sarvatra śāntavāta ivārṇave // Mo_4,22.11 //<br>
janitam uttamaṃ saundaryam yayā | sā | samatayā hi puruṣaḥ sadaiva 
prasannavadano bhavati | dūrodastā natonnatā bhāvapradhāno nirdeśaḥ | 
natonnatatā | yasyām | sā || MoT_4,22.11 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;andhakāramayī mūḍhā jāḍyajarjaritāntarā /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;tanutām eti saṃsāravāsaneva prage kṣapā // Mo_4,22.12 //<br>
ivaśabdaḥ kṣapety anena sambadhyate || MoT_4,22.12 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;dṛṣṭacidbhāskarā prajñāpadminī puṇyapallavā /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;vikasaty amaloddyotā prātar dyaur iva rūpiṇī // Mo_4,22.13 //<br>
spaṣṭam || MoT_4,22.13 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;prajñā hṛdayahāriṇyo bhuvanāhlādanakṣamāḥ /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;sattvalakṣmyaḥ pravartante sakalendor ivāṃśavaḥ // Mo_4,22.14 //<br>
sattvalakṣmyaḥ sattvaguṇasampadaḥ || MoT_4,22.14 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
upasaṃhāraṃ karoti<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;bahunātra kim uktena jñātajñeyo mahāmatiḥ /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;nodeti naiva yāty astam abhūtākāśakośavat // Mo_4,22.15 //<br>
na udeti astaṃ nāyāti cinmātrākhyāt svasvarūpān na cyavata ity arthaḥ | abhūtākāśakośavat paramākāśamadhyavat || MoT_4,22.15 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;vicāraṇāparijñātasvabhāvasyoditātmanaḥ /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;anukampyā bhavanty ete brahmaviṣṇvindraśaṅkarāḥ // Mo_4,22.16 //<br>
vicāraṇayā parijñātaḥ svabhāvaḥ svasvarūpaṃ yena | tādṛśasya | 
anukampyāḥ teṣv api sṛṣṭinirmāṇādikṣobhadarśanāt asya dayā jāyate ity 
arthaḥ || MoT_4,22.16 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;prakaṭākāram apy antar nirahaṅkāracetasam /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;nāpnuvanti vikalpās tam mṛgatṛṣṇāmbv ivaiṇakāḥ // Mo_4,22.17 //<br>
nāpnuvanti svavaśaṃ na kurvanti | prakaṭākārasya cāhaṅkārarāhityam āścaryakāry eva || MoT_4,22.17 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;taraṅgavad amī lokāḥ prayānty āyānti cābhitaḥ /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;kroḍīkuruta ātmotthe na jñam maraṇajanmanī // Mo_4,22.18 //<br>
kroḍīkurutaḥ vaśīkurutaḥ | dehābhimānābhāvena tatsthamṛtijanmābhimānābhāvāt || MoT_4,22.18 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;āvirbhāvatirobhāvau saṃsāro netaraḥ kramaḥ /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;iti tābhyāṃ samāloke ramate na sa khidyate // Mo_4,22.19 //<br>
iti evaṃrūpābhyām | tābhyām āvirbhāvatirobhāvābhyām | saḥ | samāloke 
tattattvaprakāśe sati | ramate | na khidyate | jñātavastutattvo hi 
vastubhiḥ ramata eva na khidyate | ajñātatattvasyaiva rajjvādiṣu 
sarpādibhayakṛtakhedadarśanāt || MoT_4,22.19 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;na jāyate na mriyate kumbhe kumbhanabho yathā /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;bhūṣite dūṣite vāpi dehe tadvad ihātmavān // Mo_4,22.20 //<br>
dehābhimānābhāvād iti bhāvaḥ || MoT_4,22.20 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;viveka udite śīte mithyābhramabharoditā /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;kṣīyate vāsanā sābhre mṛgatṛṣṇā marāv iva // Mo_4,22.21 //<br>
mithyārūpaḥ yaḥ bhramabharaḥ | tenoditā | sābhre hi marau mṛgatṛṣṇā kṣīyata eva | tāpa eva tasyā utthānāt || MoT_4,22.21 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;ko 'haṃ katham idaṃ veti yāvan na pravicāritam /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;saṃsārāḍambaraṃ tāvad andhakāropamaṃ sthitam // Mo_4,22.22 //<br>
andhakāro 'pi kiṃrūpo 'yam iti vicāraḥ | tāvad eva tiṣṭhati || MoT_4,22.22 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;mithyābhramabharodbhūtaṃ śarīram padam āpadām /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;ātmabhāvanayā nedaṃ yaḥ paśyati sa paśyati // Mo_4,22.23 //<br>
yaḥ idaṃ deham | ātmabhāvanayā na paśyati | saḥ paśyati samyak paśyati iti piṇḍārthaḥ || MoT_4,22.23 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;deśakālavaśotthāni na mameti gatabhramam /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;śarīrasukhaduḥkhāni yaḥ paśyati sa paśyati // Mo_4,22.24 //<br>
mama śuddhacinmātrasya mama || MoT_4,22.24 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;ātmānam itarac caiva dṛśā nityāvibhinnayā /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;sarvaṃ cijjyotir eveti yaḥ paśyati sa paśyati // Mo_4,22.25 //<br>
cijjyotiḥ śuddhacitprakāśarūpam || MoT_4,22.25 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;apāraparyantanabhodikkālādi kriyānvitam /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;aham eveti sarvatra yaḥ paśyati sa paśyati // Mo_4,22.26 //<br>
nabhaś ca dik ca kālaś ca | te ādiḥ yasya jagataḥ | tat nabhodikkālādi 
apāraparyantam pāraparyantarahitaṃ ca tat | nabhodikkālādirūpaṃ jagat 
aham evāsmi | ahantāsārasya cinmātratattvasyaiva sarvamayatvena 
sthitatvāt | anyathāham iti sarvatra na sphuret | jaḍeṣv adarśane 'pi 
cetanavat sattābhāktvāviśeṣāt | tatrāpi tatsphuraṇānumānasya śakyatvāt 
na sarvatrety asyānupapatteḥ | kathambhūtaṃ tat | kriyānvitam | 
ādiśabdākṣiptāyā api kriyāyāḥ pṛthak nirdeśaḥ prādhānyakhyāpanārthaḥ | 
iti evam | sarvatra sarveṣu deśeṣu kāleṣu ca | yaḥ paśyati saḥ paśyati |
 nānya ity arthaḥ || MoT_4,22.26 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;vālāgralakṣabhāgāt tu koṭiśaḥ parikalpitaḥ /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;ahaṃ sūkṣma iti vyāpī yaḥ paśyati sa paśyati // Mo_4,22.27 //<br>
sūkṣmasya vyāpitvam āścaryāvaham | sūkṣmatvaṃ cātra bāhyāntaḥkaraṇātītatvena draṣṭavyam || MoT_4,22.27 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;sarvaśaktir anantātmā sarvabhāvāntarasthitaḥ /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;advitīyaś cid ity antar yaḥ paśyati sa paśyati // Mo_4,22.28 //<br>
cit cidātmā | bhavati | kathambhūtaḥ | sarvaśaktiḥ anyathā nānārūpaṃ 
jagat na prādurbhavet | anantātmā antasyāpi tasminn eva nigīrṇatvāt 
tadrahitaḥ | na hi nigīrṇa eva nigarituḥ rūpam ācchādayituṃ śaktaḥ | 
sarveṣām bhāvānām antare sthitaḥ sarvabhāvāntarasthitaḥ | anyathāham iti
 na sphuret | advitīyaḥ dvitīyatvena matasyāpi tadrūpatvānapāyāt 
dvitīyarahitaḥ | iti evam | antaḥ manasi | na tu cakṣuṣā | yaḥ paśyati 
sa paśyatīti || MoT_4,22.28 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;ādhivyādhibhayodvigno jarāmaraṇajanmavān /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;deho nāham iti prājño yaḥ paśyati sa paśyati // Mo_4,22.29 //<br>
prājñaḥ śuddhacinmātratattve ātmatvaniścayavān || MoT_4,22.29 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;tiryag ūrdhvam adhastāc ca vyāpako mahimā mama /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;na dvitīyo mamāstīti yaḥ paśyati sa paśyati // Mo_4,22.30 //<br>
mama śuddhacinmātrarūpasya mama | na tu dehādirūpasya || MoT_4,22.30 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;mayi sarvam idam protaṃ sūtre maṇigaṇā iva /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;cittantur aham eveti yaḥ paśyati sa paśyati // Mo_4,22.31 //<br>
kathaṃ tvayi sarvam protam ity | atrāha cittantur iti | tantau hi muktā 
protāḥ bhavanti | tantutvaṃ ca citaḥ vyāpakatayā sūkṣmatayā ca jñeyam ||
 MoT_4,22.31 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;nāhaṃ na cānyad astīha brahmaivāsti na cāsti tat /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;itthaṃ sadasator madhyaṃ yaḥ paśyati sa paśyati // Mo_4,22.32 //<br>
iha loke | aham paricchinnadehādirūpaḥ aham | nāsmi | anyat matto 
bhinnatvena sthitaṃ jagat | na cāsti | suṣuptau adarśanāt | brahma 
vyāpakaṃ cinmātratattvam | evāsti paramārthataḥ sattām bhajate | 
sarvathābhāvasya vaktum aśakyatvāt | na hi nirādiṣṭo no bhramaḥ 
sambhavati | tat brahma | nāsti ca | bāhyāntaḥkaraṇātītatvāt | ittham 
evam | sadasatoḥ madhyam sandhibhūtaṃ śuddhacinmātrākhyaṃ vastu | yaḥ 
paśyati sa paśyati || MoT_4,22.32 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;yan nāma kiñcit trailokyaṃ sa eko 'vayavo mama /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;taraṅgo 'bdhāv ivety antar yaḥ paśyati sa paśyati // Mo_4,22.33 //<br>
mama śuddhacinmātrarūpasya mama | svapne hi cinmātrāvayavabhūtaṃ jagat sarvo 'nubhavati || MoT_4,22.33 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;śocyā pālyā mayaiveyaṃ svaseyam me kanīyasī /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;trilokī pelavety uccair yaḥ paśyati sa paśyati // Mo_4,22.34 //<br>
pelavā nāśabhīruḥ | kanīyasī svasā cedṛśy eva bhavati || MoT_4,22.34 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;ātmatāparate tvattāmatte yasya mahātmanaḥ /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;bhāvād uparate nūnaṃ sa paśyati sulocanaḥ // Mo_4,22.35 //<br>
bhāvāt manasaḥ | sarvatra cinmātratvadarśanād iti bhāvaḥ || MoT_4,22.35 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;cetyānupātarahitaṃ cidbhairavamayaṃ vapuḥ /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;āpūritajagajjālaṃ yaḥ paśyati sa paśyati // Mo_4,22.36 //<br>
cetyānupātarahitaḥ yaḥ cidbhairavaḥ sarvagrāsakatvāt cidākhyaḥ bhairavaḥ | tanmayaṃ vapuḥ svarūpam || MoT_4,22.36 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;sukhaṃ duḥkham bhavo 'bhāvo vivekakalanāś ca yāḥ /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;ahaṃ na veti nūnaṃ vā paśyan na parihīyate // Mo_4,22.37 //<br>
sukhaṃ duḥkhaṃ bhavaḥ abhāvaḥ vivekakalanāś cāham asmi iti paśyan | etan
 na vāsmi iti vā paśyan | na parihīyate na hānim prāpnoti | ubhayathāpi 
śuddhacinmātrasvarūpatvāpteḥ | na hi śuddhacinmātraṃ vinā kaścid 
vyāpakaḥ uttīrṇo vā bhavati || MoT_4,22.37 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;svātmasattāparāpūrṇe jagaty anyena varjite /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;kim me heyaṃ kim ādeyam iti paśyan sadṛg naraḥ // Mo_4,22.38 //<br>
svātmanaḥ śuddhacinmātrarūpasya svātmanaḥ | yā sattā sphūrtirūpā sattā |
 tayā parāpūrṇe sāratvena sthitatvāt nirbharite | anyathāham iti 
sphuraṇāyogāt | tathā anyena cinmātravyatiriktena | varjite jagati | kiṃ
 heyam bhavati | svātmanaḥ heyatvāyogāt na kiñcid apīty arthaḥ | kim 
ādeyam bhavati | svātmanaḥ sarvadā prāptatvāt na kiñcid apīty arthaḥ | 
iti evam | paśyan anubhavan | naraḥ | sadṛk dṛṣṭisahito | bhavati | anye
 'ndhā ity arthaḥ || MoT_4,22.38 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;apratarkyam anābhāsaṃ sanmātram idam ity alam /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;heyopādeyakalanā yasya kṣīṇā namāmi tam // Mo_4,22.39 //<br>
idam jagat | apratarkyam tarkitum aśakyam | anābhāsam śānte svasvarūpe 
sthitatvād ābhāsarahitam | sanmātram evāsti | iti anena niścayena | 
yasya puruṣasya | heyopādeyakalanā kṣīṇā | ahaṃ tam puruṣam | namāmi | 
sa eva sarvebhya utkṛṣṭa iti bhāvaḥ || MoT_4,22.39 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;ya ākāśavad ekātmā sarvabhāvagato 'pi san /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;na bhāvarañjanām eti sa mahātmā maheśvaraḥ // Mo_4,22.40 //<br>
yaḥ puruṣaḥ | ākāśavat ekātmā sarvavyāpakātmā | sarvabhāvagataḥ api san 
śarīrayātrānimitteṣu sarveṣu padārtheṣu vyavahārayukto 'pi san | 
bhāvarañjanām | bhāve manasi | rañjanām harṣāmarṣarūpāṃ rañjanām | na 
eti | saḥ mahātmā mahāpuruṣaḥ | maheśvaraḥ bhavati mahāśaktiyuktatvāt ||
 MoT_4,22.40 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;tamaḥprakāśakalanāmuktaḥ kālātmatāṃ gataḥ /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;yaḥ somyaḥ susamaḥ svasthas taṃ naumi padam āgatam // Mo_4,22.41 //<br>
yaḥ | tamaḥprakāśayoḥ jāḍyacittvayoḥ | yā kalanā | tayā muktaḥ | kālasya
 kriyāvaicitryarūpasya kālasya | ātmatām sattādāyakatvena svarūpatām | 
gataḥ | somyaḥ śītalaḥ | svasthaḥ svasvarūpe eva sthitaḥ | bhavati | tam
 padam āgataṃ naumi | apūrvaś cātra sūrya uktaḥ || MoT_4,22.41 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
sargāntaślokenāpy etad eva kathayati<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;yasyodayāstamayasaṅkalanākalāsu<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;citrāsu cāruvibhavāsu jagadgatāsu /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;vṛttiḥ samaiva sakalaikagater anantā<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;tasmai namaḥ paramabodhavate śivāya // Mo_4,22.42 //<br>
sakalaikagateḥ samastaikaśaraṇasya | cāruvibhavāsu 
praśastasāmarthyayuktāsu | citrāsu nānāvidhāsu | udayāstamayayoḥ yāḥ 
saṅkalanāḥ ghaṭṭanāḥ | tadrūpāsu jagadgatāsu kalāsu | anantā nāśarahitā |
 vṛttiḥ manovṛttiḥ | samaiva bhavati | anantatvaṃ cātra darḍhyatāpekṣam 
uktam | tasmai paramabodhavate parātmatattvabodhayuktāya | śivāya 
śivībhūtāya puruṣāya | namaḥ astu | śivaś ca samavṛttiḥ sakalaikagatiḥ 
paramabodharūpaś ca bhavatīti śivam || MoT_4,22.42 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
iti śrībhāskarakaṇṭhaviracitāyāṃ mokṣopāyaṭīkāyāṃ sthitiprakaraṇe dvāviṃśaḥ sargaḥ ||22||<br>

<br>
oṃ | punar api vivekina eva māhātmyaṃ kathayati<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;sa uttamapadālambī cakrabhramavad āsthitaḥ /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;śarīranagare rājyaṃ kurvann api na lipyate // Mo_4,23.1 //<br>
uttamam padam cinmātrākhyaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ sthānam | ālambata ity 
uttamapadālambī | cakrabhramavat āsthitaḥ samantāt sthitaḥ | 
niranusandhānaṃ ceṣṭāyāṃ sthita iti yāvat | saḥ jīvanmuktaḥ | 
śarīranagare rājyaṃ kurvann api na lipyate | tajjaiḥ sukhaduḥkhaiḥ na 
gṛhyate ity arthaḥ | rājāpi uttamapadālambī sarvatra bhraman nagare 
rājyaṃ kurvan bhavati || MoT_4,23.1 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;tasyeyam bhogamokṣārthaṃ tajjñasyopavanopamā /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;sukhāyaiva na duḥkhāya svaśarīramahāpurī // Mo_4,23.2 //<br>
sukhāyaiva ātyantikamokṣarūpasukhasādhanatvāt | na duḥkhāya duḥkhalepābhāvāt || MoT_4,23.2 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
atra śrīrāmaḥ pṛcchati<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;nagarītvaṃ śarīrasya kathaṃ nāma mahāmune /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;etāṃ cādhivasan yogī kathaṃ rājyasukhaikabhāk // Mo_4,23.3 //<br>
spaṣṭam || MoT_4,23.3 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
śrīvasiṣṭha uttaram āha<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;ramyeyaṃ dehanagarī rāma sarvaguṇānvitā /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;jñasyānantavilāsāḍhyā svālokārkaprakāśitā // Mo_4,23.4 //<br>
svālokaḥ ātmaprakāśaḥ | sa evārkaḥ | tena prakāśitā parāmarśadvāreṇa svam prati prākaṭyaṃ nītā || MoT_4,23.4 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
sarvaguṇatvam eva kathayati<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;netravātāyanoddyotaprakāśabhuvanāntarā /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;karapratolīvistāraprāptapādopajaṅgalā // Mo_4,23.5 //<br>
netre eva vātāyane | tayoḥ yaḥ uddyotaḥ prakāśaḥ | tena prakāśāni 
prakaṭāni | bhuvanāntarāṇi bhuvanamadhyāni yasyām | sā | nagaryām api 
nagaradvāranirmitaiḥ vātāyanaiḥ bhuvanāntarāṇi dṛśyāni bhavanti | karau 
eva pratolyau viśikhe | tābhyām prāptau pādāv eva upajaṅgalau 
jaṅgalasamīpadeśau yasyāḥ | sā | nagaryaś ca upajaṅgalaṃ tāvat pratolī 
bhavati || MoT_4,23.5 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;romarājilatāgulmā tvagaṭṭālakamālitā /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;gulphagulguluviśrāntajaṅghorustambhamaṇḍalā // Mo_4,23.6 //<br>
tvag evāṭṭālakam prākāraḥ | tena bhūṣitā | gulguluḥ stambhādhārabhūtā śilā || MoT_4,23.6 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;rekhāvibhaktapādograśilāprathamanirmitā /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;carmamarmasirāsārasandhisīmā manoramā // Mo_4,23.7 //<br>
rekhābhyāṃ vibhakte ye | pādau evograśile | tayoḥ prathamaṃ nirmitā | 
prathamanirmāṇe hi kṛtavibhāgāḥ śilāḥ sthāpyante | carmamarmasirāsāraḥ 
carmamarmasirāsamūha eva | sandhisīmāḥ sandhimaryādāḥ yasyāḥ | sā || 
MoT_4,23.7 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;ūrudvayakavāṭāgranirmitopasthanirgamā /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;kacatkacāvalīkācadalapracchādanāvṛtā // Mo_4,23.8 //<br>
ūrudvayam eva kavāṭe | tayoḥ ye agre | tābhyāṃ nirmitaḥ 
kavāṭaracanāyuktaḥ kṛtaḥ | upastha eva gudasthānam eva | nirgamaḥ 
dvāradeśaḥ yasyāḥ | sā | kacantī yā kacāvalī | sā eva kācadalaiḥ 
nirmitam pracchādanam | tenāvṛtā || MoT_4,23.8 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;bhrūlalāṭāsyasacchāyavadanodyānaśobhitā /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;dṛṣṭipātotpalākīrṇakapolavipulasthalā // Mo_4,23.9 //<br>
bhrūlalāṭāsyaiḥ sacchāyam yat vadanam | tad evodyānam | tena śobhitā || MoT_4,23.9 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;vakṣaḥsthalasaraḥsyūtakucapaṅkajakorakā /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;ghanaromāvalicchannaskandhakrīḍāśiloccayā // Mo_4,23.10 //<br>
ghanaromāvalicchannā cāsau skandhakrīḍāśiloccayā ca || MoT_4,23.10 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;udaraśvabhranikṣiptasvanneṣṭabhakṣyakarparā /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;dīrghakaṇṭhabilodgīrṇavātasaṃrambhaśabditā // Mo_4,23.11 //<br>
udaraśvabhre udaragarte | nikṣiptāni yāni svannāni śobhanānnāni | taiḥ |
 tadvyājeneti yāvat | iṣṭabhakṣyakarparā iṣṭabhakṣyabhagnapātram yasyāḥ |
 sā | rājanagaryām api iṣṭabhakṣyapātrāṇi bhavanti | dīrgham yat 
kaṇṭhabilam | tasmin | udgīrṇaḥ sañcārī | yaḥ vātaḥ | tasya yaḥ 
saṃrambhaḥ | tena śabditā śabdayuktā kṛtā | nagaryām api bileṣu 
vātaśabdo bhavati || MoT_4,23.11 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;hṛdayāpaṇanirṇītayathāprāptārthabhūṣitā /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;anārataṃ navadvārapravahatprāṇanāgarā // Mo_4,23.12 //<br>
hṛdayam evāpaṇaḥ niṣadyā | tasmin nirṇītā upādeyatvena niścitāḥ | ye 
yathāprāptārthāḥ svapravāhāgatārthāḥ | taiḥ bhūṣitā | nagaryā api 
āpaṇeṣu arthā nirṇīyante || MoT_4,23.12 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;āsyasphārakhadādṛṣṭadantāsthiśakalākulā /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;mukhakhadābhramajjihvācillācarvitabhojanā // Mo_4,23.13 //<br>
nagaryām api khadāsu māṃsabhakṣakaiḥ tyaktāni asthiśakalāni bhavanti | cillā pakṣiviśeṣaḥ || MoT_4,23.13 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;romaśaṣpabharacchannakarṇakoṭarakūpakā /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;sphikśṛṅkhalāñcitopāntapṛṣṭavistīrṇajaṅgalā // Mo_4,23.14 //<br>
sphijau eva śṛṅkhale | tābhyām añcitopāntam ramyopāntam | pṛṣṭam eva 
vistīrṇajaṅgalam yasyāḥ | sā | nagaryā api jaṅgalasandhiṣu 
caurādipratibandhārthaṃ śṛṅgalāḥ bhavanti || MoT_4,23.14 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;gudocchinnāraghaṭṭāntaruddhṛtānantakardamā /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;cittodyānamahīvalgadātmacintāvarāṅganā // Mo_4,23.15 //<br>
guda evocchinnāraghaṭṭaḥ troṭitāraghaṭṭayantraḥ | tenāntaḥ antaḥpradeśāt
 | uddhṛtaḥ niṣkāsitaḥ | anantaḥ kardamaḥ | arthāt śakṛdrūpaḥ kardamaḥ 
yasyāḥ | sā | nagaryā api kardamam uddharanti | cittodyāneti | jñacitte 
hi rātrindinam ātmacintā eva sphurati || MoT_4,23.15 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;dhīvaratrādṛḍhābaddhacapalendriyamarkaṭā /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;vadanodyānahasanapuṣpodgamamanoramā // Mo_4,23.16 //<br>
jño hi dhīrajjvā capalendriyāṇi badhnāti | vadanodyāneti | udyāne ca puṣpodgamo yukta eva || MoT_4,23.16 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;svaśarīrapurī jñasya sarvasaubhāgyasundarī /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;sukhāyaiva na duḥkhāya paramāya hitāya ca // Mo_4,23.17 //<br>
svaśarīrapurī proktasarvapurīguṇā nijaśarīranagarī | paramāya hitāya mokṣarūpāyety arthaḥ || MoT_4,23.17 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
ajñasyeyaṃ sukhadāsty atha vā nety | atrāha<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;ajñasyeyam anantānāṃ duḥkhānāṃ kośamālikā /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;jñasya tv iyam anantānāṃ sukhānāṃ kośamālikā // Mo_4,23.18 //<br>
kośamālikā bhāṇḍāgāramālā | anantaduḥkhotpādikety arthaḥ | 
ajñātaśuddhatattvasya tasyaitadarthaṃ rātrindinaṃ santāpabhāktvāt iti 
bhāvaḥ | nanu tarhi jñasyāpi īdṛśy eva syād ity | atrāha jñasya tv iti |
 tuśabdaḥ vyatirekadyotakaḥ | jñātaśuddhātmatattvasya tasyaitadarthaṃ 
santāpabhāktvābhāvāt | na hy anyārtham anyaḥ santāpabhāg bhavatīti 
bhāvaḥ || MoT_4,23.18 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
nanu tarhi nāśakāle iyaṃ jñasya duḥkhadā bhaviṣyatīty | atrāha<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;na kiñcid asyāṃ naṣṭāyāṃ jñasya naṣṭam arindama /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;sthitāyāṃ saṃsthitaṃ sarvaṃ teneyaṃ jñasukhāvahā // Mo_4,23.19 //<br>
etadvyatiriktaśuddhacinmātrasvarūpatvād iti bhāvaḥ | nanu tarhi 
sthitikāle 'py asyānayā na kiñcit prayojanam ity | atrāha sthitāyām iti |
 sarvaṃ saṃsthitam samastajīvanmuktyupayogikāryasādhakatvād iti bhāvaḥ |
 upasaṃhāraṃ karoti teneyam iti || MoT_4,23.19 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
nanv asyāḥ kaiścid rathatvam apy uktam ity | atrāha<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;yad enāṃ jñaḥ samāruhya saṃsāre viharaty alam /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;aśeṣabhogamokṣārthaṃ teneyaṃ jñarathaḥ smṛtaḥ // Mo_4,23.20 //<br>
enām śarīrapurīm || MoT_4,23.20 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;śabdarūparasasparśagandhabandhuśriyo yataḥ /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;anayaiva hi labhyante teneyaṃ jñasya lābhadā // Mo_4,23.21 //<br>
nanu śabdādilābhena jñasya ko lābho 'stīti cen | na | śabdādidvāreṇa 
paramātmatattvaśaktinicayajñānarūpasya lābhasya sthitatvāt || 
MoT_4,23.21 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;sukhaduḥkhakriyājālaṃ yadaiṣodvahati svayam /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;tadaiṣā rāma sarvatra sarvavastubharakṣamā // Mo_4,23.22 //<br>
eṣā dehanagarī | jño hi sukhādikaṃ śarīrasyaiva jānāti na svasya || MoT_4,23.22 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;tasyāṃ śarīrapuryāṃ hi rājyaṃ kurvan gatabhramaḥ /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;jñas tiṣṭhati gatavyagraṃ svapuryām iva vāsavaḥ // Mo_4,23.23 //<br>
gatabhramaḥ etām prati ahamabhimānarahitaḥ | gatavyagram nirākulam || MoT_4,23.23 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;na kṣipaty avaṭāṭope manomattaturaṅgamam /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;na lobhadvandvarūpāya prajñāputrīm prayacchati // Mo_4,23.24 //<br>
avaṭāṭope viṣayarūpe śvabhrāḍambare | lobhākhyo yaḥ dvandvarūpaḥ | 
tasmai | prajñāputrīṃ na prayacchati | lobhagrastām prajñāṃ na karotīti 
bhāvaḥ || MoT_4,23.24 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;ajñānapararāṣṭraṃ ca na randhraṃ tv asya paśyati /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;saṃsārāribhayasyāntarmūlāny eṣa nikṛntati // Mo_4,23.25 //<br>
ajñānam eva pararāṣṭram lakṣaṇayā ripubhūto rājā | na paśyati | 
gamanasya tu kā kathā | asya ajñānarājñaḥ | randhram | tu evaśabdārthe |
 na paśyati | jitatvāt || MoT_4,23.25 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;tṛṣṇāsāraparāvarte kāmasaṅkṣobhadurgrahe /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;na nimajjanti paryastasukhaduḥkhākṣadevane // Mo_4,23.26 //<br>
tṛṣṇāsārasya parāvartaḥ āvṛttiḥ yasmin | tādṛśe | kāmasya yaḥ saṅkṣobhaḥ
 | tena durgrahe | paryastau preritau | yau sukhaduḥkhākṣau sukhaduḥkhe 
evākṣau | tayoḥ yat devanam krīḍanam | dyūtam iti yāvat | tatra na 
nimajjanti | rājño hi dyūtamajjanaṃ doṣa eva | akṣadevanam api 
tṛṣṇākāmavalitam eva bhavati || MoT_4,23.26 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;karoty avirataṃ snānam bahir antar api kṣaṇāt /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;saritsaṅgamatīrtheṣu manorathagatiḥ kramāt // Mo_4,23.27 //<br>
bahiḥ bāhye | antaḥ manasi | mana eva svādhīnatvāt rathaḥ | tena gatiḥ 
yasya | saḥ | antaḥ snānaṃ tu ciddhradanimajjanam eva jñeyam || 
MoT_4,23.27 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;sakalākṣijanādṛśyaḥ puraprekṣāparāṅmukhaḥ /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;dhyānanāmni sukhaṃ nityaṃ tiṣṭhaty antaḥpurāntare // Mo_4,23.28 //<br>
purasya śarīrasya | nagarasya ca rājāpi sakalajanādṛśyaḥ 
puraprekṣāparāṅmukhaś caran pure tiṣṭhati | dhyānaṃ cātra 
svātmabhūtaśuddhacinmātratattvaparāmarśa eva jñeyaḥ || MoT_4,23.28 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;sukhāvahaiṣā nagarī nityam pramuditātmanaḥ /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;bhogamokṣapradā divyā śakrasyevāmarāvatī // Mo_4,23.29 //<br>
jñasyeti śeṣaḥ || MoT_4,23.29 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;sthitayā saṃsthitaṃ sarvaṃ kiñcin naṣṭaṃ na naṣṭayā /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;yayā puryā mahīpasya sā kathaṃ na sukhāvahā // Mo_4,23.30 //<br>
spaṣṭam || MoT_4,23.30 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;vinaṣṭe dehanagare jñasya naṣṭaṃ na kiñcana /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;ākrāntakumbhakośasya khasya kumbhakṣaye yathā // Mo_4,23.31 //<br>
spaṣṭam || MoT_4,23.31 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;vidyamānaṃ ghaṭaṃ vāyuḥ kila spṛśati nāsthitam /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;yathā tathaiva dehī svāṃ śarīranagarīm imām // Mo_4,23.32 //<br>
asthitam naṣṭam | dehī dehād vyatiriktam ātmānaṃ jānānaḥ tajjñaḥ || MoT_4,23.32 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;atrastha eṣa bhagavān ātmā sarvagato 'pi san /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;svavikalpakṛtām bhuktvā puṃstām adhigatātmadṛk // Mo_4,23.33 //<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;kurvann api na kurvāṇaḥ samyak sarvakriyonmukhaḥ /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;kadācit prakṛtān sarvān kāryārthān adhitiṣṭhati // Mo_4,23.34 //<br>
atrasthaḥ dehasthaḥ | apiśabdaḥ sarvagatasya puṃstābhoge virodhaṃ 
dyotayati | adhigatātmadṛk tajjñaḥ | na tu mūrkhaḥ | 
tasyaivaṃvidhatvāsambhavāt | kurvan śarīrādidvāreṇa kurvan | na kurvāṇaḥ
 nāhaṃ karteti niścayāt | kāryārthān karaṇīyāni prayojanāni | 
adhitiṣṭhati kartavyatvena niścinoti | prakṛtān pravāhāgatān | na tu 
svavimarśena kalpitān || MoT_4,23.33-34 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
nanu yadi kadācid etat karoti tarhi anyadā kiṃ karotīty | atrāha<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;kadācil līlayālolaṃ vimānam adhirohati /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;anāhatagatiṃ kāntaṃ vihartum amalam manaḥ // Mo_4,23.35 //<br>
kadācid asau tajjñaḥ ātmalīlayā manaḥ vimānam manorūpaṃ vimānam | 
adhirohati | kiṃ kartum | vihartum āntaraṃ vihāraṃ kartum | manovimānaṃ 
kathambhūtam | alolam cañcalatārahitam | punaḥ kathambhūtam | anāhatā 
kvacid apratihatā | gatiḥ yasya | saḥ | tam | vimānaśabdāpekṣayā 
puṃstvam | amalam rāgādimalarahitam | ata eva kāntam || MoT_4,23.35 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
nanu tatra kiṃ karotīty | atrāha<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;tatrastho lokasundaryā satataṃ śītalāṅgayā /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;ramate nāma yo maitryā nityaṃ hṛdayasaṃsthayā // Mo_4,23.36 //<br>
saḥ tajjñaḥ tatrasthaḥ manovimānasthaḥ | lokasundaryā lokapriyayā | 
nityaṃ hṛdayasthayā satataṃ śītalāṅgayā maitryā maitryākhyayā striyā | 
ramate | kadācid antarmukhaḥ san maitrīmaya eva bhavatīti bhāvaḥ || 
MoT_4,23.36 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
na kevalam maitry eva tasya kāntāsti yāvad anye dve apīty āha<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;dve kānte tiṣṭhatas tasya pārśvayoḥ satyataikate /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;indor iva viśākhe dve samāhlāditacetasī // Mo_4,23.37 //<br>
spaṣṭam || MoT_4,23.37 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;jña imān akhilāṃl lokān duḥkhakrakacadāritān /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;vālmīkān iva pīṭhasthaḥ pṛṣṭhād arka ivekṣate // Mo_4,23.38 //<br>
lokān kathambhūtān | duḥkham eva krakacaḥ | tena dāritān pīḍitān | 
vālmīkān pipīlikāḥ | pṛṣṭhād pṛṣṭham āruhyety arthaḥ || MoT_4,23.38 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;ciram pūritasarvāśaḥ sarvasampattisundaraḥ /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;apunaḥkhaṇḍanāyenduḥ pūrṇāṅga iva rājate // Mo_4,23.39 //<br>
sarvasampattyā sarvasampadā | sundaraḥ || MoT_4,23.39 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;sevyamāno 'pi bhogaugho na khedāyāsya jāyate /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;kālakūṭaḥ kileśasya kaṇṭhe pratyuta rājate // Mo_4,23.40 //<br>
khedāya nāśadvāreṇeti bhāvaḥ || MoT_4,23.40 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
nanu kathaṃ nāsāv asya khedāya bhavatīty | atrāha<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;parijñāyopabhukto hi bhogo bhavati tuṣṭaye /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;vijñāyāśvāsito maitrīm eti cauro na śatrutām // Mo_4,23.41 //<br>
parijñāya samyak niścityātmarūpatvena jñātvety arthaḥ | ātmarūpatvena hi
 jñāto bhogaḥ naṣṭo 'pi khedaṃ na dadāti svātmarūpatayā sthitatvāt | na 
cātmano nāśaḥ yuktaḥ | nāśe 'pi nāśasākṣitayā sthitatvāt || MoT_4,23.41 
||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;naranārīnaṭaughānāṃ kalahe dūragāminā /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;jñena yātreva subhagā bhogaśrīr avalokyate // Mo_4,23.42 //<br>
anyo 'pi nipuṇaḥ naṭaughānāṃ kalahe dūraṃ gacchati | yātrām tadārabdhaṃ nāṭyaṃ ca paśyati || MoT_4,23.42 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;aśaṅkitopasamprāptā grāmayātrā yathādhvagaiḥ /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;prekṣyate tadvad evājñair vyavahāramayī kriyā // Mo_4,23.43 //<br>
niranusandhānam eva prekṣata iti bhāvaḥ || MoT_4,23.43 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;ayatnopanateṣv akṣi digdravyeṣu yathā puraḥ /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;nīrāgam eva patati tadvat kāryeṣu dhīradhīḥ // Mo_4,23.44 //<br>
ayatnopanateṣu digdravyeṣu yathā akṣi netram | nīrāgam rāgarahitam | 
patati | dhīradhīḥ tajjñabuddhiḥ | kāryeṣu tadvat patati | rāgarahitam 
evāsau kāryāṇi karotīti bhāvaḥ || MoT_4,23.44 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;indriyāṇāṃ na harati prāptam arthaṃ kadācana /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;na dadāti tathā prāptaṃ sampūrṇo jño 'vatiṣṭhate // Mo_4,23.45 //<br>
sampūrṇatvaṃ hy etad eva yat prāptasya grahaṇam aprāptasyāvāñchanam iti || MoT_4,23.45 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;aprāptacintāḥ samprāptasamupekṣāś ca sanmatim /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;nākalpayanti taralā piñchaghātā ivācalam // Mo_4,23.46 //<br>
na ākalpayanti na cañcalīkurvanti || MoT_4,23.46 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;saṃśāntasarvasandeho galitākhilakautukaḥ /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;saṅkṣīṇakalpanājālo jñaḥ saṃrāḍ iva śobhate // Mo_4,23.47 //<br>
spaṣṭam || MoT_4,23.47 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;ātmany eva na māty antaḥ svātmanātmani jṛmbhate /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;sampūrṇāpāraparyantaḥ kṣīrārṇava ivātmavān // Mo_4,23.48 //<br>
na māti | ānandanirbharatvāt svātmanātmani jṛmbhate | nāntaḥ kañcid 
anyam paśyatīti bhāvaḥ | sampūrṇaś cāsau apāraparyantaś ca 
sampūrṇāpāraparyantaḥ || MoT_4,23.48 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;bhogecchākṛpaṇāñ jantūn dīnān dīnendriyāṇi ca /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;anunmattamanāḥ śānto hasaty unmattakān iva // Mo_4,23.49 //<br>
tadāsaktau tu kā katheti bhāvaḥ || MoT_4,23.49 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;icchato 'nyanijāṃ jāyāṃ yathaivānyena hasyate /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;indriyasyecchato bhogaṃ tathaiva jñena hasyate // Mo_4,23.50 //<br>
yathā anyasya nijām anyanijām | tādṛśīm bhāvinīm bhāryām icchataḥ | 
anyārtham bhāryām icchata iti yāvat | puruṣasya | yathā anyena hasyate 
hāsaḥ kriyate | tathaiva indriyasya bhogam icchataḥ ajñasya | jñena 
hasyate || MoT_4,23.50 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;tyajantaṃ svasukhaṃ sāmyam mano viṣayavidrutam /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;aṅkuśeneva nāgendraṃ vicāreṇa vaśaṃ nayet // Mo_4,23.51 //<br>
sāmyaṃ svasukham sāmyākhyam ātmānandam | vicāreṇa kiṃsārā ime bhogā ity evaṃrūpeṇa || MoT_4,23.51 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;bhogeṣu prasaro yasyā manovṛtteḥ pradīyate /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;sāpy ādāv eva hantavyā viṣasyevāṅkurodgatiḥ // Mo_4,23.52 //<br>
sā manovṛttiḥ | ādau prasaradānāt prāk | yasyāḥ tu na dīyate tasyāḥ kā kathety apiśabdābhiprāyaḥ || MoT_4,23.52 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
nanu prathamaṃ hatāyāḥ paścāt prasaradāne kim phalam ity | atrāha<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;tāḍitasya hi yaḥ paścāt sammānaḥ so 'py anantakaḥ /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;śāler grīṣmopataptasya kuseko 'py amṛtāyate // Mo_4,23.53 //<br>
sammānaḥ ādaraḥ | prasaradānam iti yāvat || MoT_4,23.53 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
nanu katham etad ity | atrāha<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;anārtena hi sammāno bahumāno na budhyate /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;pūrṇānāṃ saritām prāvṛṭpūraḥ svalpaṃ virājate // Mo_4,23.54 //<br>
hi yasmāt | anārtenādṛṣṭapīḍanena | sammānaḥ bahumānaḥ na budhyate na 
jñāyate | etad dṛṣṭāntena samarthayati pūrṇānām iti | pūrṇānāṃ saritām 
prāvṛṭpūraḥ svalpam tokam | virājate | janamanaāhlādakāritvābhāvād ity 
arthaḥ | janamano hi kṣīṇānāṃ nadīnām prāvṛṭpūradarśanena sānandam 
bhavati || MoT_4,23.54 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;pūrṇas tūpakṛto 'py anyat punar apy abhivāñchati /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;jagatpūraṇayāpy ambu gṛhṇāty ekārṇavo 'khilam // Mo_4,23.55 //<br>
jagatpūraṇayā yukto 'pīti śeṣaḥ || MoT_4,23.55 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;manaso nigṛhītasya yā paścād bhāgamaṇḍanā /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;tām evālabdhavistāralabdhatvād bahu manyate // Mo_4,23.56 //<br>
bhāgamaṇḍanā leśena pūraṇā | tām eva bhāgamaṇḍanām eva | alabdhavistāraś
 cāsau labdhaś ca alabdhavistāralabdhaḥ | tasya bhāvaḥ tattvam | tasmāt |
 alabdhavistāraḥ labdhaḥ hi svalpam api bahu manyate || MoT_4,23.56 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;baddhamukto mahīpālo grāmamātreṇa tuṣyati /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;parair abaddho nākrānto rājyenāpi na tuṣyati // Mo_4,23.57 //<br>
ādau baddhaḥ paścān muktaḥ baddhamuktaḥ | tathā nigṛhītam manaḥ bhogaleśenaiva tuṣyatīti bhāvaḥ || MoT_4,23.57 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
indriyanigrahadvāreṇa manonigrahasya sādhyatvād indriyanigraham eva kathayati<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;hastaṃ hastena sampīḍya dantair dantān vicūrṇya ca /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;aṅgāny aṅgair ivākramya jaya svendriyaśātravān // Mo_4,23.58 //<br>
viṣayeṣu pravṛttāni indriyāṇi samyagjñānabalena pratyāharaṇīyānīti bhāvaḥ || MoT_4,23.58 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;jetum anyaṃ kṛtotsāhaiḥ puruṣair udbubhūṣubhiḥ /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;pūrvaṃ hṛdayaśatrutvāj jñātavyānīndriyāṇy alam // Mo_4,23.59 //<br>
anyam rājādirūpam | udbhavitum icchubhiḥ udbubhūṣubhiḥ | jñātavyāni 
śatrutveneti śeṣaḥ | hṛdayaśatrutvam cendriyāṇām bhogān praty 
ākarṣaṇakāritvena jñeyam || MoT_4,23.59 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
manojayayuktānām praśaṃsāṃ karoti<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;etāvati dharaṇitale<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;subhagās te sādhucetanāḥ puruṣāḥ /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;puruṣakathāsu ca gaṇyā<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;na jitā ye na cetasā svena // Mo_4,23.60 //<br>
spaṣṭam || MoT_4,23.60 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
sargāntaślokenāpy etad eva kathayati<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;hṛdayabile kṛtakuṇḍala<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;ulbaṇakalanāviṣo manobhujagaḥ /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;yasyopaśāntim āgata<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;uditaṃ tam arindamaṃ vande // Mo_4,23.61 //<br>
sa eva sarvotkṛṣṭa iti bhāvaḥ | iti śivam || MoT_4,23.61 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
iti śrībhāskarakaṇṭhaviracitāyāṃ śrīmokṣopāyaṭīkāyāṃ sthitiprakaraṇe trayoviṃśaḥ sargaḥ ||23||<br>

<br>
nanu tarhīndriyajaye kaḥ kleśa ity | atrāha<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;mahānarakasamrājo mattaduṣkṛtavāraṇāḥ /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;āśāśaraśalākāḍhyā durjayā hīndriyārayaḥ // Mo_4,24.1 //<br>
mattaduṣkṛtāny eva vāraṇā yeṣām | te | āśā eva śaraśalākāḥ yeṣām | 
tādṛśāḥ | samrājaḥ api vāraṇayuktāḥ śarayuktāś ca bhavanti || MoT_4,24.1
 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;svāśrayam prathamaṃ dehaṃ kṛtaghnā nāśayanti ye /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;te kukāryamahākośā durjayāḥ svendriyārayaḥ // Mo_4,24.2 //<br>
nāśayanti asambhavino bhogān prati ceṣṭāṃ kārayanti || MoT_4,24.2 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;kalevarālayam prāpya viṣayāmiṣagardhataḥ /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;akṣagṛdhrā vivalganti kāryākāryograpakṣiṇaḥ // Mo_4,24.3 //<br>
kāryākārye eva ugrau pakṣau yeṣām | te | tādṛśāḥ || MoT_4,24.3 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;vivekatantujālena gṛhītā yena te śaṭhāḥ /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;tasyāṅgāni na lumpanti pāṣāṇakavalaṃ yathā // Mo_4,24.4 //<br>
te akṣagṛdhrāḥ | gṛdhrā hi pāṣāṇakavalaṃ na lumpanti || MoT_4,24.4 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;āpātaramaṇīyeṣu ramante viṣayeṣu ye /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;atyantavirasānteṣu patanti narakeṣu te // Mo_4,24.5 //<br>
atyantaṃ virasaḥ antaḥ yeṣām | teṣu | viṣayeṣv ity asya viśeṣaṇam etat || MoT_4,24.5 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;vivekadhanavān asmin kukalevarapattane /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;indriyāribhir antaḥsthair avaśo nābhibhūyate // Mo_4,24.6 //<br>
asmin anubhūyamāne | kukalevare nindite śarīre | balavān hi aribhiḥ nāvaśo 'bhibhūyate || MoT_4,24.6 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;na tathā sukhitā bhūyo mṛṇmayograpurījuṣaḥ /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;yathā svādhīnamanasaḥ svaśarīrapurīśvarāḥ // Mo_4,24.7 //<br>
mṛṇmayograpurījuṣaḥ bāhyanagarīrājānaḥ | svādhīnamanasa iti viśeṣaṇadvāreṇa hetuḥ || MoT_4,24.7 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;svākrāntendriyabhṛtyasya sugṛhītamanoripoḥ /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;vasanta iva mañjaryo vardhante buddhabuddhayaḥ // Mo_4,24.8 //<br>
buddhānām jñāninām | buddhayaḥ | buddhabuddhayaḥ || MoT_4,24.8 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;prakṣīṇacittadarpasya nigṛhītendriyadviṣaḥ /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;padminya iva hemante kṣīyante bhogavāsanāḥ // Mo_4,24.9 //<br>
bhogavāsanāḥ bhogasaṃskārāḥ || MoT_4,24.9 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;tāvan niśīva vetālyo valganti hṛdi vāsanāḥ /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;ekatattvadṛḍhābhyāsād yāvan na vijitam manaḥ // Mo_4,24.10 //<br>
vijite tu manasi na valgantīti bhāvaḥ | ekatattvam sarvavyāpakaṃ śuddhacinmātratattvam || MoT_4,24.10 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;bhṛtyo 'bhimatakartṛtvān mantrī satkāryakāraṇāt /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;sāmantaḥ svendriyākrānter mano manye vivekinaḥ // Mo_4,24.11 //<br>
sāmantaḥ śatrujaye adhikṛtaḥ || MoT_4,24.11 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;lālanāt snigdhalalanā pālanāt pāvanaḥ pitā /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;suhṛd uttamaviśvāsān mano manye manīṣiṇām // Mo_4,24.12 //<br>
lālanāt lālanākāritvāt | snigdhalalanā snehayuktā cāsau | lalanā strī || MoT_4,24.12 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;svālokitaṃ śāstradṛśā sudhyātaṃ svanunāthitam /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;prayacchati parāṃ siddhiṃ tyaktvātmānam manaḥpitā // Mo_4,24.13 //<br>
suṣṭhur anunāthitam yācitam | ātmānaṃ tyaktvā nāśayitvā | mano hi 
svātmānaṃ nāśayitvaiva hitaṃ sampādayati | pitāpi putrasya 
svaprāṇatyāgena hitaṃ karotīti tasyopamānatvam || MoT_4,24.13 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;sughṛṣṭaḥ suparāmṛṣṭaḥ sudhṛtaḥ svanubodhitaḥ /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;suguṇāyojito bhāti hṛdi hṛdyo manomaṇiḥ // Mo_4,24.14 //<br>
maṇipakṣe svanubodhitaḥ samyakparīkṣitaḥ | suguṇeṣu praśasteṣu guṇeṣu tantuṣu ca | ā samantāt | yojitaḥ || MoT_4,24.14 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;janmavṛkṣakuṭhārāṇi tathodarkodayāni ca /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;diśaty eṣa manomantrī karmāṇi śubhakarmaṇaḥ // Mo_4,24.15 //<br>
udarkaḥ uttaraphalabhūtaḥ | udayaḥ yeṣām | tāni | śubhakarmaṇaḥ śubhakarmakāriṇaḥ puruṣasya || MoT_4,24.15 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
phalitam āha<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;evam manomaṇiṃ rāma bahupaṅkakalaṅkitam /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;vivekavāriṇā siddhyai prakṣālyālokavān bhava // Mo_4,24.16 //<br>
siddhyai cinmātrasvarūpaparamātmatattvalābhākhyāyai siddhyai | ālokavān 
prakāśavān | maṇiprakṣālako 'pi tamasi ālokavān bhavati | ratnālokasya 
vidyamānatvāt || MoT_4,24.16 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;bhavabhūmiṣu bhīmāsu vivekavitato 'pi san /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;mā patotpātapūrṇāsu vivaśaḥ prākṛto yathā // Mo_4,24.17 //<br>
bhīmāsu bhayapradāsu | mā pata mā gaccha | vivekavān apy ahaṃ yadi 
gacchāmy api | kim mama setsyatīti niścaye 'pi mā gaccheti dyotayitum 
apiśabdaḥ | prākṛtaḥ vivekarahitaḥ | patane tu tvam api vivekavān nāsīti
 bhāvaḥ || MoT_4,24.17 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;saṃsāramāyām uditām anarthaśatasaṅkulām /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;mā mahāmohamihikām imāṃ tvam avadhīraya // Mo_4,24.18 //<br>
māvadhīraya kim mām iyaṃ karotīty avagaṇanāviṣayam mā kuru || MoT_4,24.18 ||<br>

&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;vivekam param āśritya buddhyā satyam avekṣya ca /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;indriyārīn alaṃ jitvā tīrṇo bhava bhavā[rṇavāt] // Mo_4,24.19 //<br>

 prāpya | anyathā teṣāṃ śaktir nābhūd iti bhāvaḥ || MoT_4,25.22 ||<br>

&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;atha śambaradaityena dudrikahvadrumādayaḥ /<br>

&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;tān apy antaram āsādya jaghnur gīrvāṇanāyakāḥ /<br>

&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;senāpatīn punaś cānyāṃś cakārāsurasattamaḥ /<br>

<br>
tān eva viśinaṣṭi<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;abhāvāt karmaṇāṃ te ca prāktanānām avāsanāḥ /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;nirvikalpakacinmātraparispandaikakarmiṇaḥ // Mo_4,25.37 //<br>
te ca traya āsan kathambhūtāḥ | sadyaḥ utthitatvena prāktanānāṃ karmaṇām
 abhāvāt avāsanāḥ vāsanārahitāḥ | punaḥ kathambhūtāḥ | nirvikalpakam 
vikalparahitam | yat cinmātram | tasya yaḥ parispandaḥ | tadrūpam ekam 
karma eṣām astīti tādṛśāḥ | nirvikalpaceṣṭā ity arthaḥ || MoT_4,25.37 ||<br>

&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;karmabījaṃ kalāṃ tanvīṃ dadhānā mananābhidhām /<br>

punaḥ kathambhūtāḥ | karmabījam karmabījabhūtām | tanvīm alpām | 
mananābhidhām kalāṃ dadhānāḥ | ata eva apuṣṭāṃ kṛtrimām āhāryām | tām 
mananābhidhāṃ kalām ādāya | udayam prādurbhāvam | āgatāḥ | anyathā 
brahmaṇaḥ utthānaṃ na syād iti bhāvaḥ || MoT_4,25.38 ||<br>

&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;pāramparyeṇa te hy atra kākatālīyavad bhaṭāḥ /<br>

&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;nābhipātaṃ na cāpātaṃ vidus te na palāyanam /<br>

kiṃ cintayām āsety | atrāha vijeṣyate iti | māyayā utpāditāḥ asurāḥ 
māyāsurāḥ | taiḥ surakṣitā matsenā | hi niścaye | vijeṣyate vijayam 
prāpsyati || MoT_4,25.43 ||<br>

&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;iṣṭāniṣṭābhir ete hi vāsanābhiḥ samujjhitāḥ /<br>

&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;yad ete na palāyante devair abhihatā api /<br>

&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;daityāḥ sāgarakuñjebhyaḥ kandarebhyaḥ surācalāt /<br>

&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;athottasthur nikuñjebhyaḥ kandarebhyaḥ surācalāt /<br>

ā samantāt kṣubdhāḥ ākṣubdhāḥ | svarvāsinām devānām || MoT_4,26.4 ||<br>

tat prasiddham || MoT_4,26.5 ||<br>

<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;petuḥ pralayaparyastasacandrārkādrivad divaḥ /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;śirāṃsi kuṇḍalodvāntatejaḥpītatamāṃsy adhaḥ // Mo_4,26.6 //<br>
pralaye paryastāḥ vāteritāḥ | ye sacandrārkāḥ adrayaḥ | tadvat | śirāṃsi
 divaḥ ākāśāt | adhaḥ bhūmau | petuḥ | śirāṃsi kathambhūtāni | kuṇḍalaiḥ
 udvāntam udvamitam | yat tejaḥ | tena pītaṃ tamaḥ | yaiḥ | tāni || 
MoT_4,26.6 ||<br>

<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;jughūrṇur bhaṭanirmuktasiṃhanādavirāvitāḥ /<br>

<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;rejur ātmaśilātulyahetipātārtavṛttayaḥ /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;kulācalataṭā bhītavibhrāntaharimaṇḍalāḥ // Mo_4,26.8 //<br>
kulācalataṭāḥ rejuḥ | kathambhūtāḥ | ātmanaḥ ātmasambandhinyaḥ | yā 
śilāḥ | tābhiḥ tulyāḥ | yā hetayaḥ | tāsāṃ yaḥ pātaḥ | tenārtā dīnā | 
vṛttiḥ sthitiḥ yeṣām | tādṛśāḥ | punaḥ kathambhūtāḥ | bhītāni ata eva 
vibhrāntāni harimaṇḍalāni siṃhamaṇḍalāni yeṣām | te || MoT_4,26.8 ||<br>

&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;vilesū raktamāṃsaughapūrṇaikārṇavatīragāḥ /<br>

<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;prasphuradrudhirāsāraśāntapāṃsupayodhare /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;vyomni hetihatakṣuṇṇamaulikuṇḍalakoṭayaḥ // Mo_4,26.11 //<br>
hetihatānāṃ yodhānām | kṣuṇṇā nipatitāni | yāni maulikuṇḍalāni | teṣāṃ 
koṭayaḥ vyomni | vilesur iti pūrveṇa sambandhaḥ || MoT_4,26.11 ||<br>
<br>
<br>

&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;vināyakakarākṛṣṭadīrghadānavaparvatam /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;ekadiktaṭaniḥspandasiddhasādhyamarudgaṇam // Mo_4,26.55 //<br>
spaṣṭam || MoT_4,26.55 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;palāyamānagandharvakinnarāmaracāraṇam /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;śavībhūtakṣatakṣīṇapatadgandharvanāyakam // Mo_4,26.56 //<br>
spaṣṭam || MoT_4,26.56 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;kiñcillabdhajayaprāyadaityadānavamaṇḍalam /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;dūyamānasurānīkam ekāntodvignavāsavam // Mo_4,26.57 //<br>
spaṣṭam || MoT_4,26.57 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;uttarāśāmiladvahniraktahetivṛhatprabham /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;pratikṣaṇaṃ lasaddāhaprakāśatimirolbaṇam // Mo_4,26.58 //<br>
uttarāśayā uttaradiśā | milan yaḥ vahniḥ | tena raktā hetīnāṃ vṛhatyaḥ 
prabhāḥ yatra | tat | devamandiradāhottho 'tra vahnir jñeyaḥ | 
pratikṣaṇam kṣaṇe kṣaṇe | lasan yaḥ dāhaḥ gṛhadāhaḥ | tena ye 
prakāśatimire | tābhyām ulbaṇam | timiram atra dhūmakṛtaṃ jñeyam || 
MoT_4,26.58 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
sargāntaślokena samīracalanaṃ kathayati<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;vavur aśaninipātapiṇḍitāṅgā<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;dalitaśilāśakalā diśām mukheṣu /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;pralayasamayasūcakāḥ surāṇām<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;urutaraghargharaghasmarāḥ samīrāḥ // Mo_4,26.59 //<br>
samīrāḥ vātāḥ | diśām mukheṣu vavuḥ vānti sma | kathambhūtāḥ | aśanīnāṃ 
yaḥ nipātaḥ | tena piṇḍitāny aṅgāni yeṣām | tādṛśāḥ | 
aśaninipātenaikatra militā ity arthaḥ | ata eva dalitāḥ śilāśakalāḥ yaiḥ
 | te tādṛśāḥ | urutaraḥ yaḥ ghargharaḥ ghargharaśabdaḥ | tena ghasmarāḥ
 śabdāntaragrāsakāriṇa ity arthaḥ | iti śivam || MoT_4,26.59 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
iti bhāskarakaṇṭhaviracitāyāṃ śrīmokṣopāyaṭīkāyāṃ sthitiprakaraṇe ṣaḍviṃśaḥ sargaḥ ||26||<br>

tataḥ kiṃ sampannam ity | atrāha<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;tasmiṃs tadā vartamāne ghore samarasambhrame /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;devāsuraśarīreṣu patatsv adridaleṣv iva // Mo_4,27.1 //<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;vahatsv abhrapravāheṣu gaṅgāpūreṣv ivāmbarāt /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;dāmni veṣṭitadevaughe muktakṣveḍāghanārave // Mo_4,27.2 //<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;vyāle nijakarākṛṣṭipiṣṭasarvasurālaye /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;kaṭe kaṭhinasaṃrambhasaṅgarācchāditāmare // Mo_4,27.3 //<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;airāvaṇe kṣīṇamade palāyanaparāyaṇe /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;pravṛddhe dānavānīke madhyāhna iva bhāskare // Mo_4,27.4 //<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;pātitāṅgāyudhārdhāni prasravadrudhirāṇi ca /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;payāṃsīva visetūni devasainyāni dudruvuḥ // Mo_4,27.5 //<br>
pātitāni arthāt asuraiḥ bhūmau pātitāni | aṅgānām āyudhānāṃ cārdhāni 
yeṣām | tāni cchinnāṅgāni cchinnāyudhāni ceti yāvat | ata eva prasravat 
rudhiraṃ yeṣām | tānīti tādṛśāni devasainyāni dudruvuḥ bhayena drutāni |
 kānīva | visetūni payāṃsīva | kasmin sati | tasminn ityādi | dāmni 
dāmākhye mahāsure | kaṭhinasaṃrambhaṃ yat saṅgaram saṅgrāmaḥ | tatra 
ācchāditāḥ amarāḥ yena | tādṛśe sati | kulakam || MoT_4,27.1-5||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;dāmavyālakaṭās tāni ciram antarhitāny api /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;anujagmur lasannādam indhanānīva pāvakāḥ // Mo_4,27.6 //<br>
tāni devasainyāni | anujagmuḥ paścād dhāvanti sma | antarhitānām anugamanaṃ na yuktam ity apiśabdo dyotayati || MoT_4,27.6 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;anviṣṭān api yatnena nālabhantāsurāḥ surān /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;ghanajālavanoḍḍīnān siṃhā hariṇakān iva // Mo_4,27.7 //<br>
spaṣṭam || MoT_4,27.7 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;alabdheṣv amaraugheṣu dāmavyālakaṭās tadā /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;jagmuḥ pātālakośasthaṃ prabhum pramuditāśayāḥ // Mo_4,27.8 //<br>
prabhuṃ śambaram || MoT_4,27.8 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;atha devā viṣaṇṇās te kṣaṇam āśvasya vai yayuḥ /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;jayopāyāya vijitā brahmāṇam amitaujasam // Mo_4,27.9 //<br>
viṣaṇṇāḥ mūrchitāḥ | āśvasya cetanāṃ labdhvā || MoT_4,27.9 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;teṣām āvirabhūd brahmā raktaraktānanaśriyām /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;sāyaṃ raktīkṛtāmbūnām abdhīnām iva candramāḥ // Mo_4,27.10 //<br>
raktena rudhireṇa | raktam ānanaṃ yeṣām | te | tādṛśānām | sāyam 
sāyaṃsandhyayety arthaḥ | candramaso vā raktīkaraṇe kartṛtvaṃ jñeyam | 
udayakāle tasya raktatvāt | tadā sāyam sāyaṃsamaya ity arthaḥ || 
MoT_4,27.10 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;praṇamya te surās tasmai tam arthaṃ śambareritam /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;samyak prakathayām āsur dāmavyālakaṭakramam // Mo_4,27.11 //<br>
te surāḥ śambareritam śambaraprādurbhāvitam | tam dāmavyālakaṭakramam 
artham dāmādikramākhyaṃ vastu | praṇamya tasmai | samyak prakathayām 
āsuḥ || MoT_4,27.11 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;tam ākarṇyākhilam brahmā vicārya ca vicāravit /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;uvācedaṃ surānīkam āśvāsanakaraṃ vacaḥ // Mo_4,27.12 //<br>
tam dāmavyālakaṭakramam | surānīkam devasainyam || MoT_4,27.12 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
brahmā kathayati<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;hanta varṣasahasrānte śambareṇa hareḥ kramāt /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;martavyam amareśasya tāvat kālam pratīkṣyatām // Mo_4,27.13 //<br>
hanta kaṣṭe | śambareṇa kartrā | varṣasahasrānte amareśasya hareḥ viṣṇoḥ
 | kramāt yuddhākhyāt kramāt | martavyam maraṇīyam | tāvat kālam asau na
 mariṣyatīti bhāvaḥ | yuṣmābhiḥ tāvat kālam pratīkṣyatām || MoT_4,27.13 
||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
nanu tarhi tāvat kālam bādhāṃ kurvataḥ dāmādīn kiṃ kurma ity | atrāha<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;dāmavyālakaṭān etān adya tv amarasattamāḥ /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;yodhayantaḥ palāyadhvam māyāyuddhena dānavān // Mo_4,27.14 //<br>
he amarasattamāḥ | yūyam etān dāmavyālakaṭān dānavān māyāyuddhena 
yodhayantaḥ yuddhaṃ kārayantaḥ santaḥ | palāyadhvam || MoT_4,27.14 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
nanu asmatpalāyanena kim eṣāṃ setsyatīty | atrāha<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;yuddhābhyāsavaśād eṣām makurāṇām ivāśaye /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;ahaṅkāracamatkāraḥ pratibimbam upaiṣyati // Mo_4,27.15 //<br>
eṣām dāmādīnām | ahaṅkāracamatkāraḥ vayaṃ yuddhe jayinaḥ smaḥ ity 
evaṃrūpo 'hambhāvāsvādaḥ | āśaye manasi | pratibimbam upaiṣyati || 
MoT_4,27.15 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
nanu tato 'pi kiṃ setsyatīty | atrāha<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;gṛhītavāsanās tv ete dāmavyālakaṭāḥ surāḥ /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;sujayā vo bhaviṣyanti jālalagnāḥ khagā iva // Mo_4,27.16 //<br>
vāsanāyā eva vakṣyamānanayena vaivaśyakāritvāt || MoT_4,27.16 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
nanv adya kathaṃ na jetuṃ śakyā ete ity | atrāha<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;adya tv avāsanā ete sukhaduḥkhavivarjitāḥ /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;dhairyeṇārīn vinighnanto devadurjayatāṃ gatāḥ // Mo_4,27.17 //<br>
tu pakṣāntare | adya avāsanāḥ ahaṃvāsanārahitāḥ | ata eva 
sukhaduḥkhavivarjitāḥ | ata eva dhairyeṇa arīn vinighnantaḥ | 
devadurjayatām yuṣmaddurjayatām iti yāvat | gatāḥ | sukhādirahito hi 
bhītirahitatvād durjayo bhavati || MoT_4,27.17 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
nanu vāsanayā katham ete vaśyā bhaviṣyantīty | atrāha<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;vāsanātantubaddhā ye āśāpāśavaśīkṛtāḥ /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;vaśyatāṃ yānti te loke rajjubaddhāḥ khagā iva // Mo_4,27.18 //<br>
ye vāsanātantubaddhā ahaṃvāsanātantubaddhāḥ | bhavanti | te 
āśāpāśavaśīkṛtāḥ santaḥ | loke vaśyā bhavanti | te ke iva | rajjubaddhāḥ
 khagā iva | ayam bhāvaḥ | puruṣaḥ antaḥsthitayāhaṃvāsanayā mamedam 
bhavatv etan mā bhavatv ity evaṃrūpayāśayāviṣṭo bhavati | tayā ca 
dainyaṃ gacchati | tena parasya vaśyo bhavatīti || MoT_4,27.18 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
nanu vāsanārahitāḥ kathaṃ durjayā bhavantīty | atrāha<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;ye hi nirvāsanā dhīrāḥ sarvatrāsaktabuddhayaḥ /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;na hṛṣyanti na kupyanti durjayās te mahādhiyaḥ // Mo_4,27.19 //<br>
sarvatra heye upādeye vā | asaktā rāgadveṣarūpayā āsaktyā rahitā | 
buddhiḥ yeṣām | tādṛśāḥ | upādeyarāgena heyadveṣeṇaiva ca puruṣaḥ jeyo 
bhavati | anyathā viditanayāḥ rājānaḥ dravyadānena śatrūn jetuṃ na 
yateran | tadabhāve tu svaśarīre 'pi rāgarahitaḥ puruṣaḥ na kenāpi jetuṃ
 śakyate iti bhāvaḥ | dveṣasyāsaktitvam āsaktyutpādakatvena jñeyam | 
dveṣeṇa hi heyān nivṛttaḥ puruṣaḥ upādeye dṛḍhataraṃ 
rāgāparaparyāyāsaktiyukto bhavati || MoT_4,27.19 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;yasyāntarvāsanārajjvā granthibandhaḥ śarīriṇaḥ /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;mahān api bahujño 'pi sa bālenāpi jīyate // Mo_4,27.20 //<br>
anyathā bāleṣv api dhanāḍhyeṣu vidyāvayovṛddhāḥ praṇāmaṃ na kuryur iti bhāvaḥ || MoT_4,27.20 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;ayaṃ so 'ham idaṃ me tad ity ākalitakalpanaḥ /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;āpadām pātratām eti payasām iva sāgaraḥ // Mo_4,27.21 //<br>
ākalitā ā samantāt dhṛtā | kalpanā saṅkalpaḥ yena | saḥ | āpadām 
mamaitad bhavatv etan mā bhavatv ity evaṃrūpāṇām || MoT_4,27.21 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;iyanmātraparicchinno yenātmā bhavya bhāvitaḥ /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;sa sarvajño 'pi sarvatra parāṃ kṛpaṇatāṃ gataḥ // Mo_4,27.22 //<br>
he bhavya he indra | yena ātmā svasvarūpam | iyanmātraparicchinnaḥ | 
iyanmātraṃ cāsau dehādimātrarūpaś cāsau | ata eva paricchinnaś ceti 
tādṛśaḥ | bhāvitaḥ bhāvanāviṣayīkṛtaḥ | saḥ puruṣaḥ | sarvajñaḥ api 
sarvatra parāṃ niratiśayām | kṛpaṇatām dīnatām | gataḥ gacchatīty arthaḥ
 | dehaniṣṭho hi dehahitam icchann avaśyam eva kṛpaṇatām eti || 
MoT_4,27.22 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;anantasyāprameyasya yeneyattā prakalpitā /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;ātmatattvasya tenātmā svātmanaivāvaśīkṛtaḥ // Mo_4,27.23 //<br>
anantasyāntasākṣitvena sthitatvāt tadrahitasya | aprameyasya kevalam 
pramātṛrūpeṇa sthitatvāt prameyatām aspṛśamānasya | ātmatattvasya | yena
 iyattā dehāvacchinnatvākhyam iyanmātratvam | prakalpitā kalpanayā 
bhāvitā | tenājñāninā | svātmanaiva ātmāvaśīkṛtaḥ | avaśyambhāvi hi 
dehāvacchinnasya bhogavaivaśyam || MoT_4,27.23 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
nanu katham etad astīty | atrāha<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;ātmano vyatiriktaṃ yat kiñcid asti jagattraye /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;tatropādeyabhāvena baddhā bhavati bhāvanā // Mo_4,27.24 //<br>
 ātmanaḥ paricchinnatvena bhāvitasyātmanaḥ | yat kiñcit vyatiriktam | 
bhāvitam iti śeṣaḥ | bhāvitam asti | tatra aprāptatvābhimānena utpannena
 upādeyabhāvena upādeyatayā | bhāvanā baddhā bhavati | 
bhāvanābandhasyaiva ca vaivaśyam iti nāmeti bhāvaḥ || MoT_4,27.24 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
bhāvanābandhasya vaivaśyeti nāmayuktatākāri duḥkhakāraṇatvaṃ kathayati<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;āsthāmātram anantānāṃ duḥkhānāṃ kāraṇaṃ viduḥ /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;anāsthāmātram abhitaḥ sukhānāṃ kāraṇaṃ viduḥ // Mo_4,27.25 //<br>
āsthāmātram bhāvanābandhamātram || MoT_4,27.25 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
sāmānyena samarthanaṃ kṛtvā viśeṣaṃ smarati<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;dāmavyālakaṭā yāvad anāsthā bhāvasaṃsthitau /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;tāvan na nāma jeyā vo maṣakāṇām ivānilāḥ // Mo_4,27.26 //<br>
anāsthāḥ āsthārahitāḥ | bhāvasaṃsthitau dehādipadārthasaṃsthitau || MoT_4,27.26 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;antarvāsanayā jantur dīnatām anuyātayā /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;jito bhavaty anyathā tu maṣako 'py amarācalaḥ // Mo_4,27.27 //<br>
anyathā vāsanārāhitye || MoT_4,27.27 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;vidyate vāsanā yatra tatra cāyāti dīnatā /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;guṇāguṇānuviddhatvaṃ sato dṛṣṭaṃ hi nāsataḥ // Mo_4,27.28 //<br>
yatra ca vāsanā vidyate tatra dīnatā āyāti | pādapūraṇārthaḥ caśabdaḥ | 
hi yasmāt | guṇāguṇānuviddhatvam dīnatāpādakaṃ hitāhitānubandhitvam | 
sataḥ vāsanayāhitadehasattākasya | dṛṣṭam | asataḥ vāsanārāhityena 
śuddhacinmātrarūpatayāsatkalpasya | na dṛṣṭam || MoT_4,27.28 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
phalitam āha<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;ayaṃ so 'ham mamedaṃ cety evam antaḥ svavāsanām /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;yathā dāmādayaḥ śakra bhāvayanti tathā kuru // Mo_4,27.29 //<br>
ata iti śeṣaḥ | he śakra | yathā dāmādayaḥ ayaṃ so 'ham mamedaṃ cety 
evaṃrūpāṃ svavāsanām ahaṅkāravāsanām | antaḥ manasi | bhāvayanti 
vikalpayanti | tathā kuru | tataḥ jeyā bhaviṣyantīti bhāvaḥ || 
MoT_4,27.29 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
nanu kathaṃ na te mama jeyā bhaviṣyantīty | atrāha<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;yā yā janasya vipado bhāvābhāvadaśāś ca yāḥ /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;tṛṣṇākarañjavallyās tā mañjaryaḥ kaṭukomalāḥ // Mo_4,27.30 //<br>
tṛṣṇā eva duḥkhakāritvāt kaṇṭakavallī | tasyāḥ || MoT_4,27.30 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;vāsanātantubaddho 'yaṃ loko viparivartate /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;sā suvṛddhātiduḥkhāya sukhāyocchedam āgatā // Mo_4,27.31 //<br>
viparivartate vaiparītyam bhajati | sā vāsanā | ucchedam nāśam || MoT_4,27.31 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;dhīro 'py atibahujño 'pi kulajo 'pi mahān api /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;tṛṣṇayā badhyate jantuḥ siṃhaḥ śṛṅkhalayā yathā // Mo_4,27.32 //<br>
badhyate vivaśaḥ kriyate | tṛṣṇāgrasto hi sphuṭam eva vivaśo bhavati || MoT_4,27.32 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;dehapādapasaṃsthasya hṛdayālayaśāyinaḥ /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;tṛṣṇācittakhagasyāsya vāgurā parikalpitā // Mo_4,27.33 //<br>
spaṣṭam || MoT_4,27.33 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;dīno vāsanayā lokaḥ kṛtāntenāpakṛṣyate /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;rajjveva bālena khago vivaśo 'niśam ucchvasan // Mo_4,27.34 //<br>
kṛtāntena mamatārūpeṇa yamena | mamatāyā eva śrīvyāsena kṛtāntatvābhidhānāt || MoT_4,27.34 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;alam āyudhabhāreṇa saṅgarabhramaṇena ca /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;vāsanāṃ saviparyāsāṃ yuktyaiva tvaṃ ripoḥ kuru // Mo_4,27.35 //<br>
saviparyāsām viparyāsayuktām | ripoḥ dāmāditrayarūpasya | āyudhādibhiḥ tava na kiñcid api setsyatīti bhāvaḥ || MoT_4,27.35 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;antar akṣubhite dhairye ripor amaranāyakāḥ /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;na śastrāṇi na śāstrāṇi na cāstrāṇi jayanti vaḥ // Mo_4,27.36 //<br>
akṣubhite vāsanārāhityena kṣobharahite sati || MoT_4,27.36 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;dāmavyālakaṭās tv ete yuddhābhyāsavaśena ca /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;ahaṅkāramayīm antas te grahīṣyanti vāsanām // Mo_4,27.37 //<br>
ahaṅkāramayīm vayaṃ yotsyāma ity evaṃrūpām || MoT_4,27.37 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;yadi te yantrapuruṣāḥ śambareṇa vinirmitāḥ /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;vāsanāṃ nāśrayiṣyanti yāsyanti tad ajayyatām // Mo_4,27.38 //<br>
yantrapuruṣāḥ anusandhānarahitā iti yāvat || MoT_4,27.38 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;tat tāvad yuktiyuddhena tān prabodhayatāmarāḥ /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;yāvad abhyāsavaśato bhaviṣyanti savāsanāḥ // Mo_4,27.39 //<br>
prabodhayata vāsanāyuktān kuruta || MoT_4,27.39 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;tato vadhyā bhaviṣyanti bhavatām baddhabhāvanāḥ /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;tṛṣṇāprotāśayā loke na kecana napelavāḥ // Mo_4,27.40 //<br>
nanu yadi kadācit tato 'pi vadhyā na bhaviṣyanti tataḥ kiṃ kāryam ity | 
atrāha tṛṣṇeti | tṛṣṇāprotāśayāḥ tṛṣṇānuviddhamanasaḥ | pelavāḥ dīnāḥ | 
tṛṣṇāgrastāḥ sarve eva pelavā bhavanti | ataḥ te 'pi bhaviṣyanty eveti 
bhāvaḥ || MoT_4,27.40 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
sargāntaślokena brahmavākyaṃ samāpayati<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;samaviṣamam idaṃ jagat samagraṃ<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;samupagataṃ sthiratāṃ svavāsanātaḥ /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;calati ca laharībharo yathābdhāv<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;ata iha saiva cikitsyatām prayātā // Mo_4,27.41 //<br>
samaviṣamam sukhaduḥkhamayam | idam anubhūyamānam | samagraṃ jagat | 
svavāsanātaḥ ahaṅkāravāsanātaḥ | sthiratāṃ samupāgatam | sā vāsanā | iha
 loke | calati ca sphulati ca | ka iva | laharībhara iva | yathā 
laharībharaḥ abdhau samudre | calati | tathety arthaḥ | ataḥ sā vāsanā 
eva | cikitsyatām cikitsāyogyatām | prayātā bhavatīti śivam || 
MoT_4,27.41 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
iti śrībhāskarakaṇṭhaviracitāyāṃ śrīmokṣopāyaṭīkāyāṃ sthitiprakaraṇe saptaviṃśaḥ sargaḥ ||27||<br>
