brahmaṇaḥ antardhānaṃ kathayati<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;ity uktvā bhagavān devas tatraivāntardhim āyayau /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;velāvanataṭe śabdaṃ kṛtvevāmbutaraṅgakaḥ // Mo_4,28.1 //<br>
tatraiva tasmin sthāna eva | na tv anyatra gatvā | antardhim vyavadhānam || MoT_4,28.1 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;surās tv ākarṇya tadvākyaṃ jagmuḥ svām abhito diśam /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;kamalāmodam ādāya vanamālām ivānilāḥ // Mo_4,28.2 //<br>
spaṣṭam || MoT_4,28.2 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;dināni katicit sveṣu kānteṣu sthirakāntiṣu /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;dvirephā iva padmeṣu mandireṣu viśaśramuḥ // Mo_4,28.3 //<br>
spaṣṭam || MoT_4,28.3 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;kañcit kālaṃ samāsādya svātmodayakaraṃ śubham /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;cakrur dundubhinirghoṣam pralayābhraravopamam // Mo_4,28.4 //<br>
spaṣṭam || MoT_4,28.4 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;atha daityaiḥ saha vyomni taiḥ pātālatalotthitaiḥ /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;kālakṣepakaraṃ ghoram punar yuddham avartata // Mo_4,28.5 //<br>
kālakṣepakaram na tu śambaravadhakāri | tanmaraṇasya varṣasahasrānte 
brahmaṇā proktatvāt ity arthaḥ | devānām iti śeṣaḥ | samavartata 
samabhavat || MoT_4,28.5 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;vavur asiśaraśaktimudgaraughā<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;musulagadāparaśūgracakrasaṅghāḥ /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;aśanigiriśilāhutāśavṛkṣā<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;ahigaruḍādimukhāni cāyudhāni // Mo_4,28.6 //<br>
kīdṛśaṃ yuddhaṃ samavartatety apekṣāyām āha vavur iti | vavuḥ vānti sma | devadaityavisṛṣṭā iti śeṣaḥ || MoT_4,28.6 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;māyākṛtāyudhamahāmbughanapravāhā<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;kṣipram prati pratidiśam parinirjagāma /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;pāṣāṇaparvatamahītaṭavṛkṣalakṣa-<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;kṣubdhāmbupūraghanaghoṣavatī nadī drāk // Mo_4,28.7 //<br>
māyākṛtaḥ rākṣasaiḥ māyayā sampāditaḥ | āyudhamahāmbunaḥ āyudhayuktasya 
mahājalasya | ghanaḥ pravāhaḥ yasyāḥ | sā | tathā pāṣāṇaparvataṃ kṣipram
 prati kṣipraṃ kṣipram | mahītaṭavṛkṣāṇāṃ lakṣeṣu kṣubdhaḥ 
sañcaraṇaśīlaḥ | yaḥ ambupūraḥ āyudhayuktaḥ ambupūraḥ | tena ghanaḥ 
ghoṣaḥ vidyate yasyāḥ | sā | tādṛśī nadī āyudhamayī nadī | drāk śīghram |
 pratidiśaṃ nirjagāma nirgatā || MoT_4,28.7 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
kena pratidiśaṃ nirjagāmeti karaṇāpekṣāyāṃ saviśeṣaṇam āha<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;madhyapravāhavahadulmukaśūlaśaila-<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;prāsāsikuntaśaratomaramudgareṇa /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;gaṅgopamāmbuvalitāmaramandireṇa<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;sarvāsu dikṣv aśanivarṣaṇakarṣaṇena // Mo_4,28.8 //<br>
aśaniyuktaṃ varṣaṇam aśanivarṣaṇam | tena yat karṣaṇam diśaḥ prati 
nayanam | tena kṛtvā nirjagāmeti pūrveṇa sambandhaḥ | varṣeṇa hi nadyaḥ 
diśaḥ vyāpnuvanti | aśanivarṣaṇakarṣaṇena kathambhūtena | madhye 
pravāheṇa vahanti ulmukaśūlaśailaprāsāsikuntaśaratomaramudgarāṇi yatra |
 tat | tādṛśena | punaḥ kathambhūtena | sarvāsu dikṣu gaṅgopamaṃ yat 
ambu | tena valitāni amaramandirāṇi yena | tat | tādṛśena || MoT_4,28.8 
||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; pṛthvyādidāruṇaśarīramayī prahāra-<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;dānagrahe gaganaraśmiśarīrikaiva /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;yā yopaśāmyati surāsurasiddhasenā<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;māyākṛtā punar udeti rasena saiva // Mo_4,28.9 //<br>
yā yā | prahārāṇāṃ dānagrahe pṛthvyādivat dāruṇaṃ yat śarīram | tanmayī 
api | prahārāṇāṃ dāne grahaṇe ca samarthāpīti yāvat | paramārthataḥ 
māyārūpatvāt gaganasya yā raśmiḥ | śūnyam iti yāvat | tadrūpaṃ śarīram 
yasyāḥ | sā | tādṛśī eva satī | upaśāmyati mriyate | sā 
surāsurasiddhasenā punaḥ udeti eva | kathambhūtā | rasena icchayā | 
māyākṛtā māyayā kṛteti tādṛśī | arthāt indraśambarābhyām || MoT_4,28.9 
||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;śailopamāyudhavighaṭṭitabhūdharāṇi<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;raktāmbupūraparipūrṇamahārṇavāni /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;devāsurendrasuraśailavirūḍhakunta-<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;tālīvanāni kakubhāṃ vadanāny athāsan // Mo_4,28.10 //<br>
devāsurendrā eva suraśailāḥ sumeravaḥ | teṣu rūḍhāni | kuntā eva tālīvanāni | yeṣām | tāni || MoT_4,28.10 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;udgīrṇakuntaśaraśaktigadāsicakrā<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;helānigīrṇasuradānavamuktaśailā /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;kāṣakvaṇatkrakacadantanakhogramālā<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;jīvānvitāpatad athāyasasiṃhavṛṣṭiḥ // Mo_4,28.11 //<br>
atha āyasasiṃhavṛṣṭiḥ ayomayānāṃ siṃhānāṃ varṣaṇam | apatat | 
kathambhūtā | udgīrṇam sahapatitam | kuntaśaraśaktigadāsicakram yasyāḥ |
 sā | punaḥ kathambhūtā | helayā nigīrṇāḥ grastāḥ | suradānavaiḥ muktāḥ 
praharaṇabhūtāḥ | śailāḥ yayā | sā | kāṣe kāṣapāṣāṇe | kvaṇan 
gharṣaṇavaśena śabdāyamānaḥ | yaḥ krakacaḥ | tadvat ye dantanakhāḥ | 
teṣām ugrā mālā yasyāḥ | sā | tathā jīvānvitā jīvayuktā || MoT_4,28.11 
||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;ujjvālalocanaviṣajvalanātapodyad-<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;digdāhadarśitayugāntadineśasenā /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;uḍḍīyamānaparidīrghamahīmahīdhrā<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;mattābdhivad viṣadharāvalir ullalāsa // Mo_4,28.12 //<br>
viṣadharāṇām sarpāṇām | āvaliḥ paṅktiḥ | mattābdhivat mattasamudravat | 
ullalāsa ullasati sma | kathambhūtā | ujjvālaḥ udgatajvālaḥ | yaḥ 
locanaviṣajvalanaḥ | tasya yaḥ ātapaḥ | tenodyan | yaḥ digdāhaḥ | tena 
darśitā yugāntadineśānām kalpāntasūryāṇām | senā paṅktiḥ | yayā | sā | 
uḍḍīyamānāḥ uḍḍayanaśīlāḥ | paridīrghāḥ | mahyāḥ sambandhinaḥ mahīdhrāḥ 
parvatāḥ | yasyāḥ | sā || MoT_4,28.12 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;unnādavajramakarotkarakarkarāntar-<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;ikṣābdhivīcivalayair valitācalendraiḥ /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;āsīj jagat sakalam eva susaṅkaṭāṅgam<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;āvartibhir vividhahetinadīpravāhaiḥ // Mo_4,28.13 //<br>
unnādāni yāni vajrāṇi | tāny eva makarāḥ | teṣāṃ ya utkaraḥ | tena 
karkaraḥ karkarākhyaḥ śabdaviśeṣaḥ yasya | tat | tādṛśaṃ yat antarikṣam |
 tad evābdhiḥ samudraḥ | tasya vīcivalayaiḥ vīcimaṇḍalarūpaiḥ | tathā 
valitāḥ āvṛtāḥ | acalendrāḥ yaiḥ | te | tādṛśaiḥ | tathā āvartibhiḥ 
bhramayuktaiḥ | vividhahetayaḥ eva nadīpravāhāḥ | taiḥ | susaṅkaṭāṅgam 
atyantapūrṇasvarūpam | sakalam eva jagat āsīt || MoT_4,28.13 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;śailāstraśastragaruḍācalamālitocca-<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;nāgāṅganāsuragaṇāṅganam antarikṣam /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;āsīt kṣaṇaṃ jaladhibhiḥ kṣaṇam agnipūraiḥ<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;pūrṇaṃ kṣaṇaṃ dinakaraiḥ kṣaṇam andhakāraiḥ // Mo_4,28.14 //<br>
kṣaṇaṃ kṣaṇam ity anena jaladhyādīnām māyākṛtatvam uktam | antarikṣam 
kathambhūtam | śailarūpāṇi astraśastrāṇi śailāstraśastrāṇi | teṣām 
madhye ye garuḍācalāḥ māṇikyaparvatāḥ | taiḥ mālitāḥ dhṛtāḥ | uccā 
nāgāṅganāś cāsuragaṇāṅganāś ca yena | tat | surāṅganānāṃ tu sākṣād 
evākāśe sthitir iti tāsām akathanam | garuḍeti gakārasya dīrghābhāvaḥ 
ārṣaḥ | mantrodbhāvitās tu śailāḥ astrarūpāḥ sākṣāt prahitāḥ śastrarūpāḥ
 || MoT_4,28.14 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;garuḍaguḍaguḍākulāntarikṣa-<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;pravisṛtahetihutāśaparvataughaiḥ /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;jagad abhavad asahyakalpakāla-<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;jvalitasurālayabhūtalāntarālam // Mo_4,28.15 //<br>
garuḍānām yaḥ guḍaguḍaḥ guḍaguḍāśabdaḥ | tenākulam yad antarikṣam | 
tatra pravisṛtāḥ ye hetihutāśaparvataughāḥ | taiḥ kṛtvā | jagat | 
asahyaḥ yaḥ kalpakālaḥ pralayakālaḥ | tatraiva jvalitāni 
surālayabhūtalāntarāṇi yasya | tat | tādṛśam abhavat || MoT_4,28.15 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;udapatan vasudhātalato 'surā<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;gaganam adritaṭād iva pakṣiṇaḥ /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;atibalād apatan vibudhā bhuvi<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;pralayacālitaśailaśilā iva // Mo_4,28.16 //<br>
atibalād ity asya pūrvārdhena sambandhaḥ || MoT_4,28.16 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;śarīrarūḍhonnatahetivṛkṣa-<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;vanāvalīlagnamahāgnidāhāḥ /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;surāsurāḥ prāpur athāmbarāntaḥ<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;kalpānilāndolitaśailaśobhām // Mo_4,28.17 //<br>
atha surāsurāḥ ambarāntaḥ ākāśamadhye | kalpānilenāndolitāḥ ye śailāḥ | 
teṣāṃ śobhām prāpuḥ | kathambhūtāḥ | śarīrarūḍhāḥ yāḥ unnatahetayaḥ | tā
 eva vṛkṣavanāvalī | tasyāṃ lagnāḥ | mahāgneḥ tatsaṅghaṭṭotthasya 
mahataḥ agneḥ | dāhaḥ yeṣām | te | tādṛśāḥ || MoT_4,28.17 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;surāsurādrīndraśarīramuktai<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;raktapravāhair abhito bhramadbhiḥ /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;babhāra pūrṇam parito 'mbarābdhiḥ<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;sandhyāruṇodyacchatagaṅgam aṅgam // Mo_4,28.18 //<br>
surāsurā evādrīndrāḥ | teṣāṃ yāni śarīrāṇi | tebhyaḥ muktaiḥ | ata 
evābhitaḥ bhramadbhiḥ raktapravāhaiḥ kṛtvā | ambarābdhiḥ ākāśākhyaḥ 
samudraḥ | sandhyāruṇāḥ udyatyaḥ śataṃ gaṅgā yasya | tādṛśam aṅgam 
pūrṇam samyak | babhāra || MoT_4,28.18 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;girivarṣaṇam ambuvarṣaṇaṃ<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;vividhogrāyudhavarṣaṇaṃ tathā /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;viṣamāśanivarṣaṇaṃ ca te<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;śamam anyo'nyam athāgnivarṣaṇam // Mo_4,28.19 //<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;anayan nayamārgakovidā<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;dalitāśeṣagirīndrabhittayaḥ /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;sasṛjuś ca samaṃ samantataḥ<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;kakubaṅgeṣv iva puṣpavarṣaṇam // Mo_4,28.20 //<br>
atha naye astraśāntiśāstre | kovidāḥ nipuṇāḥ | te devāsurāḥ | etāni 
varṣaṇāni samantataḥ śamam anayan | etāni kāni | girivarṣaṇam ityādi | 
na kevalaṃ śamam anayan | kiṃ tu kakubaṅgeṣu sasṛjuś ca | kim iva | 
puṣpavarṣaṇam iva | te kathambhūtāḥ | dalitā aśeṣagirīndrāṇām bhittayaḥ 
yaiḥ | te | tādṛśāḥ | yugmam || MoT_4,28.19-20 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;devāsurāḥ sarasasaṅgarasambhramārtā<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;anyo'nyam aṅgadalanākulahetihastāḥ /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;dāmendraḍimbadahanāḥ pṛthupīṭhapīṭhaiḥ<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;kīrṇāsṛjo nabhasi babhramur ākṣipantaḥ // Mo_4,28.21 //<br>
devāsurāḥ nabhasi babhramuḥ | kathambhūtāḥ | sarasam vīrarasasahitam | 
yat saṅgaram saṅgrāmaḥ | tatra yaḥ saṃrambhaḥ udyogaḥ | tenārtāḥ 
vyākulāḥ | anyo'nyam aṅgadalanārtham ākulahetayaḥ hastāḥ yeṣām | te | 
tādṛśāḥ | dāmendrayoḥ ḍimbadahanāḥ manaḥsantāpakāritvāt cañcalāgnayaḥ | 
tatrāpi dāmnaḥ devāḥ indrasyāsurāḥ iti vibhāgaḥ | pṛthupīṭhāḥ 
pṛthusaṃsthānāḥ | ye pīṭhāḥ aṃsādipīṭhāḥ | taiḥ kīrṇāsṛjaḥ 
vikṣiptarudhirāḥ | tathā ākṣipantaḥ anyo'nyam ākṣepaṃ kurvantaḥ || 
MoT_4,28.21 ||<br>

<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;chinnaiḥ śiraḥkarabhujorubharair bhramadbhir<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;ākāśakośaśalabhair aśivais tadānīm /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;āsīj jagajjaṭharam abhravarair ivograir<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;ābhāskaraṃ sthagitadiktaṭaśailajālam // Mo_4,28.22 //<br>
chinnaiḥ | ata eva bhramadbhiḥ | ata eva ca ākāśe śalabhaiḥ 
śalabharūpaiḥ | aśivaiḥ amaṅgalakāribhiḥ | śiraḥkarabhujorubharaiḥ | 
jagajjaṭharam ābhāskaram sūryaṃ tāvat | sthagitāni diktaṭāni śailajālāni
 ca yasya | tat | tādṛśam āsīt | taiḥ kair iva | abhravarair iva 
uttamameghair iva || MoT_4,28.22 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;mattānalaṃ kṣubdhajalānilārkaṃ<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;daladvanaṃ śīrṇasurāsuraugham /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;brahmāṇḍam ākhaṇḍitakuḍyakoṇam<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;akālakalpāntakarālam āsīt // Mo_4,28.23 //<br>
ā samantāt | khaṇḍitāḥ kuḍyakoṇāḥ yasya | tat | tādṛśam || MoT_4,28.23 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;bhrāntam bhṛśam bhramitadiktaṭam adrikūṭair<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;ātmapramāṇaghanahetihatai raṇadbhiḥ /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;kūjadbhir ārtibhir ivāgraguhaughavātaiḥ<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;krandadbhir āpatitasiṃharavair adabhraiḥ // Mo_4,28.24 //<br>
adrikūṭaiḥ kartṛbhiḥ | bhṛśam bhrāntam bhramayuktaiḥ jñātam | katham 
bhrāntam | bhramitāni bhramayuktāni kṛtāni | diktaṭāni yatra | tat | 
adrikūṭaiḥ kathambhūtaiḥ | ātmapramāṇā adrikūṭapramāṇāḥ | yāḥ 
ghanahetayaḥ | tābhiḥ hatāḥ | taiḥ | ata eva raṇadbhiḥ | punaḥ 
kathambhūtaiḥ | guhaughāgrāṇāṃ vātāḥ agraguhaughavātāḥ | taiḥ | 
tadvyājeneti yāvat | ārtibhir iva kūjadbhiḥ | ārtyā yukto hi kūjati | 
punaḥ kathambhūtaiḥ | āpatitāḥ ye siṃhāḥ | teṣāṃ ye ravāḥ | taiḥ | 
tadvyājeneti yāvat | krandadbhiḥ ravaiḥ kathambhūtaiḥ | adabhraiḥ 
utkaṭaiḥ || MoT_4,28.24 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;māyānadījaladhiyodhaghanāgnidāhair<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;vṛkṣaiḥ surāsuraśavair acalaiḥ śilaughaiḥ /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;bhrāntaṃ śirastraśaraśaktigadāstravarṣair<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;vātāvakīrṇavanaparṇavad ambarāntaḥ // Mo_4,28.25 //<br>
ambarāntaḥ ākāśamadhyam | vātenāvakīrṇam valitam | yat vanaparṇam | 
tadvat | bhrāntam bhramayuktam āsīt | kaiḥ bhrāntam āsīt | na hi 
ambaramadhyasya bhramo yukta ity apekṣāyām āha māyānadītyādi | 
ambarāntaś cāriṇām māyānadyādīnām eva bhramaḥ ambarāntaḥ 
bhramatvenāropitaḥ || MoT_4,28.25 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;adrīndrapakṣaparimāṇagamāgamaika-<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;durvārahastataladāruṇatāḍanair drāk /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;āsīt patadbhaṭaśarīragirīndraghāta-<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;vibhraṣṭadevapurapūrṇajalārṇavaughaḥ // Mo_4,28.26 //<br>
adrīndrapakṣaparimāṇāś ca te gamāgamaikadurvārāś ca | tādṛśāḥ ye hastāḥ |
 teṣāṃ yāni talāni | taiḥ yāni tāḍanāni | taiḥ kṛtvā | drāk śīghram | 
patantaḥ ye bhaṭaśarīrāṇy eva girīndrāḥ | teṣāṃ ye ghātāḥ | taiḥ 
bhraṣṭāni yāni devapurāṇi | taiḥ pūrṇajalaś cāsau arṇavaughaḥ 
samudrasaptakam | saḥ | āsīt jāta ity arthaḥ || MoT_4,28.26 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;ghanaghuṅghumapūritāntarikṣā<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;kṣatajākṣālitabhūdharāntarālā /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;rudhirahradavṛttivartinī vā<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;bhuvanābhogaguhā tadākulābhūt // Mo_4,28.27 //<br>
bhuvanābhogaḥ bhuvanavistāraḥ | sa eva guhā | tadā tasmin samaye | ākulā
 abhūt | kathambhūtā | ghanaḥ yaḥ ghuṅghumaḥ yuddhakolāhalaḥ | 
tenāpūritam antarikṣam yasyāḥ | sā | tādṛśī | kṣatajaiḥ rudhiraiḥ | ā 
samantāt | kṣālitāni bhūdharāntarālāni yasyāḥ | sā | rudhirahradarūpā yā
 vṛttiḥ sthānam | tatra vartata iti tādṛśī | sthitau sthitimatītivat 
prayogaḥ | guhā ca maṣakaghuṅghumapūritāntarikṣā 
vṛṣṭikṣālitabhūdharāntarālā hradavartinī ca bhavati || MoT_4,28.27 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
sargāntaślokena asya raṇasya saṃsārasāmyaṃ kathayati<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;anantadikprasaravikārakāriṇī<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;kṣayodayonmukhasukhaduḥkhadāyinī /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;raṇakriyāsurasurasaṅghasaṅkaṭā<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;tadābhavat khalu sadṛśīha saṃsṛteḥ // Mo_4,28.28 //<br>
khalu niścaye | sā raṇakriyā iha samsṛtisadṛśī abhavat | kathambhūtā | 
anantadikṣu yaḥ prasaraḥ | tena vikāram hiṃsākhyaṃ vikāram | karotīti 
tādṛśī | kṣayodayonmukhe ye sukhaduḥkhe | te dadātīti tādṛśī | 
asurasurasaṅghena saṅkaṭā sambādhā | saṃsṛtir api prasareṇa bandhākhyaṃ 
vikāraṃ karoti | sukhaduḥkhadāyinī nānāpadārthasaṅkaṭā ca bhavati | iti 
śivam || MoT_4,28.28 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
iti śrībhāskarakaṇṭhaviracitāyāṃ śrīmokṣopāyaṭīkāyāṃ sthitiprakaraṇe aṣṭāviṃśaḥ sargaḥ ||28||<br>

<br>
yuddham upasaṃharati<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;evamprāyākulārambhair asurair asuhāribhiḥ /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;mahāsāhasasaṃrabdhair ārabdhamaraṇai raṇaiḥ // Mo_4,29.1 //<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;māyayātha vivādena sandhinā vigraheṇa ca /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;palāyanena dhairyeṇa cchadmanopāyanena ca // Mo_4,29.2 //<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;kārpaṇyenāstrayuddhena svāntardhānaiś ca bhūriśaḥ /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;kṛtaḥ sa samaro devais triṃśad varṣāṇi pañca ca // Mo_4,29.3 //<br>
devaiḥ triṃśat pañca ca varṣāṇi pañcatriṃśadvarṣāṇi | asuraiḥ saha | saḥ
 samaraḥ kṛtaḥ | kena kena prakāreṇa kṛta ity apekṣāyām māyayetyādi | 
upāyanena samīpagamanena | kārpaṇyena dīnatayā | svāntardhānaiḥ 
māyodbhāvitaiḥ nijagopanaiḥ | asuraiḥ kathambhūtaiḥ | evamprāyaḥ 
bāhulyenaitādṛśaḥ | samārambhaḥ yeṣām | taiḥ | asuhāribhiḥ jīvahāribhiḥ |
 mahāsāhase saṃrabdhāḥ saṃrambhayuktāḥ | taiḥ | punaḥ kathambhūtaiḥ | 
raṇaiḥ kṛtvā ārabdham maraṇam yaiḥ | te | tādṛśaiḥ | tilakam || 
MoT_4,29.1-3 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;varṣāṇi divasān māsān daśāṣṭau pañca sapta ca /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;varṣāṇi petur vṛkṣāgnihetyambvaśanibhūbhṛtām // Mo_4,29.4 //<br>
vṛkṣāgnihetyambvaśanibhūbhṛtām varṣāṇi vṛṣṭayaḥ | petuḥ | kiyantaṃ kālam
 | daśa varṣāṇi | aṣṭau māsān | pañca sapta ca dvādaśeti yāvat | divasān
 | arthāt anyasmin kāle sandhyādir evābhūt iti jñeyam || MoT_4,29.4 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;etāvatā tu kālena dṛḍhābhyāsād ahaṅkṛteḥ /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;dāmādayo 'ham ity āsthāṃ jagṛhur grastacetasaḥ // Mo_4,29.5 //<br>
ahaṅkṛteḥ vayaṃ yotsyāma ity evaṃrūpasyāhaṅkārasya | grastam ahaṅkāragrastam | cetaḥ yeṣām | te | tādṛśāḥ || MoT_4,29.5 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;naikaṭyātiśayād yadvad darpaṇam bimbavad bhavet /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;abhyāsātiśayāt tadvat te 'py ahaṅkāritāṃ gatāḥ // Mo_4,29.6 //<br>
naikaṭyātiśayāt sānnidhyodrekāt | bimbavat pratibimbayuktam || MoT_4,29.6 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;yadvad dūrataraṃ vastu nādarśe pratibimbate /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;padārthavāsanā tadvad anabhyāsān na jāyate // Mo_4,29.7 //<br>
dūrataram bahudūrāt | padārtheṣu yuddhādibhāveṣu | vāsanā mayedaṃ kṛtam ity evaṃrūpaḥ saṃskāraḥ || MoT_4,29.7 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;yadā dāmādayo jātā jātāhaṅkāravāsanāḥ /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;tadā me jīvitam me 'rtha iti dainyam upāgaman // Mo_4,29.8 //<br>
yadā dāmādayaḥ dāmavyālakaṭāḥ | jātā utpannā | ahaṅkāravāsanā yeṣām | te
 | tādṛśāḥ | jātāḥ sampannāḥ | tadā me jīvitam me artha iti evaṃrūpam | 
dainyam dīnatām | upāgaman upāgatāḥ | ahaṅkārābhāve hi bhittirahitam 
mamatārūpaṃ dainyaṃ na syāt eva | tatsattāyāṃ tu prāptādhāratvena tad 
durnivāram eveti bhāvaḥ || MoT_4,29.8 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;bhayavāsanayā grastā mohavāsanayā hatāḥ /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;āśāpāśanibaddhās te tataḥ kṛpaṇatāṃ gatāḥ // Mo_4,29.9 //<br>
tataḥ dainyopāgamanānantaram | te dāmādayaḥ | bhayasya 
dehanāśaśaṅkādyutpannāyā bhīteḥ | yā vāsanā saṃskāraḥ | tayā grastāḥ 
vaśīkṛtāḥ | tathā mohasya anātmani śarīrādau 
ātmatvabhāvanārūpasyājñānasya | yā vāsanā | tayā hatāḥ bādhitāḥ | 
āśāpāśaiḥ svātmatvābhimānaviṣayīkṛtaśarīrādyarthaṃ dhanādiviṣayaiḥ 
āśāpāśaiḥ | nibaddhāḥ svādhinīkṛtāḥ | kṛpaṇatām dainyasya parāṃ kāṣṭhām |
 gatāḥ || MoT_4,29.9 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
nanu tataḥ kiṃ teṣāṃ sampannam ity | atrāha<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;mudhaiva hy anahaṅkārair mamatvam upakalpitam /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;rajjvām bhujaṅgatvam iva dāmavyālakaṭais tataḥ // Mo_4,29.10 //<br>
hi niścaye | anahaṅkāraiḥ ahaṅkārarahitaiḥ | dāmavyālakaṭaiḥ | tataḥ 
ahaṅkāravaśena dainyagamanānantaram | mamatvam mamatā | mudhā eva 
vyartham eva | upakalpitam kalpanayā dṛḍhīkṛtam | kim iva | rajjvām 
bhujaṅgatvam iva | atyantam mithyābhūtam ity arthaḥ || MoT_4,29.10 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
mamatvam eva kathayati<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;āpādamastakaṃ dehalateyam bhavatu sthirā /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;mameti tṛṣṇākṛpaṇā dīnatāṃ te samāyayuḥ // Mo_4,29.11 //<br>
spaṣṭam || MoT_4,29.11 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;sthirībhavatu me dehaḥ sukhāyāstu dhanam mama /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;iti baddhadhiyāṃ teṣāṃ dhairyam antardhim āyayau // Mo_4,29.12 //<br>
spaṣṭam || MoT_4,29.12 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;avāsanatvād vapuṣām anāsthatvāt suradviṣām /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;yābhūt prahāraparatā mārjitaivāśu sābhavat // Mo_4,29.13 //<br>
suradviṣām dāmavyālakaṭānām | avāsanatvāt vāsanārāhityāt | tathā vapuṣām
 anāsthatvāt śarīrāsthārahitatvāt | yā prahāraparatā abhūt pūrvam āsīt |
 sā āśu mārjitā naṣṭā | abhavat | ahaṅkāraprabhāvena 
dehanāśādibhayotpādāt ity arthaḥ || MoT_4,29.13 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;kathaṃ sthirā jagaty asmin bhavema iti cintayā /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;vedhitā dīnatāṃ jagmuḥ padmā iva nirambhasaḥ // Mo_4,29.14 //<br>
vedhitāḥ vyāptāḥ || MoT_4,29.14 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;teṣāṃ tv arthānnapāneṣu svāhaṅkṛtimatāṃ ratiḥ /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;babhūva bhavabhāvasthā bhīṣaṇā bhavabhāginī // Mo_4,29.15 //<br>
svā ahaṅkṛtir dehaviṣayaḥ ahaṅkāraḥ vidyate yeṣām | te | tādṛśāḥ | teṣāṃ
 ratiḥ āsaktiḥ | rāga iti yāvat | bhavabhāvasthā saṃsārikapadārthaviṣayā
 | bhavabhāginī saṃsārapradā || MoT_4,29.15 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;atha tasmin raṇe bhītyā sāpekṣatvam upāyayuḥ /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;mattebhagaṇasaṃrabdhā vane hariṇakā iva // Mo_4,29.16 //<br>
sāpekṣatvam mā mariṣyāma ity evaṃrūpāpekṣāsahitatvam | bhītyā 
maraṇabhayena | hariṇakāḥ kathambhūtāḥ | mattebhānām yaḥ gaṇaḥ | tena 
saṃrabdhāḥ kṣobhayuktāḥ kṛtāḥ || MoT_4,29.16 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
sāpekṣatvam eva spaṣṭayati<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;mariṣyāmo mariṣyāma iti cintāhatāśayāḥ /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;mandam mandaṃ kila bhremuḥ kupitairāvaṇe raṇe // Mo_4,29.17 //<br>
bhremuḥ bhramanti sma || MoT_4,29.17 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;śarīraikārthināṃ teṣām bhītānām maraṇād iti /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;alpasattvatayā mūrdhni kṛtam āpatpradam padam // Mo_4,29.18 //<br>
śarīram ekam kevalam | arthayante iti tādṛśānām | tathā maraṇād bhītānām
 | teṣām mūrdhni | iti pūrvoktaprakāreṇa | alpasattvatayā kartryā | 
padaṃ kṛtam | alpasattvās te jātā iti bhāvaḥ | padaṃ kathambhūtam | 
āpatpradam vipatpradam ity arthaḥ || MoT_4,29.18 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;atha pramlānasattvās te hantum agragatam bhaṭam /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;na śekur indhanakṣīṇā havir dagdhum ivāgnayaḥ // Mo_4,29.19 //<br>
pramlānasattvāḥ naṣṭadhairyāḥ | na śekuḥ na samarthāḥ jātāḥ | kṣīṇam indhanaṃ yeṣām | te indhanakṣīṇāḥ || MoT_4,29.19 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;vibudhānām praharatāṃ sudamyatām upāgatāḥ /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;kṣatavikṣatasarvāṅgās tasthuḥ sāmānyavad bhaṭāḥ // Mo_4,29.20 //<br>
vibudhānām devānām | sudamyatām sunigrāhyatām || MoT_4,29.20 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;bahunātra kim uktena maraṇād bhītacetasaḥ /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;daityā deveṣu valgatsu dudruvuḥ samarājirāt // Mo_4,29.21 //<br>
spaṣṭam || MoT_4,29.21 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;teṣu dravatsu sarveṣu sarvato dānavādriṣu /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;dāmavyālakaṭākhyeṣu vikhyāteṣv asurālaye // Mo_4,29.22 //<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;taddaityasainyam apatat khād vidrutam itas tataḥ /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;kalpāntapavanādhūtaṃ tārājālam ivābhitaḥ // Mo_4,29.23 //<br>
spaṣṭam || MoT_4,29.22-23 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
kutrāpatad ity apekṣāyām āha<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;amarācalakuñjeṣu śikharāṇāṃ śilāsu ca /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;taṭeṣu vārirāśīnām payodapaṭaleṣu ca // Mo_4,29.24 //<br>
spaṣṭam || MoT_4,29.24 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;sāgarāvartagarteṣu śvabhreṣv atha saritsu ca /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;jaṅgaleṣu diganteṣu jvalatsu vipineṣu ca // Mo_4,29.25 //<br>
spaṣṭam || MoT_4,29.25 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;tadraṇotsannakośeṣu grāmeṣu nagareṣu ca /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;aṭavīṣūgrayakṣāsu maruṣūdyaddavāgniṣu // Mo_4,29.26 //<br>
teṣām asurāṇām | raṇena utsannaḥ viśīrṇaḥ | kośaḥ madhyaṃ yeṣām | teṣu || MoT_4,29.26 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;lokālokācalānteṣu parvateṣu hradeṣu ca /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;andhradramiḍakāśmīrapārasīkapureṣu ca // Mo_4,29.27 //<br>
spaṣṭam || MoT_4,29.27 ||<br>

<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;nānāmbhodhitaraṅgāsu gaṅgājalaghaṭāsu ca /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;dvīpāntareṣu dūreṣu jambuṣaṇḍalatāsu ca // Mo_4,29.28 //<br>
dūreṣu dūravartiṣu || MoT_4,29.28 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;sarvataḥ parvatākārāḥ patitās te 'surālayaḥ /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;visphoṭitāṅgacaraṇā vaṃ hasantīty | atrāha<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;akṣībakṣībayor aikyaṃ kva kilehājñatajjñayoḥ /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;āndhyaprakāśayor bodhe syāc chāyātapayor iva // Mo_4,31.22 //<br>
akṣībakṣībayoḥ svātmānandākhyamadhupānena tadapānena ca saṃsāram prati 
vismaraṇāvismaraṇaśīlayoḥ | tajjñājñayor bodhe anubhave | aikyam 
parasparasammatirūpam aikyam | kva syāt | na syād ity arthaḥ | na hi 
kṣībākṣībayor iha bodhe sammatiḥ dṛśyata iti bhāvaḥ | ataḥ ete hasantīty
 āśayaḥ | tayoḥ kayor iva | chāyātapayor iva | yathā 
āndhyaprakāśarūpayoḥ chāyātapayoḥ bodhe padārthaprakaṭanākhye bodhe | 
aikyaṃ nāsti | tathety arthaḥ || MoT_4,31.22 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
nanu kimarthaṃ tayoḥ bodhe aikyaṃ nāstīty | atrāha<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;yatnenāpy anubhūte 'rthe satye kartum apahnavam /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;tajjño 'jñaś ca na śaknoti śava ākramaṇaṃ yathā // Mo_4,31.23 //<br>
anubhūte | ata eva satye satyatayā jñāte | arthe cinmātrākhye jagadākhye
 ca vastuni | tajjñaḥ ajñaḥ ca yatnenāpi apahnavaṃ kartuṃ na śaknoti | 
puraḥsphurattvāt | na hi puraḥ sphurat vastu kaścid apahnotuṃ śaknoti | 
ata eva tayoḥ bodhe aikyaṃ nāstīti bhāvaḥ | kaḥ yathā na śaknoti | śavo 
yathā | yathā śavaḥ ākramaṇam padārthākramaṇam | na śaknoti | tathety 
arthaḥ || MoT_4,31.23 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
nanu tarhi ajño 'py etad eva kathayatv ity | atrāha<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;brahma sarvaṃ jagad iti vaktuṃ tajjñasya yujyate /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;yato 'vidyānanubhave sa tad evānubhūtavān // Mo_4,31.24 //<br>
sarvaṃ jagad brahma bhavati | iti evam | vaktum tajjñasya 
cinmātrākhyabrahmasvarūpajñasya | yujyate | yataḥ sa eva tajjñaḥ eva | 
tat brahma | anubhūtavān dṛṣṭavān | kasmin sati | avidyāyāḥ ananubhave 
jagatpadārtharūpaiḥ bhāvābhāvaiḥ upalakṣitāyāḥ avidyāyāḥ adarśane sati 
|| MoT_4,31.24 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
punar api etad eva kathayati<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;prabuddhaviṣaye hy eṣā rāma vāk pravirājate /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;buddhasyāsmīti rūpeṇa kila nāsty eva kiñcana // Mo_4,31.25 //<br>
he rāma | eṣā vāk sarvam brahmeti vāk | prabuddhākhyo yaḥ viṣayaḥ yogyo 
deśaḥ | tatra pravirājate | arthāt abuddhaviṣaye na rājate iti jñeyam | 
nanu kathaṃ tatraiva rājate ity | atrāha buddhasyeti | yataḥ iti śeṣaḥ |
 yataḥ buddhasya kiñcana kiñcid api śarīrādikam | asmīti rūpeṇa nāsti 
asmīti jñānaviṣayaṃ nāsti | ayam bhāvaḥ | ajñaḥ deho 'ham iti niścitaḥ 
tadupayogīni vastūny api satyānīti jānāti | anyathā tadarthaṃ 
rātrindinam prayatnaparatvāyogāt | jñas tu dehābhimānābhāvāt 
tadupayogiṣu satyatāṃ na jānāti | anyathā tadviṣayāyā upekṣāyā ayogāt | 
iti tajjñasyaiva sarvam brahmeti vaktuṃ yuktaṃ nājñasyeti || MoT_4,31.25
 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
nanu tajjñasyāsyā anubhūteḥ kadācid apahnavo 'sti na vety | atrāha<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;brahmaivedam paraṃ śāntam ity evānubhavan sudhīḥ /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;apahnavaḥ svānubhūteḥ kartuṃ tasya na yujyate // Mo_4,31.26 //<br>
sudhīḥ jñaḥ | idam jagat | śāntam param brahmaiva bhavati | ity eva evam
 eva | anubhavan bhavati | ataḥ tasya jñasya | asyāḥ svānubhūteḥ 
apahnavaḥ kartuṃ na yujyate yukto na bhavati || MoT_4,31.26 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
nanu tarhi tvaṃ kathaṃ śrīvasiṣṭha iti nāmayogyo 'sīty | atrāha<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;parasmād vyatirekeṇa nāham ātmani kiñcana /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;hemanīvormikāditvaṃ na mayy asti vasiṣṭhatā // Mo_4,31.27 //<br>
aham vasiṣṭhākhyaḥ aham | ātmani svasmin | parasmāt uttīrṇāt cinmātrāt |
 vyatirekeṇa nāsmi | tvaṃ tu yat paśyasi tat paśyeti bhāvaḥ | ato mayi 
vasiṣṭhatā vasiṣṭheti nāmayogyatā | nāsti | kim iva | ūrmikāditvam iva |
 yathā ūrmikāditvaṃ hemani nāsti | tathety arthaḥ | ato 'ham api 
vasiṣṭho nāsmīti bhāvaḥ || MoT_4,31.27 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
nanu yadi tvaṃ svātmanīdṛśo 'si tarhi mūḍhaḥ kīdṛśo 'stīty | atrāha<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;bhūtatvavyatirekeṇa mūḍho nātmani kiñcana /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;ūrmyādibuddhau hemeva nājñe 'sti paramārthatā // Mo_4,31.28 //<br>
mūḍhaḥ cinmātrasvarūpaparamātmajñānahīnaḥ | ātmani | bhūtatvavyatirekeṇa
 dehabhāvād ṛte | kiñcana kiñcid api | nāsti | tajjñas tu taṃ yadrūpam 
paśyati tadrūpam paśyatv iti bhāvaḥ | yataḥ ajñe paramārthatā 
paramārthabhūtacinmātrabhāvaḥ | nāsti | sa hi svaṃ cinmātrarūpaṃ na 
paśyati | kim iva | hemeva | yathā ūrmyādibuddhau ūrmikādibuddhau sati |
 hema nāsti | tathety arthaḥ || MoT_4,31.28 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
saṅgṛhya kathayati<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;mithyāhantāmayo mūḍhaḥ satyaikātmamayaḥ sudhīḥ /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;yujyate na kvacin nāma svabhāvāpahnavo 'nayoḥ // Mo_4,31.29 //<br>
mūḍhaḥ ajñaḥ | mithyābhūtā yā ahantā dehaviṣayaḥ ahaṅkāraḥ | tanmayaḥ 
bhavati | sudhīḥ tajjñaḥ | satyaḥ satyabhūtaḥ | yaḥ ekātmā sarvavyāpakaḥ
 paramātmā | tanmayaḥ bhavati | nāma niścaye | anayoḥ mūḍhasudhiyoḥ | 
svabhāvasya mithyāhaṅkārākhyasya paramārthākhyasya ca svarūpasya | 
apahnavaḥ apalāpaḥ | kvacit na yujyate | na hi puraḥ sphurat svasvarūpaṃ
 kaścid apahnotuṃ śaknoti || MoT_4,31.29 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
etad eva sadṛṣṭāntam āha<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;yo yanmayas tasya tasmin yujyate 'pahnavaḥ katham /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;puruṣasya ghaṭo 'smīti vākyam unmattataiva hi // Mo_4,31.30 //<br>
yaḥ puruṣaḥ | yanmayaḥ niścayadvāreṇa yatsvarūpaḥ syāt | tasya puruṣasya
 | tasmin svarūpe | apahnavaḥ katham syāt | hi yasmāt | puruṣasya ghaṭo 
'smīti vākyam unmattatā eva bhavati | ataḥ brahmātmatve niścitasya 
jñasya sthūladehātmatve niścitasyājñasya ca svānubhūter apahnavaḥ na 
yukta iti bhāvaḥ || MoT_4,31.30 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
prakṛtam phalitatvenānusmarati<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;tasmān neme vayaṃ satyā na ca dāmādayaḥ kvacit /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;asatyās te vayaṃ ceme nāsti naḥ khalu sambhavaḥ // Mo_4,31.31 //<br>
yataḥ svapratītisiddham evāsmākaṃ dāmādīnāṃ ca svarūpaṃ tasmāt tato 
hetoḥ | ime vayaṃ satyāḥ na bhavāmaḥ | dāmādayaś ca satyāḥ na bhavanti |
 pratyuta te dāmādayaḥ | asatyāḥ bhavanti | ime vayaṃ cāsatyā bhavāmaḥ |
 yataḥ naḥ sthūlarūpāṇām asmākam | sambhavaḥ sattāyogyatā | nāsti | na 
hi pratītimātreṇāsad vastu sad bhavitum arhati | śaśaśṛṅgāder api 
sattvaprasaṅgād iti bhāvaḥ || MoT_4,31.31 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
nanu tarhi tajjñasyāpi cinmātrākhyaṃ svarūpam asmadādivat pratītisiddham evāstīti so 'pi asad eva syād ity | atrāha<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;satyasaṃvedanaṃ śuddham bodhālāśaṃ nirañjanam /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;satyaṃ sarvagataṃ śāntam asty anastamitodayam // Mo_4,31.32 //<br>
satyam yat saṃvedanam | tadrūpaṃ ghaṭādisaṃvedyādūṣitasaṃvedanarūpam iti
 yāvat | na hi ghaṭādisaṃvedyopahitasya saṃvedanasya satyatvaṃ yuktam | 
saṃvedyanāśena tasyāpi naṣṭakalpatvāt | nāpi saṃvedyasya satyatvaṃ 
yuktam | pratītimātrasāratvāt | śuddham cetyākhyamalādūṣitam | ata eva 
nirañjanam nirlepam | satyam sarvasāratvena sthitatvāt satyaṃ rūpaṃ | 
sarvagatam sākṣitayā sāratvena ca sthitatvāt sarvavyāpakam | śāntam 
svasvarūpe viśrāntam | anastamitodayam bodhākāśam cinmātrākāśam | asti 
paramārthataḥ sattām bhajati | ataḥ pratītimātrasiddhatvābhāvāt 
paramārthasati cinmātrasvarūpe svatayā niścitasya jñasya nāsatyatvam iti
 bhāvaḥ || MoT_4,31.32 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
cidātmānam eva punaḥ punaḥ viśinaṣṭi<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;sarvaṃ sat tac ca niḥśūnyaṃ nakiñcid iva saṃsthitam /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;tatra vyomni vibhāntīmā nijā bhāso 'ṅga dṛṣṭayaḥ // Mo_4,31.33 //<br>
sat sarvopādanatvena sthitatvāt satsvarūpam | na hi asat upādānībhavitum
 arhati | ata eva niḥśūnyam śūnyetarasvarūpam | tathāpi nakiñcit iva 
sthitam bāhyāntaḥkaraṇāgocaratvāt śūnyavat tiṣṭhat | tat cinmātrākhyaṃ 
vastu | sarvam samastaṃ jagat | bhavati | atra hetutvenottarārdhaṃ 
kathayati tatreti | yata iti śeṣaḥ | yataḥ tatra vyomni cinmātrākāśe | 
imāḥ puraḥ sphurantyaḥ | dṛṣṭayaḥ jagadrūpāḥ pratītayaḥ | vibhānti 
sphuranti | dṛṣṭayaḥ kāḥ | nijāḥ bhāsaḥ nijāni kacakāni | na tu 
svavyatiriktā ity arthaḥ | sarvasaṃvitsākṣikeṇa svapnadṛṣṭānte etat 
svasiddham eveti nātrāyastam || MoT_4,31.33 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
etad eva sadṛṣṭāntaṃ kathayati<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;yathā taimirikākṣasya sahajā eva dṛṣṭayaḥ /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;keśoṇḍukādivad bhānti tathemās tatra sṛṣṭayaḥ // Mo_4,31.34 //<br>
yathā taimirikākṣasya timirarogopahatanetrasya puruṣasya | sahajāḥ eva |
 na tv āgantukāḥ | dṛṣṭayaḥ netraraśmayaḥ | keśoṇḍukādivat 
keśakūrcādivat | bhānti sphuranti | tathā tatra cinmātrākhya ākāśe | 
imāḥ sṛṣṭayaḥ bhānti | etā api cinmātraraśmirūpā eveti bhāvaḥ | 
ādiśabdena dvicandrādeḥ grahaṇam || MoT_4,31.34 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
nanu kena yatnena nijaraśmirūpaṃ jagad asau karotīty | atrāha<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;sa ātmānaṃ yathā vetti tathānubhavati kṣaṇāt /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;cidākāśas tato 'satyam api satyaṃ tadīkṣaṇāt // Mo_4,31.35 //<br>
saḥ cidākāśaḥ | ātmānam svasvarūpam | yathā yena prakāreṇa yuktam | 
vetti jānāti | tathā tena prakāreṇa yuktam | anubhavati sākṣāt paśyati |
 ataḥ asatyam api jagat | tadīkṣaṇāt cidākāśasya vīkṣaṇāt | satyam 
bhavati | svapnajagad iva svapnadraṣṭrā vīkṣaṇāt | ato yatnarahitam 
evāsau etat karotīti bhāvaḥ || MoT_4,31.35 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
phalitaṃ siddhāntaṃ kathayati<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;na satyam asti nāsatyam iha tasmāj jagattraye /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;yad yathā vetti cidrūpaṃ tat tathodety asaṃśayam // Mo_4,31.36 //<br>
tasmāt tato hetoḥ | iha jagattraye kiñcit na satyam asti nāpi asatyam 
asti | cidrūpam cidātma | yat vastu | yathā vetti | tat tathā asaṃśayam 
udeti | svapnavad iti śeṣaḥ || MoT_4,31.36 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
anena phalitaṃ dāmādisāmyaṃ svasya kathayati<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;yathā dāmādayas tadvad eveme 'bhyuditā vayam /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;satyāsatyāḥ kim atrāṅga tān praty api vikalpanā // Mo_4,31.37 //<br>
ata iti śeṣaḥ | ataḥ yathā dāmādayaḥ satyāsatyāḥ bhāsamānatvena satyāḥ 
paramārthatas tv asatyāḥ | abhyuditāḥ prādurbhūtāḥ bhavanti | ime vayaṃ 
tadvad eva satyāsatyāḥ abhyuditāḥ bhavāmaḥ | tulyanyāyāt iti bhāvaḥ | he
 aṅga | ataḥ atra ihaloke | tān praty api tān praty eva | vikalpanā 
satyatvakalpanā | kim asti | yadi svasatyaṃ kalpayasi tarhi tān api kurv
 iti bhāvaḥ || MoT_4,31.37 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
nanu kathaṃ dāmādīnām asmākaṃ ca parasparaṃ sāmyam astīty | atrāha<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;asyānantasya cidvyomnaḥ sarvagasya nirākṛteḥ /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;cid udeti yathā yāntas tathā sā tatra bhāty alam // Mo_4,31.38 //<br>
asyātmatvena sphurataḥ | anantasya antasākṣitvenāpi sthitatvād 
antarahitasya | sarvagasya sarvavyāpakasya | nirākṛteḥ 
paricchinnākārarahitasya | cidvyomnaḥ cidākāśasya | sambandhinī yā cit 
cidākhyaḥ spandaḥ | antaḥ svabhittau | yathā yena rūpeṇa | udeti 
sphurati | sā cit | tatra tasyāṃ cinmātrabhittau | tathā tena rūpeṇa | 
bhāti kacati | svapnavat iti śeṣaḥ || MoT_4,31.38 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
nanu tathāpi kim prakṛte āyātam ity | atrāha<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;yatra dāmādirūpeṇa saṃvit prakacate svayam /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;tathāsau tatra sampannā tathākārānubhūtitaḥ // Mo_4,31.39 //<br>
tathākārasya dāmādyākārasya yānubhūtiḥ | tataḥ || MoT_4,31.39 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;asmadādisvarūpeṇa saṃvid yatroditā svayam /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;tathāsau tatra sampannā tathākārānubhūtitaḥ // Mo_4,31.40 //<br>
tathākārasyāsmadādyākārasya | yā anubhūtiḥ | tataḥ | tathā ca dāmādibhiḥ sahāsmākaṃ sāmyam eveti bhāvaḥ || MoT_4,31.40 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;svasvapnapratibhāsasya jagad ity abhidhā kṛtā /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;cidvyomno vyomavapuṣas tāpasyeva mṛgāmbutā // Mo_4,31.41 //<br>
vyomavapuṣaḥ atyantaśuddhatvād vyomasvarūpasya | cidvyomnaḥ sambandhinaḥ
 | svaḥ yaḥ svapnapratibhāsaḥ | tasya jagad iti abhidhā jagad iti nāma |
 kṛtā | cidvyomneti bhāvaḥ | kā iva | mṛgāmbutā iva | yathā tāpasya 
mṛgāmbutāmbu iti nāma kriyate | tathety arthaḥ || MoT_4,31.41 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
nanu tarhi sarvaṃ cidvyoma jaganmayam eva kim astīty | atrāha<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;yatra prabuddhaṃ cidvyoma tatra dṛśyābhidhā kṛtā /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;yatra suptaṃ tu tenaiva tatra mokṣābhidhā kṛtā // Mo_4,31.42 //<br>
cidvyoma yatra yasminn aṃśe | prabuddham jagadrūpasvaparāmarśayuktam | 
bhavati | tatra tenaiva cidvyomnaiva | dṛśyābhidhā kṛtā | yatra yasmin 
bhāge | suptam jagadrūpasvarūpāmarśarahitam | bhavati | tatra tenaiva 
mokṣābhidhā kṛtā | tathā ca na sarvaṃ cidvyoma jagatsamayevāstīti bhāvaḥ
 || MoT_4,31.42 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
nanu tarhi cidvyomnaḥ sāṃśatvam āgatam ity | atrāha<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;na ca tat kvacid āsuptaṃ na prabuddhaṃ kadācana /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;cidvyoma kevalaṃ dṛśyaṃ jagad ity avagamyatām // Mo_4,31.43 //<br>
paramārthavicāre kriyamāṇe tat cidvyoma | kvacit kutrāpy aṃśe | kadācana
 jātu | āsuptaṃ na bhavati | prabuddhaṃ ca na bhavati | tatsākṣikayoḥ 
svāpaprabodhayoḥ tadvyatirekeṇa sattāyā ayogāt | na ca tad eva tasya 
viśeṣakam bhavati | ghaṭasyāpi ghaṭaviśeṣakatvaprasaṅgāt | ataḥ 
paramārthavicārayuktena tvayā dṛśyaṃ jagat kevalam 
svāpabodhādidharmarahitam | cidvyometi avagamyatām jñāyatām | 
proktanyāyena mokṣajagattvāpādakayoḥ cinmātrāśrayayoḥ svāpabodhayor 
asambhavāt || MoT_4,31.43 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
atyantarahasyatvāt punaḥ pūrvaślokapūrvārdhoktam evārthaṃ kathayati<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;nirvāṇam eva sargaśrīḥ sargaśrīr eva nirvṛtiḥ /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;nānayoḥ śabdayor arthabhedaḥ paryāyayor iva // Mo_4,31.44 //<br>
nirvāṇam acetyacinmātram | nirvṛtiḥ nirvāṇam | yathā taraṅgajalayoḥ 
bhedo na yuktaḥ | tathā sarganirvāṇayor api bhedo na yukta iti bhāvaḥ ||
 MoT_4,31.44 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
nanu tarhi jagad iti śabdajñānayoḥ kā gatir ity | atrāha<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;paramārthe jagad iti rūpaṃ vetti svayaṃ svakam /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;yathā taimirikaṃ cakṣuḥ keśoṇḍukam ivekṣitam // Mo_4,31.45 //<br>
asau acetyacidātmā paramārthe paramārthabhūte svasvarūpe | svayaṃ jagad 
iti rūpaṃ vetti | jagadrūpatām paśyatīti yāvat | kim iva | cakṣur iva | 
yathā taimirikam taimirikasambandhi cakṣuḥ svakam raśmirūpaṃ svātmānam |
 keśoṇḍukam iva vetti | tathety arthaḥ | svakaṃ kathambhūtam | īkṣitam 
svasmād bahiḥprasaraṇena dṛṣṭam | anyathā atīndriyatvahāneḥ | atīndriyaṃ
 hi indriyaṃ sarvair uktam || MoT_4,31.45 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
nanu tarhi keśoṇḍukavat bhāsamānatvāt jagat kiñcid asti | tat katham asya nirvāṇarūpatvam uktam ity | atrāha<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;na tat keśoṇḍukaṃ kiñcit sā hi dṛṣṭis tathā sthitā /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;naivaṃ dṛśyam idaṃ kiñcid itthaṃ cidvyoma saṃsthitam // Mo_4,31.46 //<br>
tat bhāsamānam | keśoṇḍukaṃ kiñcid api na bhavati | hi yasmāt | sā 
dṛṣṭiḥ taimirikadṛṣṭiḥ | tathā keśoṇḍukarūpeṇa | sthitā bhavati | yataḥ 
sahasraśaḥ anviṣyamāṇam api keśoṇḍukaṃ hastagrāhyaṃ na bhavati | na 
cānyat tatra tadadhiṣṭhānatvayogyaṃ vastv asti | ato jñāyate dṛṣṭir eva 
tathātvena bhāsate iti bhāvaḥ | proktaṃ nyāyam prakṛte 'pi saṅghaṭayati 
naivam iti | evam idam jagat | kiñcit na bhavati | cidvyoma cidākāśam | 
ittham jagadrūpeṇa | saṃsthitam bhavati | svapne hi cidvyomnaḥ 
jagadrūpeṇa saṃsthitir dṛṣṭā | ato na virodha iti bhāvaḥ || MoT_4,31.46 
||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
siddhāntaṃ kathayati<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;sarvatra sarvam idam asti yathānubhūtaṃ<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;no kiñcana kvacid ihāsti ca nānubhūtam /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;śāntaṃ sad ekam idam ātatam ittham āste<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;santyaktaśaṅkam apabhedam atas tvam āssva // Mo_4,31.47 //<br>
yathānubhūtam evam eva nānātvenānubhūtam | idam sarvam sarvatrāsti | 
bhāsamānatvāt | nānubhūtam anubhavaviṣayatām agataṃ sat | kvacit 
kutracid api deśe | kiñcit leśenāpi | no asti | abhāsamānatvāt | 
anubhūtatvam ananubhūtatvaṃ ca jagataḥ jāgradādau suṣuptādau ca sarveṣāṃ
 svapratītisākṣikam eveti | nātrāyāso yuktaḥ | nanu tarhi sarvadā sat 
kim astīty | atrāha śāntam iti | śāntam anubhavitṛtvena sthitatvāt 
anubhūtatvānanubhūtatvākhyavikārarahitam | ekam advitīyam | ātatam 
samantāt vyāpakam | idam ātmatvena puraḥ sphurat | ittham 
anubhūtatvānanubhūtatvavikāragrastajagadrūpatvena sphurad iti śeṣaḥ | 
sat sanmātrākhyaṃ vastu | āste sarvadā tiṣṭhati | ananubhūtatvāvasthāyām
 api svānanubhūtyanubhavitṛtvena sthitatvāt | phalitaṃ kathayati 
santyakteti | ataḥ tvam santyaktaśaṅkam jagatsatyatvaśaṅkārahitam | 
abhedam bhedabuddhirahitam | āssva tiṣṭha || MoT_4,31.47 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
sargāntaślokenāpy etad eva kathayati<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;śilodarākāraghanam praśāntam<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;mahācito rūpam idaṃ kham accham /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;naivāsti nāstīti dṛśau kvacit sto<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;yac cāsti tat sādhu tad eva bhāti // Mo_4,31.48 //<br>
idam accham kham nakiñcidrūpatvāt nirmalaṃ jagadākhyam ākāśam | 
mahācitaḥ rūpam svarūpam | bhavati | mahācitaḥ rūpaṃ kathambhūtam | 
śilodarasya yaḥ ākāraḥ | tadvad ghanam | cidghanam ity arthaḥ | ata eva 
praśāntam cetyākhyakṣobharahitam | svapnajagataḥ sphuṭaṃ 
cinmātrarūpatvadarśanād iti bhāvaḥ | nanu tarhi bhāvābhāvabuddhiḥ katham
 astīty | atrāha naivāstīti | asti nāstīti dṛśau bhāvābhāvabuddhī | 
kvacit naiva staḥ | ābhāsamātrarūpatvād ity arthaḥ | nanu tathāpi katham
 bhāsamānayoḥ bhāvābhāvayoḥ apahnavaḥ kartuṃ śakyata ity | atrāha yac 
cāstīti | yac ca bhāvābhāvarūpaṃ kiñcit tvaddṛṣṭyā asti | tat sādhu 
samyak | tad eva mahācidrūpam eva | asti | tad vinā sākṣirahitasya 
tasyāsatkalpatvāt | tatpratītisiddhatve tu svapnapadārthavat 
tattvānapāyāc ceti śivam || MoT_4,31.48 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
iti śrībhāskarakaṇṭhaviracitāyāṃ śrīmokṣopāyaṭīkāyāṃ sthitiprakaraṇa ekatriṃśaḥ sargaḥ ||31||<br>

oṃ | śrīrāmaḥ pṛcchati<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;satām apy asatām eva bālayakṣapiśācavat /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;dāmavyālakaṭādīnāṃ duḥkhasyāntaḥ katham bhavet // Mo_4,32.1 //<br>
duḥkhasya nānāyonibhramaṇarūpasya || MoT_4,32.1 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
śrīvasiṣṭha uttaraṃ kathayati<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;dāmavyālakaṭārthaṃ tais tadaiva yamakiṅkaraiḥ /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;prārthitena yamenoktam idaṃ śṛṇu raghūdvaha // Mo_4,32.2 //<br>
spaṣṭam || MoT_4,32.2 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
yamavākyaṃ kathayati<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;yadā viyogam eṣyanti śroṣyanti ca nijāṃ kathām /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;dāmādayas tadā muktā bhaviṣyantīty asaṃśayam // Mo_4,32.3 //<br>
itiśabdaḥ yamavākyasamāptau || MoT_4,32.3 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
atra śrīrāmaḥ pṛcchati<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;svavṛttāntam imaṃ kutra kadā kathaya te katham /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;śroṣyanti bhagavan kena varṇyamānaṃ yathākramam // Mo_4,32.4 //<br>
he bhagavan | tvaṃ yathākramaṃ kathaya | te dāmādayaḥ | imaṃ 
svavṛttāntaṃ kutra deśe | kadā kāle | kena varṇyamāṇam | katham kena 
prakāreṇa | śroṣyanti || MoT_4,32.4 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
śrīvasiṣṭha uttaraṃ kathayati<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;kaśmīreṣu mahāpadmasarasītīrapalvale /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;bhūyo bhūyo 'nubhūyaite matsyayoniparamparām // Mo_4,32.5 //<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;ālānitāśayā lolāḥ kālena layam āgatāḥ /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;tatraiva padmasarasi te bhaviṣyanti sārasāḥ // Mo_4,32.6 //<br>
ālānitāśayāḥ baddhamanasaḥ ||5-6||<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;tatra kalhāramālāsu sarojapaṭalīṣu ca /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;śevālavaravallīṣu taraṅgavalanāsu ca // Mo_4,32.7 //<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;lalatkumudadolāsu nīlotpalalatāsu ca /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;śīkaraughābhralekhāsu śītalāvartavṛttiṣu // Mo_4,32.8 //<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;saraḥsārasasambhogān bhuktvā bhuvanabhūṣaṇāḥ /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;vihṛtya suciraṃ kālam alam āgataśuddhayaḥ // Mo_4,32.9 //<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;te viyuktā bhaviṣyanti muktaye labdhayuktayaḥ /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;rajaḥsattvatamāṃsīva bhedaprāptyā yadṛcchayā // Mo_4,32.10 //<br>
taraṅgarūpāḥ yāḥ valanāḥ dolāviśeṣāḥ | tāsu | saraḥsārasānāṃ sambhogāḥ |
 tān | sārasocitān bhogān ity arthaḥ | āgataśuddhayaḥ prāptakāṣāyapākāḥ |
 ata eva bhuvanabhūṣaṇāḥ ārṣam puṃstvam | labdhā yuktiḥ viyogarūpā 
yuktiḥ yaiḥ | te | tādṛśāḥ | yadṛcchayā na tu prayatnena | te kānīva | 
rajaḥsattvatamāṃsīva | yathā tāni yadṛcchayā siddhayā | bhedaprāptyā 
viyuktāni bhaviṣyanti | tathety arthaḥ || MoT_4,32.7-10 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;kaśmīramaṇḍalasyāntar nagaraṃ nagaśobhitam /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;nāmnādhiṣṭhānam ity etac chrīmat tatra bhaviṣyati // Mo_4,32.11 //<br>
spaṣṭam || MoT_4,32.11 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;pradyumnaśikharaṃ nāma tasya madhye bhaviṣyati /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;śṛṅgaṃ laghu sarojasya kośacakram ivodare // Mo_4,32.12 //<br>
kośacakram karṇikā || MoT_4,32.12 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;tasya mūrdhni girer gehaṃ ko 'pi rājā kariṣyati /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;abhraṅkaṣamahāsālaṃ śṛṅge śṛṅgam ivāparam // Mo_4,32.13 //<br>
spaṣṭam || MoT_4,32.13 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;gṛhasyeśānakoṇādriśirobhittivraṇodare /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;tasyāniśam aviśrāntavātoddhūtatṛṇāṅkite // Mo_4,32.14 //<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;ālaye dānavo vyālaḥ kalaviṅko bhaviṣyati /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;prathamālpaśrutacchāttra ivārtharahitāraṭiḥ // Mo_4,32.15 //<br>
kalaviṅkaḥ kathambhūtaḥ | artharahitam āraṭati kūjatīti artharahitāraṭiḥ
 | ka iva | prathamam alpaśrutaḥ chāttraḥ prathamālpaśrutacchāttraḥ | sa
 iva | alpaśrutaḥ chāttro hi artharahitam eva raṭati | tataḥ kālena tu 
sārtham api raṭatīti prathamagrahaṇam || MoT_4,32.14-15 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;tasminn eva tadā kāle tatra rājā bhaviṣyati /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;śrīyaśaskaradevākhyaḥ śakraḥ svarga ivāparaḥ // Mo_4,32.16 //<br>
spaṣṭam || MoT_4,32.16 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;dānavo dāmanāmā tu maṣakas tasya sadmani /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;bhaviṣyati bṛhatstambhapṛṣṭhacchidre mṛdudhvaniḥ // Mo_4,32.17 //<br>
spaṣṭam || MoT_4,32.17 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
kaṭāvasthām prastauti<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;adhiṣṭhānābhidhe tasminn evogranagare tadā /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;ratnāvalīvihārākhyo vihāro 'pi bhaviṣyati // Mo_4,32.18 //<br>
vihāraḥ krīḍāpradeśaḥ || MoT_4,32.18 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;tasmiṃs tadbhūmipāmātyo narasiṃha iti śrutaḥ /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;karāmalakavad dṛṣṭabandhamokṣo bhaviṣyati // Mo_4,32.19 //<br>
tasmin tatra vihāre | tasya bhūmipasyāmātyaḥ tadbhūmipāmātyaḥ || MoT_4,32.19 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;bhaviṣyati gṛhe tasya krīḍanakrakaraḥ khagaḥ /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;kaṭo māyāsuro nāma kṛtahiñjīrapañjaraḥ // Mo_4,32.20 //<br>
kṛtaḥ hiñjīrapañjaraḥ lohapañjaraḥ yasya | tādṛśaḥ || MoT_4,32.20 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;sa nṛsiṃho nṛpāmātyaḥ ślokair viracitām imām /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;dāmavyālakaṭādīnāṃ kathayiṣyati saṅkathām // Mo_4,32.21 //<br>
nṛsiṃhaḥ narasiṃhaḥ | dāmavyālakaṭādīnām sambandhinīṃ kathām | ādiśabdena śambarādīnāṃ grahaṇam || MoT_4,32.21 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;sa kaṭaḥ krakaraḥ śrutvā tāṃ kathāṃ saṃsmṛtātmabhūḥ /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;śāntamithyāhamaṃśo 'ntaḥ paraṃ nirvāṇam eṣyati // Mo_4,32.22 //<br>
krakaraḥ pakṣaviśeṣarūpaḥ | sa kaṭaḥ tām svasambandhinīṃ kathāṃ śrutvā |
 saṃsmṛtā ātmabhūḥ svotpattiḥ yena | tādṛśaḥ | ata eva śāntaḥ 
mithyārūpaḥ ahamaṃśaḥ yasya | tādṛśaḥ san | param utkṛṣṭam | nirvāṇam 
brahmaṇy ātyantikaṃ layam | eṣyati gamiṣyati || MoT_4,32.22 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;pradyumnaśikharaprāntavāstavyaḥ kalaviṅkakaḥ /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;tathaiva svakathāṃ śrutvā paraṃ nirvāṇam eṣyati // Mo_4,32.23 //<br>
tathaiva kaṭavat eva || MoT_4,32.23 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;rājamandiradārvantar vraṇavāstavyatāṃ gataḥ /<br>

prasaṅgena kathāprasaṅgena || MoT_4,32.24 ||<br>

saṅgṛhya kathayati<br>

&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;vihārāt krakaraś ceti mokṣam eṣyanti rāghava // Mo_4,32.25 //<br>
spaṣṭam || MoT_4,32.25 ||<br>

&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;bhramayaty aparijñātā mṛgatṛṣṇāmbudhīr iva /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;saṃśāmyati parijñātā mṛgatṛṣṇāmbudhīr iva // Mo_4,32.27 //<br>

<br>
padād adhaḥpātam eva kathayati<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;kva bhrūkṣepaviniṣpiṣṭamerumandarasahyatā /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;kva rājagṛhadārvantar vraṇe maṣakarūpatā // Mo_4,32.29 //<br>
spaṣṭam || MoT_4,32.29 ||<br>

&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;kva capeṭacchaṭāmātrapātitārkendubimbatā /<br>

spaṣṭam || MoT_4,32.30 ||<br>

<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;kva puṣpalīlayālolakaratolitamerutā /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;kvārṣyaśṛṅge nṛsiṃhasya gṛhe krakarapotatā // Mo_4,32.31 //<br>
arṣyaśṛṅge pradyumnaśṛṅge || MoT_4,32.31 ||<br>

<br>
<br>
nanu katham āpatataḥ satyabhūtasyādhaḥpātasya nivṛttiḥ śakyakriyety | atrāha<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;cidākāśo hi mithyaiva rajasārañjitaprabhaḥ /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;svarūpam atyajann eva virūpam iva budhyate // Mo_4,32.32 //<br>
hi yasmāt | cidākāśaḥ mithyā rajasā rajoguṇākhyadūlyā | ārañjitaprabhaḥ 
rūṣitaprakāśaḥ | svarūpam cittvākhyaṃ svarūpam | atyajann eva | virūpam 
iva | bhāvapradhāne nirdeśaḥ | virūpatvam iva | svarūpaviruddhaṃ 
jaḍatvam iva | budhyate anubhavati | paramārthatas tu na budhyate 
itīvaśabdopādānam | ataḥ rajjusarpāpātavat 
virūpatvāparaparyāyādhaḥcyutyāpātaḥ na durvāra iti bhāvaḥ || MoT_4,32.32
 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
punar apy etad eva kathayati<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;svayaiva vāsanābhrāntyā satyayevāpy asatyayā /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;mṛgatṛṣṇāmbubuddhyeva yāti jantur avāntaram // Mo_4,32.33 //<br>
jantuḥ cidekasāraḥ dehābhimānī jīvaḥ | svayā svāvyatiriktayā | 
vāsanābhrāntyā śarīre ātmatvavāsanārūpeṇa bhrameṇa | avāntaram 
viśrāntipradeśād bhinnaṃ śarīrāhambhāvākhyam avāntaram pradeśaṃ | yāti |
 kathambhūtayā | paramārthataḥ asatyayāpi bhāsamānatvāt satyayā | ayam 
bhāvaḥ | yathā puruṣaḥ kañcid deśaṃ gantukāmaḥ taddeśavāsanākṛtayā 
bhrāntyāvāntarapradeśān yāti | tathā jīvaḥ citsvarūpaṃ svātmānaṃ 
gantukāmaḥ tadvāsanākṛtayā bhrāntyā deharūpe ātmani tiṣṭhatīti | ataḥ 
vāsanākṛta evādhaḥpāto 'stīti | vāsanayā kayeva | mṛgatṛṣṇāmbubuddhyā 
iva | yathā mṛgaḥ viśrāntisthānabhūtaṃ jaladeśaṃ gantukāmaḥ 
mṛgatṛṣṇāmbubuddhyā marudeśe tiṣṭhati | tathety arthaḥ || MoT_4,32.33 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
nanu kenopāyenādhaḥpāto nivartate ity | atrāha<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;taranti te bhavāmbhodhiṃ svapravāhadhiyaiva ye /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;śāstreṇāsad idaṃ dṛśyam iti nirvāsanaṃ sthitāḥ // Mo_4,32.34 //<br>
te puruṣāḥ | svapravāhabuddhyā eva svapravāhena sthitāḥ | na tu 
gurvādipreritā yā buddhiḥ | tayā eva | bhavāmbhodhim taranti te | ke ye |
 śāstreṇopāyabhūtenādhyātmaśāstreṇa iti | nirvāsanam 
dṛśyasaṃskārarahitam | sthitā iti | kim iti | idam anubhūyamānam | 
dṛśyam | asat sattārahitam | bhavati | pratītimātrasāratvāt ity arthaḥ |
 ataḥ śāstrasyaivātra mukhyam upāyatvam iti bhāvaḥ || MoT_4,32.34 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
śuṣkatarkāṇām etadupāyatvaṃ nirvārayati<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;tārārāvavikārīṇi śuṣkatarkamatāni ye /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;yānti śvabhrajalāny āśu nāśubhaṃ nāśayanti te // Mo_4,32.35 //<br>
ye puruṣāḥ | tāraḥ udbhaṭaḥ | yaḥ ārāvaḥ kathanam | sa eva vikāraḥ | 
tadyuktāni tārārāvavikārīṇi | śuṣkāḥ 
paramātmatattvanirṇayākhyarasarāhityena 
mukhaśoṣakārighaṭapaṭādinirṇayākhyapāruṣyeṇa ca śuṣkatulyāḥ | ye tarkāḥ 
tarkābhāsāḥ | tadyuktāni matāni śuṣkatarkamatāni | yānti | tāny 
evopāyatvenāśrayam | te puruṣāḥ | aśubham saṃsārākhyam anartham | na 
nāśayanti | api tu nānāvikalpagrastatvād vardhayanty eveti bhāvaḥ | 
śuṣkatarkamatāni kāni | śvabhrajalāni śvabhrajalatulyānīti yāvat | 
śvabhrajalāny api tārārāvavikārīṇi śuṣkāni duṣprāpatvāt malānāśakāni ca 
bhavanti || MoT_4,32.35 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
nanu tarhi keṣām aśubhanāśaḥ sampadyata ity | atrāha<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;svānubhūtiprasiddhena mārgeṇāgamagāminā /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;na vināśo bhavaty aṅga gacchatām patatām iva // Mo_4,32.36 //<br>
he aṅga | svā nijā | yā anubhūtiḥ anubhavaḥ | tena prasiddhena 
svānubhavasiddheneti yāvat | tathā āgamam sacchāstram | anugacchatīti 
tādṛśena mārgeṇa gacchatām vināśaḥ aśubhanāśarūpaḥ vināśaḥ | na bhavati |
 teṣām aśubhaṃ na naśyatīty arthaḥ | teṣāṃ keṣām iva | patatām iva | 
yathā patatām kumārgaluṭhitānām | vināśo bhavati | tathaiṣāṃ na 
bhavatīti vyatirekadṛṣṭāntaḥ | svamataviruddhanivartanāya 
svānubhūtiprasiddhenety uktam [...] || MoT_4,32.36 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
nanu yadi tarkamatāśrayaṇenānarthaprāptiḥ syāt tarhi tadapekṣayā sāṃsāriko vyavahāra eva śreyān ity | atrāha<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;idam me syād idam me syād iti buddhimatām matiḥ /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;svena daurbhāgyadainyena na bhasmāpy upatiṣṭhate // Mo_4,32.37 //<br>
idam vastu | me mama | syāt bhavatu | idam me syād iti evam | 
buddhimatām buddhiyuktānām | matiḥ buddhiḥ | svena daurbhāgyadainyena 
nijena mamatākhyadāridryakṛtena dīnatvena | bhasmāpi nopatiṣṭhate na 
prāpnoti | anekārthatvāt dhātūnām upapūrvaḥ tiṣṭhatir atra prāptyarthe 
vartate | āśāmayasya sāṃsārikavyavahārasyātmaprāptyupāyatve nāmāpi 
grahītuṃ na yogyam iti | kā kathā śuṣkatarkāt śraiṣṭhyasyeti bhāvaḥ || 
MoT_4,32.37 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
proktasāṃsārikavyavahārarahitasya śubhaprāptiṃ kathayati<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;vetti nityam udārātmā trailokyam api yas tṛṇam /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;taṃ tyajanty āpadaḥ sarvā rasateva jarattṛṇam // Mo_4,32.38 //<br>
yaḥ udārātmā mamatākhyadāridryarahitaḥ | nityam na tu 
abhimatavastuprāptikāla eva | trailokyam api tṛṇaṃ vetti | tam puruṣam |
 sarvāḥ āpadaḥ tyajanti | atṛpter evāpacchabdapravṛttinimittatvāt | 
āpadaḥ kā iva | rasatā iva | pādapūraṇārtho bhāvapratyayaḥ | rasaḥ iva |
 yathā rasaḥ jarattṛṇaṃ tyajati | tathety arthaḥ || MoT_4,32.38 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
nanu sarvaṃ tyajataḥ kathaṃ śarīrayātrā sidhyatīty | atrāha<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;parisphurati yasyāntar nityaṃ sattvacamatkṛtiḥ /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;brāhmam aṇḍam ivākhaṇḍaṃ lokeśāḥ pālayanti tam // Mo_4,32.39 //<br>
yasya puruṣasya | sattvacamatkṛtiḥ | sattvasya sarvatyāgarūpasya 
dhairyasya | camatkṛtiḥ camatkāraḥ | antaḥ manasi | sphurati | na tu 
dambhālasyādinā vacanamātre eva sphurati | taṃ lokeśāḥ akhaṇḍam samyak |
 pālayanti | kim iva | brahmāṇḍam iva | atyantanirlobhasya kāryam 
brahmāṇḍakāryam iva svayam eva sampadyata iti bhāvaḥ || MoT_4,32.39 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
nanu yadi kadācit tasya durantā vipat syāt tadā kiṃ kāryam ity | atrāha<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;apy āpadi durantāyāṃ naiva rantavyam akrame /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;rāhur apy akrameṇaiva pibann apy amṛtam mṛtaḥ // Mo_4,32.40 //<br>
durantāyām api antarahitāyām | bahvyām apīti yāvat | āpadi vicārayuktena
 puruṣeṇa | akrame śāstrādiviruddhe krame | na rantavyam na laganīyam | 
arthāt svapravāhāgate krame rantavyam iti jñeyam [...] | ataḥ krama eva 
kārya iti bhāvaḥ || MoT_4,32.40 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
kramapradarśakaṃ sacchāstrādikam praśaṃsati<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;sacchāstrasādhusamparkam arkam ugraprakāśadam /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;ye śrayanti na te yānti mohāndhyasya punar vaśam // Mo_4,32.41 //<br>
mohāndhyasyākramarūpasyety arthaḥ || MoT_4,32.41 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
sacchāstrādisevanād utpannān maitryādiguṇān praśaṃsati<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;avaśyā vaśyam āyānti yānti sarvāpadaḥ kṣayam /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;avaśyam bhavati śreyaḥ kreyaṃ yasya guṇair yaśaḥ // Mo_4,32.42 //<br>
avaśyāḥ śatravaḥ | śreyaḥ mokṣākhyam paramakalyāṇam | kreyam grāhyam | 
utpādyam iti yāvat | guṇaiḥ sacchāstrādisevanotpāditaiḥ maitryādiguṇaiḥ |
 tasmāt yaśaütpādakān guṇān evāśrayed iti bhāvaḥ || MoT_4,32.42 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
guṇalubdhatvam praśaṃsati<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;yeṣāṃ guṇeṣv asantoṣo rāgo yeṣāṃ śrutam prati /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;satye vyasanino ye ca te narāḥ paśavo 'pare // Mo_4,32.43 //<br>
asantoṣaḥ apūrṇatā | śrutam adhyātmaśāstram | apare etebhyaḥ vyatiriktāḥ || MoT_4,32.43 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
guṇotpāditaṃ yaśaḥ praśaṃsati<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;yaśaścandrikayā yeṣām bhāsitaṃ janahṛnnabhaḥ /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;teṣāṃ kṣīrasamudrāṇāṃ nūnam mūrtau sthito hariḥ // Mo_4,32.44 //<br>
yeṣām puruṣāṇām | sambandhinyā yaśaścandrikayā maitryādiguṇotpāditayā 
yaśaścandrikayā | janahṛnnabhaḥ janahṛdayaḥ ākāśaḥ | bhāsitam | teṣāṃ 
kṣīrasamudrāṇām candrikotpādakatvasāmyāt kṣīrasamudratulyānām | nūnam 
niścayena | mūrtau hariḥ śrīnārāyaṇaḥ | sthitaḥ bhavati | teṣām manasi 
bhagavān satatam eva sphuratīti bhāvaḥ | yuktaṃ ca kṣīrasamudramūrtau 
śrīharyavasthānam || MoT_4,32.44 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;bhuktam bhoktavyam akhilaṃ dṛṣṭā draṣṭavyadṛṣṭayaḥ /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;kim anyad bhavabhaṅgāya bhūyo bhogeṣv alubdhatā // Mo_4,32.45 //<br>
yuṣmābhiḥ akhilam bhoktavyam bhuktam | kiñcidbhogadvāreṇa 
tatsamānayogakṣemāḥ sarve bhogā bhuktā ity arthaḥ | draṣṭavyāḥ 
darśanīyāḥ | dṛṣṭayaḥ dṛṣṭāḥ | atrāpi pūrvavat eva yojyam | bhūyaḥ punaḥ
 | anyat itarat bhoktavyaṃ draṣṭavyaṃ vā | kim asti | kiñcid api nāstīty
 arthaḥ | ataḥ bhavabhaṅgāya saṃsāranāśāya | alubdhatā lobharāhityam | 
dhāryatām iti śeṣaḥ || MoT_4,32.45 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;yathākramaṃ yathāśāstraṃ yathācāraṃ yathāsthiti /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;sthīyatām mucyatām antar bhogagārdhyam avāstavam // Mo_4,32.46 //<br>
yathācāram svācārasadṛśam | na tv ācārāntaraniṣṭhatayā | tattve hi 
ayuktaṃ kāritvaṃ syāt | yathāsthiti | na tu gṛhasthaḥ san vanasthatayā 
vanastho vā san gṛhasthatayety arthaḥ | antaḥ manasi | bhogagārdhyam 
bhogeṣu gardhaḥ lobhaḥ yasya | saḥ bhogagardhaḥ | tasya bhāvaḥ | tat || 
MoT_4,32.46 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;saṃstavaḥ kriyatāṃ kīrtyā guṇair gaganagāmibhiḥ /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;trāyante mṛtyunopetaṃ na kadācana bhogakāḥ // Mo_4,32.47 //<br>
yuṣmābhiḥ | gaganagāmibhiḥ guṇaiḥ maitryādiguṇaiḥ | utpannayā kīrtyā 
saha | saṃstavaḥ paricayaḥ | kriyatām | nanu bhogaiḥ saha saṃstavaṃ 
tyaktvā kīrtyā saha kimarthaṃ kurma ity | atrāha trāyanta iti | ye 
tādṛśyām maraṇāvasthāyāṃ nopayujyante kiṃ taiḥ saha saṃstaveneti bhāvaḥ 
|| MoT_4,32.47 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
guṇotpāditayaśoyuktān praśaṃsati<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;gāyanti siddhasundaryo yeṣām indusitaṃ yaśaḥ /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;gītibhir gaganābhoge te jīvanti mṛtāḥ pare // Mo_4,32.48 //<br>
pare proktayaśorahitāḥ || MoT_4,32.48 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
nanu yadi proktaguṇārjanenāpi na kiñcit setsyati tadā kiṃ kāryam ity | atrāha<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;paramam pauruṣaṃ yatnam āsthāyādāya sūdyamam /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;yathāśāstram anudvegam ācārāt ko na siddhibhāk // Mo_4,32.49 //<br>
ācārāt guṇārjanarūpāt ācārāt || MoT_4,32.49 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
nanu yadā kadācin mayā guṇārjane yatnaḥ kṛta eva kiṃ tena sampannam ity | atrāha<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;yathāśāstraṃ viharatā tvarā kāryā na siddhiṣu /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;cirakālaparāpakvā siddhiḥ puṣṭaphalā bhavet // Mo_4,32.50 //<br>
spaṣṭam || MoT_4,32.50 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
phalitaṃ kathayati<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;vītaśokabhayāyāsam agardham apayantraṇam /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;vyavahāro yathāśāstraṃ kriyatām mā vinaśyatām // Mo_4,32.51 //<br>
agardham lobharahitam | apayantraṇam bandhanarahitam || MoT_4,32.51 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;jīvo jīrṇāndhakūpeṣu bhaveṣv antardhim āgataḥ /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;bhavatām bhūribhaṅgānām adhunoddhriyatām ataḥ // Mo_4,32.52 //<br>
bhūribhaṅgānām bahunāśayuktānām | bhavatām | jīvaḥ jīrṇāndhakūpeṣu 
duḥkhadatvena jīrṇāndhakūparūpeṣu | bhaveṣu | antardhim gataḥ | kṣīṇa 
iti yāvat | bhavati | ataḥ yuṣmābhiḥ adhunā saḥ jīvaḥ uddhriyatām | 
andhakūpamagnasya hi uddharaṇam avaśyam eva kāryam iti bhāvaḥ || 
MoT_4,32.52 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;itaḥ prabhṛti mā bhūyo gamyatām adharād adhaḥ /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;idaṃ nirdhāryatāṃ śāstram astram āpannivāraṇe // Mo_4,32.53 //<br>
yuṣmābhiḥ | itaḥ prabhṛti asmān madupadeśāt prabhṛti | bhūyaḥ punaḥ | 
adharād adhaḥsthānād | adhaḥ mā gamyatām | yuṣmābhiḥ | idam maduktam | 
etac chāstram | nirdhāryatām niścīyatām | idam kim | āpannivāraṇe astram
 astrabhūtam āpannivārakam ity arthaḥ || MoT_4,32.53 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;raṇe rabhasanirlūnavāraṇe prāṇam ujjhatām /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;kim arthamātrayā kāryam āryāḥ śāstram avekṣyatām // Mo_4,32.54 //<br>
arthamātrayā dhanaleśena arthamātrārtham | raṇādikāryaṃ tyaktvā idam eva śāstram avekṣyatām iti piṇḍārthaḥ || MoT_4,32.54 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;idam bimbam idaṃ nimbam iti matyā vicāryatām /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;svayā parapreraṇayā yāta mā paśavo yathā // Mo_4,32.55 //<br>
idam bimbam bimbaphalam bhavati | idaṃ nimbam nimbaphalam bhavati | iti 
evam | svayā matyā buddhyā | vicāryatām | parapreraṇayā mā yāta mā 
gacchata | ke yathā | paśavo yathā | yathā paśavaḥ parapreraṇayā yānti 
tathā yūyam mā yātety arthaḥ || MoT_4,32.55 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;daurbhāgyadāyinī dīnā śubhahīnāvicāraṇā /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;ghanadīrghamahānidrā tyajyatāṃ samprabudhyatām // Mo_4,32.56 //<br>
yuṣmābhiḥ | avicāraṇā avicārākhyā ghanadīrghā cāsau mahānidrā | sā 
tyajyatām | kathambhūtā sā | daurbhāgyadāyinī āśārūpadāridryadāyinī | 
tāṃ tyaktvā samprabudhyatām | yuktaś ca nidrātyāgānantaram prabodhaḥ || 
MoT_4,32.56 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;suptaiḥ mā sthīyatāṃ vṛddhamandakacchapavac chanaiḥ /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;utthānam aṅgīkriyatāṃ jarāmaraṇaśāntaye // Mo_4,32.57 //<br>
yuṣmābhiḥ | vṛddhamandakacchapavat suptaiḥ svātmavicāre vimukhaiḥ | mā 
sthīyatām | vṛddhamandakacchapo hi suptaḥ tiṣṭhati | śanaiḥ krameṇa | 
jarāmaraṇaśāntaye mokṣāya | utthānam udyogaḥ | aṅgīkriyatām 
nirvāṇamukhyopāyabhūtaṃ sacchāstravicārādi kriyatām ity arthaḥ || 
MoT_4,32.57 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
nanu sukhasādhanadhanādyarjanam apahāya kimartham anyat kurma ity | atrāha<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;anarthāyārthasampattir bhogaugho bhavarogadaḥ /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;āpade sampadaḥ sarvāḥ sarvatrānādaro jayaḥ // Mo_4,32.58 //<br>
arthasampattiḥ anarthāya duḥkhāya bhavati | arjanādau kleśahetutvāt | 
bhogaughaḥ bhavarogadaḥ bhavati | rāgādyutpādakatvāt | sampadaḥ śriyaḥ |
 āpade bhavanti | tāpakāridarpādidoṣotpādakatvāt | sarvatra samaste 
dhanādau bhāvajāte | anādaraḥ tyāgādānavyatiriktasvarūpā upekṣā | jayaḥ 
bhavati || MoT_4,32.58 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;lokatantrānusāreṇa vicārād vyavahāriṇām /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;śāstrācārāviruddhena karmaṇā śarma sidhyati // Mo_4,32.59 //<br>
lokatantrānusāreṇa lokācārānusāreṇa | vicārāt iti lyaplope pañcamī | tena vicāraṃ kṛtvety arthaḥ || MoT_4,32.59 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
sargāntaślokenāpy etad eva kathayati<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;svācāracārucaritasya viviktavṛtteḥ<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;saṃsāraduḥkhalavasaukhyadaśāsv agṛdhnoḥ /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;āyur yaśāṃsi ca guṇāś ca sahaiva lakṣmyā<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;phullanti mādhavalatā iva satphalāya // Mo_4,32.60 //<br>
svācāreṇa śobhanācāreṇa | cārucaritam yasya | saḥ | tādṛśasya | viviktā 
viśiṣṭā | vṛttiḥ vyāpāro yasya | saḥ | tādṛśasya | tathā duḥkhalavarūpāḥ
 ca tāḥ saukhyadaśāḥ duḥkhalavasaukhyadaśāḥ | saṃsārasya yāḥ 
duḥkhalavasaukhyadaśāḥ | tāsu agṛdhnoḥ lobharahitasya puruṣasya | āyuḥ 
yaśāṃsi guṇāś cety etāni vastūni | lakṣmyā sahaiva satphalāya 
mokṣākhyāya śobhanāya phalāya | phullanti vikasanti | mokṣam 
utpādayantīty arthaḥ | etāni vastūni kā iva | mādhavalatāḥ iva | yathā 
mādhavalatāḥ vasantalatāḥ | satphalāya phullanti | tathety arthaḥ | iti 
śivam || MoT_4,32.60 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
iti śrībhāskarakaṇṭhaviracitāyāṃ śrīmokṣopāyaṭīkāyāṃ sthitiprakaraṇe dvātriṃśaḥ sargaḥ ||32||<br>

<br>
<br>
punar api pūrvoktam evārthaṃ kathayati<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;sarvātiśayasāphalyāt sarvaṃ sarvatra sarvadā /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;sambhavaty eva tasmāt svaṃ śubhodyogaṃ na santyajet // Mo_4,33.1 //<br>
sarveṣām atiśayānām yat sāphalyam saphalatā | tato hetoḥ | sarvatra 
sarveṣu deśeṣu | sarvadā sarveṣu kāleṣu | sarvaṃ sambhavaty eva | yataḥ 
atiśayaprayuktānāṃ sarveṣāṃ yatnānāṃ sāphalyam asti | ataḥ sarvatra 
sarvadā sarvaṃ sambhavaty eveti yāvat | phalitaṃ kathayati tasmād iti | 
tasmāt tato hetoḥ | puruṣaḥ svaṃ śubhodyogaṃ na santyajet || MoT_4,33.1 
||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
viśeṣeṇa udyogasya sāphalyaṃ kathayati<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;mitrasvajanabandhūnāṃ nandinānandadāyinā /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;sarasīśvaram ārādhya mṛtyur apy upanirjitaḥ // Mo_4,33.2 //<br>
nandinā nandirudreṇa || MoT_4,33.2 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;sarvotkarṣeṇa vartante devā api vimarditāḥ /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;dānavair dānavāryāḍhyair gajaiḥ padmākarā iva // Mo_4,33.3 //<br>
gajaiḥ kathambhūtaiḥ | dānavāriṇā madajalenāḍhyaiḥ yuktaiḥ || MoT_4,33.3 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;maruttanṛpater yajñe saṃvartena maharṣiṇā /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;brahmaṇevāparaḥ sargo racitaḥ sasurāsuraḥ // Mo_4,33.4 //<br>
spaṣṭam || MoT_4,33.4 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;mahātiśayayuktena viśvāmitreṇa vipratā /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;bhūyo bhūyaḥ prayuktena duṣprāpā tapasārjitā // Mo_4,33.5 //<br>
spaṣṭam || MoT_4,33.5 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;piṣṭātakāmbu duṣprāpaṃ rasāyanam ivāśnatā /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;durbhagenedṛśenāptaḥ kṣīroda upamanyunā // Mo_4,33.6 //<br>
piṣṭātakāmbu | piṣṭamiśritaṃ jalam | īdṛśena durbhagena etādṛśena daridreṇa | āptaḥ | īśvarārādhanayeti śeṣaḥ || MoT_4,33.6 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;trailokyamallāṃs tṛṇavan nighnan viṣṇvabjajādikān /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;yuktyātiśayadārḍhyena kālaḥ śvetena kālitaḥ // Mo_4,33.7 //<br>
yuktyā īśvarārādhanarūpeṇopāyena | śvetena rājaviśeṣeṇa | kathambhūtena |
 atiśaye yatnātiśaye | dārḍhyam dṛḍhatā yasya | tādṛśena || MoT_4,33.7 
||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;praṇayena yamaṃ jitvā kṛtvā vacanasaṅgaram /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;paralokād upānītaḥ sāvitryā satyavān patiḥ // Mo_4,33.8 //<br>
praṇayena snehena | upānīta ity anena sambandhaḥ | vacanasaṅgaram vacanasaṅgrāmam || MoT_4,33.8 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
viśeṣeṇoktvā sāmānyena kathayati<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;na so 'sty atiśayo loke yasyāsti na phalaṃ sphuṭam /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;bhavitavyaṃ vicāryātaḥ sarvātiśayaśālinā // Mo_4,33.9 //<br>
atiśayaḥ yatnātiśayaḥ | phalitaṃ kathayati bhavitavyam iti | ataḥ 
sarvebhyaḥ yaḥ atiśayaḥ udyogākhyaḥ | tena śālatīti tādṛśena puruṣeṇa | 
vicārya bhavitavyam | aśubhaphalasampādakatvād aśubho yatnaḥ na kārya 
iti bhāvaḥ || MoT_4,33.9 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
nanu ko yatnaḥ śubho 'sti | yatnātiśayavān bhavāmīty apekṣāyām āha<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;ātmajñānam aśeṣāṇāṃ sukhaduḥkhadaśādṛśām /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;mūlaṃ kaṣakaraṃ tasmād bhāvyaṃ tatrātiśāyinā // Mo_4,33.10 //<br>
ātmajñānam ko 'ham ity evam ātmavicāraḥ | aśeṣāṇām samastānām | 
sukhaduḥkhadaśādṛśām | mūlaṃ kaṣakaraṃ mūlataḥ nāśakaram | bhavati | 
ātmavicāreṇa hi cidātmani ātmatvena prāpte śarīrānāsthāyāṃ ca jātāyāṃ 
śarīrānubaddhasukhaduḥkhādisparśo na bhavati | tasmāt tato hetoḥ | 
puruṣeṇa | tatra ātmajñāne | atiśayinā atiśayayuktena | bhāvyam || 
MoT_4,33.10 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
nanu dṛśyakṛtaṃ sukhaṃ tyaktvā kimartham atyantabhogatyāgasādhye ātmajñāne puruṣo lagatīty | atrāha<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;nānayopahatārthinyā dṛśyadṛṣṭyātiduṣṭayā /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;duḥkhād ṛte nirābādhaṃ sukhaṃ kiñcid avāpyate // Mo_4,33.11 //<br>
upahataḥ naṣṭaḥ | arthaḥ puruṣārthaḥ | asyām astīti tādṛśyā | ata 
evātiduṣṭayā dṛśyarūpayā dṛṣṭyā dṛśyadṛṣṭyā | dṛśyeneti yāvat | duḥkhād 
ṛte duḥkhāmiśram | ata eva nirābādham bādharahitam | kiñcit sukhaṃ na 
avāpyate | yadi kiñcit prāpyate 'pi duḥkhamiśram evety arthaḥ || 
MoT_4,33.11 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
nanu sarvasya brahmamayatvāt dṛśyadṛṣṭirūpasyāśamasya tannāśarūpasya śamasya ca ko bhedaḥ yenaivaṃ kathayasīty | atrāha<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;aśamaḥ paramam brahma śamaś ca paramam padam /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;yady apy evaṃ tathāpy enam praśamaṃ viddhi śaṅkaram // Mo_4,33.12 //<br>
yady apy evam bhavati | evam katham | aśamaḥ dṛśyakṣobhaḥ | paramam 
brahma bhavati | śamaś ca dṛśyanāśaś ca | paramam padam bhavati | 
tatsāratvāt | tathāpi tvam enam praśamam dṛśyanāśam | śaṅkaram 
kalyāṇakāriṇam | viddhi | śamāśamarūpabrahmaprāptim praty upāyatvāt | 
nanv aśamasya brahmatvaṃ na sidhyati | satyam | brahmatvaṃ tvayā kiṃ 
jñātam | sukhakāritvam iti cen | na | sukhaduḥkhakāritvavyatiriktasya 
brahmatvayogāt | ataḥ sukhakārivat duḥkhakāriṇo 'pi 
svarūpamātraprādhānyena brahmatvānapāyān na tvaccodyāvakāśaḥ | nanu 
tarhi ānandaikarūpatvaṃ katham brahmaṇaḥ kathayantīti cet | tatratya 
ānandaḥ na tvadanubhūta[ ]ttirūpānandarūpo bhavati | kiṃ tu 
apekṣārāhityamātrarūpa evāsau | sarvam brahmeti jñānena hi sarvatra 
heyopādeyatāvyatiriktā mahānandarūpā tṛptyaparaparyāyā upekṣā jāyate | 
sā ca sarvatra sambhavatīti alaṃ codyena || MoT_4,33.12 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
kartavyam upadiśati<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;abhimānam parityajya śamam āśritya śāśvatam /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;vicārya prajñayāryatvaṃ kuryāt sajjanasevanam // Mo_4,33.13 //<br>
abhimānam mayedṛśaḥ śamaḥ kṛta ity evaṃrūpaṃ darpam | śamam 
dṛśyakṣobharāhityam | āryatvam sādhutvam | vicārya kenedaṃ sidhyatīti 
vicāraviṣayaṃ kṛtvā || MoT_4,33.13 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
nanu āryatvasādhanam prasiddhaṃ tapastīrthādikaṃ tyaktvā kim ity aprasiddhaṃ sajjanasevanaṃ kartavyatvenopadiśasīty | atrāha<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;na tapāṃsi na tīrthāni na śāstrāṇi jayanti vaḥ /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;saṃsārasāgarottāre sajjanāsevanaṃ yathā // Mo_4,33.14 //<br>
saṃsārasāgarāt yaḥ āryatvakaraṇadvāreṇa uttāraḥ | tasmin na jayanti na prabhavanti || MoT_4,33.14 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
nanu kiṃlakṣaṇo 'sau sajjanaḥ yasya sevanaṃ kartavyatvenopadiśasīty | atrāha<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;lobhamoharuṣāṃ yasya tanutānudinam bhavet /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;yathāśāstraṃ viharataḥ svakarmasu sa sajjanaḥ // Mo_4,33.15 //<br>
yathāśāstraṃ svakarmasu śarīrayātrānimitteṣu nijeṣu karmasu | viharataḥ 
krīḍayā yatnaṃ kurvataḥ | yasya puruṣasya | anudinam lobhamoharuṣāṃ 
tanutā bhavet | saḥ sajjanaḥ bhavati || MoT_4,33.15 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
nanu mūrkhaśrotriyā api lobhāditānavayuktā dṛśyante | teṣāṃ saṅgenāpi kiñcit setsyaty atha vā nety | atrāha<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;adhyātmaviduṣaḥ saṅgāt tasya sā dhīḥ pravartate /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;atyantābhāva evāsya yayā dṛśyasya dṛśyate // Mo_4,33.16 //<br>
adhyātmaviduṣaḥ adhyātmaśāstrajñasya | tasya lobhāditānavavataḥ 
sajjanasya | saṅgāt | puruṣasya sā dhīḥ pravartate | sā kā | yayā dhiyā 
kāraṇabhūtayā | puruṣeṇa | asya puraḥsphurataḥ | dṛśyasyātyantābhāvaḥ 
traikālikaḥ abhāvaḥ | dṛśyate | ata indriyāsāmarthyādinā 
lobhāditānavavato 'pi mūrkhasya saṅgān na kiñcid api setsyatīti bhāvaḥ 
|| MoT_4,33.16 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
nanu dṛśyātyantābhāvadarśanena kiṃ setsyatīty | atrāha<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;dṛśyātyantābhāvatas tu param evāvaśiṣyate /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;anyābhāvavaśād āśu jīvas tatraiva līyate // Mo_4,33.17 //<br>
tu niścaye | dṛśyātyantābhāvataḥ lakṣaṇayā dṛśyātyantābhāvadarśanād 
dhetoḥ | param dṛśyādhiṣṭhānatvān muktam uttīrṇaṃ cinmātrākhyaṃ vastu | 
eva | avaśiṣyate avaśeṣatvena dṛśyate | nanu tato 'pi kiṃ syād ity | 
atrāhānyābhāveti | tataḥ anyasya paravastuvyatiriktasya | abhāvāt | 
jīvaḥ draṣṭṛtvena sthitaḥ jīvaḥ | tatraiva parasmin vastuny eva | līyate
 | so 'pi tadrūpatvena dṛśyate iti yāvat | 
jīvanmuktābhiprāyeṇaivamarthaḥ kṛtaḥ | videhamuktābhiprāyeṇa tu 
dṛśyātyantābhāvaḥ jīvalayaḥ ca[ ]śenopādhimukta eva jñeyaḥ || 
MoT_4,33.17 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
atyantābhāvasvarūpaṃ kathayati<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;na cotpannaṃ na caivāsīd dṛśyaṃ na ca bhaviṣyati /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;vartamāne 'pi naivāsti param evāsty aveditam // Mo_4,33.18 //<br>
vartamāne vartamānakāle | nanu yadi dṛśyaṃ nāsīt nāsti na bhaviṣyati 
tarhi kim asti | na hi abhāvasya etādṛk prapañcādhiṣṭhānatvaṃ yuktam ity
 | atrāha param eveti | param sākṣitvena sthitatvāt sarvottīrṇaṃ 
cinmātram | eva | asti | svapne tasyaiva prapañcādhiṣṭhānatvena 
dṛṣṭatvāt | tat kathambhūtam | aveditam vedyarahitam | aveditam iti 
karmaṇi ktaḥ || MoT_4,33.18 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
nanu katham etad astīty | atrāha<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;etad yuktisahasreṇa darśitaṃ darśyate 'pi ca /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;sarvair evānubhūtaṃ hi darśayiṣyāmi cādhunā // Mo_4,33.19 //<br>
etat dṛśyaṃ nāsīt nāsti na bhaviṣyatīty etat | nanu katham aprasiddham 
etat darśitam darśyate darśayiṣyasi cety | atrāha sarvair iti | hi 
yasmāt | etat sarvair anubhūtam vartamāne ktaḥ | anubhūyate ity arthaḥ |
 suṣuptāv iti śeṣaḥ | suṣuptau hi sarve dṛśyātyantābhāvam anubhavanti ||
 MoT_4,33.19 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
abhyāsārtham punaḥ etad eva kathayati<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;yathedam akhilaṃ śāntaṃ trijagat saṃvidambaram /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;idaṃ tattvaṃ tv asattvādi kuto 'tra syāt kathañcana // Mo_4,33.20 //<br>
idam anubhūyamānam | akhilaṃ trijagat | śāntam saṃvedyākhyakṣobharahitam
 | saṃvidambaram cidākāśam bhavatīti yathā iti yat bhavati | idam tat | 
tattvam paramārthaḥ bhavati | tu vyatireke | atra saṃvidākāśarūpe jagati
 | asattvādi | asattvam acinmayatvaṃ cety evamādi | kathañcana kutaḥ 
syāt kathañcanāpi na syād ity arthaḥ | dṛṣṭaṃ ca svapnajagataḥ 
saṃvidākāśātmakatvam iti na virodhaḥ || MoT_4,33.20 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
nanu tarhi jagad iti śabdapratyayau kathaṃ rūḍhiṃ gatāv ity | atrāha<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;cic camatkurute cāru cañcalācañcalātmani /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;yat tayaiva tad evedaṃ jagad ity avabudhyate // Mo_4,33.21 //<br>
cañcalā bāhyonmukhatve spandānuviddhā | cit | acañcalātmani 
paramārthataḥ tathāsthitatvāt acañcale svasvarūpe | cāru samyak | yat 
camatkurute svarūpāmarśarūpam āsvādaṃ karoti | tayā eva na tv anyena | 
tad eva camatkaraṇam eva | jagad iti avabudhyate jñāyate | na jagannāma 
kiñcid aparaṃ vastu asti | cidāśrayaviṣayasya svātmaparāmarśasyaiva 
jagattvād iti bhāvaḥ || MoT_4,33.21 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
nanu tathāpi katham bheda iva dṛśyata ity | atrāha<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;trailokyarūpo 'nubhavaś cidādityāṃśumaṇḍalam /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;kva vendvaṃśumator bhedo nirvikatthana kathyatām // Mo_4,33.22 //<br>
trailokyarūpaḥ trailokyākāraḥ | anubhavaḥ | trailokyam iti yāvat | cid 
evādityaḥ | tasyāṃśumaṇḍalam | bhavati | he nirvikatthana he amṛṣāvādin |
 tvayā kathyatām | kim ity apekṣāyām āha | kveti | indvaṃśumatoḥ 
jalamaṇḍalapratibimbitasūryāṃśumaṇḍalarūpasya indoḥ sūryasya ca | bhedaḥ
 kva bhavati | kasmin kāle deśe vā bhavati | yathā 
jalapratibimbitasūryāṃśumaṇḍalarūpasya candrasya sūryasya ca bhāsamāno 
'pi bhedaḥ paramārthataḥ nāsti | tathā 
bāhyāntaḥkaraṇapratibimbitacidādityāṃśumaṇḍalarūpasya jagataḥ 
cidādityasya ca bhāsamāno 'pi bhedaḥ nāsty evety arthaḥ || MoT_4,33.22 
||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
sarvathā bhedābhāvaṃ kathayati<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;svabhāvato 'syāś ciddṛṣṭer ye unmeṣanimeṣaṇe /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;jagadrūpānubhūtes tāv etāv astamayodayau // Mo_4,33.23 //<br>
svabhāvataḥ yatnarahitam | asyāḥ ātmatvena puraḥsthāyāḥ | ciddṛṣṭeḥ 
cidākhyāyāḥ dṛṣṭeḥ | ye unmeṣaṇanimeṣaṇe svavyatiriktaparāmarśarūpam 
unmeṣaṇaṃ svamātraparāmarśarūpaṃ nimeṣaṇaṃ ca bhavataḥ | tau eva 
unmeṣanimeṣau eva | jagadrūpā yā anubhūtiḥ | jagad iti yāvat | tasyāḥ 
astamayodayau bhavataḥ | nimeṣaṇam astamayaḥ | unmeṣaṇam udayaḥ | atha 
vā unmeṣaṇam svarūpaprasāraḥ | nimeṣaṇam svarūpasaṅkocaḥ | iti kṛtvā 
unmeṣaṇam astamayaḥ | nimeṣaṇam udaya iti yojyam | tathā ca bhedagandho 
'pi nāsti | na hi unmeṣanimeṣavataḥ unmeṣanimeṣau bhinnau iti bhāvaḥ | 
etac ca svapne suṣuptau ca sarvapratītisākṣikam eveti nātrāyastam || 
MoT_4,33.23 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
kāraṇatvena samastajagatpradhānabhūtāhaṅkāravarṇanam prastauti<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;ahamartho 'parijñātaḥ paramārthāmbare malaḥ /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;parijñāto 'hamarthas tu paramārthāmbaram bhavet // Mo_4,33.24 //<br>
ahamarthaḥ aham iti śabdābhidheyaṃ vastu | aparijñātaḥ paramārthataḥ 
kiṃrūpo 'yam ity ajñātaḥ san | paramārthāmbare cinmātrākāśe | malaḥ 
bhavati | deharūpatayāvasthānena tadācchādakatvāt | ācchādakatvam eva hi
 malasya svarūpam | tu vyatireke | parijñātaḥ paramārthataḥ evaṃrūpo 
'sāv iti jñātaḥ san | paramārthāmbaram cinmātrākāśa eva bhavati | 
tadrūpatāyām eva viśrāmāt || MoT_4,33.24 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
abhyāsārtham punaḥ punaḥ etad eva kathayati<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;ahambhāvaḥ parijñāto nāhambhāve bhavaty alam /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;ekatām ambunevāmbu yāti cinnabhasātmanā // Mo_4,33.25 //<br>
parijñātaḥ paramārthataḥ kiṃniṣṭho 'yam iti jñātaḥ | ahambhāvaḥ 
ahaṅkāraḥ | ahambhāve nimittasaptamī | sthūlāhambhāvanimittaṃ na bhavati
 | kuta etad ity | atrāhaikatām iti | yataḥ saḥ ahambhāvaḥ cinnabhasā 
cidākāśarūpeṇa | ātmanā ekatāṃ yāti | kim iva | ambu iva | yathāmbu 
ambunā ekatāṃ yāti | tathety arthaḥ | paramārthataḥ kiṃniṣṭho 'yam iti 
ahaṅkāraparamārthasvarūpe jñāte sati ahaṅkāraḥ paramātmaniṣṭho bhavati |
 tataḥ śarīraniṣṭhatārūpām parimitatāṃ nāyātīti bhāvaḥ || MoT_4,33.25 ||<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
nanu katham parijñātaḥ ahambhāvaḥ cidātmanā ekatvaṃ yāti ity | atrāha<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;ahamādijagaddṛśyaṃ kila nāsty eva vastutaḥ /<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;avaśyam eva tat kasmāc chiṣyate 'haṃvicāriṇaḥ // Mo_4,33.26 //<br>
kila niścaye | ahamādi<br>
<br>
<br>
